  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-747">캐스트 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-747">Cast policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-748">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-748">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-749">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-749">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-750">启用 Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-750">启用 Google Cast</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-751">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-751">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-752">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-752">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-753">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-753">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-754">启用此策略以启用 Google Cast。用户将能够从应用程序菜单、页面上下文菜单、启用强制转换的网站上的媒体控件以及（如果显示）强制转换工具栏图标启动它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-754">启用此策略以启用 Google Cast。用户将能够从应用程序菜单、页面上下文菜单、启用强制转换的网站上的媒体控件以及（如果显示）强制转换工具栏图标启动它。</span></span>

         <span data-ttu-id="27a59-755">停用此策略可停用 Google Cast。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-755">停用此策略可停用 Google Cast。</span></span>

         <span data-ttu-id="27a59-756">默认情况下，Google Cast 已启用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-756">默认情况下，Google Cast 已启用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-757">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-757">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-758">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-758">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-759">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-759">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-760">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-760">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-761">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-761">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-762">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-762">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-763">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-763">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-764">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-764">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-765">GP 唯一名称: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-765">GP 唯一名称: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-766">GP 名称: 启用 Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-766">GP 名称: 启用 Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-767">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-767">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-768">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-768">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-769">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-769">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-770">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-770">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-771">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-771">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-772">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-772">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-773">值名称: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-773">值名称: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-774">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-774">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-775">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-775">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-776">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-776">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-777">首选项密钥名称: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-777">首选项密钥名称: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-778">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-778">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-779">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-779">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-780">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-780">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-781">在工具栏中显示投放图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-781">在工具栏中显示投放图标</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-782">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-782">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-783">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-783">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-784">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-784">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-785">将此策略设置为 true 可在工具栏或溢出菜单上显示“强制转换”工具栏图标。用户将无法将其删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-785">将此策略设置为 true 可在工具栏或溢出菜单上显示“强制转换”工具栏图标。用户将无法将其删除。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-786">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则用户可以使用其上下文菜单来固定或删除图标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-786">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则用户可以使用其上下文菜单来固定或删除图标。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-787">如果已将 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 策略设置为 false，则会忽略此策略，并且不显示该工具栏图标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-787">如果已将 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 策略设置为 false，则会忽略此策略，并且不显示该工具栏图标。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-788">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-788">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-789">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-789">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-790">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-790">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-791">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-791">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-792">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-792">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-793">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-793">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-794">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-794">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-795">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-795">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-796">GP 唯一名称: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-796">GP 唯一名称: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-797">GP 名称: 在工具栏中显示投放图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-797">GP 名称: 在工具栏中显示投放图标</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-798">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-798">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-799">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-799">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-800">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-800">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-801">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-801">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-802">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-802">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-803">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-803">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-804">值名称: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-804">值名称: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-805">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-805">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-806">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-806">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-807">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-807">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-808">首选项密钥名称: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-808">首选项密钥名称: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-809">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-809">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-811">HTTP 身份验证 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-811">HTTP 身份验证 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-812">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-812">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-813">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-813">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-814">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-814">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-815">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-815">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-816">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-816">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-817">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-817">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-818">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-818">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-819">일반적으로 피싱 방어로는 해당 기능을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-819">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-820">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-820">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-821">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-821">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-822">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-822">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-823">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-823">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-824">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-824">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-825">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-825">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-826">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-826">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-827">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-827">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-828">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-828">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-829">GP 唯一名称: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-829">GP 唯一名称: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-830">GP 名称: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-830">GP 名称: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-831">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-831">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-832">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-832">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-833">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-833">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-834">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-834">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-835">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-835">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-836">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-836">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-837">值名称: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-837">值名称: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-838">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-838">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-839">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-839">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-840">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-840">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-841">首选项密钥名称: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-841">首选项密钥名称: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-842">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-842">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-843">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-843">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-844">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-844">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-845">指定 Microsoft Edge 可以将用户凭据委派给的服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-845">指定 Microsoft Edge 可以将用户凭据委派给的服务器列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-846">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-846">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-847">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-847">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-848">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-848">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-849">配置 Microsoft Edge 可委派的服务器列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-849">配置 Microsoft Edge 可委派的服务器列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-850">请用逗号分隔多个服务器名称。允许使用通配符(\*)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-850">请用逗号分隔多个服务器名称。允许使用通配符(\*)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-851">如果你未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将不会委派用户凭据，即使检测到服务器为 Intranet 服务器也不例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-851">如果你未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将不会委派用户凭据，即使检测到服务器为 Intranet 服务器也不例外。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-852">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-852">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-853">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-853">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-854">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-854">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-855">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-855">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-856">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-856">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-857">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-857">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-858">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-858">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-859">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-859">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-860">GP 唯一名称: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-860">GP 唯一名称: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-861">GP 名称: 指定 Microsoft Edge 可以将用户凭据委派给的服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-861">GP 名称: 指定 Microsoft Edge 可以将用户凭据委派给的服务器列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-862">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-862">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-863">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-863">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-864">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-864">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-865">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-865">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-866">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-866">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-867">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-867">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-868">值名称: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-868">值名称: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-869">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-869">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-870">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-870">示例值:</span></span>
```
"contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-871">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-871">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-872">首选项密钥名称: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-872">首选项密钥名称: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-873">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-873">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-874">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-874">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-875">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-875">AuthSchemes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-876">支持的身份验证方案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-876">支持的身份验证方案</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-877">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-877">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-878">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-878">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-879">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-879">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-880">指定受支持的 HTTP 身份验证方案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-880">指定受支持的 HTTP 身份验证方案。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-881">可用于配置该策略的值: "basic"、"digest"、"ntlm" 和 "negotiate"。用逗号分隔多个值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-881">可用于配置该策略的值: "basic"、"digest"、"ntlm" 和 "negotiate"。用逗号分隔多个值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-882">如果未配置此策略，则会使用所有四个方案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-882">如果未配置此策略，则会使用所有四个方案。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-883">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-883">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-884">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-884">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-885">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-885">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-886">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-886">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-887">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-887">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-888">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-888">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-889">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-889">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-890">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-890">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-891">GP 唯一名称: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-891">GP 唯一名称: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-892">GP 名称: 支持的身份验证方案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-892">GP 名称: 支持的身份验证方案</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-893">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-893">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-894">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-894">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-895">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-895">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-896">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-896">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-897">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-897">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-898">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-898">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-899">值名称: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-899">值名称: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-900">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-900">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-901">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-901">示例值:</span></span>
```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-902">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-902">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-903">首选项密钥名称: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-903">首选项密钥名称: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-904">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-904">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-905">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-905">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-906">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-906">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-907">配置允许的身份验证服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-907">配置允许的身份验证服务器列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-908">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-908">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-909">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-909">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-910">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-910">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-911">指定为集成身份验证启用的服务器。仅当 Microsoft Edge 从代理或此列表中的服务器收到身份验证质询时，才启用集成身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-911">指定为集成身份验证启用的服务器。仅当 Microsoft Edge 从代理或此列表中的服务器收到身份验证质询时，才启用集成身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-912">用逗号分隔多个服务器名称。允许使用通配符(\*)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-912">用逗号分隔多个服务器名称。允许使用通配符(\*)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-913">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 尝试检测服务器是否位于 Intranet 上 - 直到那时，它才将响应 IWA 请求。如果服务器在 Internet 上，Microsoft Edge 会忽略来自该服务器的 IWA 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-913">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 尝试检测服务器是否位于 Intranet 上 - 直到那时，它才将响应 IWA 请求。如果服务器在 Internet 上，Microsoft Edge 会忽略来自该服务器的 IWA 请求。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-914">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-914">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-915">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-915">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-916">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-916">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-917">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-917">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-918">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-918">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-919">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-919">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-920">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-920">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-921">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-921">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-922">GP 唯一名称: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-922">GP 唯一名称: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-923">GP 名称: 配置允许的身份验证服务器列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-923">GP 名称: 配置允许的身份验证服务器列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-924">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-924">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-925">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-925">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-926">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-926">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-927">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-927">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-928">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-928">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-929">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-929">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-930">值名称: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-930">值名称: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-931">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-931">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-932">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-932">示例值:</span></span>
```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-933">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-933">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-934">首选项密钥名称: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-934">首选项密钥名称: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-935">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-935">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-936">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-936">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-937">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-937">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-938">协商 Kerberos 身份验证时禁用 CNAME 查找</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-938">协商 Kerberos 身份验证时禁用 CNAME 查找</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-939">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-939">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-940">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-940">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-941">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-941">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-942">确定生成的 Kerberos SPN 是否基于规范的 DNS 名称(CNAME)或输入的原始名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-942">确定生成的 Kerberos SPN 是否基于规范的 DNS 名称(CNAME)或输入的原始名称。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-943">如果启用此策略，将跳过 CNAME 查找，使用服务器名称(作为输入)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-943">如果启用此策略，将跳过 CNAME 查找，使用服务器名称(作为输入)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-944">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则使用服务器的规范名称。这通过 CNAME 查找来确定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-944">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则使用服务器的规范名称。这通过 CNAME 查找来确定。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-945">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-945">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-946">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-946">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-947">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-947">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-948">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-948">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-949">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-949">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-950">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-950">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-951">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-951">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-952">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-952">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-953">GP 唯一名称: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-953">GP 唯一名称: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-954">GP 名称: 协商 Kerberos 身份验证时禁用 CNAME 查找</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-954">GP 名称: 协商 Kerberos 身份验证时禁用 CNAME 查找</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-955">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-955">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-956">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-956">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-957">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-957">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-958">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-958">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-959">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-959">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-960">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-960">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-961">值名称: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-961">值名称: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-962">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-962">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-963">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-963">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-964">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-964">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-965">首选项密钥名称: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-965">首选项密钥名称: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-966">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-966">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-967">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-967">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-968">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-968">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-969">在 Kerberos SPN 中包含非标准端口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-969">在 Kerberos SPN 中包含非标准端口</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-970">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-970">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-971">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-971">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-972">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-972">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-973">指定生成的 Kerberos SPN 是否应包括非标准端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-973">指定生成的 Kerberos SPN 是否应包括非标准端口。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-974">如果启用此策略，并且用户在 URL 中包含非标准端口(非 80 或 443 的端口)，则该端口包含在生成的 Kerberos SPN 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-974">如果启用此策略，并且用户在 URL 中包含非标准端口(非 80 或 443 的端口)，则该端口包含在生成的 Kerberos SPN 中。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-975">如果不配置或禁用此策略，生成的 Kerberos SPN 在任何情况下都不包含端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-975">如果不配置或禁用此策略，生成的 Kerberos SPN 在任何情况下都不包含端口。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-976">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-976">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-977">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-977">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-978">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-978">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-979">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-979">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-980">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-980">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-981">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-981">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-982">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-982">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-983">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-983">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-984">GP 唯一名称: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-984">GP 唯一名称: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-985">GP 名称: 在 Kerberos SPN 中包含非标准端口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-985">GP 名称: 在 Kerberos SPN 中包含非标准端口</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-986">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-986">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-987">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-987">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-988">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-988">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-989">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-989">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-990">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-990">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-991">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-991">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-992">值名称: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-992">值名称: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-993">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-993">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-994">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-994">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-995">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-995">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-996">首选项密钥名称: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-996">首选项密钥名称: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-997">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-997">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-998">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-998">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-999">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-999">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1000">控制是否启用 NTLMv2 身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1000">控制是否启用 NTLMv2 身份验证</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1001">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1001">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1002">在 macOS 自 77 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1002">在 macOS 自 77 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1003">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1003">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1004">控制是否启用 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1004">控制是否启用 NTLMv2。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1005">所有最新版本的 Samba 和 Windows 服务器都支持 NTLMv2。你应该只禁用 NTLMv2 来解决向后兼容性问题，因为它会降低身份验证的安全性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1005">所有最新版本的 Samba 和 Windows 服务器都支持 NTLMv2。你应该只禁用 NTLMv2 来解决向后兼容性问题，因为它会降低身份验证的安全性。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1006">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下会启用 NTLMv2。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1006">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下会启用 NTLMv2。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1007">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1007">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1008">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1008">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1009">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1009">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1010">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1010">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1011">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1011">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1012">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1012">布尔</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1013">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1013">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1014">首选项密钥名称: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1014">首选项密钥名称: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1015">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1015">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1016">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1016">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1017">Smartscreen 设置 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1017">Smartscreen 设置 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1018">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1018">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1019">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1019">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1020">阻止绕过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 对站点的提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1020">阻止绕过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 对站点的提示</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1021">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1021">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1022">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1022">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1023">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1023">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1024">此策略让你确定用户是否可以覆盖有关潜在恶意网站的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1024">此策略让你确定用户是否可以覆盖有关潜在恶意网站的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1025">如果启用此设置，则用户无法忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，并且会阻止用户继续访问该站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1025">如果启用此设置，则用户无法忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，并且会阻止用户继续访问该站点。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1026">如果禁用或未配置此设置，则用户可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告并继续访问该站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1026">如果禁用或未配置此设置，则用户可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告并继续访问该站点。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1027">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为进行设备管理而注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1027">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为进行设备管理而注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1028">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1028">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1029">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1029">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1030">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1030">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1031">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1031">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1032">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1032">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1033">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1033">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1034">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1034">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1035">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1035">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1036">GP 唯一名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1036">GP 唯一名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1037">GP 名称: 阻止绕过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 对站点的提示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1037">GP 名称: 阻止绕过 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 对站点的提示</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1038">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1038">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1039">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1039">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1040">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1040">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1041">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1041">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1042">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1042">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1043">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1043">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1044">值名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1044">值名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1045">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1045">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1046">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1046">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1047">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1047">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1048">首选项密钥名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1048">首选项密钥名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1049">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1049">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1050">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1050">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1051">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1051">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1052">阻止绕过有关下载的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1052">阻止绕过有关下载的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1053">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1053">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1054">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1054">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1055">在 macOS 自 79 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1055">在 macOS 自 79 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1056">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1056">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1057">此策略让你确定用户是否可以覆盖有关未验证下载的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1057">此策略让你确定用户是否可以覆盖有关未验证下载的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1058">如果启用此策略，组织中的用户无法忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，并且用户无法完成未验证的下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1058">如果启用此策略，组织中的用户无法忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告，并且用户无法完成未验证的下载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1059">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告并完成未验证的下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1059">如果禁用或未配置此策略，用户可以忽略 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告并完成未验证的下载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1060">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为进行设备管理而注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1060">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为进行设备管理而注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1061">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1061">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1062">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1062">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1063">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1063">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1064">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1064">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1065">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1065">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1066">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1066">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1067">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1067">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1068">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1068">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1069">GP 唯一名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1069">GP 唯一名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1070">GP 名称: 阻止绕过有关下载的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1070">GP 名称: 阻止绕过有关下载的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1071">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1071">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1072">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1072">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1073">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1073">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1074">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1074">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1075">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1075">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1076">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1076">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1077">值名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1077">值名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1078">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1078">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1079">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1079">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1080">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1080">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1081">首选项密钥名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1081">首选项密钥名称: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1082">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1082">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1083">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1083">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1084">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1084">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1085">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将不会为其触发警告的域的列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1085">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将不会为其触发警告的域的列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1086">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1086">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1087">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1087">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1088">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1088">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1089">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 受信任的域列表。这意味着: 如果源 URL 与这些域匹配，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 不会检查可能的恶意资源，例如钓鱼软件和其他恶意软件。 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 下载保护服务不会检查在这些域上托管的下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1089">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 受信任的域列表。这意味着: 如果源 URL 与这些域匹配，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 不会检查可能的恶意资源，例如钓鱼软件和其他恶意软件。 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 下载保护服务不会检查在这些域上托管的下载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1090">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将信任这些域。 如果禁用或未设置此策略，默认的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 保护将适用于所有资源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1090">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将信任这些域。 如果禁用或未设置此策略，默认的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 保护将适用于所有资源。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1091">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为进行设备管理而注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。 另请注意，如果你的组织已启用 Microsoft Defender 高级威胁防护，则此策略不适用。你必须在 Microsoft Defender 安全中心中配置允许和阻止名单。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1091">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为进行设备管理而注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。 另请注意，如果你的组织已启用 Microsoft Defender 高级威胁防护，则此策略不适用。你必须在 Microsoft Defender 安全中心中配置允许和阻止名单。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1092">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1092">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1093">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1093">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1094">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1094">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1095">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1095">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1096">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1096">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1097">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1097">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1098">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1098">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1099">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1099">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1100">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1100">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1101">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将不会为其触发警告的域的列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1101">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 将不会为其触发警告的域的列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1102">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1102">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1103">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1103">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1104">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1104">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1105">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1105">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1106">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1106">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1107">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1107">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1108">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1108">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1109">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1109">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1110">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1110">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1111">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1111">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1112">首选项密钥名称: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1112">首选项密钥名称: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1113">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1113">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1114">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1114">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1115">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1115">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1116">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1116">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1117">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1117">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1118">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1118">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1119">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1119">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1120">此策略设置允许你配置是否开启 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 提供警告消息，以帮助保护用户免受潜在的钓鱼诈骗和恶意软件的侵害。默认情况下，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 处于开启状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1120">此策略设置允许你配置是否开启 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 提供警告消息，以帮助保护用户免受潜在的钓鱼诈骗和恶意软件的侵害。默认情况下，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 处于开启状态。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1121">如果启用此设置，则将开启 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1121">如果启用此设置，则将开启 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1122">如果禁用此设置，则将关闭 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1122">如果禁用此设置，则将关闭 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1123">如果未配置此设置，则用户可以选择是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1123">如果未配置此设置，则用户可以选择是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1124">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1124">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1125">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1125">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1126">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1126">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1127">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1127">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1128">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1128">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1129">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1129">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1130">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1130">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1131">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1131">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1132">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1132">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1133">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1133">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1134">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1134">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1135">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1135">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1136">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1136">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1137">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1137">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1138">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1138">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1139">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1139">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1140">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1140">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1141">值名称: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1141">值名称: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1142">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1142">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1143">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1143">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1144">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1144">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1145">首选项密钥名称: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1145">首选项密钥名称: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1146">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1146">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1147">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1147">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1148">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1148">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1149">强制对来自受信任源的下载执行 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1149">强制对来自受信任源的下载执行 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1150">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1150">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1151">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1151">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1152">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1152">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1153">此策略设置允许你配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 是否检查来自受信任源的下载内容的声誉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1153">此策略设置允许你配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 是否检查来自受信任源的下载内容的声誉。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1154">如果启用或未配置此设置，则无论来源如何，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 都将检查下载内容的声誉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1154">如果启用或未配置此设置，则无论来源如何，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 都将检查下载内容的声誉。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1155">如果禁用此设置，则从受信任源下载时，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 不会检查下载内容的声誉。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1155">如果禁用此设置，则从受信任源下载时，Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 不会检查下载内容的声誉。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1156">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1156">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1157">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1157">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1158">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1158">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1159">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1159">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1160">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1160">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1161">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1161">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1162">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1162">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1163">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1163">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1164">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1164">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1165">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1165">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1166">GP 名称: 强制对来自受信任源的下载执行 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1166">GP 名称: 强制对来自受信任源的下载执行 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1167">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1167">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1168">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1168">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1169">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1169">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1170">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1170">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1171">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1171">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1172">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1172">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1173">值名称: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1173">值名称: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1174">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1174">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1175">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1175">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1176">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1176">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1177">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1177">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1178">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以阻止可能不需要的应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1178">配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以阻止可能不需要的应用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1179">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1179">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1180">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1180">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1181">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1181">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1182">此策略设置允许你配置是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 开启对可能不需要的应用的阻止功能。使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用可提供警告消息，以帮助保护用户防范广告程序、挖矿病毒、捆绑软件和其他由网站托管的信誉度较低的应用。默认关闭使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1182">此策略设置允许你配置是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 开启对可能不需要的应用的阻止功能。使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用可提供警告消息，以帮助保护用户防范广告程序、挖矿病毒、捆绑软件和其他由网站托管的信誉度较低的应用。默认关闭使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1183">如果启用此设置，则会开启使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1183">如果启用此设置，则会开启使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1184">如果禁用此设置，则会关闭使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1184">如果禁用此设置，则会关闭使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1185">如果未配置此设置，则用户可以选择是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1185">如果未配置此设置，则用户可以选择是否使用 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 阻止可能不需要的应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1186">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1186">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1187">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1187">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1188">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1188">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1189">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1189">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1190">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1190">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1191">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1191">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1192">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1192">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1193">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1193">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1194">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1194">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1195">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1195">GP 唯一名称: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1196">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以阻止可能不需要的应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1196">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 以阻止可能不需要的应用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1197">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1197">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1198">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/Smartscreen 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1198">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/Smartscreen 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1199">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1199">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1200">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1200">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1201">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1201">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1202">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1202">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1203">值名称: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1203">值名称: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1204">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1204">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1205">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1205">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1206">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1206">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1207">首选项密钥名称: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1207">首选项密钥名称: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1208">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1208">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1209">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1209">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1210">代理服务器 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1210">代理服务器 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1211">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1211">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1212">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1212">ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1213">配置代理绕过规则</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1213">配置代理绕过规则</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1214">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1214">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1215">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1215">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1216">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1216">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1217">定义 Microsoft Edge 将会为其绕过任何代理的主机列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1217">定义 Microsoft Edge 将会为其绕过任何代理的主机列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1218">仅当在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择“使用固定代理服务器”时才应用此策略。如果已选择任何其他模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1218">仅当在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择“使用固定代理服务器”时才应用此策略。如果已选择任何其他模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1219">如果启用此策略，则可以创建主机列表，使 Microsoft Edge 不对这些主机使用代理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1219">如果启用此策略，则可以创建主机列表，使 Microsoft Edge 不对这些主机使用代理。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1220">如果未配置此策略，则不会创建 Microsoft Edge 为其绕过代理的主机列表。如果已指定任何其他代理策略设置方法，请不要配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1220">如果未配置此策略，则不会创建 Microsoft Edge 为其绕过代理的主机列表。如果已指定任何其他代理策略设置方法，请不要配置此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1221">有关更详细的示例，请转到 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1221">有关更详细的示例，请转到 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1222">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1222">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1223">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1223">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1224">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1224">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1225">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1225">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1226">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1226">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1227">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1227">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1228">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1228">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1229">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1229">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1230">GP 唯一名称: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1230">GP 唯一名称: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1231">GP 名称: 配置代理绕过规则</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1231">GP 名称: 配置代理绕过规则</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1232">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1232">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1233">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1233">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1234">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1234">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1235">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1235">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1236">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1236">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1237">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1237">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1238">值名称: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1238">值名称: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1239">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1239">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1240">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1240">示例值:</span></span>
