```
"https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1241">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1241">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1242">首选项密钥名称: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1242">首选项密钥名称: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1243">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1243">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1244">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1244">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1245">ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1245">ProxyMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1246">配置代理服务器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1246">配置代理服务器设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1247">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1247">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1248">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1248">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1249">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1249">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1250">指定 Microsoft Edge 所使用的代理服务器设置。如果启用此策略，则用户将无法更改代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1250">指定 Microsoft Edge 所使用的代理服务器设置。如果启用此策略，则用户将无法更改代理设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1251">如果选择从不使用代理服务器并且始终直接连接，则会忽略所有其他选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1251">如果选择从不使用代理服务器并且始终直接连接，则会忽略所有其他选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1252">如果选择使用系统代理设置，则会忽略所有其他选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1252">如果选择使用系统代理设置，则会忽略所有其他选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1253">如果选择自动检测代理服务器，则会忽略所有其他选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1253">如果选择自动检测代理服务器，则会忽略所有其他选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1254">如果选择固定服务器代理模式，则可以在 [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) 和“以逗号分隔的代理跳过规则列表”中指定更多选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1254">如果选择固定服务器代理模式，则可以在 [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) 和“以逗号分隔的代理跳过规则列表”中指定更多选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1255">如果选择使用 .pac 代理脚本，则必须在“指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL”中指定指向脚本的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1255">如果选择使用 .pac 代理脚本，则必须在“指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL”中指定指向脚本的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1256">有关详细示例，请转到 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1256">有关详细示例，请转到 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1257">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将忽略从命令行指定的所有代理相关选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1257">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将忽略从命令行指定的所有代理相关选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1258">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择自己的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1258">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择自己的代理设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1259">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1259">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1260">ProxyDisabled (direct) = 从不使用代理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1260">ProxyDisabled (direct) = 从不使用代理</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1261">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = 自动检测代理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1261">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = 自动检测代理设置</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1262">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = 使用 .pac 代理脚本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1262">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = 使用 .pac 代理脚本</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1263">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = 使用固定的代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1263">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = 使用固定的代理服务器</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1264">ProxyUseSystem (system) = 使用系统代理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1264">ProxyUseSystem (system) = 使用系统代理设置</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1265">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1265">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1266">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1266">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1267">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1267">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1268">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1268">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1269">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1269">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1270">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1270">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1271">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1271">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1272">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1272">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1273">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1273">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1274">GP 唯一名称: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1274">GP 唯一名称: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1275">GP 名称: 配置代理服务器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1275">GP 名称: 配置代理服务器设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1276">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1276">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1277">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1277">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1278">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1278">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1279">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1279">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1280">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1280">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1281">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1281">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1282">值名称: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1282">值名称: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1283">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1283">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1284">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1284">示例值:</span></span>
```
"direct"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1285">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1285">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1286">首选项密钥名称: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1286">首选项密钥名称: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1287">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1287">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>direct</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1288">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1288">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1289">ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1289">ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1290">设置代理 .pac 文件的 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1290">设置代理 .pac 文件的 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1291">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1291">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1292">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1292">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1293">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1293">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1294">指定代理自动配置(PAC)文件的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1294">指定代理自动配置(PAC)文件的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1295">仅当你在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择了“使用 .pac 代理脚本”时才会应用此策略。如果你选择了任何其他模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1295">仅当你在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择了“使用 .pac 代理脚本”时才会应用此策略。如果你选择了任何其他模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1296">如果启用此策略，则可以指定 PAC 文件的 URL，该文件定义浏览器如何自动选择适当的代理服务器来获取特定网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1296">如果启用此策略，则可以指定 PAC 文件的 URL，该文件定义浏览器如何自动选择适当的代理服务器来获取特定网站。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1297">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会指定 PAC 文件。如果已指定任何其他代理策略设置方法，请不要配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1297">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会指定 PAC 文件。如果已指定任何其他代理策略设置方法，请不要配置此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1298">有关详细示例，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1298">有关详细示例，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1299">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1299">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1300">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1300">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1301">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1301">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1302">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1302">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1303">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1303">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1304">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1304">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1305">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1305">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1306">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1306">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1307">GP 唯一名称: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1307">GP 唯一名称: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1308">GP 名称: 设置代理 .pac 文件的 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1308">GP 名称: 设置代理 .pac 文件的 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1309">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1309">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1310">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1310">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1311">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1311">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1312">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1312">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1313">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1313">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1314">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1314">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1315">值名称: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1315">值名称: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1316">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1316">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1317">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1317">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1318">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1318">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1319">首选项密钥名称: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1319">首选项密钥名称: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1320">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1320">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1321">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1321">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1322">ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1322">ProxyServer</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1323">配置代理服务器的地址或 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1323">配置代理服务器的地址或 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1324">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1324">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1325">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1325">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1326">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1326">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1327">指定代理服务器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1327">指定代理服务器的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1328">仅当你在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择了“使用固定代理服务器”时才会应用此策略。如果选择了任何其他模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1328">仅当你在 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 策略中选择了“使用固定代理服务器”时才会应用此策略。如果选择了任何其他模式来配置代理策略，请不要启用或配置此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1329">如果启用此策略，则此策略配置的代理服务器将用于所有 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1329">如果启用此策略，则此策略配置的代理服务器将用于所有 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1330">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在处于此代理模式时选择自己的代理设置。如果已指定任何其他代理策略设置方法，请不要配置此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1330">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在处于此代理模式时选择自己的代理设置。如果已指定任何其他代理策略设置方法，请不要配置此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1331">有关更多选项和详细示例，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1331">有关更多选项和详细示例，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1332">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1332">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1333">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1333">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1334">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1334">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1335">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1335">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1336">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1336">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1337">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1337">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1338">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1338">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1339">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1339">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1340">GP 唯一名称: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1340">GP 唯一名称: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1341">GP 名称: 配置代理服务器的地址或 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1341">GP 名称: 配置代理服务器的地址或 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1342">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1342">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1343">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1343">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1344">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1344">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1345">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1345">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1346">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1346">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1347">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1347">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1348">值名称: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1348">值名称: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1349">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1349">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1350">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1350">示例值:</span></span>
```
"123.123.123.123:8080"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1351">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1351">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1352">首选项密钥名称: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1352">首选项密钥名称: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1353">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1353">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1354">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1354">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1355">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1355">ProxySettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1356">代理服务器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1356">代理服务器设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1357">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1357">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1358">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1358">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1359">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1359">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1360">配置 Microsoft Edge 的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1360">配置 Microsoft Edge 的代理设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1361">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会忽略从命令行指定的所有代理相关选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1361">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会忽略从命令行指定的所有代理相关选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1362">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择自己的代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1362">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择自己的代理设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1363">此策略将替代以下各个策略:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1363">此策略将替代以下各个策略:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1364">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1364">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1365">使用 ProxyMode 字段可以指定 Microsoft Edge 所使用的代理服务器，并阻止用户更改代理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1365">使用 ProxyMode 字段可以指定 Microsoft Edge 所使用的代理服务器，并阻止用户更改代理设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1366">ProxyPacUrl 字段是指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1366">ProxyPacUrl 字段是指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1367">ProxyServer 字段是代理服务器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1367">ProxyServer 字段是代理服务器的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1368">ProxyBypassList 字段是 Microsoft Edge 绕过的代理主机列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1368">ProxyBypassList 字段是 Microsoft Edge 绕过的代理主机列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1369">如果选择 "direct" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则将永远不会使用代理并且会忽略所有其他字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1369">如果选择 "direct" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则将永远不会使用代理并且会忽略所有其他字段。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1370">如果选择 "system" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则使用系统的代理并忽略所有其他字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1370">如果选择 "system" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则使用系统的代理并忽略所有其他字段。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1371">如果选择 "auto_detect" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则会忽略所有其他字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1371">如果选择 "auto_detect" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则会忽略所有其他字段。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1372">如果选择 "fixed_server" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则将使用 [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) 和 [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist) 字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1372">如果选择 "fixed_server" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则将使用 [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) 和 [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist) 字段。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1373">如果选择 "pac_script" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则将使用 [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) 和 [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist) 字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1373">如果选择 "pac_script" 值作为 [ProxyMode](#proxymode)，则将使用 [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) 和 [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist) 字段。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1374">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1374">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1375">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1375">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1376">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1376">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1377">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1377">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1378">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1378">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1379">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1379">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1380">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1380">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1381">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1381">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1382">GP 唯一名称: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1382">GP 唯一名称: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1383">GP 名称: 代理服务器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1383">GP 名称: 代理服务器设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1384">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1384">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/代理服务器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1385">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1385">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1386">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1386">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1387">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1387">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1388">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1388">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1389">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1389">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1390">值名称: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1390">值名称: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1391">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1391">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1392">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1392">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", 
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1393">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1393">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1394">首选项密钥名称: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1394">首选项密钥名称: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1395">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1395">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>direct</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1396">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1396">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1397">内容设置 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1397">内容设置 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1398">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1398">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1399">Autoselectcertificateurl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1399">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1400">自动为这些站点选择客户端证书</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1400">自动为这些站点选择客户端证书</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1401">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1401">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1402">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1402">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1403">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1403">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1404">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1404">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1405">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1405">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1406">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1406">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1407">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1407">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1408">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1408">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1409">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1409">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1410">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1410">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1411">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1411">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1412">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1412">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1413">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1413">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1414">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1414">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1415">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1415">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1416">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1416">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1417">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1417">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1418">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1418">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1419">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1419">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1420">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1420">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1421">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1421">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1422">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1422">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1423">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1423">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1424">GP 唯一名称: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1424">GP 唯一名称: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1425">GP 名称: 自动为这些站点选择客户端证书</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1425">GP 名称: 自动为这些站点选择客户端证书</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1426">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1426">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1427">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1427">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1428">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1428">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1429">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1429">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1430">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1430">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1431">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1431">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1432">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1432">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1433">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1433">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1434">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1434">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1435">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1435">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1436">首选项密钥名称: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1436">首选项密钥名称: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1437">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1437">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1438">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1438">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1439">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1439">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1440">在特定站点上允许 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1440">在特定站点上允许 Cookie</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1441">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1441">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1442">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1442">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1443">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1443">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1444">根据 URL 模式定义允许设置 Cookie 的站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1444">根据 URL 模式定义允许设置 Cookie 的站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1445">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1445">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1446">有关详细信息，请参阅 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1446">有关详细信息，请参阅 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1447">请注意，这三个策略之间不能设置冲突的 URL 模式:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1447">请注意，这三个策略之间不能设置冲突的 URL 模式:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1448">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1448">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1449">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1449">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1450">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1450">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1451">若要排除 cookie 以防退出时被删除，请配置 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1451">若要排除 cookie 以防退出时被删除，请配置 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1452">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1452">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1453">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1453">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1454">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1454">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1455">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1455">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1456">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1456">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1457">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1457">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1458">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1458">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1459">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1459">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1460">GP 唯一名称: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1460">GP 唯一名称: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1461">GP 名称: 在特定站点上允许 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1461">GP 名称: 在特定站点上允许 Cookie</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1462">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1462">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1463">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1463">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1464">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1464">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1465">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1465">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1466">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1466">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1467">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1467">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1468">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1468">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1469">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1469">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1470">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1470">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1471">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1471">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1472">首选项密钥名称: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1472">首选项密钥名称: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1473">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1473">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1474">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1474">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1475">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1475">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1476">在特定站点上阻止 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1476">在特定站点上阻止 Cookie</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1477">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1477">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1478">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1478">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1479">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1479">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1480">根据 URL 模式定义无法设置 Cookie 的站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1480">根据 URL 模式定义无法设置 Cookie 的站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1481">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1481">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1482">有关详细信息，请参阅 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1482">有关详细信息，请参阅 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1483">请注意，这三个策略之间不能设置冲突的 URL 模式:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1483">请注意，这三个策略之间不能设置冲突的 URL 模式:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1484">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1484">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1485">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1485">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1486">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1486">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1487">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1487">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1488">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1488">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1489">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1489">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1490">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1490">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1491">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1491">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1492">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1492">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1493">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1493">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1494">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1494">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1495">GP 唯一名称: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1495">GP 唯一名称: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1496">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1496">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止 Cookie</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1497">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1497">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1498">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1498">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1499">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1499">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1500">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1500">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1501">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1501">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1502">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1502">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1503">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1503">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1504">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1504">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1505">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1505">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1506">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1506">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1507">首选项密钥名称: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1507">首选项密钥名称: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1508">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1508">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1509">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1509">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1510">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1510">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1511">将特定网站的 Cookie 限制为当前会话</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1511">将特定网站的 Cookie 限制为当前会话</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1512">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1512">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1513">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1513">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1514">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1514">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1515">当会话结束时(窗口关闭时)，由与定义的 URL 模式匹配的网站所创建的 Cookie 将被删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1515">当会话结束时(窗口关闭时)，由与定义的 URL 模式匹配的网站所创建的 Cookie 将被删除。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1516">与模式不匹配的网站所创建的 Cookie 由 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置所控制。如果未配置此策略，那么这也是默认行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1516">与模式不匹配的网站所创建的 Cookie 由 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置所控制。如果未配置此策略，那么这也是默认行为。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1517">如果 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行，则在最后一个窗口关闭时，会话可能不会关闭，这意味着窗口关闭时不会清除 Cookie。有关配置 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行时所发生情况的信息，请参阅 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1517">如果 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行，则在最后一个窗口关闭时，会话可能不会关闭，这意味着窗口关闭时不会清除 Cookie。有关配置 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行时所发生情况的信息，请参阅 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1518">你还可以使用 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 策略控制哪些网站可以创建 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1518">你还可以使用 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 和 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 策略控制哪些网站可以创建 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1519">请注意，三个策略之间不能设置冲突的 URL 模式:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1519">请注意，三个策略之间不能设置冲突的 URL 模式:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1520">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1520">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1521">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1521">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1522">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1522">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1523">如果你设置 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略以从以前的会话中恢复 URL，则会忽略此策略，并且会永久为那些站点存储 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1523">如果你设置 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略以从以前的会话中恢复 URL，则会忽略此策略，并且会永久为那些站点存储 Cookie。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1524">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1524">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1525">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1525">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1526">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1526">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1527">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1527">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1528">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1528">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1529">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1529">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1530">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1530">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1531">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1531">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1532">GP 唯一名称: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1532">GP 唯一名称: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1533">GP 名称: 将特定网站的 Cookie 限制为当前会话</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1533">GP 名称: 将特定网站的 Cookie 限制为当前会话</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1534">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1534">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1535">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1535">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1536">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1536">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1537">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1537">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1538">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1538">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1539">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1539">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1540">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1540">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1541">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1541">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1542">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1542">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1543">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1543">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1544">首选项密钥名称: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1544">首选项密钥名称: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1545">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1545">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1546">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1546">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1547">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1547">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1548">配置 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1548">配置 Cookie</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1549">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1549">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1550">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1550">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1551">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1551">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1552">控制网站是否可以在用户的设备上创建 Cookie。此策略要求全部应用或者全部不应用 - 你可以允许所有网站创建 Cookie，或者不允许任何网站创建 Cookie。无法使用此策略启用来自特定网站的 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1552">控制网站是否可以在用户的设备上创建 Cookie。此策略要求全部应用或者全部不应用 - 你可以允许所有网站创建 Cookie，或者不允许任何网站创建 Cookie。无法使用此策略启用来自特定网站的 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1553">将该策略设置为“SessionOnly”可在会话关闭时清除 Cookie。如果 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行，则在最后一个窗口关闭时，会话可能不会关闭，这意味着窗口关闭时不会清除 Cookie。有关配置 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行时所发生情况的信息，请参阅 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1553">将该策略设置为“SessionOnly”可在会话关闭时清除 Cookie。如果 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行，则在最后一个窗口关闭时，会话可能不会关闭，这意味着窗口关闭时不会清除 Cookie。有关配置 Microsoft Edge 在后台模式下运行时所发生情况的信息，请参阅 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1554">如果未配置此策略，将使用默认的“AllowCookies”，并且用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 的“设置”中更改此设置。(如果不希望用户能够更改此设置，请设置该策略。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1554">如果未配置此策略，将使用默认的“AllowCookies”，并且用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 的“设置”中更改此设置。(如果不希望用户能够更改此设置，请设置该策略。)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1555">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1555">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1556">AllowCookies (1) = 允许所有站点创建 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1556">AllowCookies (1) = 允许所有站点创建 Cookie</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1557">BlockCookies (2) = 不允许任何站点创建 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1557">BlockCookies (2) = 不允许任何站点创建 Cookie</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1558">SessionOnly (4) = 在会话持续时间内保留 cookie，[SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 中列出的内容除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1558">SessionOnly (4) = 在会话持续时间内保留 cookie，[SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 中列出的内容除外</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1559">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1559">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1560">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1560">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1561">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1561">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1562">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1562">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1563">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1563">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1564">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1564">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1565">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1565">整数</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1582">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1582">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1583">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1583">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1584">控制用于读取的文件系统 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1584">控制用于读取的文件系统 API 的使用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1585">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1585">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1586">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1586">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1587">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1587">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1588">如果将此策略设置为 3，则网站可以使用文件系统 API 请求对主机操作系统的文件系统进行读取访问。如果将此策略设置为 2，则拒绝访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1588">如果将此策略设置为 3，则网站可以使用文件系统 API 请求对主机操作系统的文件系统进行读取访问。如果将此策略设置为 2，则拒绝访问。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1589">如果未设置此策略，则网站可以请求访问。用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1589">如果未设置此策略，则网站可以请求访问。用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1590">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1590">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1591">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = 不允许任何网站通过文件系统 API 请求对文件和目录的读取访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1591">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = 不允许任何网站通过文件系统 API 请求对文件和目录的读取访问权限</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1592">AskFileSystemRead (3) = 允许网站通过文件系统 API 要求用户授予对文件和目录的读取访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1592">AskFileSystemRead (3) = 允许网站通过文件系统 API 要求用户授予对文件和目录的读取访问权限</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1593">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1593">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1594">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1594">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1595">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1595">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1596">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1596">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1597">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1597">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1598">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1598">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1599">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1599">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1600">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1600">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1601">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1601">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1602">GP 唯一名称: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1602">GP 唯一名称: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1603">GP 名称: 控制用于读取的文件系统 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1603">GP 名称: 控制用于读取的文件系统 API 的使用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1604">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1604">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1605">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1605">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1606">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1606">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1607">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1607">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1608">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1608">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1609">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1609">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1610">值名称: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1610">值名称: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1611">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1611">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1612">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1612">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1613">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1613">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1614">首选项密钥名称: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1614">首选项密钥名称: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1615">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1615">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1621">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1621">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1622">如果将此策略设置为 3，则网站可以使用文件系统 API 请求对主机操作系统的文件系统进行写入访问。如果将此策略设置为 2，则拒绝访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1622">如果将此策略设置为 3，则网站可以使用文件系统 API 请求对主机操作系统的文件系统进行写入访问。如果将此策略设置为 2，则拒绝访问。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1623">如果未设置此策略，则网站可以请求访问。用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1623">如果未设置此策略，则网站可以请求访问。用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1624">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1624">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1625">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = 不允许任何网站请求对文件和目录的写入访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1625">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = 不允许任何网站请求对文件和目录的写入访问权限</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1626">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = 允许网站要求用户授予对文件和目录的写入访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1626">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = 允许网站要求用户授予对文件和目录的写入访问权限</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1627">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1627">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1628">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1628">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1629">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1629">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1630">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1630">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1631">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1631">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1632">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1632">数据类型:</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1635">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1635">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1636">GP 唯一名称: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1636">GP 唯一名称: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1637">GP 名称: 控制用于编写的文件系统 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1637">GP 名称: 控制用于编写的文件系统 API 的使用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1638">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1638">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1639">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1639">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1640">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1640">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1643">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1643">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1644">值名称: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1644">值名称: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1650">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1650">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1651">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1651">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1652">默认地理位置设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1652">默认地理位置设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1653">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1653">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1654">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1654">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1655">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1655">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1656">设置网站是否可以跟踪用户的物理位置。你可以默认允许跟踪(“AllowGeolocation”)，默认拒绝跟踪(“BlockGeolocation”)，或者在每次网站请求用户位置时询问用户(“AskGeolocation”)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1656">设置网站是否可以跟踪用户的物理位置。你可以默认允许跟踪(“AllowGeolocation”)，默认拒绝跟踪(“BlockGeolocation”)，或者在每次网站请求用户位置时询问用户(“AskGeolocation”)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1657">如果未配置此策略，将使用“AskGeolocation”策略，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1657">如果未配置此策略，将使用“AskGeolocation”策略，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1658">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1658">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1659">AllowGeolocation (1) = 允许站点跟踪用户的实际位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1659">AllowGeolocation (1) = 允许站点跟踪用户的实际位置</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1660">BlockGeolocation (2) = 不允许任何站点跟踪用户的物理位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1660">BlockGeolocation (2) = 不允许任何站点跟踪用户的物理位置</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1661">AskGeolocation (3) = 每当站点要跟踪用户的实际位置时都进行询问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1661">AskGeolocation (3) = 每当站点要跟踪用户的实际位置时都进行询问</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1662">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1662">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1671">GP 唯一名称: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1671">GP 唯一名称: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1672">GP 名称: 默认地理位置设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1672">GP 名称: 默认地理位置设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1673">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1673">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1674">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1674">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1675">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1675">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1677">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1677">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1678">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1678">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1679">值名称: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1679">值名称: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1680">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1680">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
