  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1686">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1686">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1687">默认图像设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1687">默认图像设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1688">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1688">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1689">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1689">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1690">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1690">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1691">设置网站是否可以显示图像。可以对所有站点允许(“AllowImages”)或阻止(“BlockImages”)图像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1691">设置网站是否可以显示图像。可以对所有站点允许(“AllowImages”)或阻止(“BlockImages”)图像。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1692">如果未配置此策略，默认情况下允许显示图像，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1692">如果未配置此策略，默认情况下允许显示图像，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1693">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1693">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1694">AllowImages (1) = 允许所有站点显示所有图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1694">AllowImages (1) = 允许所有站点显示所有图像</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1695">BlockImages (2) = 不允许任何站点显示图像</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1695">BlockImages (2) = 不允许任何站点显示图像</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1696">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1696">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1697">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1697">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1698">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1698">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1699">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1699">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1700">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1700">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1701">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1701">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1702">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1702">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1703">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1703">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1704">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1704">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1705">GP 唯一名称: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1705">GP 唯一名称: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1706">GP 名称: 默认图像设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1706">GP 名称: 默认图像设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1707">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1707">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1708">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1708">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1709">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1709">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1710">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1710">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1711">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1711">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1712">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1712">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1713">值名称: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1713">值名称: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1714">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1714">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1715">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1715">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1716">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1716">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1717">首选项密钥名称: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1717">首选项密钥名称: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1718">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1718">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1719">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1719">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1720">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1720">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1721">控制不安全内容例外的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1721">控制不安全内容例外的使用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1722">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1722">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1723">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1723">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1724">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1724">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1725">允许你设置用户是否可以添加例外以允许特定站点显示混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1725">允许你设置用户是否可以添加例外以允许特定站点显示混合内容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1726">针对特定 URL 模式，可使用 [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) 和 [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) 策略替代此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1726">针对特定 URL 模式，可使用 [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) 和 [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) 策略替代此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1727">如果未设置此策略，则将允许用户添加例外以允许可阻止混合内容并禁止自动升级可选择阻止的混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1727">如果未设置此策略，则将允许用户添加例外以允许可阻止混合内容并禁止自动升级可选择阻止的混合内容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1728">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1728">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1729">BlockInsecureContent (2) = 不允许任何站点加载混合内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1729">BlockInsecureContent (2) = 不允许任何站点加载混合内容</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1730">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = 允许用户添加例外以允许混合内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1730">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = 允许用户添加例外以允许混合内容</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1731">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1731">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1732">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1732">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1733">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1733">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1734">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1734">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1735">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1735">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1736">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1736">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1737">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1737">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1738">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1738">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1739">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1739">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1740">GP 唯一名称: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1740">GP 唯一名称: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1741">GP 名称: 控制不安全内容例外的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1741">GP 名称: 控制不安全内容例外的使用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1742">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1742">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1743">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1743">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1744">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1744">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1745">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1745">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1746">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1746">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1747">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1747">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1748">值名称: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1748">值名称: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1749">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1749">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1750">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1750">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1751">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1751">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1752">首选项密钥名称: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1752">首选项密钥名称: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1753">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1753">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1754">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1754">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1755">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1755">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1756">默认 JavaScript 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1756">默认 JavaScript 设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1757">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1757">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1758">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1758">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1759">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1759">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1760">设置网站是否可以运行 JavaScript。可以对所有站点允许(“AllowJavaScript”)或阻止(“BlockJavaScript”)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1760">设置网站是否可以运行 JavaScript。可以对所有站点允许(“AllowJavaScript”)或阻止(“BlockJavaScript”)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1761">如果未配置此策略，所有站点默认都可以运行 JavaScript，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1761">如果未配置此策略，所有站点默认都可以运行 JavaScript，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1762">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1762">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1763">AllowJavaScript (1) = 允许所有站点运行 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1763">AllowJavaScript (1) = 允许所有站点运行 JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1764">BlockJavaScript (2) = 不允许任何站点运行 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1764">BlockJavaScript (2) = 不允许任何站点运行 JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1765">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1765">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1766">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1766">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1767">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1767">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1768">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1768">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1769">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1769">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1770">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1770">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1771">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1771">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1772">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1772">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1773">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1773">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1774">GP 唯一名称: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1774">GP 唯一名称: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1775">GP 名称: 默认 JavaScript 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1775">GP 名称: 默认 JavaScript 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1776">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1776">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1777">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1777">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1778">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1778">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1779">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1779">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1780">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1780">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1781">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1781">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1782">值名称: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1782">值名称: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1783">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1783">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1784">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1784">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1785">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1785">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1786">首选项密钥名称: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1786">首选项密钥名称: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>


  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1789">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1789">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1790">默认通知设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1790">默认通知设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1791">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1791">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1792">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1792">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1793">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1793">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1794">设置网站是否可以显示桌面通知。你可以默认允许通知(“AllowNotifications'”)，默认拒绝通知(“BlockNotifications”)，或者在每次网站要显示通知时询问用户(“AskNotifications”)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1794">设置网站是否可以显示桌面通知。你可以默认允许通知(“AllowNotifications'”)，默认拒绝通知(“BlockNotifications”)，或者在每次网站要显示通知时询问用户(“AskNotifications”)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1795">如果未配置此策略，则默认允许通知，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1795">如果未配置此策略，则默认允许通知，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1796">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1796">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1797">AllowNotifications (1) = 允许站点显示桌面通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1797">AllowNotifications (1) = 允许站点显示桌面通知</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1798">BlockNotifications (2) = 不允许任何站点显示桌面通知</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1798">BlockNotifications (2) = 不允许任何站点显示桌面通知</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1799">AskNotifications (3) = 每次站点要显示桌面通知时都询问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1799">AskNotifications (3) = 每次站点要显示桌面通知时都询问</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1800">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1800">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1801">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1801">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1802">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1802">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1803">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1803">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1804">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1804">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1805">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1805">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1806">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1806">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1807">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1807">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1808">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1808">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1809">GP 唯一名称: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1809">GP 唯一名称: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1810">GP 名称: 默认通知设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1810">GP 名称: 默认通知设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1811">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1811">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1812">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1812">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1813">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1813">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1814">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1814">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1815">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1815">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1816">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1816">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1817">值名称: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1817">值名称: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1818">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1818">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1819">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1819">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1820">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1820">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1821">首选项密钥名称: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1821">首选项密钥名称: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1822">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1822">示例值:</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1823">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1823">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1824">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1824">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1825">默认 Adobe Flash 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1825">默认 Adobe Flash 设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1826">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1826">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1827">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1827">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1828">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1828">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1829">首先检查 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls)，然后检查此策略。选项为 “ClickToPlay” 和 “BlockPlugins”。如果将此策略设置为“BlockPlugins”，则所有网站都将拒绝此插件。“ClickToPlay”允许 Flash 插件运行，但用户可单击占位符启动它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1829">首先检查 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls)，然后检查此策略。选项为 “ClickToPlay” 和 “BlockPlugins”。如果将此策略设置为“BlockPlugins”，则所有网站都将拒绝此插件。“ClickToPlay”允许 Flash 插件运行，但用户可单击占位符启动它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1830">如果未配置此策略，用户可以手动更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1830">如果未配置此策略，用户可以手动更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1831">注意：自动播放仅适用于 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 策略中明确列出的域。若要为所有网站打开自动播放功能，请将 http://\* 和 https://\* 添加到允许的 URL 列表中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1831">注意：自动播放仅适用于 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 策略中明确列出的域。若要为所有网站打开自动播放功能，请将 http://\* 和 https://\* 添加到允许的 URL 列表中。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1832">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1832">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1833">BlockPlugins (2) = 阻止 Adobe Flash 插件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1833">BlockPlugins (2) = 阻止 Adobe Flash 插件</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1834">ClickToPlay (3) = 单击以播放</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1834">ClickToPlay (3) = 单击以播放</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1835">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1835">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1836">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1836">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1837">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1837">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1838">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1838">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1839">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1839">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1840">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1840">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1841">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1841">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1842">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1842">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1843">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1843">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1844">GP 唯一名称: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1844">GP 唯一名称: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1845">GP 名称: 默认 Adobe Flash 设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1845">GP 名称: 默认 Adobe Flash 设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1846">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1846">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1847">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1847">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1848">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1848">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1849">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1849">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1850">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1850">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1851">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1851">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1852">值名称: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1852">值名称: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1853">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1853">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1854">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1854">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1855">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1855">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1856">首选项密钥名称: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1856">首选项密钥名称: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1857">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1857">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1858">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1858">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1859">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1859">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1860">默认的弹出窗口设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1860">默认的弹出窗口设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1861">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1861">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1862">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1862">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1863">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1863">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1864">设置网站是否可显示弹出窗口。可以对所有站点允许(“AllowPopups”)或阻止(“BlockPopups”)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1864">设置网站是否可显示弹出窗口。可以对所有站点允许(“AllowPopups”)或阻止(“BlockPopups”)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1865">如果未配置此策略，则默认阻止弹出窗口，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1865">如果未配置此策略，则默认阻止弹出窗口，而且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1866">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1866">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1867">AllowPopups (1) = 允许所有站点显示弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1867">AllowPopups (1) = 允许所有站点显示弹出窗口</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1868">BlockPopups (2) = 不允许任何站点显示弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1868">BlockPopups (2) = 不允许任何站点显示弹出窗口</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1869">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1869">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1870">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1870">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1871">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1871">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1872">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1872">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1873">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1873">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1874">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1874">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1875">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1875">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1876">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1876">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1877">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1877">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1878">GP 唯一名称: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1878">GP 唯一名称: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1879">GP 名称: 默认的弹出窗口设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1879">GP 名称: 默认的弹出窗口设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1880">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1880">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1881">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1881">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1882">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1882">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1883">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1883">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1884">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1884">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1885">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1885">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1886">值名称: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1886">值名称: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1887">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1887">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1888">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1888">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1889">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1889">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1890">首选项密钥名称: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1890">首选项密钥名称: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1891">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1891">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1892">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1892">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1893">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1893">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1894">控制 Web 蓝牙 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1894">控制 Web 蓝牙 API 的使用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1895">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1895">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1896">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1896">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1897">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1897">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1898">控制网站是否可以访问附近的蓝牙设备。你可以完全阻止访问或要求站点在每次要访问蓝牙设备时都询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1898">控制网站是否可以访问附近的蓝牙设备。你可以完全阻止访问或要求站点在每次要访问蓝牙设备时都询问用户。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1899">如果不配置此策略，则使用默认值(“AskWebBluetooth”，表示每次都询问用户)，用户可以更改此值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1899">如果不配置此策略，则使用默认值(“AskWebBluetooth”，表示每次都询问用户)，用户可以更改此值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1900">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1900">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1901">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = 不允许任何站点通过 Web 蓝牙 API 请求对蓝牙设备的访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1901">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = 不允许任何站点通过 Web 蓝牙 API 请求对蓝牙设备的访问</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1902">AskWebBluetooth (3) = 允许站点请求用户授予对附近蓝牙设备的访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1902">AskWebBluetooth (3) = 允许站点请求用户授予对附近蓝牙设备的访问权限</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1903">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1903">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1904">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1904">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1905">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1905">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1906">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1906">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1907">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1907">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1908">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1908">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1909">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1909">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1910">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1910">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1911">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1911">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1912">GP 唯一名称: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1912">GP 唯一名称: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1913">GP 名称: 控制 Web 蓝牙 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1913">GP 名称: 控制 Web 蓝牙 API 的使用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1914">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1914">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1915">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1915">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1916">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1916">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1917">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1917">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1918">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1918">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1919">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1919">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1920">值名称: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1920">值名称: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1921">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1921">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1922">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1922">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1923">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1923">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1924">首选项密钥名称: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1924">首选项密钥名称: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1925">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1925">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1926">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1926">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1927">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1927">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1928">控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1928">控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1929">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1929">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1930">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1930">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1931">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1931">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1932">设置网站是否可以访问连接的 USB 设备。你可以完全阻止访问，或让网站在每次希望访问连接的 USB 时询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1932">设置网站是否可以访问连接的 USB 设备。你可以完全阻止访问，或让网站在每次希望访问连接的 USB 时询问用户。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1933">你可以对特定的 URL 模式覆盖此策略，方法是使用 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 和 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1933">你可以对特定的 URL 模式覆盖此策略，方法是使用 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 和 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1934">如果未配置此策略，默认情况下站点可以询问用户是否可以访问连接的 USB 设备(“AskWebUsb”)，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1934">如果未配置此策略，默认情况下站点可以询问用户是否可以访问连接的 USB 设备(“AskWebUsb”)，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1935">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1935">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1936">BlockWebUsb (2) = 不允许任何站点通过 WebUSB API 请求对 USB 设备的访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1936">BlockWebUsb (2) = 不允许任何站点通过 WebUSB API 请求对 USB 设备的访问</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1937">AskWebUsb (3) = 允许站点请求用户授予对已连接 USB 设备的访问权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1937">AskWebUsb (3) = 允许站点请求用户授予对已连接 USB 设备的访问权限</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1938">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1938">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1939">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1939">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1940">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1940">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1941">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1941">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1942">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1942">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1943">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1943">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1944">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1944">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1945">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1945">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1946">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1946">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1947">GP 唯一名称: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1947">GP 唯一名称: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1948">GP 名称: 控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1948">GP 名称: 控制 WebUSB API 的使用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1949">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1949">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1950">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1950">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1951">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1951">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1952">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1952">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1953">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1953">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1954">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1954">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1955">值名称: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1955">值名称: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1956">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1956">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1962">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1962">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1963">在这些网站上允许通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1963">在这些网站上允许通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1964">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1964">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1965">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1965">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1966">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1966">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1967">如果设置该策略，则可以列出 URL 模式，指定哪些网站可以通过文件系统 API 要求用户授予他们对主机操作系统的文件系统中的文件或目录的读取访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1967">如果设置该策略，则可以列出 URL 模式，指定哪些网站可以通过文件系统 API 要求用户授予他们对主机操作系统的文件系统中的文件或目录的读取访问权限。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1968">如果未设置此策略，[DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) 适用于所有网站(如果已设置)。否则，用户的个人设置将适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1968">如果未设置此策略，[DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) 适用于所有网站(如果已设置)。否则，用户的个人设置将适用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1969">URL 式不能与 [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls) 冲突。如果 URL 与两者都匹配，则这两个策略都不优先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1969">URL 式不能与 [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls) 冲突。如果 URL 与两者都匹配，则这两个策略都不优先。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-1970">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1970">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1971">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1971">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1972">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1972">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1973">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1973">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1974">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1974">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1975">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1975">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1976">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1976">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1977">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1977">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1978">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1978">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1979">GP 唯一名称: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1979">GP 唯一名称: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1980">GP 名称: 在这些网站上允许通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1980">GP 名称: 在这些网站上允许通过文件系统 API 进行读取访问</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1981">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1981">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1982">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1982">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1983">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1983">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1984">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1984">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1985">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1985">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1986">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1986">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1987">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1987">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1988">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1988">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1989">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1989">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1990">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1990">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1991">首选项密钥名称: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1991">首选项密钥名称: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-1992">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-1992">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2034">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2034">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2036">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2036">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2037">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2037">可以推荐: 否</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2048">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2048">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2049">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2049">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2050">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2050">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2052">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2052">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>


  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2057">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2057">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2058">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2058">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2059">在这些网站上阻止对文件和目录的写入访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2059">在这些网站上阻止对文件和目录的写入访问</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2060">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2060">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2061">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2061">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2062">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2062">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2063">如果设置此策略，则可以列出 URL 模式，指定哪些网站不能要求用户授予他们对主机操作系统的文件系统中的文件或目录的写入访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2063">如果设置此策略，则可以列出 URL 模式，指定哪些网站不能要求用户授予他们对主机操作系统的文件系统中的文件或目录的写入访问权限。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2064">如果未设置此策略，[DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) 将应用于所有网站(如果已设置)。否则，用户的个人设置将适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2064">如果未设置此策略，[DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) 将应用于所有网站(如果已设置)。否则，用户的个人设置将适用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2065">URL 式不能与 [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls) 冲突。如果 URL 与两者都匹配，则这两个策略都不优先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2065">URL 式不能与 [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls) 冲突。如果 URL 与两者都匹配，则这两个策略都不优先。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2066">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2066">有关有效 url 模式的详细信息，请参阅 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2067">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2067">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2068">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2068">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2069">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2069">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2070">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2070">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2071">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2071">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2072">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2072">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2073">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2073">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2074">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2074">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2075">GP 唯一名称: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2075">GP 唯一名称: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2076">GP 名称: 在这些网站上阻止对文件和目录的写入访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2076">GP 名称: 在这些网站上阻止对文件和目录的写入访问</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2077">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2077">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2078">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2078">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2079">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2079">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2080">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2080">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2081">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2081">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2082">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2082">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2083">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2083">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2084">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2084">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2085">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2085">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2086">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2086">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2087">首选项密钥名称: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2087">首选项密钥名称: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2088">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2088">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml

  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2139">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2139">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2140">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2140">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2141">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2141">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2142">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2142">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2143">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2143">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2144">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2144">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2145">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2145">示例值:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2146">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2146">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2149">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2149">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2150">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2150">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2151">对指定站点允许不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2151">对指定站点允许不安全内容</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2152">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2152">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2153">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2153">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2154">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2154">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2155">创建 URL 模式列表，以指定可以显示不安全混合内容(即 HTTPS 站点上的 HTTP 内容)的站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2155">创建 URL 模式列表，以指定可以显示不安全混合内容(即 HTTPS 站点上的 HTTP 内容)的站点。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2156">如果未配置此策略，可阻止的混合内容将被阻止，而可选择阻止的混合内容将得以升级。但是，用户可以设置例外，允许特定站点显示不安全的混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2156">如果未配置此策略，可阻止的混合内容将被阻止，而可选择阻止的混合内容将得以升级。但是，用户可以设置例外，允许特定站点显示不安全的混合内容。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2157">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2157">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2158">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2158">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2159">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2159">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2160">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2160">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2161">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2161">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2162">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2162">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2163">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2163">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2164">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2164">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2165">GP 唯一名称: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2165">GP 唯一名称: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2166">GP 名称: 对指定站点允许不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2166">GP 名称: 对指定站点允许不安全内容</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2167">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2167">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2168">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2168">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2169">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2169">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2170">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2170">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2171">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2171">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2172">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2172">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2173">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2173">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2174">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2174">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2175">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2175">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2176">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2176">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2177">首选项密钥名称: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2177">首选项密钥名称: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2178">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2178">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2179">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2179">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2180">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2180">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2181">对指定站点阻止不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2181">对指定站点阻止不安全内容</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2182">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2182">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2183">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2183">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2184">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2184">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2185">创建 URL 模式列表，以指定不允许显示可阻止的(即活动的)混合内容(即 HTTPS 站点上的 HTTP 内容)的站点，以及将对其禁用可选择阻止的混合内容升级的站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2185">创建 URL 模式列表，以指定不允许显示可阻止的(即活动的)混合内容(即 HTTPS 站点上的 HTTP 内容)的站点，以及将对其禁用可选择阻止的混合内容升级的站点。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2186">如果未配置此策略，可阻止的混合内容将被阻止，而可选择阻止的混合内容将得以升级。但是，用户可以设置例外，允许特定站点显示不安全的混合内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2186">如果未配置此策略，可阻止的混合内容将被阻止，而可选择阻止的混合内容将得以升级。但是，用户可以设置例外，允许特定站点显示不安全的混合内容。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2187">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2187">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2188">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2188">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2189">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2189">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2190">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2190">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2191">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2191">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2192">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2192">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2193">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2193">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2194">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2194">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2195">GP 唯一名称: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2195">GP 唯一名称: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2196">GP 名称: 对指定站点阻止不安全内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2196">GP 名称: 对指定站点阻止不安全内容</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2197">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2197">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2198">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2198">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2199">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2199">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2200">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2200">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2201">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2201">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2202">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2202">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2203">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2203">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2204">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2204">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2205">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2205">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2206">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2206">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2207">首选项密钥名称: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2207">首选项密钥名称: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2208">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2208">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2209">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2209">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2210">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2210">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2211">在特定站点上允许 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2211">在特定站点上允许 JavaScript</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2212">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2212">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2213">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2213">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2214">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2214">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2215">根据 URL 模式定义允许运行 JavaScript 的站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2215">根据 URL 模式定义允许运行 JavaScript 的站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2216">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2216">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2217">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2217">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2218">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2218">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2219">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2219">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2220">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2220">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2221">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2221">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2222">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2222">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2223">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2223">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2224">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2224">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2225">GP 唯一名称: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2225">GP 唯一名称: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2226">GP 名称: 在特定站点上允许 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2226">GP 名称: 在特定站点上允许 JavaScript</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2227">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2227">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2228">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2228">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2229">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2229">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2230">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2230">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2231">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2231">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2232">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2232">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2233">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2233">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2234">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2234">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2235">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2235">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2236">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2236">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2237">首选项密钥名称: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2237">首选项密钥名称: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2238">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2238">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2239">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2239">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2240">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2240">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2241">在特定站点上阻止 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2241">在特定站点上阻止 JavaScript</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2242">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2242">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2243">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2243">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2244">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2244">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2245">根据 URL 模式定义不允许其运行 JavaScript 的站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2245">根据 URL 模式定义不允许其运行 JavaScript 的站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2246">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2246">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2247">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2247">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2248">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2248">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2249">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2249">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2250">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2250">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2251">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2251">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2252">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2252">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2253">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2253">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2254">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2254">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2255">GP 唯一名称: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2255">GP 唯一名称: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2256">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止 JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2256">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止 JavaScript</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2257">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2257">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2258">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2258">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2259">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2259">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2260">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2260">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2261">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2261">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2262">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2262">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2263">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2263">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2264">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2264">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2265">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2265">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2266">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2266">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2267">首选项密钥名称: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2267">首选项密钥名称: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2268">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2268">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<array>
```
