  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2269">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2269">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2270">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2270">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2271">启用默认的旧 SameSite cookie 行为设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2271">启用默认的旧 SameSite cookie 行为设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2272">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2272">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2273">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2273">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2274">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2274">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2275">모든 쿠키를 레거시 SameSite 동작으로 되돌립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2275">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2276">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2276">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2277">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2277">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2278">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2278">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2279">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2279">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2280">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = 针对所有站点上的 cookie 都恢复为旧 SameSite 行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2280">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = 针对所有站点上的 cookie 都恢复为旧 SameSite 行为</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2281">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = 针对所有站点上的 cookie 都使用 SameSite-by-default 行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2281">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = 针对所有站点上的 cookie 都使用 SameSite-by-default 行为</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2282">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2282">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2283">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2283">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2284">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2284">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2285">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2285">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2286">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2286">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2287">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2287">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2288">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2288">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2289">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2289">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2290">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2290">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2291">GP 唯一名称: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2291">GP 唯一名称: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2292">GP 名称: 启用默认的旧 SameSite cookie 行为设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2292">GP 名称: 启用默认的旧 SameSite cookie 行为设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2293">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2293">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2294">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2294">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2295">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2295">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2296">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2296">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2297">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2297">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2298">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2298">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2299">值名称: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2299">值名称: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2300">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2300">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2301">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2301">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2302">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2302">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2303">首选项密钥名称: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2303">首选项密钥名称: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2304">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2304">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2305">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2305">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2306">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2306">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2307">针对指定站点上的 cookie 恢复为旧 SameSite 行为</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2307">针对指定站点上的 cookie 恢复为旧 SameSite 行为</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2308">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2308">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2309">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2309">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2310">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2310">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2311">지정된 패턴과 일치하는 도메인에 대해 설정된 쿠키는 레거시 SameSite 동작으로 돌아갑니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2311">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2312">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2312">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2313">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 전역 기본값이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2313">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2314">전역 기본값은 사용자가 지정하는 패턴으로 다루지 않는 도메인의 쿠키에도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2314">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2315">전역 기본값은 [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) 정책을 사용하여 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2315">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2316">[LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled)를 설정하지 않은 경우 전역 기본값은 다른 구성 소스로 돌아갑니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2316">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2317">해당 정책에서 사용자가 나열하는 패턴은 URL이 아니라 도메인으로 취급되므로 구성표 또는 포트를 지정할 수 없다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2317">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2318">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2318">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2319">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2319">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2320">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2320">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2321">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2321">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2322">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2322">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2323">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2323">字符串列表</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2328">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2328">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2329">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2329">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2341">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2341">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2346">可用于创建 URL 模式的列表，以便指定允许显示通知的站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2346">可用于创建 URL 模式的列表，以便指定允许显示通知的站点。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2347">如果未设置此策略，则将对所有站点使用全局默认值。此默认值将来自 [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户的个人配置。有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2347">如果未设置此策略，则将对所有站点使用全局默认值。此默认值将来自 [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户的个人配置。有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2353">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2353">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2354">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2354">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2359">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2359">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2360">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2360">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2361">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2361">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2362">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2362">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2363">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2363">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2365">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2365">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2368">首选项密钥名称: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2368">首选项密钥名称: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2401">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2401">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2402">允许对特定站点使用 Adobe Flash 插件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2402">允许对特定站点使用 Adobe Flash 插件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2403">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2403">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2404">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2404">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2405">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2405">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2406">根据 URL 模式定义可运行 Adobe Flash 插件的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2406">根据 URL 模式定义可运行 Adobe Flash 插件的网站列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2407">如果未配置此策略，则对所有用户使用 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 策略的全局默认值(如果已设置)或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2407">如果未配置此策略，则对所有用户使用 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 策略的全局默认值(如果已设置)或用户的个人配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2408">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。但是，从 M85 开始，此策略不再支持主机中带有“\* 和“[\*.]”通配符的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2408">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。但是，从 M85 开始，此策略不再支持主机中带有“\* 和“[\*.]”通配符的模式。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2409">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2409">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2410">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2410">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2411">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2411">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2412">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2412">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2413">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2413">数据类型:</span></span>

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2432">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2432">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2433">阻止特定站点上的 Adobe Flash 插件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2433">阻止特定站点上的 Adobe Flash 插件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2434">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2434">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2435">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2435">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2436">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2436">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2437">根据 URL 模式定义阻止运行 Adobe Flash 的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2437">根据 URL 模式定义阻止运行 Adobe Flash 的网站列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2438">如果未配置此策略，则对所有用户使用 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 策略的全局默认值(如果已设置)或用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2438">如果未配置此策略，则对所有用户使用 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 策略的全局默认值(如果已设置)或用户的个人配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2439">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。但是，从 M85 开始，此策略不再支持主机中带有“\* 和“[\*.]”通配符的模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2439">有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。但是，从 M85 开始，此策略不再支持主机中带有“\* 和“[\*.]”通配符的模式。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2440">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2440">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2441">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2441">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2442">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2442">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2443">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2443">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2444">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2444">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2445">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2445">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2446">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2446">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2447">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2447">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2448">GP 唯一名称: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2448">GP 唯一名称: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2449">GP 名称: 阻止特定站点上的 Adobe Flash 插件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2449">GP 名称: 阻止特定站点上的 Adobe Flash 插件</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2450">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2450">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2451">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2451">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2452">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2452">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2453">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2453">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2454">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2454">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2455">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2455">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2456">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2456">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2457">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2457">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2458">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2458">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2459">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2459">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2460">首选项密钥名称: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2460">首选项密钥名称: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2508">GP 唯一名称: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2508">GP 唯一名称: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2509">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2509">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止弹出窗口</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2510">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2510">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2511">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2511">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2512">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2512">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2513">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2513">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2514">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2514">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2515">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2515">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2516">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2516">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2517">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2517">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2518">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2518">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2519">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2519">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2520">首选项密钥名称: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2520">首选项密钥名称: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2521">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2521">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2522">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2522">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2523">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2523">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2524">注册协议处理程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2524">注册协议处理程序</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2525">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2525">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2526">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2526">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2527">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2527">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2528">设置此策略(仅推荐)以注册协议处理程序列表。此列表与用户注册的列表进行合并，并且都可使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2528">设置此策略(仅推荐)以注册协议处理程序列表。此列表与用户注册的列表进行合并，并且都可使用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2529">要注册协议处理程序，请执行以下操作:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2529">要注册协议处理程序，请执行以下操作:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2530">将协议属性设置为方案(例如 "mailto")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2530">将协议属性设置为方案(例如 "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2531">将 URL 属性设置为处理“协议”字段中指定方案的应用程序的 URL 属性。该模式可以包括已处理的 URL 所替换的“%s”占位符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2531">将 URL 属性设置为处理“协议”字段中指定方案的应用程序的 URL 属性。该模式可以包括已处理的 URL 所替换的“%s”占位符。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2532">用户不能删除此策略注册的协议处理程序。但是，他们可以安装一个新的默认协议处理程序来替代现有的协议处理程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2532">用户不能删除此策略注册的协议处理程序。但是，他们可以安装一个新的默认协议处理程序来替代现有的协议处理程序。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2533">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2533">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2534">可以为必填字段: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2534">可以为必填字段: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2535">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2535">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2536">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2536">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2537">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2537">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2538">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2538">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2539">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2539">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2540">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2540">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2541">GP 唯一名称: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2541">GP 唯一名称: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2542">GP 名称: 注册协议处理程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2542">GP 名称: 注册协议处理程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2543">GP 路径 (强制): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2543">GP 路径 (强制): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2544">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2544">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2545">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2545">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2546">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2546">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2547">路径 (强制): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2547">路径 (强制): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2548">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2548">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2549">值名称: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2549">值名称: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2550">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2550">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2551">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2551">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2552">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2552">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2553">首选项密钥名称: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2553">首选项密钥名称: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2554">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2554">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2577">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2577">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2578">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2578">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2579">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2579">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2584">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2584">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2585">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2585">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2586">授予特定站点访问权限以连接到特定 USB 设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2586">授予特定站点访问权限以连接到特定 USB 设备</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2587">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2587">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2588">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2588">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2589">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2589">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2590">允许你设置 URL 列表，指定为哪些站点自动授予具有给定供应商和产品 ID 的 USB 设备的访问权限。为了使策略有效，列表中的每个项目都必须包含设备和 URL。设备中的每个项目都可以包含供应商 ID 和产品 ID 字段。任何被省略的 ID 均视为通配符，但有一个例外: 必须同时指定供应商 ID，才能指定产品 ID，否则策略将无效并被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2590">允许你设置 URL 列表，指定为哪些站点自动授予具有给定供应商和产品 ID 的 USB 设备的访问权限。为了使策略有效，列表中的每个项目都必须包含设备和 URL。设备中的每个项目都可以包含供应商 ID 和产品 ID 字段。任何被省略的 ID 均视为通配符，但有一个例外: 必须同时指定供应商 ID，才能指定产品 ID，否则策略将无效并被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2591">USB 权限模型使用请求站点的 URL (“请求 URL”)和顶级框架网站的 URL (“嵌入 URL”)为请求 URL 授予 USB 设备的访问权限。当请求的网站加载到 iframe 中时，请求 URL 可能不同于嵌入 URL。因此，"urls" 字段最多可包含两个以逗号分隔的 URL 字符串，以便分别指定请求和嵌入 URL。如果仅指定了一个 URL，则当请求站点的 URL 与此 URL 匹配时，将向相应的 USB 设备授予访问权限，而无论嵌入状态如何。"urls" 中的 URL 必须是有效的 URL，否则将忽略该策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2591">USB 权限模型使用请求站点的 URL (“请求 URL”)和顶级框架网站的 URL (“嵌入 URL”)为请求 URL 授予 USB 设备的访问权限。当请求的网站加载到 iframe 中时，请求 URL 可能不同于嵌入 URL。因此，"urls" 字段最多可包含两个以逗号分隔的 URL 字符串，以便分别指定请求和嵌入 URL。如果仅指定了一个 URL，则当请求站点的 URL 与此 URL 匹配时，将向相应的 USB 设备授予访问权限，而无论嵌入状态如何。"urls" 中的 URL 必须是有效的 URL，否则将忽略该策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2592">如果未设置此策略，则将对所有站点使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2592">如果未设置此策略，则将对所有站点使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2593">此策略中的 URL 模式不应与通过 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 配置的 URL 冲突。如果存在冲突，此策略将优先于 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 和 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2593">此策略中的 URL 模式不应与通过 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 配置的 URL 冲突。如果存在冲突，此策略将优先于 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 和 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2594">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2594">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2595">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2595">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2596">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2596">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2597">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2597">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2598">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2598">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2599">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2599">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2600">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2600">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2601">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2601">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2602">GP 唯一名称: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2602">GP 唯一名称: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2603">GP 名称: 授予特定站点访问权限以连接到特定 USB 设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2603">GP 名称: 授予特定站点访问权限以连接到特定 USB 设备</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2604">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2604">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2605">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2605">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2606">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2606">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2607">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2607">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2608">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2608">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2609">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2609">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2610">值名称: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2610">值名称: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2611">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2611">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2612">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2612">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2613">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2613">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2614">首选项密钥名称: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2614">首选项密钥名称: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2615">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2615">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2616">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2616">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2617">WebUsbAskForUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2617">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2618">在特定站点上允许 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2618">在特定站点上允许 WebUSB</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2619">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2619">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2620">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2620">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2621">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2621">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2622">根据 URL 模式定义可以请求用户提供 USB 设备访问权限的站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2622">根据 URL 模式定义可以请求用户提供 USB 设备访问权限的站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2623">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2623">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2624">此策略中定义的 URL 模式不能与 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 策略中配置的 URL 模式冲突 - 不能同时允许和阻止 URL。有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2624">此策略中定义的 URL 模式不能与 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 策略中配置的 URL 模式冲突 - 不能同时允许和阻止 URL。有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2625">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2625">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2626">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2626">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2627">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2627">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2628">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2628">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2629">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2629">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2630">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2630">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2631">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2631">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2632">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2632">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2633">GP 唯一名称: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2633">GP 唯一名称: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2634">GP 名称: 在特定站点上允许 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2634">GP 名称: 在特定站点上允许 WebUSB</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2635">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2635">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2636">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2636">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2637">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2637">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2638">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2638">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2639">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2639">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2640">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2640">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2641">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2641">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2642">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2642">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2643">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2643">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2644">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2644">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2645">首选项密钥名称: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2645">首选项密钥名称: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2646">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2646">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2648">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2648">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2651">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2651">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2652">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2652">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2653">根据 URL 模式定义无法请求用户授予 USB 设备访问权限的站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2653">根据 URL 模式定义无法请求用户授予 USB 设备访问权限的站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2654">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2654">如果未配置此策略，则对所有站点使用 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 策略(如果已设置)或用户个人配置中的全局默认值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2655">此策略中的 URL 模式不能与 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 策略中配置的 URL 模式冲突。不能同时允许和阻止 URL。有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2655">此策略中的 URL 模式不能与 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 策略中配置的 URL 模式冲突。不能同时允许和阻止 URL。有关有效 URL 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2656">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2656">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2657">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2657">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2658">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2658">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2659">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2659">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2660">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2660">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2661">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2661">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2662">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2662">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2663">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2663">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2664">GP 唯一名称: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2664">GP 唯一名称: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2665">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止 WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2665">GP 名称: 在特定站点上阻止 WebUSB</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2666">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2666">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/内容设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2667">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2667">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2668">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2668">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2669">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2669">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2670">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2670">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2671">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2671">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2672">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2672">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2673">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2673">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2674">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2674">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2675">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2675">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2676">首选项密钥名称: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2676">首选项密钥名称: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2677">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2677">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2678">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2678">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2679">启动、主页和新选项卡页 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2679">启动、主页和新选项卡页 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2680">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2680">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2681">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2681">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2682">将新标签页设置为主页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2682">将新标签页设置为主页</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2683">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2683">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2684">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2684">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2685">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2685">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2686">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置默认主页。你可以将主页设置为你指定的 URL 或新标签页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2686">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置默认主页。你可以将主页设置为你指定的 URL 或新标签页。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2687">如果启用此策略，则新标签页将始终用作主页，并且会忽略主页 URL 位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2687">如果启用此策略，则新标签页将始终用作主页，并且会忽略主页 URL 位置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2688">如果禁用此策略，则用户的主页不能是新标签页，除非 URL 设置为 "edge://newtab"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2688">如果禁用此策略，则用户的主页不能是新标签页，除非 URL 设置为 "edge://newtab"。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2689">如果未配置，则用户可以选择新标签页是否是其主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2689">如果未配置，则用户可以选择新标签页是否是其主页。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2690">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2690">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2691">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2691">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2692">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2692">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2693">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2693">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2694">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2694">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2695">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2695">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2696">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2696">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2697">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2697">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2698">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2698">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2699">GP 唯一名称: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2699">GP 唯一名称: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2700">GP 名称: 将新标签页设置为主页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2700">GP 名称: 将新标签页设置为主页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2701">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2701">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2702">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2702">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2703">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2703">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2704">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2704">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2705">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2705">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2706">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2706">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2707">值名称: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2707">值名称: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2708">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2708">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2709">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2709">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2710">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2710">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2711">首选项密钥名称: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2711">首选项密钥名称: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2712">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2712">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2713">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2713">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2714">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2714">HomepageLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2715">配置主页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2715">配置主页 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2716">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2716">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2717">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2717">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2718">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2718">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2719">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置默认主页 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2719">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置默认主页 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2720">主页是通过主页按钮打开的页面。启动时打开的页面由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略进行控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2720">主页是通过主页按钮打开的页面。启动时打开的页面由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略进行控制。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2721">你可以在此处设置 URL 或设置主页以打开新标签页。如果选择打开新标签页，则此策略不会生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2721">你可以在此处设置 URL 或设置主页以打开新标签页。如果选择打开新标签页，则此策略不会生效。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2722">如果启用此策略，则用户无法更改其主页 URL，但可以选择使用新标签页作为主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2722">如果启用此策略，则用户无法更改其主页 URL，但可以选择使用新标签页作为主页。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2723">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则只要未启用 [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) 策略，用户就可以自行选择主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2723">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则只要未启用 [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) 策略，用户就可以自行选择主页。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2724">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2724">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2725">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2725">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2726">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2726">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2727">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2727">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2728">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2728">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2729">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2729">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2730">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2730">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2731">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2731">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2732">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2732">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2733">GP 唯一名称: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2733">GP 唯一名称: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2734">GP 名称: 配置主页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2734">GP 名称: 配置主页 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2735">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2735">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2736">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2736">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2737">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2737">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2738">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2738">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2739">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2739">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2740">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2740">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2741">值名称: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2741">值名称: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2742">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2742">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2743">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2743">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://www.contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2744">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2744">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2745">首选项密钥名称: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2745">首选项密钥名称: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2746">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2746">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2747">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2747">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2748">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2748">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2749">配置允许用于新选项卡页面布局的背景类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2749">配置允许用于新选项卡页面布局的背景类型</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2750">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2750">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2751">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2751">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2752">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2752">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2753">你可以在 Microsoft Edge 中配置新选项卡页面布局上允许使用的背景图像类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2753">你可以在 Microsoft Edge 中配置新选项卡页面布局上允许使用的背景图像类型。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2754">如果未配置此策略，则会启用新选项卡页上的所有背景图像类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2754">如果未配置此策略，则会启用新选项卡页上的所有背景图像类型。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2755">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2755">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2756">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = 禁用每日背景图像类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2756">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = 禁用每日背景图像类型</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2757">DisableCustomImage (2) = 禁用自定义背景图像类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2757">DisableCustomImage (2) = 禁用自定义背景图像类型</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2758">DisableAll (3) = 禁用所有背景图像类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2758">DisableAll (3) = 禁用所有背景图像类型</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2782">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2782">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2783">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2783">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2784">设置新的选项卡页公司徽标 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2784">设置新的选项卡页公司徽标 (过时)</span></span>
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-2785">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 85 之后无法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2785">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 85 之后无法使用。</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2786">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2786">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2787">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 79 上 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2787">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 79 上 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2788">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2788">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2789">由于操作要求发生变化，此策略无法按预期发挥作用。因此，它已过时，不应使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2789">由于操作要求发生变化，此策略无法按预期发挥作用。因此，它已过时，不应使用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2790">指定要在 Microsoft Edge 中的新选项卡页上使用的公司徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2790">指定要在 Microsoft Edge 中的新选项卡页上使用的公司徽标。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2791">此策略应配置为以 JSON 格式表示徽标的字符串。例如: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2791">此策略应配置为以 JSON 格式表示徽标的字符串。例如: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2792">你可以通过指定 URL 来配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 可以通过此 URL 下载徽标以及用于验证下载完整性的加密哈希(SHA-256)。徽标必须采用 PNG 或 SVG 格式，并且文件大小不得超过 16 MB。下载并缓存徽标后，只要 URL 或哈希发生更改，就会重新下载徽标。此 URL 必须可访问，并且无需进行任何身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2792">你可以通过指定 URL 来配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 可以通过此 URL 下载徽标以及用于验证下载完整性的加密哈希(SHA-256)。徽标必须采用 PNG 或 SVG 格式，并且文件大小不得超过 16 MB。下载并缓存徽标后，只要 URL 或哈希发生更改，就会重新下载徽标。此 URL 必须可访问，并且无需进行任何身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2793">"default_logo" 是必需的，将在没有背景图像时使用。如果提供了 "light_logo"，则将在用户的新选项卡页具有背景图像时使用。我们建议使用具有左对齐且垂直居中的透明背景的水平徽标。徽标的最小高度应为 32 像素，纵横比为 1:1 到 4:1。"default_logo" 应与黑/白背景具有适当的对比度，而 "light_logo" 应与背景图像具有适当的对比度。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2793">"default_logo" 是必需的，将在没有背景图像时使用。如果提供了 "light_logo"，则将在用户的新选项卡页具有背景图像时使用。我们建议使用具有左对齐且垂直居中的透明背景的水平徽标。徽标的最小高度应为 32 像素，纵横比为 1:1 到 4:1。"default_logo" 应与黑/白背景具有适当的对比度，而 "light_logo" 应与背景图像具有适当的对比度。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2794">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将下载指定的徽标并在新选项卡页上显示此徽标。用户不能覆盖或隐藏徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2794">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将下载指定的徽标并在新选项卡页上显示此徽标。用户不能覆盖或隐藏徽标。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2795">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将不在新选项卡页上显示公司徽标或 Microsoft 徽标。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2795">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将不在新选项卡页上显示公司徽标或 Microsoft 徽标。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2796">有关确定 SHA-256 哈希的帮助，请参阅 https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2796">有关确定 SHA-256 哈希的帮助，请参阅 https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2797">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2797">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2798">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2798">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2799">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2799">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2800">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2800">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2801">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2801">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2802">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2802">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2803">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2803">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2804">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2804">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2805">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2805">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2806">GP 名称: 设置新的选项卡页公司徽标 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2806">GP 名称: 设置新的选项卡页公司徽标 (过时)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2807">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2807">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2808">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2808">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2809">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2809">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2810">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2810">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2811">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2811">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2812">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2812">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2813">值名称: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2813">值名称: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2814">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2814">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2815">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2815">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  }, 
  "light_logo": {
    "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2816">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2816">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2819">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2819">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2820">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2820">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2821">从新选项卡页中隐藏默认的热门站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2821">从新选项卡页中隐藏默认的热门站点</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2822">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2822">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2823">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2823">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2824">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2824">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2825">在 Microsoft Edge 中的新标签页中隐藏默认热门站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2825">在 Microsoft Edge 中的新标签页中隐藏默认热门站点。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2826">如果将此策略设置为 True，则默认热门站点磁贴将隐藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2826">如果将此策略设置为 True，则默认热门站点磁贴将隐藏。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2827">如果将此策略设置为 False 或未配置此策略，则默认热门站点磁贴将保持可见。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2827">如果将此策略设置为 False 或未配置此策略，则默认热门站点磁贴将保持可见。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2828">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2828">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2829">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2829">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2830">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2830">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2831">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2831">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2832">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2832">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2833">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2833">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2834">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2834">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2835">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2835">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2836">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2836">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2837">GP 名称: 从新选项卡页中隐藏默认的热门站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2837">GP 名称: 从新选项卡页中隐藏默认的热门站点</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2838">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2838">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2839">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2839">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2840">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2840">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2841">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2841">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2842">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2842">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2843">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2843">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2844">值名称: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2844">值名称: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2845">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2845">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2846">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2846">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2847">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2847">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2848">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2848">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2849">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2849">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
