  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2850">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2850">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2851">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2851">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2852">配置新的选项卡页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2852">配置新的选项卡页 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2853">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2853">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2854">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2854">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2855">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2855">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2856">为新标签页配置默认 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2856">为新标签页配置默认 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2857">此策略可决定创建新标签页时(包括打开新窗口时)打开的页面。如果启动页面设置为打开新标签页，则此策略也会影响启动页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2857">此策略可决定创建新标签页时(包括打开新窗口时)打开的页面。如果启动页面设置为打开新标签页，则此策略也会影响启动页面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2858">此策略无法决定启动时打开哪个页面；启动时打开哪个页面由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略控制。如果主页设置为打开新标签页，则它也不会影响主页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2858">此策略无法决定启动时打开哪个页面；启动时打开哪个页面由 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略控制。如果主页设置为打开新标签页，则它也不会影响主页。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2859">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认的新标签页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2859">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认的新标签页。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2860">如果配置此策略*以及* [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) 策略，则此策略优先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2860">如果配置此策略*以及* [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) 策略，则此策略优先。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2861">如果提供的 URL 无效，新标签页将打开 about://blank。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2861">如果提供的 URL 无效，新标签页将打开 about://blank。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2862">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2862">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2863">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2863">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2864">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2864">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2865">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2865">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2866">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2866">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2867">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2867">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2868">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2868">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2869">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2869">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2870">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2870">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2871">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2871">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2872">GP 名称: 配置新的选项卡页 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2872">GP 名称: 配置新的选项卡页 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2873">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2873">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2874">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2874">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2875">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2875">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2876">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2876">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2877">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2877">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2878">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2878">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2879">值名称: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2879">值名称: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2880">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2880">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2881">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2881">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://www.fabrikam.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2882">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2882">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2883">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2883">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2884">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2884">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2885">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2885">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2886">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2886">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2887">设置新标签页快速链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2887">设置新标签页快速链接</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2888">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2888">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2889">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2889">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2890">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2890">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2891">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 在新标签页上显示快速链接，包括用户添加的快捷方式和基于浏览历史记录的热门站点。使用此策略，可以在新标签页上配置最多三个快速链接磁贴，以 JSON 对象的形式表示:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2891">默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 在新标签页上显示快速链接，包括用户添加的快捷方式和基于浏览历史记录的热门站点。使用此策略，可以在新标签页上配置最多三个快速链接磁贴，以 JSON 对象的形式表示:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2892">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2892">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2893">"URL" 字段为必填字段；“标题”和“已固定”为可选字段。如果未提供“标题”，则将 URL 用作默认标题。如果未提供“已固定”，则默认值为 false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2893">"URL" 字段为必填字段；“标题”和“已固定”为可选字段。如果未提供“标题”，则将 URL 用作默认标题。如果未提供“已固定”，则默认值为 false。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2894">Microsoft Edge 按所列顺序从左到右显示这些项，并将所有已固定的磁贴排在未固定的磁贴之前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2894">Microsoft Edge 按所列顺序从左到右显示这些项，并将所有已固定的磁贴排在未固定的磁贴之前。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2895">如果此策略设置为强制执行，则会忽略“已固定”字段，并固定所有磁贴。用户无法删除磁贴，磁贴将始终显示在快速链接列表的前面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2895">如果此策略设置为强制执行，则会忽略“已固定”字段，并固定所有磁贴。用户无法删除磁贴，磁贴将始终显示在快速链接列表的前面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2896">如果此策略设置为推荐，则已固定的磁贴将保留在列表中，但用户可以编辑和删除它们。未固定的快速链接磁贴的使用方式与默认的热门站点类似，如果用户访问其他网站次数更多，则会将其从列表中清除。通过此策略将未固定的链接应用到现有浏览器用户配置时，链接可能根本不会显示，具体取决于它们在用户的浏览历史记录中的排名情况。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2896">如果此策略设置为推荐，则已固定的磁贴将保留在列表中，但用户可以编辑和删除它们。未固定的快速链接磁贴的使用方式与默认的热门站点类似，如果用户访问其他网站次数更多，则会将其从列表中清除。通过此策略将未固定的链接应用到现有浏览器用户配置时，链接可能根本不会显示，具体取决于它们在用户的浏览历史记录中的排名情况。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2897">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2897">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2898">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2898">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2899">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2899">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2900">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2900">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2901">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2901">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2902">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2902">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2903">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2903">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2904">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2904">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2905">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2905">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2906">GP 名称: 设置新标签页快速链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2906">GP 名称: 设置新标签页快速链接</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2907">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2907">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2908">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2908">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2909">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2909">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2910">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2910">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2911">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2911">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2912">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2912">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2913">值名称: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2913">值名称: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2914">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2914">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2915">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2915">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true, 
    "title": "Contoso Portal", 
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam", 
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2916">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2916">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2917">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2917">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2918">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2918">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2919">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2919">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2920">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2920">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2921">启用新标签页的预加载以提高呈现速度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2921">启用新标签页的预加载以提高呈现速度</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2922">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2922">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2923">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2923">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2924">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2924">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2925">如果配置此策略，则会启用预加载“新建”选项卡页面，并且用户无法更改此设置。如果未配置此策略，则将启用预加载，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2925">如果配置此策略，则会启用预加载“新建”选项卡页面，并且用户无法更改此设置。如果未配置此策略，则将启用预加载，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2926">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2926">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2927">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2927">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2928">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2928">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2929">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2929">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2930">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2930">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2931">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2931">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2932">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2932">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2933">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2933">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2934">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2934">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2935">GP 名称: 启用新标签页的预加载以提高呈现速度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2935">GP 名称: 启用新标签页的预加载以提高呈现速度</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2936">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2936">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2937">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2937">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2938">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2938">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2939">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2939">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2940">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2940">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2941">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2941">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2942">值名称: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2942">值名称: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2943">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2943">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2944">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2944">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2945">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2945">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2946">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2946">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2947">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2947">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2948">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2948">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2949">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2949">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2950">配置 Microsoft Edge 新标签页体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2950">配置 Microsoft Edge 新标签页体验</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2951">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2951">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2952">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2952">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2953">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2953">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2954">允许你为新标签页选择 Microsoft 资讯或是 Office 365 信息提要体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2954">允许你为新标签页选择 Microsoft 资讯或是 Office 365 信息提要体验。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2955">将此策略设置为“News”时，用户将在新标签页上获得 Microsoft 资讯信息提要体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2955">将此策略设置为“News”时，用户将在新标签页上获得 Microsoft 资讯信息提要体验。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2956">将此策略设置为“Office”时，通过 Azure Active Directory 登录浏览器的用户将在新标签页上获得 Office 365 信息提要体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2956">将此策略设置为“Office”时，通过 Azure Active Directory 登录浏览器的用户将在新标签页上获得 Office 365 信息提要体验。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2957">如果禁用或未配置此策略:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2957">如果禁用或未配置此策略:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2958">通过 Azure Active Directory 登录浏览器的用户将获得 Office 365 新标签页信息提要体验，以及标准的新标签页信息提要体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2958">通过 Azure Active Directory 登录浏览器的用户将获得 Office 365 新标签页信息提要体验，以及标准的新标签页信息提要体验。</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2959">未通过 Azure Active Directory 登录浏览器的用户将获得标准的新标签页体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2959">未通过 Azure Active Directory 登录浏览器的用户将获得标准的新标签页体验。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2960">如果配置此策略 *以及* [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 策略，则 [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 优先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2960">如果配置此策略 *以及* [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 策略，则 [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 优先。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2961">默认设置: 已禁用或未配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2961">默认设置: 已禁用或未配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2962">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2962">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2963">News (0) = Microsoft 资讯信息提要体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2963">News (0) = Microsoft 资讯信息提要体验</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2964">Office (1) = Office 365 信息提要体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2964">Office (1) = Office 365 信息提要体验</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2965">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2965">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2966">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2966">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2967">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2967">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2968">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2968">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2969">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2969">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2970">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2970">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2971">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2971">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2972">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2972">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2973">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2973">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2974">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2974">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2975">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Edge 新标签页体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2975">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Edge 新标签页体验</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2976">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2976">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2977">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2977">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2978">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2978">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2979">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2979">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2980">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2980">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2981">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2981">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2982">值名称: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2982">值名称: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2983">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2983">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2984">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2984">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2985">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2985">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2986">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2986">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2987">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2987">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2988">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2988">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2989">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2989">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2990">要在启动时执行的操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2990">要在启动时执行的操作</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2991">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2991">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2992">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2992">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2993">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2993">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-2994">指定 Microsoft Edge 在启动时的行为方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2994">指定 Microsoft Edge 在启动时的行为方式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2995">如果希望在启动时始终打开新标签页，请选择“RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2995">如果希望在启动时始终打开新标签页，请选择“RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2996">如果要重新打开上次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时打开的 URL，请选择“RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession”。浏览会话将按原样还原。请注意，此选项将禁用某些依赖会话或在退出时执行操作的设置(如“退出时清除浏览数据”或仅限于会话的 cookie)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2996">如果要重新打开上次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时打开的 URL，请选择“RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession”。浏览会话将按原样还原。请注意，此选项将禁用某些依赖会话或在退出时执行操作的设置(如“退出时清除浏览数据”或仅限于会话的 cookie)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2997">如果要打开一组特定的 URL，请选择“RestoreOnStartupIsURLs”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2997">如果要打开一组特定的 URL，请选择“RestoreOnStartupIsURLs”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2998">禁用此设置相当于未配置此设置。用户将能够在 Microsoft Edge 中对其进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2998">禁用此设置相当于未配置此设置。用户将能够在 Microsoft Edge 中对其进行更改。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-2999">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-2999">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3000">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3000">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3001">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = 打开新标签页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3001">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = 打开新标签页</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3002">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = 还原上一个会话</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3002">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = 还原上一个会话</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3003">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = 打开 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3003">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = 打开 URL 列表</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3004">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3004">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3005">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3005">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3006">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3006">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3007">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3007">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3008">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3008">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3011">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3011">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3012">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3012">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3013">GP 唯一名称: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3013">GP 唯一名称: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3014">GP 名称: 要在启动时执行的操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3014">GP 名称: 要在启动时执行的操作</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3015">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3015">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3016">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3016">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3017">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3017">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3018">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3018">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3019">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3019">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3020">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3020">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3021">值名称: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3021">值名称: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3022">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3022">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3023">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3023">示例值:</span></span>

```
0x00000004
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3025">首选项密钥名称: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3025">首选项密钥名称: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3027">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3027">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3028">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3028">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3029">浏览器启动时打开的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3029">浏览器启动时打开的站点</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3030">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3030">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3031">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3031">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3032">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3032">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3033">指定要在浏览器启动时自动打开的网站的列表。如果未配置此策略，则在启动时不打开任何站点。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3033">指定要在浏览器启动时自动打开的网站的列表。如果未配置此策略，则在启动时不打开任何站点。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3034">此策略仅在将 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略设置为“打开 URL 列表”(4)时有效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3034">此策略仅在将 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 策略设置为“打开 URL 列表”(4)时有效。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3035">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3035">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3036">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3036">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3037">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3037">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3038">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3038">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3039">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3039">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3040">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3040">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3041">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3041">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3042">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3042">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3043">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3043">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3044">GP 唯一名称: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3044">GP 唯一名称: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3045">GP 名称: 浏览器启动时打开的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3045">GP 名称: 浏览器启动时打开的站点</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3046">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3046">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3047">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3047">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3048">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3048">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3049">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3049">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3050">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3050">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3051">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3051">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3052">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3052">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3053">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3053">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3054">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3054">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = "https://www.fabrikam.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3055">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3055">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3056">首选项密钥名称: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3056">首选项密钥名称: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3057">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3057">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3059">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3059">ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3060">在工具栏上显示“主页”按钮</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3060">在工具栏上显示“主页”按钮</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3061">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3061">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3062">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3062">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3063">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3063">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3064">在 Microsoft Edge 的工具栏上显示主页按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3064">在 Microsoft Edge 的工具栏上显示主页按钮。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3065">启用此策略可始终显示主页按钮。禁用此策略将从不显示此按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3065">启用此策略可始终显示主页按钮。禁用此策略将从不显示此按钮。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3066">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否显示主页按钮。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3066">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否显示主页按钮。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3067">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3067">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3068">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3068">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3069">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3069">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3070">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3070">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3071">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3071">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3072">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3072">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3073">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3073">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3074">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3074">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3075">GP 唯一名称: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3075">GP 唯一名称: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3076">GP 名称: 在工具栏上显示“主页”按钮</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3076">GP 名称: 在工具栏上显示“主页”按钮</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3077">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3077">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3078">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3078">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/启动、主页和新选项卡页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3079">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3079">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3080">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3080">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3081">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3081">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3082">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3082">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3083">值名称: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3083">值名称: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3084">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3084">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
