  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3090">密码管理器和保护 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3090">密码管理器和保护 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3091">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3091">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3092">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3092">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3093">启用将密码保存到密码管理器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3093">启用将密码保存到密码管理器</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3094">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3094">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3095">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3095">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3096">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3096">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3097">启用 Microsoft Edge 以保存用户密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3097">启用 Microsoft Edge 以保存用户密码。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3098">如果启用此策略，则用户可以保存其在 Microsoft Edge 中的密码。他们下次访问站点时，Microsoft Edge 将自动输入密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3098">如果启用此策略，则用户可以保存其在 Microsoft Edge 中的密码。他们下次访问站点时，Microsoft Edge 将自动输入密码。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3099">如果禁用此策略，则用户将无法保存新的密码，但仍可使用以前保存的密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3099">如果禁用此策略，则用户将无法保存新的密码，但仍可使用以前保存的密码。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3100">如果启用或禁用此策略，则用户不能在 Microsoft Edge 中更改或覆盖它。如果未配置此策略，则用户可以保存密码，也可以关闭此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3100">如果启用或禁用此策略，则用户不能在 Microsoft Edge 中更改或覆盖它。如果未配置此策略，则用户可以保存密码，也可以关闭此功能。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3101">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3101">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3102">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3102">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3103">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3103">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3104">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3104">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3105">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3105">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3106">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3106">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3107">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3107">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3108">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3108">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3109">GP 唯一名称: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3109">GP 唯一名称: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3110">GP 名称: 启用将密码保存到密码管理器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3110">GP 名称: 启用将密码保存到密码管理器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3111">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3111">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3112">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3112">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/密码管理器和保护</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3113">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3113">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3114">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3114">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3115">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3115">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3116">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3116">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3117">值名称: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3117">值名称: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3118">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3118">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3119">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3119">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3120">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3120">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3121">首选项密钥名称: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3121">首选项密钥名称: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3122">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3122">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3123">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3123">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3124">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3124">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3125">如果发现用户的密码不安全，则向用户发出警报</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3125">如果发现用户的密码不安全，则向用户发出警报</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3126">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3126">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3127">在 Windows 自 85 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3127">在 Windows 自 85 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3128">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3128">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3129">允许 Microsoft Edge 监视用户密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3129">允许 Microsoft Edge 监视用户密码。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3130">如果你启用此策略，并且用户同意启用该策略，则如果发现存储在 Microsoft Edge 中的任何密码不安全，则会向用户发出警报。Microsoft Edge 将显示警报，并且此信息也将在“设置”>“密码”>“密码监视器”中提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3130">如果你启用此策略，并且用户同意启用该策略，则如果发现存储在 Microsoft Edge 中的任何密码不安全，则会向用户发出警报。Microsoft Edge 将显示警报，并且此信息也将在“设置”>“密码”>“密码监视器”中提供。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3131">如果禁用此策略，则不会要求用户授予启用此功能的权限。他们的密码不会被扫描，也不会收到警报。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3131">如果禁用此策略，则不会要求用户授予启用此功能的权限。他们的密码不会被扫描，也不会收到警报。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3132">如果启用或未配置该策略，则用户可以打开或关闭此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3132">如果启用或未配置该策略，则用户可以打开或关闭此功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3133">若要了解有关 Microsoft Edge 如何找到不安全密码的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3133">若要了解有关 Microsoft Edge 如何找到不安全密码的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3134">其他指南:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3134">其他指南:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3135">可以将此政策设置为“推荐”和“强制”两种，但是带有重要标注。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3135">可以将此政策设置为“推荐”和“强制”两种，但是带有重要标注。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3136">强制启用: 鉴于个人用户同意是为给定用户启用此功能的前提，因此此策略没有强制启用设置。如果将该策略设置为强制启用，则“设置”中的 UI 不会更改，并且以下错误消息将显示在 edge://policy 中</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3136">强制启用: 鉴于个人用户同意是为给定用户启用此功能的前提，因此此策略没有强制启用设置。如果将该策略设置为强制启用，则“设置”中的 UI 不会更改，并且以下错误消息将显示在 edge://policy 中</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3137">示例错误状态消息:“此策略值将被忽略，因为密码监视器器需要个人用户同意才能打开它。你可以要求组织中的用户转至“设置”>“用户配置”>“密码”并打开功能。”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3137">示例错误状态消息:“此策略值将被忽略，因为密码监视器器需要个人用户同意才能打开它。你可以要求组织中的用户转至“设置”>“用户配置”>“密码”并打开功能。”</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3138">建议启用: 如果将策略设置为建议启用，则“设置”中的用户界面将保持“关闭”状态，但旁边会出现一个公文包图标，并在悬停时显示此说明:“你的组织建议为此设置指定一个特定值，而你选择了其他值”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3138">建议启用: 如果将策略设置为建议启用，则“设置”中的用户界面将保持“关闭”状态，但旁边会出现一个公文包图标，并在悬停时显示此说明:“你的组织建议为此设置指定一个特定值，而你选择了其他值”</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3139">强制和建议禁用: 这两种状态都将正常工作，并向用户显示常用标题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3139">强制和建议禁用: 这两种状态都将正常工作，并向用户显示常用标题。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3140">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3140">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3141">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3141">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3142">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3142">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3143">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3143">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3144">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3144">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3145">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3145">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3146">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3146">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3147">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3147">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3148">GP 唯一名称: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3148">GP 唯一名称: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3149">GP 名称: 如果发现用户的密码不安全，则向用户发出警报</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3149">GP 名称: 如果发现用户的密码不安全，则向用户发出警报</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3150">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3150">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3151">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3151">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/密码管理器和保护</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3152">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3152">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3153">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3153">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3154">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3154">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3155">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3155">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3156">值名称: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3156">值名称: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3157">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3157">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3158">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3158">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3159">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3159">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3160">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3160">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3161">配置更改密码 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3161">配置更改密码 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3162">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3162">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3163">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3163">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3164">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3164">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3165">配置更改密码 URL (仅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3165">配置更改密码 URL (仅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3166">密码保护服务会将用户定向到此 URL，以便用户在浏览器中看到警告后更改其密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3166">密码保护服务会将用户定向到此 URL，以便用户在浏览器中看到警告后更改其密码。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3167">如果启用此策略，则密码保护服务会将用户定向到此 URL 以便其更改密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3167">如果启用此策略，则密码保护服务会将用户定向到此 URL 以便其更改密码。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3168">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则密码保护服务不会将用户重定向到更改密码 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3168">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则密码保护服务不会将用户重定向到更改密码 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3169">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3169">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3170">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3170">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3171">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3171">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3172">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3172">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3173">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3173">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3174">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3174">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3175">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3175">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3176">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3176">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3177">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3177">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3178">GP 唯一名称: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3178">GP 唯一名称: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3179">GP 名称: 配置更改密码 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3179">GP 名称: 配置更改密码 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3180">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3180">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3181">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3181">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3182">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3182">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3183">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3183">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3184">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3184">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3185">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3185">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3186">值名称: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3186">值名称: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3187">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3187">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3188">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3188">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://contoso.com/change_password.html"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3189">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3189">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3190">首选项密钥名称: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3190">首选项密钥名称: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3191">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3191">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3192">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3192">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3193">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3193">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3194">配置密码保护服务应捕获密码加盐哈希的企业登录 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3194">配置密码保护服务应捕获密码加盐哈希的企业登录 URL 列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3195">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3195">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3196">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3196">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3197">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3197">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3198">配置企业登录 URL 列表（仅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案），其中 Microsoft Edge 应捕获密码盐渍哈希并将其用于密码重用检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3198">配置企业登录 URL 列表（仅限 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案），其中 Microsoft Edge 应捕获密码盐渍哈希并将其用于密码重用检测。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3199">如果启用此策略，则密码保护服务将捕获已定义 URL 上的密码指纹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3199">如果启用此策略，则密码保护服务将捕获已定义 URL 上的密码指纹。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3200">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会捕获密码指纹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3200">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会捕获密码指纹。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3201">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3201">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3202">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3202">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3203">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3203">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3204">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3204">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3205">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3205">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3206">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3206">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3207">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3207">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3208">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3208">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3209">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3209">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3210">GP 唯一名称: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3210">GP 唯一名称: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3211">GP 名称: 配置密码保护服务应捕获密码加盐哈希的企业登录 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3211">GP 名称: 配置密码保护服务应捕获密码加盐哈希的企业登录 URL 列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3212">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3212">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3213">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3213">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3214">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3214">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3215">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3215">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3216">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3216">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3217">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3217">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3218">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3218">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3219">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3219">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3220">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3220">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com/login.html"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = "https://login.contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3221">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3221">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3222">首选项密钥名称: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3222">首选项密钥名称: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3223">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3223">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3224">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3224">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3225">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3225">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3226">配置密码保护警告触发器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3226">配置密码保护警告触发器</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3227">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3227">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3228">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3228">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3229">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3229">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3230">允许你控制何时触发密码保护警告。用户在潜在可疑站点上重复使用受保护的密码时，密码保护功能会提醒用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3230">允许你控制何时触发密码保护警告。用户在潜在可疑站点上重复使用受保护的密码时，密码保护功能会提醒用户。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3231">你可以使用 [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 策略来配置要保护的密码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3231">你可以使用 [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 策略来配置要保护的密码。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3232">例外: [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 中所列站点以及 [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains) 中所列站点的密码不会触发密码保护警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3232">例外: [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 和 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 中所列站点以及 [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains) 中所列站点的密码不会触发密码保护警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3233">如果设置为“PasswordProtectionWarningOff”，则不会显示密码保护警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3233">如果设置为“PasswordProtectionWarningOff”，则不会显示密码保护警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3234">如果设置为“PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse”，则当用户在未列入允许列表的站点上重复使用受保护的密码时，会显示密码保护警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3234">如果设置为“PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse”，则当用户在未列入允许列表的站点上重复使用受保护的密码时，会显示密码保护警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3235">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不显示警告触发器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3235">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不显示警告触发器。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3236">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3236">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3237">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = 密码保护警告处于关闭状态</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3237">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = 密码保护警告处于关闭状态</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3238">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = 密码重用将触发密码保护警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3238">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = 密码重用将触发密码保护警告</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3239">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3239">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3240">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3240">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3241">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3241">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3242">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3242">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3243">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3243">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3244">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3244">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3245">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3245">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3246">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3246">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3247">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3247">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3248">GP 唯一名称: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3248">GP 唯一名称: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3249">GP 名称: 配置密码保护警告触发器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3249">GP 名称: 配置密码保护警告触发器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3250">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3250">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/密码管理器和保护</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3251">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3251">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3252">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3252">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3253">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3253">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3254">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3254">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3255">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3255">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3256">值名称: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3256">值名称: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3257">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3257">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3258">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3258">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3259">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3259">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3260">首选项密钥名称: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3260">首选项密钥名称: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3261">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3261">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3262">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3262">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3263">展台模式设置 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3263">展台模式设置 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3264">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3264">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3265">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3265">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3266">关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，删除展台会话期间下载的文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3266">关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，删除展台会话期间下载的文件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3267">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3267">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3268">在 Windows 自 87 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3268">在 Windows 自 87 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3269">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3269">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3270">注意：只有当使用“--edge-kiosk-type”命令行参数启动 Edge 时，才支持此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3270">注意：只有当使用“--edge-kiosk-type”命令行参数启动 Edge 时，才支持此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3271">如果启用此策略，则每次关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，系统都会删除展台会话期间下载的文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3271">如果启用此策略，则每次关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，系统都会删除展台会话期间下载的文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3272">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则在关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，系统不会删除展台会话期间下载的文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3272">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则在关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，系统不会删除展台会话期间下载的文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3273">要详细了解配置展台模式的相关信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3273">要详细了解配置展台模式的相关信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3274">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3274">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3275">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3275">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3276">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3276">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3277">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3277">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3278">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3278">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3279">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3279">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3280">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3280">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3281">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3281">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3282">GP 唯一名称: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3282">GP 唯一名称: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3283">GP 名称: 关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，删除展台会话期间下载的文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3283">GP 名称: 关闭 Microsoft Edge 时，删除展台会话期间下载的文件</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3284">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/展台模式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3284">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/展台模式设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3285">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3285">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3286">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3286">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3287">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3287">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3288">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3288">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3289">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3289">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3290">值名称: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3290">值名称: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3291">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3291">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3292">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3292">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3293">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3293">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3294">应用程序防护设置 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3294">应用程序防护设置 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3295">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3295">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3296">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3296">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3297">应用程序防护容器代理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3297">应用程序防护容器代理</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3298">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3298">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3299">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3299">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3300">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3300">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3301">配置 Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护的代理设置。 如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护会忽略代理配置的其他来源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3301">配置 Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护的代理设置。 如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护会忽略代理配置的其他来源。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3302">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护将使用主机的代理配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3302">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护将使用主机的代理配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3303">此策略不会影响应用程序防护(主机)外部的 Microsoft Edge 代理配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3303">此策略不会影响应用程序防护(主机)外部的 Microsoft Edge 代理配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3304">在 ProxyMode 字段中，可指定 Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护使用的代理服务器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3304">在 ProxyMode 字段中，可指定 Microsoft Edge 应用程序防护使用的代理服务器。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3305">ProxyPacUrl 字段是指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3305">ProxyPacUrl 字段是指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3306">ProxyServer 字段是代理服务器的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3306">ProxyServer 字段是代理服务器的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3307">如果选择“direct”值作为“ProxyMode”，则所有其他字段都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3307">如果选择“direct”值作为“ProxyMode”，则所有其他字段都将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3308">如果选择“auto_detect”值作为“ProxyMode”，则所有其他字段都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3308">如果选择“auto_detect”值作为“ProxyMode”，则所有其他字段都将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3309">如果选择“fixed_servers”值作为“ProxyMode”，则将使用“ProxyServer”字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3309">如果选择“fixed_servers”值作为“ProxyMode”，则将使用“ProxyServer”字段。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3310">如果选择“pac_script”值作为“ProxyMode”，则将使用“ProxyPacUrl”字段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3310">如果选择“pac_script”值作为“ProxyMode”，则将使用“ProxyPacUrl”字段。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3311">有关通过双重代理确定应用程序防护流量的更多信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3311">有关通过双重代理确定应用程序防护流量的更多信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3312">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3312">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3313">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3313">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3314">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3314">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3315">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3315">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3316">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3316">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3317">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3317">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3318">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3318">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3319">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3319">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3320">GP 唯一名称: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3320">GP 唯一名称: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3321">GP 名称: 应用程序防护容器代理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3321">GP 名称: 应用程序防护容器代理</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3322">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/应用程序防护设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3322">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/应用程序防护设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3323">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3323">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3324">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3324">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3325">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3325">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3326">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3326">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3327">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3327">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3328">值名称: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3328">值名称: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3329">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3329">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3330">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3330">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3331">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3331">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3332">打印 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3332">打印 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3333">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3333">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3334">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3334">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3335">默认打印机选择规则</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3335">默认打印机选择规则</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3336">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3336">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3337">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3337">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3338">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3338">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3339">替代 Microsoft Edge 默认打印机选择规则。此策略确定在 Microsoft Edge 中选择默认打印机的规则，用户首次尝试打印页面时需要进行此操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3339">替代 Microsoft Edge 默认打印机选择规则。此策略确定在 Microsoft Edge 中选择默认打印机的规则，用户首次尝试打印页面时需要进行此操作。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3340">设置此策略后，Microsoft Edge 会尝试查找与所有指定属性都匹配的打印机，并将其用作默认打印机。如果有多台打印机符合条件，则使用第一台匹配的打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3340">设置此策略后，Microsoft Edge 会尝试查找与所有指定属性都匹配的打印机，并将其用作默认打印机。如果有多台打印机符合条件，则使用第一台匹配的打印机。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3341">如果未配置此策略或在超时期限内未找到匹配的打印机，则打印机默认为内置 PDF 打印机，如果 PDF 打印机不可用，则默认为没有打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3341">如果未配置此策略或在超时期限内未找到匹配的打印机，则打印机默认为内置 PDF 打印机，如果 PDF 打印机不可用，则默认为没有打印机。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3342">该值被解析为 JSON 对象，遵循以下架构: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3342">该值被解析为 JSON 对象，遵循以下架构: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3343">省略字段意味着所有值都匹配；例如，如果未指定连接，则“打印预览”将开始发现各种本地打印机。正则表达式模式必须遵循 JavaScript RegExp 语法，并且匹配项区分大小写。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3343">省略字段意味着所有值都匹配；例如，如果未指定连接，则“打印预览”将开始发现各种本地打印机。正则表达式模式必须遵循 JavaScript RegExp 语法，并且匹配项区分大小写。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3344">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3344">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3345">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3345">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3346">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3346">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3347">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3347">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3348">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3348">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3349">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3349">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3350">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3350">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3351">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3351">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3352">GP 唯一名称: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3352">GP 唯一名称: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3353">GP 名称: 默认打印机选择规则</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3353">GP 名称: 默认打印机选择规则</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3354">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3354">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3355">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3355">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3356">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3356">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3357">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3357">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3358">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3358">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3359">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3359">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3360">值名称: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3360">值名称: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3361">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3361">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3362">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3362">示例值:</span></span>
```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3363">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3363">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3364">首选项密钥名称: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3364">首选项密钥名称: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3365">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3365">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3366">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3366">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3367">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3367">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3368">打印页眉和页脚</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3368">打印页眉和页脚</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3369">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3369">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3370">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3370">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3371">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3371">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3372">在打印对话框中强制开启或关闭“页眉和页脚”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3372">在打印对话框中强制开启或关闭“页眉和页脚”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3373">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以决定是否打印页眉和页脚。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3373">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以决定是否打印页眉和页脚。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3374">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法打印页眉和页脚。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3374">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法打印页眉和页脚。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3375">如果启用此策略，则用户始终打印页眉和页脚。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3375">如果启用此策略，则用户始终打印页眉和页脚。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3376">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3376">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3377">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3377">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3378">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3378">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3379">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3379">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3380">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3380">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3381">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3381">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3382">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3382">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3383">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3383">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3384">GP 唯一名称: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3384">GP 唯一名称: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3385">GP 名称: 打印页眉和页脚</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3385">GP 名称: 打印页眉和页脚</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3386">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3386">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3387">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3387">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3388">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3388">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3389">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3389">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3390">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3390">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3391">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3391">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3392">值名称: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3392">值名称: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3393">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3393">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3394">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3394">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3395">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3395">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3396">首选项密钥名称: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3396">首选项密钥名称: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3397">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3397">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3398">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3398">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3399">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3399">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3400">将系统的默认打印机设置为默认打印机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3400">将系统的默认打印机设置为默认打印机</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3401">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3401">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3402">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3402">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3403">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3403">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3404">告诉 Microsoft Edge 使用系统默认打印机作为“打印预览”中的默认选项，而不是使用最近使用过的打印机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3404">告诉 Microsoft Edge 使用系统默认打印机作为“打印预览”中的默认选项，而不是使用最近使用过的打印机。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3405">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则“打印预览”使用最近使用过的打印机作为默认目标选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3405">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则“打印预览”使用最近使用过的打印机作为默认目标选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3406">如果启用此策略，则“打印预览”使用 OS 系统默认打印机作为默认目标选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3406">如果启用此策略，则“打印预览”使用 OS 系统默认打印机作为默认目标选项。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3407">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3407">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3408">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3408">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3409">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3409">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3410">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3410">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3411">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3411">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3412">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3412">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3413">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3413">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3414">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3414">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3415">GP 唯一名称: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3415">GP 唯一名称: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3416">GP 名称: 将系统的默认打印机设置为默认打印机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3416">GP 名称: 将系统的默认打印机设置为默认打印机</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3417">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3417">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3418">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3418">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3419">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3419">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3420">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3420">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3421">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3421">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3422">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3422">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3423">值名称: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3423">值名称: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3424">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3424">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3425">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3425">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3426">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3426">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3427">首选项密钥名称: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3427">首选项密钥名称: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3428">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3428">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3429">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3429">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3430">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3430">PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3431">启用打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3431">启用打印</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3432">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3432">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3433">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3433">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3434">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3434">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3435">允许在 Microsoft Edge 中进行打印，并阻止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3435">允许在 Microsoft Edge 中进行打印，并阻止用户更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3436">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则用户可以打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3436">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则用户可以打印。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3437">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法通过 Microsoft Edge 进行打印。在扳手菜单、扩展、JavaScript 应用程序等位置中禁用了打印。用户仍然可以通过打印时绕过 Microsoft Edge 的插件进行打印。例如，某些 Adobe Flash 应用程序的上下文菜单中具有打印选项，此策略未涵盖此选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3437">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法通过 Microsoft Edge 进行打印。在扳手菜单、扩展、JavaScript 应用程序等位置中禁用了打印。用户仍然可以通过打印时绕过 Microsoft Edge 的插件进行打印。例如，某些 Adobe Flash 应用程序的上下文菜单中具有打印选项，此策略未涵盖此选项。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3438">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3438">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3439">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3439">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3440">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3440">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3441">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3441">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3442">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3442">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3443">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3443">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3444">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3444">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3445">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3445">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3446">GP 唯一名称: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3446">GP 唯一名称: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3447">GP 名称: 启用打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3447">GP 名称: 启用打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3448">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3448">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3449">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3449">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3450">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3450">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3451">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3451">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3452">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3452">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3453">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3453">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3454">值名称: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3454">值名称: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3455">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3455">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3456">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3456">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3457">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3457">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3458">首选项密钥名称: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3458">首选项密钥名称: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3459">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3459">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3460">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3460">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3461">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3461">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3462">默认打印页面大小</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3462">默认打印页面大小</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3463">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3463">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3464">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3464">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3465">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3465">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3466">覆盖默认打印页面大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3466">覆盖默认打印页面大小。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3467">如果列表中没有所需的纸张尺寸，name 应包含其中一种列出的格式或“自定义”格式。如果提供了“自定义”值，则应指定 custom_size 属性。它描述了所需的高度和宽度(以千分尺为单位)。否则不应指定 custom_size 属性。违反这些规则的策略将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3467">如果列表中没有所需的纸张尺寸，name 应包含其中一种列出的格式或“自定义”格式。如果提供了“自定义”值，则应指定 custom_size 属性。它描述了所需的高度和宽度(以千分尺为单位)。否则不应指定 custom_size 属性。违反这些规则的策略将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3468">如果页面大小在用户选择的打印机上不可用，则忽略此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3468">如果页面大小在用户选择的打印机上不可用，则忽略此策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3469">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3469">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3470">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3470">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3471">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3471">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3472">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3472">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3473">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3473">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3474">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3474">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3475">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3475">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3476">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3476">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3477">GP 唯一名称: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3477">GP 唯一名称: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3478">GP 名称: 默认打印页面大小</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3478">GP 名称: 默认打印页面大小</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3479">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3479">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3480">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3480">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3481">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3481">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3482">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3482">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3483">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3483">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3484">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3484">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3485">值名称: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3485">值名称: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3486">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3486">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3487">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3487">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {
  "custom_size": {
    "height": 297000, 
    "width": 210000
  }, 
  "name": "custom"
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3488">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3488">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3489">首选项密钥名称: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3489">首选项密钥名称: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3490">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3490">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>PrintingPaperSizeDefault</key>
<dict>
  <key>custom_size</key>
  <dict>
    <key>height</key>
    <integer>297000</integer>
    <key>width</key>
    <integer>210000</integer>
  </dict>
  <key>name</key>
  <string>custom</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3491">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3491">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3492">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3492">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3493">使用系统打印对话框打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3493">使用系统打印对话框打印</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3494">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3494">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3495">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3495">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3496">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3496">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3497">显示系统打印对话框而不是打印预览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3497">显示系统打印对话框而不是打印预览。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3498">如果启用此策略，那么当用户打印页面时，Microsoft Edge 将打开系统打印对话框而不是内置打印预览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3498">如果启用此策略，那么当用户打印页面时，Microsoft Edge 将打开系统打印对话框而不是内置打印预览。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3499">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则打印命令会触发 Microsoft Edge 打印预览屏幕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3499">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则打印命令会触发 Microsoft Edge 打印预览屏幕。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3500">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3500">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3501">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3501">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3502">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3502">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3503">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3503">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3504">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3504">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3505">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3505">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3506">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3506">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3507">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3507">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3508">GP 唯一名称: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3508">GP 唯一名称: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3509">GP 名称: 使用系统打印对话框打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3509">GP 名称: 使用系统打印对话框打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3510">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3510">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/打印</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3511">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3511">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3512">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3512">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3513">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3513">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3514">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3514">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3515">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3515">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3516">值名称: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3516">值名称: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3517">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3517">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3518">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3518">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3519">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3519">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3520">首选项密钥名称: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3520">首选项密钥名称: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3521">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3521">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3523">扩展 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3523">扩展 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3524">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3524">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3525">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3525">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3526">配置允许的扩展类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3526">配置允许的扩展类型</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3527">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3527">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3528">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3528">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3529">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3529">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3530">控制可以安装哪些扩展类型并限制运行时访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3530">控制可以安装哪些扩展类型并限制运行时访问。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3531">此设置定义允许的扩展类型以及它们可以与之交互的主机。值是一个字符串列表，每个字符串都应为以下其中一项: "extension"、"theme"、"user_script" 和 "hosted_app"。有关这些类型的详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft Edge 扩展文档。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3531">此设置定义允许的扩展类型以及它们可以与之交互的主机。值是一个字符串列表，每个字符串都应为以下其中一项: "extension"、"theme"、"user_script" 和 "hosted_app"。有关这些类型的详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft Edge 扩展文档。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3532">请注意，此策略还影响将要使用 [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) 策略强制安装的扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3532">请注意，此策略还影响将要使用 [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) 策略强制安装的扩展。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3533">如果启用此策略，则仅安装与列表中的类型匹配的扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3533">如果启用此策略，则仅安装与列表中的类型匹配的扩展。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3534">如果未配置此策略，则不会强制实施针对可接受扩展类型的限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3534">如果未配置此策略，则不会强制实施针对可接受扩展类型的限制。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3535">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3535">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3536">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3536">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3537">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3537">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3538">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3538">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3539">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3539">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3540">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3540">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3541">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3541">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3542">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3542">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3543">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3543">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3544">GP 名称: 配置允许的扩展类型</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3544">GP 名称: 配置允许的扩展类型</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3545">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3545">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3546">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3546">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3547">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3547">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3548">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3548">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3549">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3549">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3550">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3550">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3552">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3552">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3557">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3557">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3558">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3558">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3559">允许安装特定扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3559">允许安装特定扩展</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3560">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3560">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3561">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3561">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3562">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3562">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3563">默认情况下允许所有扩展。但是，如果通过将 "ExtensionInstallBlockList" 策略设置为 "\*" 来阻止所有扩展，则用户只能安装此策略中定义的扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3563">默认情况下允许所有扩展。但是，如果通过将 "ExtensionInstallBlockList" 策略设置为 "\*" 来阻止所有扩展，则用户只能安装此策略中定义的扩展。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3564">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3564">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3565">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3565">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3566">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3566">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3567">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3567">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3568">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3568">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3569">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3569">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3570">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3570">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3571">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3571">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3572">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3572">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3573">GP 名称: 允许安装特定扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3573">GP 名称: 允许安装特定扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3574">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3574">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3575">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3575">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3576">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3576">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3577">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3577">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3578">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3578">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3579">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3579">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3580">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3580">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3581">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3581">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3582">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3582">示例值:</span></span>
