```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3584">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3584">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3585">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3585">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml

  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3586">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3586">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3587">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3587">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3588">控制哪些扩展不能安装</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3588">控制哪些扩展不能安装</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3589">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3589">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3590">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3590">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3591">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3591">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3592">列出用户不能在 Microsoft Edge 中安装的特定扩展。部署此策略时，此列表中以前安装的任何扩展都将被禁用，并且用户将无法启用它们。如果从被阻止的扩展列表中删除某个项目，该扩展将在以前安装的任何位置自动重新启用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3592">列出用户不能在 Microsoft Edge 中安装的特定扩展。部署此策略时，此列表中以前安装的任何扩展都将被禁用，并且用户将无法启用它们。如果从被阻止的扩展列表中删除某个项目，该扩展将在以前安装的任何位置自动重新启用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3593">使用 "\*" 可阻止允许列表中未明确列出的所有扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3593">使用 "\*" 可阻止允许列表中未明确列出的所有扩展。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3594">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中安装任何扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3594">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中安装任何扩展。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3595">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3595">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3596">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3596">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3597">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3597">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3598">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3598">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3599">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3599">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3600">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3600">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3601">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3601">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3602">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3602">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3603">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3603">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3604">GP 名称: 控制哪些扩展不能安装</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3604">GP 名称: 控制哪些扩展不能安装</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3605">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3605">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3606">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3606">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3607">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3607">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3608">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3608">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3609">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3609">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3610">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3610">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3611">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3611">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3612">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3612">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3613">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3613">示例值:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3614">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3614">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3615">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3615">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3616">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3616">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3617">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3617">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3618">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3618">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3619">控制无提示安装的扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3619">控制无提示安装的扩展</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3620">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3620">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3621">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3621">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3622">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3622">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3623">指定静默安装、无需用户交互以及用户无法卸载或禁用(“强制安装”)的扩展。系统会隐式授予扩展请求的所有权限，包括将来版本的扩展所请求的任何附加权限，无需用户进行交互。此外，系统还会为 enterprise.deviceAttributes 和 enterprise.platformKeys 扩展 API 授予权限。(这两个 API 仅对强制安装的扩展可用。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3623">指定静默安装、无需用户交互以及用户无法卸载或禁用(“强制安装”)的扩展。系统会隐式授予扩展请求的所有权限，包括将来版本的扩展所请求的任何附加权限，无需用户进行交互。此外，系统还会为 enterprise.deviceAttributes 和 enterprise.platformKeys 扩展 API 授予权限。(这两个 API 仅对强制安装的扩展可用。)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3624">此策略优先于可能存在冲突的 [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 策略。当你从强制安装列表中取消某个扩展时，Microsoft Edge 将自动卸载该扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3624">此策略优先于可能存在冲突的 [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 策略。当你从强制安装列表中取消某个扩展时，Microsoft Edge 将自动卸载该扩展。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3625">对于非以下任一项的实例，强制安装仅限于 Microsoft Edge 加载项网站中列出的应用和扩展: 已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例或已注册用于设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，以及通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3625">对于非以下任一项的实例，强制安装仅限于 Microsoft Edge 加载项网站中列出的应用和扩展: 已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例或已注册用于设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，以及通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3626">请注意，用户可以使用开发人员工具(可能会显示扩展功能异常)修改任何扩展的源代码。如果你担心这一点，请设置 [DeveloperToolsAvailability](#developertoolsavailability) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3626">请注意，用户可以使用开发人员工具(可能会显示扩展功能异常)修改任何扩展的源代码。如果你担心这一点，请设置 [DeveloperToolsAvailability](#developertoolsavailability) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3627">使用以下格式将扩展添加到列表中:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3627">使用以下格式将扩展添加到列表中:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3628">[extensionID];[updateURL]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3628">[extensionID];[updateURL]</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3629">extensionID - 开发人员模式下在 edge://extensions 上找到的 32 个字母的字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3629">extensionID - 开发人员模式下在 edge://extensions 上找到的 32 个字母的字符串。</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3630">updateURL (可选)是应用或扩展的更新清单 XML 文档的地址，如 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) 中所述。如果要从 Chrome Web Store 安装扩展，请提供 Chrome Web Store 更新 URL: https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx。请注意，此策略中设置的更新 URL 仅用于初始安装；此扩展的后续更新使用扩展清单中指示的更新 URL。如果未设置 updateURL，则假定扩展位于 Microsoft Store 中，并使用以下更新 URL (https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3630">updateURL (可选)是应用或扩展的更新清单 XML 文档的地址，如 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) 中所述。如果要从 Chrome Web Store 安装扩展，请提供 Chrome Web Store 更新 URL: https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx。请注意，此策略中设置的更新 URL 仅用于初始安装；此扩展的后续更新使用扩展清单中指示的更新 URL。如果未设置 updateURL，则假定扩展位于 Microsoft Store 中，并使用以下更新 URL (https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3631">例如，gggmmkjegpiggikcnhidnjjhmicpibll;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx 从 Microsoft Store“更新”URL 安装 Microsoft Online 应用。有关托管扩展的详细信息，请参阅: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3631">例如，gggmmkjegpiggikcnhidnjjhmicpibll;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx 从 Microsoft Store“更新”URL 安装 Microsoft Online 应用。有关托管扩展的详细信息，请参阅: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3632">如果未配置此策略，则不会自动安装扩展，并且用户可以卸载 Microsoft Edge 中的任何扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3632">如果未配置此策略，则不会自动安装扩展，并且用户可以卸载 Microsoft Edge 中的任何扩展。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3633">请注意，此策略不适用于 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3633">请注意，此策略不适用于 InPrivate 模式。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3634">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3634">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3635">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3635">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3636">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3636">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3637">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3637">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3638">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3638">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3639">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3639">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3640">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3640">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3641">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3641">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3642">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3642">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3643">GP 名称: 控制无提示安装的扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3643">GP 名称: 控制无提示安装的扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3644">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3644">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3645">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3645">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3646">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3646">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3647">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3647">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3648">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3648">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3649">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3649">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3650">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3650">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3651">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3651">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3652">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3652">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3653">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3653">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3654">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3654">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3655">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3655">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<array>

</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3657">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3657">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3658">配置扩展和用户脚本安装源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3658">配置扩展和用户脚本安装源</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3659">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3659">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3660">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3660">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3661">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3661">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3662">定义可以安装扩展和主题的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3662">定义可以安装扩展和主题的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3663">默认情况下，用户必须为要安装的每个扩展或脚本下载 \*.crx 文件，然后将其拖到 Microsoft Edge 设置页面上。此策略允许特定 URL 针对用户使用/安装扩展或脚本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3663">默认情况下，用户必须为要安装的每个扩展或脚本下载 \*.crx 文件，然后将其拖到 Microsoft Edge 设置页面上。此策略允许特定 URL 针对用户使用/安装扩展或脚本。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3664">此列表中的每个项目都是扩展样式匹配模式(请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039))。用户可以从任何与此列表中的项匹配的 URL 轻松安装项目。这些模式必须允许 \*.crx 文件的位置，以及从中开始下载的页面(也就是引用站点)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3664">此列表中的每个项目都是扩展样式匹配模式(请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039))。用户可以从任何与此列表中的项匹配的 URL 轻松安装项目。这些模式必须允许 \*.crx 文件的位置，以及从中开始下载的页面(也就是引用站点)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3665">[ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 策略优先于此策略。阻止名单中的任何扩展都不会安装，即使来自此列表中的站点也不例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3665">[ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 策略优先于此策略。阻止名单中的任何扩展都不会安装，即使来自此列表中的站点也不例外。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3666">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3666">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3667">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3667">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3668">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3668">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3669">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3669">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3670">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3670">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3671">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3671">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3672">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3672">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3673">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3673">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3674">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3674">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3675">GP 名称: 配置扩展和用户脚本安装源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3675">GP 名称: 配置扩展和用户脚本安装源</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3676">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3676">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3677">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3677">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3678">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3678">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3679">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3679">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3680">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3680">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3681">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3681">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3682">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3682">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3683">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3683">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3684">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3684">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3685">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3685">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3686">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3686">首选项密钥名称: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3689">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3689">ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3690">配置扩展管理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3690">配置扩展管理设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3691">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3691">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3692">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3692">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3693">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3693">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3694">配置 Microsoft Edge 的扩展管理设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3694">配置 Microsoft Edge 的扩展管理设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3695">此策略控制多个设置，包括任何现有扩展相关策略所控制的设置。如果同时设置了此策略和任何旧策略，则此策略将替代旧策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3695">此策略控制多个设置，包括任何现有扩展相关策略所控制的设置。如果同时设置了此策略和任何旧策略，则此策略将替代旧策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3696">此策略会将扩展 ID 或更新 URL 映射到其配置。对于扩展 ID，此配置仅应用于指定的扩展。请设置特殊 ID "\*" 的默认配置，以应用于此策略中未明确列出的所有扩展。对于更新 URL，此配置将应用于在此扩展的清单中明确声明的更新 URL 的所有扩展，如 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) 中所述。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3696">此策略会将扩展 ID 或更新 URL 映射到其配置。对于扩展 ID，此配置仅应用于指定的扩展。请设置特殊 ID "\*" 的默认配置，以应用于此策略中未明确列出的所有扩展。对于更新 URL，此配置将应用于在此扩展的清单中明确声明的更新 URL 的所有扩展，如 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) 中所述。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3697">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3697">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3698">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3698">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3699">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3699">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3700">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3700">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3701">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3701">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3702">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3702">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3703">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3703">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3704">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3704">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3705">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3705">GP 唯一名称: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3706">GP 名称: 配置扩展管理设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3706">GP 名称: 配置扩展管理设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3707">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3707">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3708">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3708">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3709">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3709">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3710">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3710">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3711">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3711">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3712">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3712">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3713">值名称: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3713">值名称: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3714">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3714">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3715">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3715">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3719">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3719">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3720">本机消息 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3720">本机消息 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3721">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3721">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3722">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3722">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3723">控制用户可以使用的本机消息传递主机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3723">控制用户可以使用的本机消息传递主机</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3724">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3724">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3725">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3725">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3726">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3726">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3727">列出用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中使用的特定本地消息传递主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3727">列出用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中使用的特定本地消息传递主机。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3728">默认情况下，允许使用所有本地消息传递主机。如果将 [NativeMessagingBlocklist](#nativemessagingblocklist) 策略设置为 \*，则将阻止所有本地消息传递主机，并且仅加载此处列出的本地消息传递主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3728">默认情况下，允许使用所有本地消息传递主机。如果将 [NativeMessagingBlocklist](#nativemessagingblocklist) 策略设置为 \*，则将阻止所有本地消息传递主机，并且仅加载此处列出的本地消息传递主机。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3729">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3729">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3730">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3730">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3731">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3731">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3732">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3732">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3733">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3733">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3734">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3734">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3735">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3735">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3736">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3736">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3737">GP 唯一名称: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3737">GP 唯一名称: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3738">GP 名称: 控制用户可以使用的本机消息传递主机</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3738">GP 名称: 控制用户可以使用的本机消息传递主机</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3739">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3739">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3740">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3740">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3741">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3741">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3742">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3742">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3743">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3743">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3744">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3744">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3745">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3745">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3746">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3746">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3747">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3747">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3748">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3748">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3749">首选项密钥名称: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3749">首选项密钥名称: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3750">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3750">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3751">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3751">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3752">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3752">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3753">配置本机消息传递阻止名单</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3753">配置本机消息传递阻止名单</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3754">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3754">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3755">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3755">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3756">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3756">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3757">指定不应使用的本机消息传递主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3757">指定不应使用的本机消息传递主机。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3758">使用 "\*" 阻止所有本机消息传递主机，除非允许列表中明确列出了它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3758">使用 "\*" 阻止所有本机消息传递主机，除非允许列表中明确列出了它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3759">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将加载所有已安装的本机消息传递主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3759">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将加载所有已安装的本机消息传递主机。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3760">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3760">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3761">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3761">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3762">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3762">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3763">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3763">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3764">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3764">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3765">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3765">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3766">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3766">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3767">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3767">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3768">GP 唯一名称: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3768">GP 唯一名称: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3769">GP 名称: 配置本机消息传递阻止名单</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3769">GP 名称: 配置本机消息传递阻止名单</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3770">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3770">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3771">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3771">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3772">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3772">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3773">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3773">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3774">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3774">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3775">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3775">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3776">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3776">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3777">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3777">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3778">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3778">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3779">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3779">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3780">首选项密钥名称: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3780">首选项密钥名称: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3781">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3781">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
