  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3782">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3782">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3783">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3783">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3784">允许用户级本机消息传递主机(安装时不带管理员权限)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3784">允许用户级本机消息传递主机(安装时不带管理员权限)</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3785">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3785">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3786">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3786">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3787">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3787">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3788">启用本机消息传递主机的用户级别安装。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3788">启用本机消息传递主机的用户级别安装。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3789">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将只使用在系统级别安装的本机消息传递主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3789">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将只使用在系统级别安装的本机消息传递主机。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3790">默认情况下，如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将允许使用用户级别的本机消息传递主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3790">默认情况下，如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将允许使用用户级别的本机消息传递主机。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3791">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3791">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3792">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3792">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3793">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3793">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3794">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3794">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3795">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3795">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3796">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3796">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3797">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3797">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3798">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3798">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3799">GP 唯一名称: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3799">GP 唯一名称: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3800">GP 名称: 允许用户级本机消息传递主机(安装时不带管理员权限)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3800">GP 名称: 允许用户级本机消息传递主机(安装时不带管理员权限)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3801">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3801">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/本机消息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3802">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3802">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3803">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3803">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3804">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3804">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3805">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3805">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3806">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3806">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3807">值名称: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3807">值名称: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3808">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3808">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3809">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3809">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3810">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3810">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3811">首选项密钥名称: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3811">首选项密钥名称: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3812">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3812">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3813">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3813">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3814">默认的搜索提供程序 policies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3814">默认的搜索提供程序 policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3815">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3815">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3816">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3816">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3817">启用默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3817">启用默认搜索提供程序</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3818">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3818">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3819">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3819">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3820">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3820">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3821">启用使用默认搜索提供程序的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3821">启用使用默认搜索提供程序的功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3822">如果启用此策略，用户可通过在地址栏中键入来搜索术语(只要键入的不是 URL)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3822">如果启用此策略，用户可通过在地址栏中键入来搜索术语(只要键入的不是 URL)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3823">通过启用其余默认搜索策略，你可以指定要使用的默认搜索提供程序。如果留空(未配置)或配置不正确，用户可以选择默认提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3823">通过启用其余默认搜索策略，你可以指定要使用的默认搜索提供程序。如果留空(未配置)或配置不正确，用户可以选择默认提供程序。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3824">如果禁用此策略，用户不能从地址栏中搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3824">如果禁用此策略，用户不能从地址栏中搜索。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3825">如果启用或禁用此策略，则用户无法更改或覆盖它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3825">如果启用或禁用此策略，则用户无法更改或覆盖它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3826">如果未配置此策略，将启用默认搜索提供程序，用户可以选择默认搜索提供程序并设置搜索提供程序列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3826">如果未配置此策略，将启用默认搜索提供程序，用户可以选择默认搜索提供程序并设置搜索提供程序列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3827">此策略仅适用于加入到 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例，注册用于设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3827">此策略仅适用于加入到 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例，注册用于设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3828">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3828">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3829">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3829">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3830">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3830">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3831">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3831">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3832">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3832">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3833">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3833">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3834">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3834">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3835">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3835">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3836">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3836">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3837">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3837">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3838">GP 名称: 启用默认搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3838">GP 名称: 启用默认搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3839">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3839">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3840">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3840">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3841">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3841">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3842">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3842">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3843">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3843">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3844">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3844">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3845">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3845">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3846">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3846">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3847">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3847">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3848">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3848">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3849">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3849">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3850">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3850">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3851">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3851">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3852">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3852">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3853">默认的搜索提供程序编码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3853">默认的搜索提供程序编码</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3854">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3854">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3855">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3855">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3856">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3856">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3857">指定搜索提供程序支持的字符编码。编码是代码页名称，例如 UTF-8、GB2312 和 ISO-8859-1。将按照提供的顺序尝试它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3857">指定搜索提供程序支持的字符编码。编码是代码页名称，例如 UTF-8、GB2312 和 ISO-8859-1。将按照提供的顺序尝试它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3858">此策略是可选的。如果未配置，则使用默认值 UTF-8。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3858">此策略是可选的。如果未配置，则使用默认值 UTF-8。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3859">此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3859">此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3860">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3860">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3861">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3861">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3862">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3862">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3863">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3863">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3864">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3864">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3865">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3865">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3866">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3866">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3867">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3867">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3868">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3868">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3869">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3869">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3870">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序编码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3870">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序编码</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3871">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3871">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3872">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3872">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3873">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3873">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3874">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3874">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3875">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3875">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3876">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3876">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3877">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3877">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3878">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3878">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3879">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3879">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3880">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3880">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3881">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3881">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3882">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3882">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3883">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3883">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3884">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3884">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3885">为默认搜索提供程序指定“按图像搜索”功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3885">为默认搜索提供程序指定“按图像搜索”功能</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3886">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3886">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3887">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3887">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3888">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3888">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3889">指定用于图像搜索的搜索引擎 URL。使用 GET 方法发送搜索请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3889">指定用于图像搜索的搜索引擎 URL。使用 GET 方法发送搜索请求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3890">此策略是可选的。如果未配置此策略，则图像搜索不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3890">此策略是可选的。如果未配置此策略，则图像搜索不可用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3891">必应的图像搜索 URL 可以指定为: “{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3891">必应的图像搜索 URL 可以指定为: “{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3892">Google 的图像搜索 URL 可以指定为:“{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3892">Google 的图像搜索 URL 可以指定为:“{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3893">请参阅 [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) 策略，以完成图像搜索配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3893">请参阅 [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) 策略，以完成图像搜索配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3894">此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3894">此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3895">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3895">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3896">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3896">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3897">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3897">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3898">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3898">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3899">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3899">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3900">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3900">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3901">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3901">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3902">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3902">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3903">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3903">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3904">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3904">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3905">GP 名称: 为默认搜索提供程序指定“按图像搜索”功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3905">GP 名称: 为默认搜索提供程序指定“按图像搜索”功能</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3906">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3906">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3907">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3907">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3908">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3908">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3909">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3909">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3910">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3910">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3911">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3911">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3912">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3912">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3913">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3913">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3914">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3914">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3915">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3915">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3916">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3916">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3917">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3917">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3918">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3918">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3919">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3919">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3920">使用 POST 的图像 URL 的参数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3920">使用 POST 的图像 URL 的参数</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3921">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3921">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3922">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3922">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3923">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3923">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3924">如果启用此策略，它将指定在执行使用 POST 的图像搜索时使用的参数。该策略包含以逗号分隔的名称/值对。如果值为模板参数(例如前面示例中的 {imageThumbnail})，它将替换为实际图像缩略图数据。此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3924">如果启用此策略，它将指定在执行使用 POST 的图像搜索时使用的参数。该策略包含以逗号分隔的名称/值对。如果值为模板参数(例如前面示例中的 {imageThumbnail})，它将替换为实际图像缩略图数据。此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3925">必应的图像搜索 URL 发布参数可以指定为: “imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3925">必应的图像搜索 URL 发布参数可以指定为: “imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3926">Google 的图像搜索 URL Post 参数可以指定为: “encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3926">Google 的图像搜索 URL Post 参数可以指定为: “encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}”</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3927">如果未设置此策略，则会使用 GET 方法发送图像搜索请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3927">如果未设置此策略，则会使用 GET 方法发送图像搜索请求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3928">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3928">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3929">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3929">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3930">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3930">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3931">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3931">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3932">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3932">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3933">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3933">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3934">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3934">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3935">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3935">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3936">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3936">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3937">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3937">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3938">GP 名称: 使用 POST 的图像 URL 的参数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3938">GP 名称: 使用 POST 的图像 URL 的参数</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3939">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3939">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3940">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3940">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3941">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3941">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3942">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3942">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3943">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3943">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3944">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3944">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3945">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3945">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3946">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3946">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3947">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3947">示例值:</span></span>
```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3948">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3948">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3949">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3949">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3950">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3950">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3951">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3951">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3952">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3952">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3953">默认的搜索提供程序关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3953">默认的搜索提供程序关键字</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3954">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3954">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3955">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3955">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3956">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3956">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3957">指定关键字，它是在地址栏中用于触发搜索此提供程序的快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3957">指定关键字，它是在地址栏中用于触发搜索此提供程序的快捷方式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3958">此策略是可选的。如果未配置此策略，则不会有关键字激活搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3958">此策略是可选的。如果未配置此策略，则不会有关键字激活搜索提供程序。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3959">仅当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3959">仅当启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时，才应用此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3960">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置为建议的策略。如果用户已设置默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可以从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3960">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置为建议的策略。如果用户已设置默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可以从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3961">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3961">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3962">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3962">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3963">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3963">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3964">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3964">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3965">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3965">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3966">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3966">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3967">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3967">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3968">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3968">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3969">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3969">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3970">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3970">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序关键字</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3971">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3971">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3972">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3972">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3973">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3973">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3974">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3974">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3975">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3975">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3976">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3976">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3977">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3977">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3978">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3978">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3979">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3979">示例值:</span></span>
```
"mis"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3980">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3980">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3981">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3981">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3982">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3982">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>mis</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3983">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3983">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3984">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3984">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3985">默认的搜索提供程序名称</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3985">默认的搜索提供程序名称</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3986">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3986">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3987">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3987">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3988">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3988">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3989">指定默认搜索提供程序的名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3989">指定默认搜索提供程序的名称。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3990">如果启用此策略，请设置默认搜索提供程序的名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3990">如果启用此策略，请设置默认搜索提供程序的名称。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3991">如果未启用此策略或将其留空，则将使用由搜索 URL 指定的主机名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3991">如果未启用此策略或将其留空，则将使用由搜索 URL 指定的主机名称。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3992">“DefaultSearchProviderName”应设置为组织批准的已加密搜索提供程序，并与在 DTBC-0008 中设置的已加密搜索提供程序相对应。此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3992">“DefaultSearchProviderName”应设置为组织批准的已加密搜索提供程序，并与在 DTBC-0008 中设置的已加密搜索提供程序相对应。此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-3993">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3993">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3994">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3994">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3995">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3995">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3996">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3996">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3997">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3997">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3998">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3998">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-3999">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-3999">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4000">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4000">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4001">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4001">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4002">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4002">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4003">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序名称</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4003">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序名称</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4004">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4004">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4005">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4005">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4006">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4006">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4007">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4007">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4008">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4008">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4009">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4009">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4010">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4010">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4011">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4011">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4012">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4012">示例值:</span></span>
```
"My Intranet Search"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4013">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4013">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4014">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4014">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4015">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4015">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4016">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4016">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4017">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4017">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4018">默认的搜索提供程序搜索 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4018">默认的搜索提供程序搜索 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4019">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4019">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4020">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4020">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4021">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4021">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4022">指定用于默认搜索的搜索引擎 URL。该 URL 包含字符串“{searchTerms}”，该字符串将在查询时替换为用户搜索的术语。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4022">指定用于默认搜索的搜索引擎 URL。该 URL 包含字符串“{searchTerms}”，该字符串将在查询时替换为用户搜索的术语。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4023">必应的搜索 URL 可以指定为:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4023">必应的搜索 URL 可以指定为:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4024">“{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4024">“{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4025">Google 的搜索 URL 可以指定为:“{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4025">Google 的搜索 URL 可以指定为:“{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4026">此策略在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 策略时是必需的；如果未启用后者策略，则此策略将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4026">此策略在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 策略时是必需的；如果未启用后者策略，则此策略将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4027">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4027">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4028">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4028">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4029">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4029">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4030">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4030">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4031">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4031">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4032">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4032">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4033">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4033">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4034">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4034">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4035">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4035">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4036">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4036">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4037">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序搜索 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4037">GP 名称: 默认的搜索提供程序搜索 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4038">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4038">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4039">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4039">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4040">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4040">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4041">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4041">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4042">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4042">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4043">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4043">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4044">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4044">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4045">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4045">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4046">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4046">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4047">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4047">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4048">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4048">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4049">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4049">示例值:</span></span>

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4050">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4050">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4051">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4051">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4052">建议的默认搜索提供程序 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4052">建议的默认搜索提供程序 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4053">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4053">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4054">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4054">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4055">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4055">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4056">指定用于提供搜索建议的搜索引擎 URL。该 URL 包含字符串“{searchTerms}”，该字符串在查询时被用户实时输入的文本所替换。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4056">指定用于提供搜索建议的搜索引擎 URL。该 URL 包含字符串“{searchTerms}”，该字符串在查询时被用户实时输入的文本所替换。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4057">此策略是可选的。如果未配置此策略，用户将看不到搜索建议，而将看到来自浏览历史记录和收藏夹的建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4057">此策略是可选的。如果未配置此策略，用户将看不到搜索建议，而将看到来自浏览历史记录和收藏夹的建议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4058">必应的建议 URL 可以指定为:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4058">必应的建议 URL 可以指定为:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4059">“{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4059">“{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4060">Google 的建议 URL 可以指定为:“{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4060">Google 的建议 URL 可以指定为:“{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4061">此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4061">此策略仅在启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略时应用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4062">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4062">从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，可以将此策略设置为推荐策略。如果用户已设置了默认搜索提供程序，则此建议策略配置的默认搜索提供程序将不会添加到用户可从中选择的搜索提供程序列表中。如果这是所需的行为，请使用 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4063">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4063">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4064">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4064">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4065">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4065">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4066">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4066">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4067">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4067">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4068">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4068">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4069">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4069">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4070">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4070">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4071">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4071">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4072">GP 名称: 建议的默认搜索提供程序 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4072">GP 名称: 建议的默认搜索提供程序 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4073">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4073">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4074">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4074">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4075">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4075">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4076">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4076">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4077">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4077">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4078">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4078">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4079">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4079">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4080">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4080">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4081">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4081">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4082">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4082">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4083">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4083">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4084">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4084">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4085">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4085">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4086">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4086">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4087">配置新的选项卡页搜索框体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4087">配置新的选项卡页搜索框体验</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4088">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4088">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4089">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4089">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4090">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4090">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4091">你可以配置新选项卡页搜索框，以使用“搜索框(推荐)”或“地址栏”在新选项卡上搜索。只有当你通过设置以下两个策略将搜索引擎设置为除必应以外的值时，此策略才起作用: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4091">你可以配置新选项卡页搜索框，以使用“搜索框(推荐)”或“地址栏”在新选项卡上搜索。只有当你通过设置以下两个策略将搜索引擎设置为除必应以外的值时，此策略才起作用: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4092">如果禁用或未配置此策略，并且:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4092">如果禁用或未配置此策略，并且:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4093">如果地址栏默认搜索引擎为必应，则新选项卡页将使用搜索框在新选项卡上搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4093">如果地址栏默认搜索引擎为必应，则新选项卡页将使用搜索框在新选项卡上搜索。</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4094">如果地址栏默认搜索引擎不是必应，则在新选项卡上搜索时，用户还可以获得一个附加选项(使用“地址栏”)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4094">如果地址栏默认搜索引擎不是必应，则在新选项卡上搜索时，用户还可以获得一个附加选项(使用“地址栏”)。</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4095">如果启用此策略并将其设置为:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4095">如果启用此策略并将其设置为:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4096">-“搜索框(推荐)”(“bing”)，则新选项卡页将使用搜索框在新选项卡上搜索。 -“地址栏”(“redirect”)，新选项卡页搜索框使用地址栏在新选项卡上搜索。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4096">-“搜索框(推荐)”(“bing”)，则新选项卡页将使用搜索框在新选项卡上搜索。 -“地址栏”(“redirect”)，新选项卡页搜索框使用地址栏在新选项卡上搜索。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4097">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4097">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4098">bing (bing) = 搜索框(推荐)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4098">bing (bing) = 搜索框(推荐)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4099">redirect (redirect) = 地址栏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4099">redirect (redirect) = 地址栏</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4100">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4100">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4101">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4101">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4102">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4102">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4103">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4103">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4104">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4104">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4105">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4105">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4106">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4106">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4107">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4107">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4108">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4108">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4109">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4109">GP 唯一名称: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4110">GP 名称: 配置新的选项卡页搜索框体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4110">GP 名称: 配置新的选项卡页搜索框体验</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4111">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4111">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4112">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4112">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/默认的搜索提供程序</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4113">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4113">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4114">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4114">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4115">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4115">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4116">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4116">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4117">值名称: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4117">值名称: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4118">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4118">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4119">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4119">示例值:</span></span>
```
"bing"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4120">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4120">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4121">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4121">首选项密钥名称: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4122">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4122">示例值:</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4123">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4123">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4124">추가 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4124">Additional policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4125">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4125">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4126">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4126">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4127">在地址栏中启用必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4127">在地址栏中启用必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4128">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4128">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4129">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4129">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4130">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4130">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4131">启用以下功能: 当用户在地址栏中键入搜索字符串时，在地址栏建议列表中显示相关的必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议。如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏建议列表中查看由必应中的 Microsoft 搜索支持的内部结果。要查看必应中的 Microsoft 搜索结果，用户必须通过组织的 Azure AD 帐户登录到 Microsoft Edge。 如果禁用此策略，则用户无法在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏建议列表中查看内部结果。 如果已启用强制使用默认搜索提供程序的策略集([DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled)、[DefaultSearchProviderName](#defaultsearchprovidername) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl))，并且指定的搜索提供程序不是必应，则此策略不适用，且地址栏的建议列表中不会显示必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4131">启用以下功能: 当用户在地址栏中键入搜索字符串时，在地址栏建议列表中显示相关的必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议。如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏建议列表中查看由必应中的 Microsoft 搜索支持的内部结果。要查看必应中的 Microsoft 搜索结果，用户必须通过组织的 Azure AD 帐户登录到 Microsoft Edge。 如果禁用此策略，则用户无法在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏建议列表中查看内部结果。 如果已启用强制使用默认搜索提供程序的策略集([DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled)、[DefaultSearchProviderName](#defaultsearchprovidername) 和 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl))，并且指定的搜索提供程序不是必应，则此策略不适用，且地址栏的建议列表中不会显示必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4132">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4132">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4133">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4133">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4134">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4134">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4135">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4135">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4136">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4136">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4137">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4137">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4138">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4138">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4139">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4139">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4140">GP 唯一名称: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4140">GP 唯一名称: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4141">GP 名称: 在地址栏中启用必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4141">GP 名称: 在地址栏中启用必应中的 Microsoft 搜索建议</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4142">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4142">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4143">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4143">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4144">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4144">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4145">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4145">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4146">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4146">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4147">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4147">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4148">值名称: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4148">值名称: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4149">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4149">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4150">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4150">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4151">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4151">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4152">首选项密钥名称: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4152">首选项密钥名称: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4153">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4153">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4154">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4154">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4155">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4155">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4156">具有干扰性广告的站点的广告设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4156">具有干扰性广告的站点的广告设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4157">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4157">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4158">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4158">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4159">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4159">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4160">控制是否在具有入侵广告的网站上阻止广告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4160">控制是否在具有入侵广告的网站上阻止广告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4161">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4161">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4162">AllowAds (1) = 在所有站点上允许广告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4162">AllowAds (1) = 在所有站点上允许广告</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4163">BlockAds (2) = 在具有干扰性广告的站点上阻止广告。（默认值）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4163">BlockAds (2) = 在具有干扰性广告的站点上阻止广告。（默认值）</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4164">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4164">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4165">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4165">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4166">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4166">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4167">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4167">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4168">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4168">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4169">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4169">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4170">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4170">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4171">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4171">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4172">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4172">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4173">GP 唯一名称: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4173">GP 唯一名称: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4174">GP 名称: 具有干扰性广告的站点的广告设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4174">GP 名称: 具有干扰性广告的站点的广告设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4175">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4175">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4176">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4176">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4177">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4177">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4178">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4178">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4179">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4179">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4180">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4180">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4181">值名称: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4181">值名称: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4182">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4182">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4183">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4183">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4184">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4184">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4185">首选项密钥名称: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4185">首选项密钥名称: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4186">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4186">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4187">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4187">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4188">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4188">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4189">启用删除浏览器和下载历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4189">启用删除浏览器和下载历史记录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4190">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4190">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4191">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4191">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4192">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4192">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4193">启用浏览器历史记录和下载历史记录删除，并防止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4193">启用浏览器历史记录和下载历史记录删除，并防止用户更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4194">请注意，即使禁用此策略，也不能保证会保留浏览和下载历史记录: 用户可以直接编辑或删除历史记录数据库文件，浏览器本身可能会(根据过期期限)随时删除或存档任何或所有历史记录项目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4194">请注意，即使禁用此策略，也不能保证会保留浏览和下载历史记录: 用户可以直接编辑或删除历史记录数据库文件，浏览器本身可能会(根据过期期限)随时删除或存档任何或所有历史记录项目。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4195">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以删除浏览和下载历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4195">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以删除浏览和下载历史记录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4196">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法删除浏览和下载历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4196">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法删除浏览和下载历史记录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4197">如果启用此策略，则不要启用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略，因为它们都会执行数据删除。如果二者都启用，则 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略优先并且会在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，无论你如何配置此策略都是如此。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4197">如果启用此策略，则不要启用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略，因为它们都会执行数据删除。如果二者都启用，则 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略优先并且会在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，无论你如何配置此策略都是如此。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4198">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4198">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4199">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4199">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4200">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4200">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4201">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4201">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4202">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4202">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4203">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4203">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4204">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4204">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4205">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4205">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4206">GP 唯一名称: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4206">GP 唯一名称: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4207">GP 名称: 启用删除浏览器和下载历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4207">GP 名称: 启用删除浏览器和下载历史记录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4208">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4208">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4209">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4209">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4210">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4210">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4211">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4211">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4212">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4212">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4213">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4213">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4214">值名称: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4214">值名称: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4215">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4215">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4216">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4216">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4217">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4217">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4218">首选项密钥名称: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4218">首选项密钥名称: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4219">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4219">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
