  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4220">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4220">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4221">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4221">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4222">允许文件选择对话框</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4222">允许文件选择对话框</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4223">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4223">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4224">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4224">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4225">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4225">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4226">允许 Microsoft Edge 显示文件选择对话框，从而允许访问本地文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4226">允许 Microsoft Edge 显示文件选择对话框，从而允许访问本地文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4227">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以正常打开文件选择对话框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4227">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以正常打开文件选择对话框。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4228">如果禁用此策略，那么每当用户执行触发文件选择对话框的操作(如导入收藏夹、上传文件或保存链接)时，就会显示一条消息，并且会假定用户在文件选择对话框中单击了“取消”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4228">如果禁用此策略，那么每当用户执行触发文件选择对话框的操作(如导入收藏夹、上传文件或保存链接)时，就会显示一条消息，并且会假定用户在文件选择对话框中单击了“取消”。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4229">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4229">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4230">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4230">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4231">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4231">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4232">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4232">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4233">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4233">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4234">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4234">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4235">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4235">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4236">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4236">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4237">GP 唯一名称: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4237">GP 唯一名称: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4238">GP 名称: 允许文件选择对话框</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4238">GP 名称: 允许文件选择对话框</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4239">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4239">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4240">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4240">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4241">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4241">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4242">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4242">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4243">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4243">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4244">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4244">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4245">值名称: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4245">值名称: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4246">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4246">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4247">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4247">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4248">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4248">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4249">首选项密钥名称: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4249">首选项密钥名称: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4250">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4250">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4251">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4251">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4252">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4252">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4253">允许页面在卸载期间显示弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4253">允许页面在卸载期间显示弹出窗口</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4254">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4254">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4255">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4255">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4256">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4256">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4257">通过此策略，管理员可以指定页面在卸载时是否可以显示弹出窗口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4257">通过此策略，管理员可以指定页面在卸载时是否可以显示弹出窗口。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4258">如果将策略设置为“启用”，则将允许页面在卸载时显示弹出窗口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4258">如果将策略设置为“启用”，则将允许页面在卸载时显示弹出窗口。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4259">如果将策略设置为“禁用”或未设置，则将不允许页面在卸载时显示弹出窗口。此策略基于规范: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4259">如果将策略设置为“禁用”或未设置，则将不允许页面在卸载时显示弹出窗口。此策略基于规范: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4260">此策略将在未来删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4260">此策略将在未来删除。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4261">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4261">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4262">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4262">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4263">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4263">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4264">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4264">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4265">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4265">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4266">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4266">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4267">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4267">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4268">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4268">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4269">GP 唯一名称: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4269">GP 唯一名称: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4270">GP 名称: 允许页面在卸载期间显示弹出窗口</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4270">GP 名称: 允许页面在卸载期间显示弹出窗口</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4271">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4271">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4272">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4272">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4273">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4273">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4274">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4274">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4275">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4275">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4276">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4276">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4277">值名称: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4277">值名称: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4278">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4278">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4279">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4279">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4280">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4280">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4281">首选项密钥名称: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4281">首选项密钥名称: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4282">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4282">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4283">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4283">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4284">AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4284">AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4285">允许冲浪游戏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4285">允许冲浪游戏</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4286">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4286">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4287">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4287">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4288">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4288">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4289">如果禁用此策略，则当设备处于离线状态或者用户导航到 edge://surf 时，用户将无法玩冲浪游戏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4289">如果禁用此策略，则当设备处于离线状态或者用户导航到 edge://surf 时，用户将无法玩冲浪游戏。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4290">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以玩冲浪游戏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4290">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以玩冲浪游戏。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4291">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4291">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4292">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4292">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4293">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4293">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4294">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4294">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4295">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4295">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4296">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4296">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4297">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4297">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4298">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4298">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4299">GP 唯一名称: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4299">GP 唯一名称: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4300">GP 名称: 允许冲浪游戏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4300">GP 名称: 允许冲浪游戏</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4301">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4301">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4302">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4302">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4303">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4303">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4304">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4304">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4305">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4305">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4306">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4306">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4307">值名称: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4307">值名称: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4308">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4308">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4309">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4309">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4310">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4310">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4311">首选项密钥名称: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4311">首选项密钥名称: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4312">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4312">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4313">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4313">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4314">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4314">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4315">允许页面在关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4315">允许页面在关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求 (已弃用)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-4316">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4316">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4317">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4317">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4318">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4318">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4319">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4319">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4320">此策略已弃用，因为它旨在仅作为一种短期机制，让企业在发现它与不允许在页面关闭过程中同步 XHR 请求的更改不兼容时，有更多时间更新其 Web 内容。它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 88 中正常使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4320">此策略已弃用，因为它旨在仅作为一种短期机制，让企业在发现它与不允许在页面关闭过程中同步 XHR 请求的更改不兼容时，有更多时间更新其 Web 内容。它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 88 中正常使用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4321">此策略让你可以指定页面是否可以在页面关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4321">此策略让你可以指定页面是否可以在页面关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4322">如果启用此策略，则页面可以在页面关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4322">如果启用此策略，则页面可以在页面关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4323">如果禁用此策略或未配置此策略，则不允许页面在页面关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4323">如果禁用此策略或未配置此策略，则不允许页面在页面关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4324">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4324">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4325">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4325">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4326">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4326">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4327">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4327">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4328">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4328">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4329">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4329">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4330">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4330">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4331">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4331">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4332">GP 唯一名称: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4332">GP 唯一名称: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4333">GP 名称: 允许页面在关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4333">GP 名称: 允许页面在关闭过程中发送同步 XHR 请求 (已弃用)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4334">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4334">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4335">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4335">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4336">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4336">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4337">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4337">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4338">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4338">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4339">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4339">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4340">值名称: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4340">值名称: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4341">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4341">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4342">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4342">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4343">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4343">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4344">首选项密钥名称: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4344">首选项密钥名称: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4345">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4345">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4346">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4346">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4347">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4347">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4348">配置 Microsoft Edge 将尝试为其建立令牌绑定的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4348">配置 Microsoft Edge 将尝试为其建立令牌绑定的网站列表。</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4349">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4349">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4350">在 Windows 自 83 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4350">在 Windows 自 83 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4351">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4351">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4352">配置浏览器将尝试通过其执行令牌绑定协议的网站的 URL 模式列表。 对于此列表中的域，浏览器将在 TLS 握手中发送令牌绑定 ClientHello (请参阅 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472)。 如果服务器通过有效的 ServerHello 响应进行响应，则浏览器将在后续的 https 请求中创建并发送令牌绑定消息。有关详细信息，请参阅 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4352">配置浏览器将尝试通过其执行令牌绑定协议的网站的 URL 模式列表。 对于此列表中的域，浏览器将在 TLS 握手中发送令牌绑定 ClientHello (请参阅 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472)。 如果服务器通过有效的 ServerHello 响应进行响应，则浏览器将在后续的 https 请求中创建并发送令牌绑定消息。有关详细信息，请参阅 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4353">如果此列表为空，则将禁用令牌绑定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4353">如果此列表为空，则将禁用令牌绑定。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4354">此策略仅在具有虚拟安全模式功能的 Windows 10 设备上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4354">此策略仅在具有虚拟安全模式功能的 Windows 10 设备上可用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4355">从 Microsoft Edge 86 开始，此策略不再支持动态刷新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4355">从 Microsoft Edge 86 开始，此策略不再支持动态刷新。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4356">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4356">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4357">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4357">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4358">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4358">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4359">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4359">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4360">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4360">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4361">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4361">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4362">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4362">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4363">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4363">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4364">GP 唯一名称: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4364">GP 唯一名称: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4365">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Edge 将尝试为其建立令牌绑定的网站列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4365">GP 名称: 配置 Microsoft Edge 将尝试为其建立令牌绑定的网站列表。</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4366">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4366">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4367">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4367">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4368">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4368">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4369">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4369">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4370">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4370">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4371">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4371">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4372">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4372">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4373">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4373">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4374">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4374">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4375">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4375">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4376">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4376">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4377">为特定站点配置跟踪保护例外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4377">为特定站点配置跟踪保护例外</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4378">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4378">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4379">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4379">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4380">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4380">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4381">配置从跟踪保护中排除的 URL 模式的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4381">配置从跟踪保护中排除的 URL 模式的列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4382">如果配置此策略，则会从跟踪保护中排除配置的 URL 模式列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4382">如果配置此策略，则会从跟踪保护中排除配置的 URL 模式列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4383">如果未配置此策略，则将对所有站点使用“阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动”策略中的全局默认值(如果已设置)或用户个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4383">如果未配置此策略，则将对所有站点使用“阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动”策略中的全局默认值(如果已设置)或用户个人配置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4384">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4384">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4385">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4385">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4386">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4386">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4387">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4387">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4388">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4388">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4389">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4389">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4390">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4390">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4391">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4391">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4392">GP 唯一名称: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4392">GP 唯一名称: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4393">GP 名称: 为特定站点配置跟踪保护例外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4393">GP 名称: 为特定站点配置跟踪保护例外</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4394">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4394">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4395">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4395">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4396">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4396">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4397">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4397">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4398">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4398">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4399">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4399">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4400">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4400">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4401">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4401">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4402">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4402">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4403">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4403">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4404">首选项密钥名称: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4404">首选项密钥名称: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4405">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4405">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4406">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4406">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4407">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4407">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4408">找不到网页时建议类似的页面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4408">找不到网页时建议类似的页面</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4409">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4409">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4410">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4410">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4411">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4411">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4412">允许 Microsoft Edge 发出 Web 服务连接以针对 DNS 错误等连接问题生成 URL 和搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4412">允许 Microsoft Edge 发出 Web 服务连接以针对 DNS 错误等连接问题生成 URL 和搜索建议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4413">如果启用此策略，则 Web 服务用于针对网络错误生成 URL 和搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4413">如果启用此策略，则 Web 服务用于针对网络错误生成 URL 和搜索建议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4414">如果禁用此策略，则不会调用 Web 服务，并显示标准错误页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4414">如果禁用此策略，则不会调用 Web 服务，并显示标准错误页面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4415">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会遵守在 edge://settings/privacy 的“服务”下设置的用户首选项。 具体来说，存在用户可以打开或关闭的**找不到网页时建议类似的页面**切换开关。请注意，如果启用了此策略(AlternateErrorPagesEnabled)，则会打开“找不到网页时建议类似的页面”设置，但是用户无法使用切换开关来更改此设置。如果禁用此策略，则会关闭“找不到网页时建议类似的页面”设置，并且用户无法使用切换开关来更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4415">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会遵守在 edge://settings/privacy 的“服务”下设置的用户首选项。 具体来说，存在用户可以打开或关闭的**找不到网页时建议类似的页面**切换开关。请注意，如果启用了此策略(AlternateErrorPagesEnabled)，则会打开“找不到网页时建议类似的页面”设置，但是用户无法使用切换开关来更改此设置。如果禁用此策略，则会关闭“找不到网页时建议类似的页面”设置，并且用户无法使用切换开关来更改此设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4416">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4416">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4417">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4417">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4418">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4418">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4419">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4419">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4420">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4420">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4421">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4421">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4422">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4422">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4423">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4423">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4424">GP 唯一名称: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4424">GP 唯一名称: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4425">GP 名称: 找不到网页时建议类似的页面</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4425">GP 名称: 找不到网页时建议类似的页面</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4426">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4426">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4427">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4427">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4428">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4428">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4429">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4429">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4430">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4430">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4431">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4431">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4432">值名称: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4432">值名称: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4433">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4433">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4434">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4434">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4435">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4435">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4436">首选项密钥名称: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4436">首选项密钥名称: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4437">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4437">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4438">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4438">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4439">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4439">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4440">始终在外部打开 PDF 文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4440">始终在外部打开 PDF 文件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4441">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4441">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4442">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4442">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4443">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4443">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4444">在 Microsoft Edge 中禁用内部 PDF 查看器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4444">在 Microsoft Edge 中禁用内部 PDF 查看器。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4445">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会将 PDF 文件视为下载内容，并允许用户使用默认应用程序打开它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4445">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会将 PDF 文件视为下载内容，并允许用户使用默认应用程序打开它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4446">如果未配置此策略或禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将打开 PDF 文件(除非用户禁用此文件)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4446">如果未配置此策略或禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将打开 PDF 文件(除非用户禁用此文件)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4447">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4447">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4448">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4448">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4449">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4449">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4450">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4450">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4451">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4451">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4452">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4452">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4453">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4453">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4454">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4454">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4455">GP 唯一名称: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4455">GP 唯一名称: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4456">GP 名称: 始终在外部打开 PDF 文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4456">GP 名称: 始终在外部打开 PDF 文件</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4457">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4457">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4458">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4458">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4459">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4459">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4460">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4460">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4461">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4461">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4462">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4462">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4463">值名称: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4463">值名称: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4464">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4464">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4465">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4465">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4466">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4466">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4467">首选项密钥名称: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4467">首选项密钥名称: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4468">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4468">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4469">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4469">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4470">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4470">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4471">针对 InPrivate 和来宾用户配置启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4471">针对 InPrivate 和来宾用户配置启用环境身份验证</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4472">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4472">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4473">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4473">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4474">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4474">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4475">配置此策略以允许/禁止在 Microsoft Edge 中针对 InPrivate 和来宾用户配置进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4475">配置此策略以允许/禁止在 Microsoft Edge 中针对 InPrivate 和来宾用户配置进行环境身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4476">环境身份验证是未通过 NTLM/Kerberos/协商质询/响应方案提供显式凭据时使用默认凭据进行的 http 身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4476">环境身份验证是未通过 NTLM/Kerberos/协商质询/响应方案提供显式凭据时使用默认凭据进行的 http 身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4477">如果将策略设置为“RegularOnly”，则仅允许定期会话进行环境身份验证。将不允许 InPrivate 和来宾会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4477">如果将策略设置为“RegularOnly”，则仅允许定期会话进行环境身份验证。将不允许 InPrivate 和来宾会话进行环境身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4478">如果将策略设置为“InPrivateAndRegular”，则允许 InPrivate 和定期会话进行环境身份验证。将不允许来宾会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4478">如果将策略设置为“InPrivateAndRegular”，则允许 InPrivate 和定期会话进行环境身份验证。将不允许来宾会话进行环境身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4479">如果将策略设置为“GuestAndRegular”，则允许来宾和定期会话进行环境身份验证。将不允许 InPrivate 会话进行环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4479">如果将策略设置为“GuestAndRegular”，则允许来宾和定期会话进行环境身份验证。将不允许 InPrivate 会话进行环境身份验证</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4480">如果将策略设置为“All”，则将允许所有会话进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4480">如果将策略设置为“All”，则将允许所有会话进行环境身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4481">请注意，始终允许对定期用户配置进行环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4481">请注意，始终允许对定期用户配置进行环境身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4482">在 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 及更高版本中，如果策略保留为未设置，则仅在定期会话中启用环境身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4482">在 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 及更高版本中，如果策略保留为未设置，则仅在定期会话中启用环境身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4483">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4483">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4484">RegularOnly (0) = 仅在定期会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4484">RegularOnly (0) = 仅在定期会话中启用环境身份验证</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4485">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = 在 InPrivate 和定期会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4485">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = 在 InPrivate 和定期会话中启用环境身份验证</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4486">GuestAndRegular (2) = 在来宾和定期会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4486">GuestAndRegular (2) = 在来宾和定期会话中启用环境身份验证</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4487">All (3) = 在定期 InPrivate 和来宾会话中启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4487">All (3) = 在定期 InPrivate 和来宾会话中启用环境身份验证</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4488">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4488">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4489">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4489">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4490">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4490">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4491">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4491">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4492">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4492">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4493">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4493">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4494">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4494">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4495">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4495">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4496">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4496">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4497">GP 唯一名称: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4497">GP 唯一名称: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4498">GP 名称: 针对 InPrivate 和来宾用户配置启用环境身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4498">GP 名称: 针对 InPrivate 和来宾用户配置启用环境身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4499">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4499">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4500">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4500">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4501">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4501">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4502">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4502">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4503">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4503">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4504">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4504">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4505">值名称: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4505">值名称: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4506">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4506">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4507">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4507">示例值:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4508">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4508">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4509">首选项密钥名称: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4509">首选项密钥名称: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4510">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4510">示例值:</span></span>

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4511">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4511">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4512">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4512">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4513">允许重新启用 AppCache 功能，即使它默认处于关闭状态</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4513">允许重新启用 AppCache 功能，即使它默认处于关闭状态</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4514">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4514">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4515">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4515">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4516">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4516">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4517">如果将此策略设置为 true，AppCache 将启用，即使 Microsoft Edge 中的 AppCache 默认情况下不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4517">如果将此策略设置为 true，AppCache 将启用，即使 Microsoft Edge 中的 AppCache 默认情况下不可用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4518">如果将此策略设置为 false 或未设置，AppCache 将遵循 Microsoft Edge 的默认设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4518">如果将此策略设置为 false 或未设置，AppCache 将遵循 Microsoft Edge 的默认设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4519">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4519">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4520">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4520">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4521">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4521">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4522">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4522">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4523">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4523">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4524">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4524">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4525">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4525">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4526">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4526">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4527">GP 唯一名称: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4527">GP 唯一名称: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4528">GP 名称: 允许重新启用 AppCache 功能，即使它默认处于关闭状态</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4528">GP 名称: 允许重新启用 AppCache 功能，即使它默认处于关闭状态</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4529">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4529">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4530">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4530">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4531">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4531">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4532">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4532">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4533">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4533">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4534">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4534">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4535">值名称: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4535">值名称: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4536">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4536">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4537">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4537">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4538">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4538">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4539">首选项密钥名称: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4539">首选项密钥名称: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4540">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4540">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4541">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4541">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4542">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4542">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4543">设置应用程序的区域设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4543">设置应用程序的区域设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4544">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4544">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4545">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4545">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4546">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4546">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4547">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置应用程序区域设置，并阻止用户更改区域设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4547">在 Microsoft Edge 中配置应用程序区域设置，并阻止用户更改区域设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4548">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 使用指定的区域设置。如果不支持配置的区域设置，则改用 "en-US"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4548">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 使用指定的区域设置。如果不支持配置的区域设置，则改用 "en-US"。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4549">如果禁用或未配置此设置，则 Microsoft Edge 使用用户指定的首选区域设置(如果已配置)或回退区域设置 "en-US"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4549">如果禁用或未配置此设置，则 Microsoft Edge 使用用户指定的首选区域设置(如果已配置)或回退区域设置 "en-US"。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4550">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4550">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4551">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4551">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4552">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4552">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4553">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4553">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4554">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4554">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4555">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4555">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4556">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4556">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4557">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4557">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4558">GP 唯一名称: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4558">GP 唯一名称: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4559">GP 名称: 设置应用程序的区域设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4559">GP 名称: 设置应用程序的区域设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4560">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4560">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4561">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4561">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4562">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4562">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4563">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4563">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4564">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4564">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4565">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4565">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4566">值名称: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4566">值名称: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4567">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4567">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4568">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4568">示例值:</span></span>
```
"en"
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4569">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4569">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4570">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4570">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4571">允许或阻止音频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4571">允许或阻止音频捕获</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4572">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4572">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4573">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4573">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4574">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4574">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4575">允许你设置是否提示用户为网站授予其音频捕获设备的访问权限。此策略适用于除 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 列表中配置的 URL 以外的所有 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4575">允许你设置是否提示用户为网站授予其音频捕获设备的访问权限。此策略适用于除 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 列表中配置的 URL 以外的所有 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4576">如果启用或未配置此策略(默认设置)，则会提示用户提供音频捕获访问权限，但这不适用于 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 列表中的 URL。这些列出的 URL 已被授予访问权限，但未给出任何提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4576">如果启用或未配置此策略(默认设置)，则会提示用户提供音频捕获访问权限，但这不适用于 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 列表中的 URL。这些列出的 URL 已被授予访问权限，但未给出任何提示。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4577">如果禁用此策略，则不会提示用户，并且只有 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 中配置的 URL 才能访问音频捕获。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4577">如果禁用此策略，则不会提示用户，并且只有 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 中配置的 URL 才能访问音频捕获。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4578">此策略会影响所有类型的音频输入，而不仅仅是内置麦克风。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4578">此策略会影响所有类型的音频输入，而不仅仅是内置麦克风。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4579">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4579">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4580">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4580">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4581">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4581">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4582">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4582">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4583">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4583">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4584">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4584">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4585">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4585">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4586">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4586">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4587">GP 唯一名称: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4587">GP 唯一名称: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4588">GP 名称: 允许或阻止音频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4588">GP 名称: 允许或阻止音频捕获</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4589">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4589">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4590">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4590">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4591">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4591">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4592">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4592">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4593">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4593">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4594">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4594">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4595">值名称: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4595">值名称: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4596">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4596">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4597">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4597">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4598">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4598">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4599">首选项密钥名称: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4599">首选项密钥名称: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4600">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4600">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4601">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4601">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4602">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4602">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4603">无需请求许可即可访问音频捕获设备的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4603">无需请求许可即可访问音频捕获设备的站点</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4604">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4604">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4605">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4605">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4606">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4606">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4607">根据 URL 模式指定无需用户许可即可使用音频捕获设备的网站。该列表中的模式将与请求 URL 的安全来源进行匹配。如果匹配，站点将自动获得音频捕获设备的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4607">根据 URL 模式指定无需用户许可即可使用音频捕获设备的网站。该列表中的模式将与请求 URL 的安全来源进行匹配。如果匹配，站点将自动获得音频捕获设备的访问权限。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4608">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4608">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4609">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4609">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4610">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4610">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4611">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4611">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4612">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4612">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4613">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4613">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4614">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4614">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4615">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4615">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4616">GP 唯一名称: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4616">GP 唯一名称: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4617">GP 名称: 无需请求许可即可访问音频捕获设备的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4617">GP 名称: 无需请求许可即可访问音频捕获设备的站点</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4618">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4618">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4619">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4619">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4620">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4620">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4621">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4621">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4622">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4622">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4623">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4623">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4624">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4624">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4625">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4625">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4626">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4626">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4627">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4627">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4628">首选项密钥名称: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4628">首选项密钥名称: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4629">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4629">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4630">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4630">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4631">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4631">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4632">允许音频沙盒运行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4632">允许音频沙盒运行</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4633">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4633">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4634">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4634">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4635">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4635">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4636">此策略控制音频进程沙盒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4636">此策略控制音频进程沙盒。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4637">如果启用此策略，则音频进程将在沙盒化环境中运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4637">如果启用此策略，则音频进程将在沙盒化环境中运行。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4638">如果禁用此策略，则音频进程将在非沙盒化环境中运行，WebRTC 音频处理模块将在呈现器进程中运行。 这会使用户面临与在非沙盒化环境中运行音频子系统相关的安全风险。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4638">如果禁用此策略，则音频进程将在非沙盒化环境中运行，WebRTC 音频处理模块将在呈现器进程中运行。 这会使用户面临与在非沙盒化环境中运行音频子系统相关的安全风险。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4639">如果未配置此策略，则将使用音频沙盒的默认配置，这可能会因平台而异。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4639">如果未配置此策略，则将使用音频沙盒的默认配置，这可能会因平台而异。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4640">此策略旨在使企业能够灵活地禁用音频沙盒(如果他们使用干扰沙盒的安全软件设置)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4640">此策略旨在使企业能够灵活地禁用音频沙盒(如果他们使用干扰沙盒的安全软件设置)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4641">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4641">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4642">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4642">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4643">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4643">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4644">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4644">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4645">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4645">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4646">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4646">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4647">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4647">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4648">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4648">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4649">GP 唯一名称: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4649">GP 唯一名称: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4650">GP 名称: 允许音频沙盒运行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4650">GP 名称: 允许音频沙盒运行</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4651">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4651">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4652">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4652">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4653">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4653">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4654">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4654">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4655">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4655">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4656">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4656">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4657">值名称: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4657">值名称: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4658">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4658">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4659">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4659">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4660">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4660">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4661">首选项密钥名称: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4661">首选项密钥名称: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4662">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4662">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4663">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4663">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4664">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4664">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4665">首次运行时自动导入其他浏览器的数据和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4665">首次运行时自动导入其他浏览器的数据和设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4666">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4666">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4667">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4667">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4668">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4668">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4669">如果启用此策略，则在首次运行时会无提示地自动导入指定浏览器中的所有受支持的数据类型和设置。在首次运行体验期间，将跳过导入部分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4669">如果启用此策略，则在首次运行时会无提示地自动导入指定浏览器中的所有受支持的数据类型和设置。在首次运行体验期间，将跳过导入部分。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4670">无论此策略的值如何，来自旧版 Microsoft Edge 的浏览器数据始终会在首次运行时无提示地进行迁移。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4670">无论此策略的值如何，来自旧版 Microsoft Edge 的浏览器数据始终会在首次运行时无提示地进行迁移。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4671">如果此策略设置为“FromDefaultBrowser”，则将导入与托管设备上的默认浏览器相对应的数据类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4671">如果此策略设置为“FromDefaultBrowser”，则将导入与托管设备上的默认浏览器相对应的数据类型。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4672">如果指定为此策略值的浏览器在托管设备中不存在，则 Microsoft Edge 只是跳过导入，而不向用户发送任何通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4672">如果指定为此策略值的浏览器在托管设备中不存在，则 Microsoft Edge 只是跳过导入，而不向用户发送任何通知。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4705">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4705">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4713">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4713">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
