  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4728">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4728">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4729">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4729">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4730">定义可以在不提示用户的情况下从列出的源启动外部应用程序的协议列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4730">定义可以在不提示用户的情况下从列出的源启动外部应用程序的协议列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4731">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4731">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4732">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4732">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4733">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4733">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4734">允许设置协议列表并为每个协议设置一个关联的允许源模式列表，该列表可以在不提示用户的情况下启动外部应用程序。在列出协议时不应包含尾部分隔符。例如，请列出 "skype"，而不是 "skype:" 或 "skype://"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4734">允许设置协议列表并为每个协议设置一个关联的允许源模式列表，该列表可以在不提示用户的情况下启动外部应用程序。在列出协议时不应包含尾部分隔符。例如，请列出 "skype"，而不是 "skype:" 或 "skype://"。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4735">如果配置了此策略，则只有在以下条件下，才允许协议在不通过策略提示的情况下启动外部应用程序:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4735">如果配置了此策略，则只有在以下条件下，才允许协议在不通过策略提示的情况下启动外部应用程序:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4736">该协议已列出</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4736">该协议已列出</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4737">尝试启动协议的网站源与该协议的 allowed_origins 列表中的一个源模式相匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4737">尝试启动协议的网站源与该协议的 allowed_origins 列表中的一个源模式相匹配。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4738">如果其中任一条件为 false，策略都不会省略外部协议启动提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4738">如果其中任一条件为 false，策略都不会省略外部协议启动提示。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4739">如果未配置此策略，则在没有提示的情况下不能启动任何协议。除非将 [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) 策略设置为“已禁用”，否则用户可以根据协议/站点选择不显示提示。此策略对用户设置的每协议/每站点的提示豁免没有影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4739">如果未配置此策略，则在没有提示的情况下不能启动任何协议。除非将 [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) 策略设置为“已禁用”，否则用户可以根据协议/站点选择不显示提示。此策略对用户设置的每协议/每站点的提示豁免没有影响。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4740">源匹配模式使用与 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 策略类似的格式，相关介绍，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4740">源匹配模式使用与 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 策略类似的格式，相关介绍，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4741">但是，此策略的源匹配模式不能包含 "/path" 或 "@query" 元素。任何包含 "/path" 或 "@query" 元素的模式都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4741">但是，此策略的源匹配模式不能包含 "/path" 或 "@query" 元素。任何包含 "/path" 或 "@query" 元素的模式都将被忽略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4742">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4742">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4743">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4743">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4744">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4744">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4745">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4745">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4746">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4746">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4747">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4747">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4748">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4748">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4749">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4749">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4750">GP 唯一名称: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4750">GP 唯一名称: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4751">GP 名称: 定义可以在不提示用户的情况下从列出的源启动外部应用程序的协议列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4751">GP 名称: 定义可以在不提示用户的情况下从列出的源启动外部应用程序的协议列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4752">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4752">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4753">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4753">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4754">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4754">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4755">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4755">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4756">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4756">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4757">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4757">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4758">值名称: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4758">值名称: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4759">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4759">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4760">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4760">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com", 
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ], 
    "protocol": "spotify"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com", 
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "teams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "outlook"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4761">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4761">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4762">首选项密钥名称: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4762">首选项密钥名称: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4763">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4763">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4764">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4764">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4765">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4765">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4766">AutoOpenFileTypes 可应用的 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4766">AutoOpenFileTypes 可应用的 URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4767">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4767">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4768">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4768">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4769">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4769">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4770">[AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 将应用于的 URL 列表。此策略不会影响用户通过下载架设置的自动打开值...> “始终打开这种类型的文件”菜单条目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4770">[AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 将应用于的 URL 列表。此策略不会影响用户通过下载架设置的自动打开值...> “始终打开这种类型的文件”菜单条目。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4771">如果在此策略中设置 URL，则只有当 URL 是此设置的一部分并且文件类型在 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 中列出时，文件才会按策略自动打开。如果任一条件为 false，则下载不会按策略自动打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4771">如果在此策略中设置 URL，则只有当 URL 是此设置的一部分并且文件类型在 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 中列出时，文件才会按策略自动打开。如果任一条件为 false，则下载不会按策略自动打开。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4772">如果未设置此策略，文件类型为 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 的所有下载将自动打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4772">如果未设置此策略，文件类型为 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) 的所有下载将自动打开。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4773">必须根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4773">必须根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式的格式。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4774">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4774">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4775">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4775">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4776">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4776">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4777">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4777">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4778">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4778">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4779">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4779">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4780">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4780">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4781">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4781">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4782">GP 唯一名称: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4782">GP 唯一名称: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4783">GP 名称: AutoOpenFileTypes 可应用的 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4783">GP 名称: AutoOpenFileTypes 可应用的 URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4784">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4784">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4785">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4785">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4786">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4786">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4787">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4787">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4788">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4788">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4789">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4789">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4790">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4790">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4791">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4791">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4792">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4792">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = "example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4793">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4793">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4794">首选项密钥名称: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4794">首选项密钥名称: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4795">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4795">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4796">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4796">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4797">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4797">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4798">应在下载时自动打开的文件类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4798">应在下载时自动打开的文件类型列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4799">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4799">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4800">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4800">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4801">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4801">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4802">此策略设置应在下载时自动打开的文件类型列表。注意: 列出文件类型时不应包含前导分隔符，因此应列出“txt”而不是“.txt”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4802">此策略设置应在下载时自动打开的文件类型列表。注意: 列出文件类型时不应包含前导分隔符，因此应列出“txt”而不是“.txt”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4803">默认情况下，这些文件类型将在所有 URL 上自动打开。你可以使用 [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) 策略来限制将对其自动打开这些文件类型的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4803">默认情况下，这些文件类型将在所有 URL 上自动打开。你可以使用 [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) 策略来限制将对其自动打开这些文件类型的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4804">具有应自动打开的类型的文件仍将受启用的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查约束，如果未通过检查，则这些文件不会打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4804">具有应自动打开的类型的文件仍将受启用的 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 检查约束，如果未通过检查，则这些文件不会打开。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4805">用户已指定为自动打开的类型在下载时将继续打开。用户将继续能够指定要自动打开的其他文件类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4805">用户已指定为自动打开的类型在下载时将继续打开。用户将继续能够指定要自动打开的其他文件类型。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4806">如果未设置此策略，则只有用户已指定为自动打开的文件类型将在下载时自动打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4806">如果未设置此策略，则只有用户已指定为自动打开的文件类型将在下载时自动打开。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4807">为使此策略应用于 Windows 设备，设备必须加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域，注册了设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4807">为使此策略应用于 Windows 设备，设备必须加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域，注册了设备管理的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4808">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4808">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4809">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4809">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4810">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4810">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4811">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4811">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4812">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4812">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4813">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4813">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4814">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4814">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4815">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4815">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4816">GP 唯一名称: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4816">GP 唯一名称: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4817">GP 名称: 应在下载时自动打开的文件类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4817">GP 名称: 应在下载时自动打开的文件类型列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4818">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4818">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4819">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4819">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4820">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4820">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4821">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4821">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4822">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4822">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4823">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4823">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4824">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4824">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4825">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4825">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4826">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4826">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = "exe"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = "txt"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4827">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4827">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4828">首选项密钥名称: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4828">首选项密钥名称: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4829">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4829">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4830">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4830">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4831">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4831">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4832">启用地址自动填充</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4832">启用地址自动填充</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4833">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4833">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4834">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4834">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4835">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4835">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4836">启用自动填充功能，并允许用户使用以前存储的信息在 Web 窗体中自动完成地址信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4836">启用自动填充功能，并允许用户使用以前存储的信息在 Web 窗体中自动完成地址信息。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4837">如果禁用此策略，自动填充不会建议或填充地址信息，也不会保存用户在浏览 Web 时可能提交的其他地址信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4837">如果禁用此策略，自动填充不会建议或填充地址信息，也不会保存用户在浏览 Web 时可能提交的其他地址信息。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4838">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在用户界面中控制地址自动填充。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4838">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在用户界面中控制地址自动填充。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4839">请注意，如果禁用此策略，则还会停止除付款和密码窗体之外的所有其他 Web 窗体的所有活动。不再保存任何条目，Microsoft Edge 不会建议或自动填充任何以前的条目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4839">请注意，如果禁用此策略，则还会停止除付款和密码窗体之外的所有其他 Web 窗体的所有活动。不再保存任何条目，Microsoft Edge 不会建议或自动填充任何以前的条目。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4840">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4840">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4841">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4841">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4842">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4842">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4843">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4843">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4844">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4844">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4845">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4845">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4846">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4846">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4847">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4847">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4848">GP 唯一名称: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4848">GP 唯一名称: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4849">GP 名称: 启用地址自动填充</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4849">GP 名称: 启用地址自动填充</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4850">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4850">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4851">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4851">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4852">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4852">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4853">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4853">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4854">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4854">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4855">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4855">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4856">值名称: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4856">值名称: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4857">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4857">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4858">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4858">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4859">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4859">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4860">首选项密钥名称: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4860">首选项密钥名称: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4861">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4861">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4862">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4862">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4863">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4863">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4866">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4866">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4867">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4867">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4868">启用 Microsoft Edge 的自动填充功能，并允许用户使用以前存储的信息在 Web 窗体中自动填写信用卡信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4868">启用 Microsoft Edge 的自动填充功能，并允许用户使用以前存储的信息在 Web 窗体中自动填写信用卡信息。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4869">如果禁用此策略，则自动填充绝对不会建议或填充信用卡信息，也不会保存用户在浏览 Web 时可能提交的其他信用卡信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4869">如果禁用此策略，则自动填充绝对不会建议或填充信用卡信息，也不会保存用户在浏览 Web 时可能提交的其他信用卡信息。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4870">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以控制信用卡信息的自动填充。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4870">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以控制信用卡信息的自动填充。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4871">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4871">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4872">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4872">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4873">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4873">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4874">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4874">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4875">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4875">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4876">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4876">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4877">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4877">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4878">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4878">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4879">GP 唯一名称: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4879">GP 唯一名称: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4880">GP 名称: 启用信用卡的自动填充功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4880">GP 名称: 启用信用卡的自动填充功能</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4881">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4881">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4882">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4882">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4883">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4883">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4884">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4884">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4885">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4885">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4886">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4886">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4887">值名称: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4887">值名称: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>


  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4893">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4893">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4894">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4894">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4895">允许网站自动播放媒体</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4895">允许网站自动播放媒体</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4896">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4896">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4897">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4897">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4898">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4898">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4899">此策略为网站设置媒体自动播放策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4899">此策略为网站设置媒体自动播放策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4900">默认设置“未配置”遵循当前媒体自动播放设置，并允许用户配置其自动播放设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4900">默认设置“未配置”遵循当前媒体自动播放设置，并允许用户配置其自动播放设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4901">如果设置为“已启用”，则会将媒体自动播放设置为“允许”。允许所有网站自动播放媒体。用户无法覆盖此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4901">如果设置为“已启用”，则会将媒体自动播放设置为“允许”。允许所有网站自动播放媒体。用户无法覆盖此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4902">如果设置为“已禁用”，则会将媒体自动播放设置为“阻止”。不允许任何网站自动播放媒体。用户无法覆盖此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4902">如果设置为“已禁用”，则会将媒体自动播放设置为“阻止”。不允许任何网站自动播放媒体。用户无法覆盖此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4903">需要关闭并重新打开标签页才能使此策略生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4903">需要关闭并重新打开标签页才能使此策略生效。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4904">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4904">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4905">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4905">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4906">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4906">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4907">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4907">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4908">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4908">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4909">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4909">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4910">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4910">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4911">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4911">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4912">GP 唯一名称: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4912">GP 唯一名称: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4913">GP 名称: 允许网站自动播放媒体</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4913">GP 名称: 允许网站自动播放媒体</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4914">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4914">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4915">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4915">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4916">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4916">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4917">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4917">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4918">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4918">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4919">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4919">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4920">值名称: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4920">值名称: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4921">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4921">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4922">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4922">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4923">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4923">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4924">首选项密钥名称: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4924">首选项密钥名称: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4925">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4925">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4926">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4926">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4927">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4927">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4928">Microsoft Edge 关闭后，继续运行后台应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4928">Microsoft Edge 关闭后，继续运行后台应用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4929">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4929">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4930">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4930">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4931">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4931">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4932">允许 Microsoft Edge 进程在操作系统登录时启动，并在最后一个浏览器窗口关闭后继续运行。在此场景中，后台应用和当前浏览会话保持活动状态，包括任何会话 cookie。打开的后台进程会在系统托盘中显示一个图标，并且始终可以从系统托盘中将其关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4932">允许 Microsoft Edge 进程在操作系统登录时启动，并在最后一个浏览器窗口关闭后继续运行。在此场景中，后台应用和当前浏览会话保持活动状态，包括任何会话 cookie。打开的后台进程会在系统托盘中显示一个图标，并且始终可以从系统托盘中将其关闭。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4933">如果启用此策略，则将开启后台模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4933">如果启用此策略，则将开启后台模式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4934">如果禁用此策略，则将关闭后台模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4934">如果禁用此策略，则将关闭后台模式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4935">如果未配置此策略，则将先关闭后台模式，并且用户可以在 edge://settings/system 中配置其行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4935">如果未配置此策略，则将先关闭后台模式，并且用户可以在 edge://settings/system 中配置其行为。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4936">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4936">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4937">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4937">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4938">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4938">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4939">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4939">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4940">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4940">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4941">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4941">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4942">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4942">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4943">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4943">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4944">GP 唯一名称: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4944">GP 唯一名称: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4945">GP 名称: Microsoft Edge 关闭后，继续运行后台应用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4945">GP 名称: Microsoft Edge 关闭后，继续运行后台应用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4946">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4946">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4947">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4947">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4948">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4948">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4949">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4949">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4950">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4950">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4951">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4951">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4952">值名称: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4952">值名称: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4953">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4953">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4954">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4954">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4955">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4955">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4956">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4956">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4957">对集锦和其他使用模板的功能的可用模板列表启用后台更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4957">对集锦和其他使用模板的功能的可用模板列表启用后台更新</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4958">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4958">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4959">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4959">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4960">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4960">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4961">允许你对集锦和其他使用模板的功能的可用模板列表启用或禁用后台更新。模板用于在将页面保存到集锦时从网页中提取丰富的元数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4961">允许你对集锦和其他使用模板的功能的可用模板列表启用或禁用后台更新。模板用于在将页面保存到集锦时从网页中提取丰富的元数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4962">如果启用此设置或未配置此设置，则将在后台每隔 24 小时从 Microsoft 服务下载可用模板的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4962">如果启用此设置或未配置此设置，则将在后台每隔 24 小时从 Microsoft 服务下载可用模板的列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4963">如果禁用此设置，则将按需下载可用模板的列表。此类型的下载可能会导致集锦和其他功能的性能受到细微影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4963">如果禁用此设置，则将按需下载可用模板的列表。此类型的下载可能会导致集锦和其他功能的性能受到细微影响。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4964">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4964">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4965">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4965">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4966">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4966">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4967">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4967">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4968">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4968">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4969">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4969">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4970">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4970">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4971">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4971">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4972">GP 唯一名称: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4972">GP 唯一名称: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4973">GP 名称: 对集锦和其他使用模板的功能的可用模板列表启用后台更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4973">GP 名称: 对集锦和其他使用模板的功能的可用模板列表启用后台更新</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4974">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4974">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4975">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4975">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4976">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4976">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4977">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4977">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4978">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4978">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4979">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4979">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4980">值名称: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4980">值名称: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4981">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4981">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4982">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4982">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4983">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4983">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4984">首选项密钥名称: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4984">首选项密钥名称: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4985">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4985">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4986">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4986">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4987">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4987">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4988">阻止必应搜索结果中的所有广告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4988">阻止必应搜索结果中的所有广告</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4989">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4989">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4990">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4990">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4991">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4991">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4992">在 Bing.com 上实现无广告搜索体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4992">在 Bing.com 上实现无广告搜索体验</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-4993">如果启用此策略，则用户可以在 bing.com 上搜索并获得无广告搜索体验。同时，安全搜索设置将设置为“严格”，并且用户无法进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4993">如果启用此策略，则用户可以在 bing.com 上搜索并获得无广告搜索体验。同时，安全搜索设置将设置为“严格”，并且用户无法进行更改。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4994">如果未配置此策略，则默认体验将在 bing.com 上的搜索结果中显示广告。安全搜索将设置为“中等”，并且用户可以进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4994">如果未配置此策略，则默认体验将在 bing.com 上的搜索结果中显示广告。安全搜索将设置为“中等”，并且用户可以进行更改。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4995">此策略仅适用于被 Microsoft 标识为 EDU 租户的 K-12 SKU。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4995">此策略仅适用于被 Microsoft 标识为 EDU 租户的 K-12 SKU。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4996">请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) 以了解有关此策略的详细信息，或者如果以下情况适用于你:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4996">请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) 以了解有关此策略的详细信息，或者如果以下情况适用于你:</span></span>

 * <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4997">你拥有 EDU 租户，但策略不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4997">你拥有 EDU 租户，但策略不起作用。</span></span>

 * <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4998">你的 IP 已列入核准清单，因为它具有无广告搜索体验。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4998">你的 IP 已列入核准清单，因为它具有无广告搜索体验。</span></span>

 * <span data-ttu-id="27a59-4999">你正在体验旧版 Microsoft Edge 的无广告搜索体验，并且想要升级到 Microsoft Edge 的新版本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-4999">你正在体验旧版 Microsoft Edge 的无广告搜索体验，并且想要升级到 Microsoft Edge 的新版本。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5000">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5000">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5001">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5001">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5002">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5002">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5003">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5003">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5004">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5004">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5005">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5005">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5006">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5006">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5007">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5007">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5008">GP 唯一名称: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5008">GP 唯一名称: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5009">GP 名称: 阻止必应搜索结果中的所有广告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5009">GP 名称: 阻止必应搜索结果中的所有广告</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5010">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5010">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5011">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5011">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5012">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5012">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5013">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5013">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5014">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5014">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5015">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5015">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5016">值名称: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5016">值名称: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5017">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5017">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5018">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5018">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5019">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5019">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5020">首选项密钥名称: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5020">首选项密钥名称: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5021">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5021">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5022">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5022">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5023">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5023">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5024">阻止第三方 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5024">阻止第三方 Cookie</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5025">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5025">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5026">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5026">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5027">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5027">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5028">阻止不是来自地址栏中的域的网页元素设置 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5028">阻止不是来自地址栏中的域的网页元素设置 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5029">如果启用此策略，则不是来自地址栏中的域的网页元素无法设置 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5029">如果启用此策略，则不是来自地址栏中的域的网页元素无法设置 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5030">如果禁用此策略，则来自地址栏以外的域的网页元素可以设置 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5030">如果禁用此策略，则来自地址栏以外的域的网页元素可以设置 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5031">如果未配置此策略，则启用第三方 Cookie，但用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5031">如果未配置此策略，则启用第三方 Cookie，但用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5032">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5032">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5033">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5033">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5034">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5034">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5035">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5035">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5036">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5036">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5037">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5037">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5038">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5038">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5039">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5039">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5040">GP 唯一名称: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5040">GP 唯一名称: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5041">GP 名称: 阻止第三方 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5041">GP 名称: 阻止第三方 Cookie</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5042">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5042">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5043">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5043">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5044">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5044">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5045">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5045">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5046">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5046">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5047">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5047">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5048">值名称: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5048">值名称: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5049">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5049">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5050">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5050">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5051">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5051">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5052">首选项密钥名称: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5052">首选项密钥名称: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5053">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5053">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5054">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5054">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5055">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5055">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5056">从“标识”浮出菜单或“设置”页面启用用户配置创建</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5056">从“标识”浮出菜单或“设置”页面启用用户配置创建</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5057">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5057">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5058">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5058">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5059">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5059">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5060">允许用户使用**添加用户配置**选项创建新用户配置。 如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 允许用户使用“标识”浮出控件菜单或“设置”页上的**添加用户配置**创建新用户配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5060">允许用户使用**添加用户配置**选项创建新用户配置。 如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 允许用户使用“标识”浮出控件菜单或“设置”页上的**添加用户配置**创建新用户配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5061">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法从“标识”浮出控件菜单或“设置”页中添加新用户配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5061">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法从“标识”浮出控件菜单或“设置”页中添加新用户配置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5062">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5062">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5063">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5063">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5064">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5064">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5065">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5065">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5066">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5066">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5067">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5067">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5068">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5068">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5069">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5069">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5070">GP 唯一名称: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5070">GP 唯一名称: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5071">GP 名称: 从“标识”浮出菜单或“设置”页面启用用户配置创建</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5071">GP 名称: 从“标识”浮出菜单或“设置”页面启用用户配置创建</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5072">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5072">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5073">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5073">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5074">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5074">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5075">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5075">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5076">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5076">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5077">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5077">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5078">值名称: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5078">值名称: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5079">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5079">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5080">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5080">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5081">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5081">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5082">首选项密钥名称: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5082">首选项密钥名称: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5083">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5083">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5084">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5084">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5085">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5085">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5086">启用来宾模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5086">启用来宾模式</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5087">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5087">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5088">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5088">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5089">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5089">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5090">启用此选项可允许在 Microsoft Edge 中使用来宾用户配置。在来宾用户配置中，浏览器不会从现有用户配置中导入浏览数据，并且在关闭所有来宾用户配置后，它会删除浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5090">启用此选项可允许在 Microsoft Edge 中使用来宾用户配置。在来宾用户配置中，浏览器不会从现有用户配置中导入浏览数据，并且在关闭所有来宾用户配置后，它会删除浏览数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5091">如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 允许用户在来宾用户配置中浏览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5091">如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 允许用户在来宾用户配置中浏览。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5092">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 不允许用户在来宾用户配置中浏览。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5092">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 不允许用户在来宾用户配置中浏览。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5093">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5093">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5094">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5094">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5095">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5095">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5096">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5096">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5097">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5097">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5098">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5098">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5099">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5099">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5100">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5100">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5101">GP 唯一名称: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5101">GP 唯一名称: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5102">GP 名称: 启用来宾模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5102">GP 名称: 启用来宾模式</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5103">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5103">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5104">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5104">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5105">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5105">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5106">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5106">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5107">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5107">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5108">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5108">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5109">值名称: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5109">值名称: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5110">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5110">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5111">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5111">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5112">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5112">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5113">首选项密钥名称: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5113">首选项密钥名称: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5114">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5114">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5115">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5115">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5116">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5116">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5117">允许查询浏览器网络时间服务</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5117">允许查询浏览器网络时间服务</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5118">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5118">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5119">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5119">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5120">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5120">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5121">阻止 Microsoft Edge 偶尔向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询以检索准确的时间戳。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5121">阻止 Microsoft Edge 偶尔向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询以检索准确的时间戳。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5122">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将停止向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5122">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将停止向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5123">如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会偶尔向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5123">如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会偶尔向浏览器网络时间服务发送查询。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5124">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5124">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5125">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5125">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5126">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5126">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5127">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5127">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5128">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5128">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5129">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5129">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5130">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5130">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5131">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5131">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5132">GP 唯一名称: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5132">GP 唯一名称: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5133">GP 名称: 允许查询浏览器网络时间服务</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5133">GP 名称: 允许查询浏览器网络时间服务</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5134">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5134">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5135">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5135">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5136">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5136">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5137">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5137">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5138">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5138">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5139">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5139">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5140">值名称: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5140">值名称: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5141">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5141">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5142">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5142">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5143">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5143">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5144">首选项密钥名称: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5144">首选项密钥名称: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5145">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5145">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5146">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5146">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5147">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5147">BrowserSignin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5148">浏览器登录设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5148">浏览器登录设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5149">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5149">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5150">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5150">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5151">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5151">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5152">指定用户是否可以使用其帐户登录 Microsoft Edge 并使用与帐户相关的服务，例如同步和单一登录。若要控制同步的可用性，请改用 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5152">指定用户是否可以使用其帐户登录 Microsoft Edge 并使用与帐户相关的服务，例如同步和单一登录。若要控制同步的可用性，请改用 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5153">如果将此策略设置为“Disable”，请确保将 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 策略也设置为“已禁用”，因为 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 会禁止创建自动登录浏览器用户配置。如果同时设置了这两个策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将使用“禁用浏览器登录”策略，其行为方式等同于将 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 设置为“已禁用”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5153">如果将此策略设置为“Disable”，请确保将 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 策略也设置为“已禁用”，因为 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 会禁止创建自动登录浏览器用户配置。如果同时设置了这两个策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将使用“禁用浏览器登录”策略，其行为方式等同于将 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 设置为“已禁用”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5154">如果将此策略设置为“Enable”，则用户可以登录浏览器。登录浏览器并不意味着默认情况下打开同步；用户必须单独选择使用此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5154">如果将此策略设置为“Enable”，则用户可以登录浏览器。登录浏览器并不意味着默认情况下打开同步；用户必须单独选择使用此功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5155">如果将此策略设置为“Force”，则用户必须登录用户配置才能使用浏览器。默认情况下，这将允许用户选择是否要同步到他们的帐户，除非由域管理员或通过 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略禁用了同步。[BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) 策略的默认值被设置为 false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5155">如果将此策略设置为“Force”，则用户必须登录用户配置才能使用浏览器。默认情况下，这将允许用户选择是否要同步到他们的帐户，除非由域管理员或通过 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略禁用了同步。[BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) 策略的默认值被设置为 false。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5156">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以确定是否要启用浏览器登录选项并在合适时使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5156">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以确定是否要启用浏览器登录选项并在合适时使用它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5157">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5157">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5158">Disable (0) = 禁用浏览器登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5158">Disable (0) = 禁用浏览器登录</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5159">Enable (1) = 启用浏览器登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5159">Enable (1) = 启用浏览器登录</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5160">Force (2) = 强制用户通过登录使用浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5160">Force (2) = 强制用户通过登录使用浏览器</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5161">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5161">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5162">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5162">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5163">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5163">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5164">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5164">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5165">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5165">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5166">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5166">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5167">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5167">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5168">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5168">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5169">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5169">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5170">GP 唯一名称: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5170">GP 唯一名称: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5171">GP 名称: 浏览器登录设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5171">GP 名称: 浏览器登录设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5172">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5172">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5173">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5173">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5174">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5174">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5175">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5175">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5176">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5176">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5177">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5177">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5178">值名称: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5178">值名称: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5179">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5179">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5180">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5180">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5181">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5181">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5182">首选项密钥名称: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5182">首选项密钥名称: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5183">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5183">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5184">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5184">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5185">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5185">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5186">使用内置 DNS 客户端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5186">使用内置 DNS 客户端</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5187">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5187">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5188">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5188">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5189">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5189">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5190">控制是否使用内置 DNS 客户端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5190">控制是否使用内置 DNS 客户端。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5191">这不会对使用哪个 DNS 服务器有影响；只影响用于与它们通信的软件堆栈。例如，如果操作系统配置为使用企业 DNS 服务器，则内置 DNS 客户端将使用该服务器。但是，内置 DNS 客户端可能会使用更新型的 DNS 相关协议(例如 DNS-over-TLS)以不同方式对服务器进行寻址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5191">这不会对使用哪个 DNS 服务器有影响；只影响用于与它们通信的软件堆栈。例如，如果操作系统配置为使用企业 DNS 服务器，则内置 DNS 客户端将使用该服务器。但是，内置 DNS 客户端可能会使用更新型的 DNS 相关协议(例如 DNS-over-TLS)以不同方式对服务器进行寻址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5192">如果启用此策略，则使用内置 DNS 客户端(如果可用)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5192">如果启用此策略，则使用内置 DNS 客户端(如果可用)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5193">如果禁用此策略，则从不使用客户端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5193">如果禁用此策略，则从不使用客户端。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5194">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下在 MacOS 上启用内置 DNS 客户端，用户可通过编辑 edge://flags 或指定命令行标志，对是否使用内置 DNS 客户端进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5194">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下在 MacOS 上启用内置 DNS 客户端，用户可通过编辑 edge://flags 或指定命令行标志，对是否使用内置 DNS 客户端进行更改。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5195">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5195">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5196">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5196">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5197">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5197">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5198">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5198">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5199">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5199">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5200">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5200">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5201">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5201">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5202">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5202">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5203">GP 唯一名称: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5203">GP 唯一名称: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5204">GP 名称: 使用内置 DNS 客户端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5204">GP 名称: 使用内置 DNS 客户端</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5205">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5205">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5206">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5206">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5207">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5207">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5208">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5208">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5209">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5209">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5210">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5210">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5211">值名称: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5211">值名称: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5212">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5212">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5213">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5213">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5214">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5214">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5215">首选项密钥名称: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5215">首选项密钥名称: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5216">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5216">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5217">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5217">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)
