  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5218">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5218">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5219">确定是否将使用内置证书验证器验证服务器证书 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5219">确定是否将使用内置证书验证器验证服务器证书 (已弃用)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-5220">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5220">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5221">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5221">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5222">在 macOS 自 83 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5222">在 macOS 自 83 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5223">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5223">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5224">此策略已弃用，因为它旨在仅作为一种短期机制，如果发现企业与内置证书验证程序不兼容，则可以让他们有更多时间更新环境并报告问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5224">此策略已弃用，因为它旨在仅作为一种短期机制，如果发现企业与内置证书验证程序不兼容，则可以让他们有更多时间更新环境并报告问题。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5225">当计划删除对 Mac 操作系统 X 上的旧版证书验证程序的支持时，它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 87 中正常使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5225">当计划删除对 Mac 操作系统 X 上的旧版证书验证程序的支持时，它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 87 中正常使用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5226">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5226">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5227">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5227">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5228">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5228">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5229">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5229">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5230">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5230">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5231">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5231">布尔</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5232">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5232">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5233">首选项密钥名称: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5233">首选项密钥名称: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5234">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5234">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5235">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5235">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5236">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5236">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5237">对 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希列表禁用强制证书透明度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5237">对 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希列表禁用强制证书透明度</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5238">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5238">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5239">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5239">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5240">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5240">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5241">对列出的 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希禁用强制的证书透明度要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5241">对列出的 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希禁用强制的证书透明度要求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5242">此策略允许你对包含具有指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希之一的证书的证书链禁用证书透明度公开要求。这允许证书继续用于企业主机，否则这些证书因未被适当公开而不受信任。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5242">此策略允许你对包含具有指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希之一的证书的证书链禁用证书透明度公开要求。这允许证书继续用于企业主机，否则这些证书因未被适当公开而不受信任。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5243">为了在设置此策略时禁用强制证书透明度，必须满足以下条件集之一:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5243">为了在设置此策略时禁用强制证书透明度，必须满足以下条件集之一:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5244">哈希具有服务器证书的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5244">哈希具有服务器证书的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5245">哈希具有出现在证书链中的 CA 证书的 subjectPublicKeyInfo，该 CA 证书通过 X.509v3 nameConstraints 扩展进行约束，permittedSubtrees 中包含一个或多个 directoryName nameConstraints，且 directoryName 包含一个 organizationName 属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5245">哈希具有出现在证书链中的 CA 证书的 subjectPublicKeyInfo，该 CA 证书通过 X.509v3 nameConstraints 扩展进行约束，permittedSubtrees 中包含一个或多个 directoryName nameConstraints，且 directoryName 包含一个 organizationName 属性。</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5246">哈希具有出现在证书链中的 CA 证书的 subjectPublicKeyInfo，该 CA 证书在证书使用者中有一个或多个 organizationName 属性，并且服务器的证书包含相同数量的 organizationName 属性，顺序相同，并且具有逐字节相同的值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5246">哈希具有出现在证书链中的 CA 证书的 subjectPublicKeyInfo，该 CA 证书在证书使用者中有一个或多个 organizationName 属性，并且服务器的证书包含相同数量的 organizationName 属性，顺序相同，并且具有逐字节相同的值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5247">指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希的方式是: 拼接哈希算法名称、"/" 字符和用于指定证书的 DER 编码 subjectPublicKeyInfo 的哈希算法的 Base64 编码。该 Base64 编码与 SPKI 指纹的格式相同，如 RFC 7469 第 2.4 节所定义。无法识别的哈希算法将被忽略。目前唯一支持的哈希算法是 "sha256"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5247">指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希的方式是: 拼接哈希算法名称、"/" 字符和用于指定证书的 DER 编码 subjectPublicKeyInfo 的哈希算法的 Base64 编码。该 Base64 编码与 SPKI 指纹的格式相同，如 RFC 7469 第 2.4 节所定义。无法识别的哈希算法将被忽略。目前唯一支持的哈希算法是 "sha256"。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5248">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则任何需要通过证书透明度公开的证书，如果没有根据证书透明度策略公开，将被视为不受信任。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5248">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则任何需要通过证书透明度公开的证书，如果没有根据证书透明度策略公开，将被视为不受信任。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5249">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5249">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5250">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5250">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5251">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5251">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5252">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5252">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5253">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5253">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5254">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5254">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5255">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5255">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5256">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5256">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5257">GP 唯一名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5257">GP 唯一名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5258">GP 名称: 对 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希列表禁用强制证书透明度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5258">GP 名称: 对 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希列表禁用强制证书透明度</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5259">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5259">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5260">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5260">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5261">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5261">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5262">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5262">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5263">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5263">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5264">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5264">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5265">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5265">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5266">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5266">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5267">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5267">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5268">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5268">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5269">首选项密钥名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5269">首选项密钥名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5270">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5270">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5271">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5271">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5272">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5272">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5273">对列出的旧证书颁发机构禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5273">对列出的旧证书颁发机构禁用证书透明度强制</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5274">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5274">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5275">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5275">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5276">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5276">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5277">针对旧证书颁发机构(Ca)列表禁用实施证书透明度要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5277">针对旧证书颁发机构(Ca)列表禁用实施证书透明度要求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5278">此策略允许你对包含具有所指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希之一的证书的证书链禁用证书透明度公开要求。这样，你可以使用原来因未被正确公开但却继续用于企业主机而不受信任的证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5278">此策略允许你对包含具有所指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希之一的证书的证书链禁用证书透明度公开要求。这样，你可以使用原来因未被正确公开但却继续用于企业主机而不受信任的证书。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5279">为了禁用证书透明度实施要求，必须将哈希设置为出现在 CA 证书中并且被识别为旧证书颁发机构(CA)的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。旧 CA 是默认情况下已被 Microsoft Edge 所支持的一个或多个操作系统公开信任的 CA。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5279">为了禁用证书透明度实施要求，必须将哈希设置为出现在 CA 证书中并且被识别为旧证书颁发机构(CA)的 subjectPublicKeyInfo。旧 CA 是默认情况下已被 Microsoft Edge 所支持的一个或多个操作系统公开信任的 CA。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5280">通过连接哈希算法名称、"/" 字符和对指定证书的 DER 编码 subjectPublicKeyInfo 应用的哈希算法的 Base64 编码，可以指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希。此 Base64 编码与 SPKI 指纹的格式相同，如 RFC 7469 第 2.4 节中所定义。无法识别的哈希算法会被忽略。目前唯一支持的哈希算法是 "sha256"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5280">通过连接哈希算法名称、"/" 字符和对指定证书的 DER 编码 subjectPublicKeyInfo 应用的哈希算法的 Base64 编码，可以指定 subjectPublicKeyInfo 哈希。此 Base64 编码与 SPKI 指纹的格式相同，如 RFC 7469 第 2.4 节中所定义。无法识别的哈希算法会被忽略。目前唯一支持的哈希算法是 "sha256"。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5281">如果未配置此策略，则任何需要通过证书透明度公开的证书在未根据证书透明度策略公开的情况下，都将被视为不受信任。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5281">如果未配置此策略，则任何需要通过证书透明度公开的证书在未根据证书透明度策略公开的情况下，都将被视为不受信任。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5282">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5282">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5283">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5283">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5284">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5284">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5285">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5285">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5286">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5286">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5287">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5287">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5288">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5288">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5289">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5289">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5290">GP 唯一名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5290">GP 唯一名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5291">GP 名称: 对列出的旧证书颁发机构禁用证书透明度强制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5291">GP 名称: 对列出的旧证书颁发机构禁用证书透明度强制</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5292">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5292">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5293">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5293">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5294">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5294">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5295">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5295">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5296">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5296">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5297">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5297">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5298">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5298">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5299">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5299">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5300">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5300">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5301">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5301">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5302">首选项密钥名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5302">首选项密钥名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5303">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5303">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5304">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5304">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5305">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5305">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5306">对特定 URL 禁用强制证书透明度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5306">对特定 URL 禁用强制证书透明度</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5307">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5307">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5308">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5308">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5309">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5309">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5310">为列出的 URL 禁用强制执行证书透明度要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5310">为列出的 URL 禁用强制执行证书透明度要求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5311">此策略允许你不通过证书透明度公开指定 URL 中的主机名证书。这样，你可以使用原来因未被正确公开而不受信任的证书，但这却更难检测到为那些主机误颁发的证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5311">此策略允许你不通过证书透明度公开指定 URL 中的主机名证书。这样，你可以使用原来因未被正确公开而不受信任的证书，但这却更难检测到为那些主机误颁发的证书。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5312">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 形成 URL 模式。由于证书对给定主机名有效，而与方案、端口或路径无关，因此仅考虑了 URL 的主机名部分。不支持使用通配符主机。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5312">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 形成 URL 模式。由于证书对给定主机名有效，而与方案、端口或路径无关，因此仅考虑了 URL 的主机名部分。不支持使用通配符主机。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5313">如果未配置此策略，则任何应通过证书透明度公开的证书在未公开的情况下，都会被视为不受信任。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5313">如果未配置此策略，则任何应通过证书透明度公开的证书在未公开的情况下，都会被视为不受信任。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5314">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5314">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5315">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5315">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5316">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5316">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5317">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5317">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5318">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5318">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5319">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5319">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5320">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5320">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5321">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5321">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5322">GP 唯一名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5322">GP 唯一名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5323">GP 名称: 对特定 URL 禁用强制证书透明度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5323">GP 名称: 对特定 URL 禁用强制证书透明度</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5324">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5324">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5325">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5325">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5326">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5326">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5327">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5327">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5328">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5328">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5329">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5329">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5330">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5330">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5331">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5331">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5332">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5332">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\2 = ".contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5333">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5333">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5334">首选项密钥名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5334">首选项密钥名称: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5335">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5335">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5336">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5336">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5337">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5337">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5338">Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除浏览数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5338">Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除浏览数据</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5339">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5339">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5340">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5340">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5341">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5341">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5342">Microsoft Edge 关闭时不会默认清除浏览数据。浏览数据包括在表单、密码甚至是所访问网站中输入的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5342">Microsoft Edge 关闭时不会默认清除浏览数据。浏览数据包括在表单、密码甚至是所访问网站中输入的信息。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5343">如果启用此策略，则每次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时都会删除所有浏览数据。请注意，如果启用此策略，它将优先于你配置 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 的方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5343">如果启用此策略，则每次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时都会删除所有浏览数据。请注意，如果启用此策略，它将优先于你配置 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 的方式</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5344">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在“设置”中配置“清除浏览数据”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5344">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在“设置”中配置“清除浏览数据”选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5345">如果启用此策略，请不要配置 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 策略，因为它们都会执行数据删除。如果同时配置了上述策略和此策略，则会在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，无论你如何配置 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5345">如果启用此策略，请不要配置 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 策略，因为它们都会执行数据删除。如果同时配置了上述策略和此策略，则会在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，无论你如何配置 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 或 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5346">若要排除 cookie 以防退出时被删除，请配置 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5346">若要排除 cookie 以防退出时被删除，请配置 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5347">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5347">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5348">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5348">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5349">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5349">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5350">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5350">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5351">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5351">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5352">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5352">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5353">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5353">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5354">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5354">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5355">GP 唯一名称: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5355">GP 唯一名称: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5356">GP 名称: Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除浏览数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5356">GP 名称: Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除浏览数据</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5357">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5357">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5358">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5358">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5359">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5359">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5360">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5360">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5361">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5361">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5362">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5362">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5363">值名称: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5363">值名称: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5364">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5364">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5365">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5365">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5366">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5366">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5367">首选项密钥名称: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5367">首选项密钥名称: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5368">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5368">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5369">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5369">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5370">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5370">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5371">Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除缓存的图像和文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5371">Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除缓存的图像和文件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5372">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5372">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5373">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5373">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5374">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5374">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5375">Microsoft Edge 关闭时不会默认清除缓存的图像和文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5375">Microsoft Edge 关闭时不会默认清除缓存的图像和文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5376">如果启用此策略，则会在每次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除缓存的图像和文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5376">如果启用此策略，则会在每次 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除缓存的图像和文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5377">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法在 edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose 中配置缓存的图像和文件选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5377">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法在 edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose 中配置缓存的图像和文件选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5378">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否在退出时清除缓存的图像和文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5378">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否在退出时清除缓存的图像和文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5379">如果禁用此策略，则不要启用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略，因为它们都涉及删除数据。如果同时配置这两者，则 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略将优先并在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，而无论你是如何配置 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5379">如果禁用此策略，则不要启用 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略，因为它们都涉及删除数据。如果同时配置这两者，则 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 策略将优先并在 Microsoft Edge 关闭时删除所有数据，而无论你是如何配置 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 的。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5380">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5380">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5381">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5381">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5382">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5382">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5383">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5383">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5384">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5384">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5385">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5385">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5386">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5386">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5387">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5387">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5388">GP 唯一名称: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5388">GP 唯一名称: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5389">GP 名称: Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除缓存的图像和文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5389">GP 名称: Microsoft Edge 关闭时清除缓存的图像和文件</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5390">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5390">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5391">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5391">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5392">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5392">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5393">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5393">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5394">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5394">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5395">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5395">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5396">值名称: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5396">值名称: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5397">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5397">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5398">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5398">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5399">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5399">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5400">首选项密钥名称: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5400">首选项密钥名称: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5401">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5401">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5402">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5402">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5403">ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5403">ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5404">允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5404">允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5405">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5405">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5406">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5406">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5407">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5407">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5408">允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。通过 ClickOnce 协议，网站可以请求浏览器使用用户的计算机或设备上的 ClickOnce 文件处理程序打开特定 URL 中的文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5408">允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。通过 ClickOnce 协议，网站可以请求浏览器使用用户的计算机或设备上的 ClickOnce 文件处理程序打开特定 URL 中的文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5409">如果启用此策略，则用户可以使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。此策略将替代 edge://flags/ 页面中用户的 ClickOnce 设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5409">如果启用此策略，则用户可以使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。此策略将替代 edge://flags/ 页面中用户的 ClickOnce 设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5410">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。文件将通过浏览器保存到文件系统。此策略将替代 edge://flags/ 页面中用户的 ClickOnce 设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5410">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。文件将通过浏览器保存到文件系统。此策略将替代 edge://flags/ 页面中用户的 ClickOnce 设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5411">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 版本在 Microsoft Edge 87 之前的用户无法使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。但是，他们可以选择允许将 ClickOnce 协议与 edge://flags/ 页面搭配使用。默认情况下，具有 Microsoft Edge 版本 87 和更高版本的用户可以使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件，但可以选择使用 edge://flags/ 页面禁用 ClickOnce 协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5411">如果未配置此策略，则默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 版本在 Microsoft Edge 87 之前的用户无法使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件。但是，他们可以选择允许将 ClickOnce 协议与 edge://flags/ 页面搭配使用。默认情况下，具有 Microsoft Edge 版本 87 和更高版本的用户可以使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件，但可以选择使用 edge://flags/ 页面禁用 ClickOnce 协议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5412">禁用 ClickOnce 可能会阻止 ClickOnce 应用程序(.application 文件)正常启动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5412">禁用 ClickOnce 可能会阻止 ClickOnce 应用程序(.application 文件)正常启动。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5413">有关 ClickOnce 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5413">有关 ClickOnce 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5414">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5414">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5415">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5415">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5416">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5416">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5417">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5417">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5418">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5418">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5419">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5419">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5420">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5420">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5421">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5421">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5422">GP 唯一名称: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5422">GP 唯一名称: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5423">GP 名称: 允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5423">GP 名称: 允许用户使用 ClickOnce 协议打开文件</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5424">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5424">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5425">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5425">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5426">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5426">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5427">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5427">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5428">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5428">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5429">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5429">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5430">值名称: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5430">值名称: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5431">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5431">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5432">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5432">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5433">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5433">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5434">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5434">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5435">阻止访问集锦中指定的服务列表和导出目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5435">阻止访问集锦中指定的服务列表和导出目标</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5436">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5436">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5437">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5437">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5438">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5438">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5439">在 Microsoft Edge 的集锦功能中列出用户无法访问的特定服务和导出目标。这包括显示来自必应的其他数据以及将集锦导出到 Microsoft 产品或外部合作伙伴。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5439">在 Microsoft Edge 的集锦功能中列出用户无法访问的特定服务和导出目标。这包括显示来自必应的其他数据以及将集锦导出到 Microsoft 产品或外部合作伙伴。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5440">如果启用此策略，则与给定列表匹配的服务和导出目标将被阻止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5440">如果启用此策略，则与给定列表匹配的服务和导出目标将被阻止。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5441">如果未配置此政策，则不对可接受的服务和导出目标实施任何限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5441">如果未配置此政策，则不对可接受的服务和导出目标实施任何限制。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5442">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5442">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5443">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest 建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5443">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest 建议</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5444">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5444">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5445">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5445">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5446">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5446">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5447">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5447">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5448">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5448">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5449">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5449">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5450">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5450">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5451">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5451">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5452">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5452">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5453">GP 唯一名称: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5453">GP 唯一名称: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5454">GP 名称: 阻止访问集锦中指定的服务列表和导出目标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5454">GP 名称: 阻止访问集锦中指定的服务列表和导出目标</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5455">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5455">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5456">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5456">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5457">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5457">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5458">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5458">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5459">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5459">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5460">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5460">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5461">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5461">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5462">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5462">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5463">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5463">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\1 = "pinterest_suggestions"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5464">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5464">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5465">首选项密钥名称: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5465">首选项密钥名称: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5466">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5466">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>pinterest_suggestions</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5467">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5467">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5468">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5468">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5469">为命令行标志启用安全警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5469">为命令行标志启用安全警告</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5470">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5470">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5471">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5471">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5472">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5472">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5473">如果禁用，则使用具有潜在危险的命令行标志启动 Microsoft Edge 时，此策略会阻止出现安全警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5473">如果禁用，则使用具有潜在危险的命令行标志启动 Microsoft Edge 时，此策略会阻止出现安全警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5474">如果启用或取消设置，则使用这些命令行标志启动 Microsoft Edge 时，会显示安全警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5474">如果启用或取消设置，则使用这些命令行标志启动 Microsoft Edge 时，会显示安全警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5475">例如，--disable-gpu-sandbox 标志将生成以下警告: 你使用的是不受支持的命令行标志: --disable-gpu-sandbox。这会带来稳定性和安全风险。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5475">例如，--disable-gpu-sandbox 标志将生成以下警告: 你使用的是不受支持的命令行标志: --disable-gpu-sandbox。这会带来稳定性和安全风险。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5476">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版(或企业版)实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5476">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版(或企业版)实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5477">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5477">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5478">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5478">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5479">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5479">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5480">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5480">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5481">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5481">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5482">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5482">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5483">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5483">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5484">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5484">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5485">GP 唯一名称: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5485">GP 唯一名称: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5486">GP 名称: 为命令行标志启用安全警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5486">GP 名称: 为命令行标志启用安全警告</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5487">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5487">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5488">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5488">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5489">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5489">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5490">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5490">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5491">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5491">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5492">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5492">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5493">值名称: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5493">值名称: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5494">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5494">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5495">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5495">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5496">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5496">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5497">首选项密钥名称: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5497">首选项密钥名称: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5498">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5498">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5499">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5499">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5500">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5500">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5501">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5501">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5502">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5502">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5503">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5503">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5504">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5504">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5505">如果启用或未配置此策略，则会在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5505">如果启用或未配置此策略，则会在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5506">如果禁用此策略或将其设置为 false，则将对 Microsoft Edge 中的所有组件禁用组件更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5506">如果禁用此策略或将其设置为 false，则将对 Microsoft Edge 中的所有组件禁用组件更新。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5507">但是，某些组件不受此策略控制。这包括任何不含可执行代码的组件、不会明显改变浏览器行为的组件，或对安全性至关重要的组件。即，即使禁用此策略，也仍会应用被视为“对安全至关重要”的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5507">但是，某些组件不受此策略控制。这包括任何不含可执行代码的组件、不会明显改变浏览器行为的组件，或对安全性至关重要的组件。即，即使禁用此策略，也仍会应用被视为“对安全至关重要”的更新。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5508">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5508">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5509">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5509">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5510">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5510">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5511">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5511">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5512">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5512">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5513">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5513">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5514">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5514">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5515">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5515">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5516">GP 唯一名称: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5516">GP 唯一名称: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5517">GP 名称: 在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5517">GP 名称: 在 Microsoft Edge 中启用组件更新</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5518">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5518">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5519">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5519">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5520">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5520">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5521">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5521">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5522">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5522">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5523">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5523">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5524">值名称: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5524">值名称: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5525">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5525">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5526">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5526">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5527">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5527">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5528">首选项密钥名称: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5528">首选项密钥名称: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5529">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5529">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5530">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5530">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5531">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5531">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5532">配置“禁止跟踪”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5532">配置“禁止跟踪”</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5533">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5533">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5534">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5534">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5535">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5535">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5536">指定是否向请求跟踪信息的网站发送“禁止跟踪”请求。“禁止跟踪”请求让你访问的网站知道你不希望你的浏览活动被跟踪。默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 不会发送“禁止跟踪”请求，但用户可以打开此功能来发送它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5536">指定是否向请求跟踪信息的网站发送“禁止跟踪”请求。“禁止跟踪”请求让你访问的网站知道你不希望你的浏览活动被跟踪。默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 不会发送“禁止跟踪”请求，但用户可以打开此功能来发送它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5537">如果启用此策略，则将始终向请求跟踪信息的网站发送“禁止跟踪”请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5537">如果启用此策略，则将始终向请求跟踪信息的网站发送“禁止跟踪”请求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5538">如果禁用此策略，则从不会发送请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5538">如果禁用此策略，则从不会发送请求。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5539">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否发送这些请求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5539">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否发送这些请求。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5540">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5540">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5541">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5541">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5542">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5542">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5543">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5543">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5544">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5544">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5545">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5545">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5546">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5546">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5547">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5547">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5548">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5548">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5549">GP 名称: 配置“禁止跟踪”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5549">GP 名称: 配置“禁止跟踪”</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5550">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5550">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5551">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5551">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5552">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5552">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5553">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5553">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5554">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5554">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5555">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5555">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5556">值名称: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5556">值名称: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5557">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5557">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5558">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5558">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5559">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5559">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5560">首选项密钥名称: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5560">首选项密钥名称: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5561">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5561">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5562">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5562">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5563">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5563">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5564">配置用 Active Directory 域帐户(如果没有 Azure AD 域帐户)进行的自动登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5564">配置用 Active Directory 域帐户(如果没有 Azure AD 域帐户)进行的自动登录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5565">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5565">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5566">在 Windows 自 81 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5566">在 Windows 自 81 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5567">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5567">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5568">如果你的用户计算机加入了域并且你的环境未进行混合联接，则启用使用 Active Directory 帐户自动登录。如果希望用户使用其 Azure Active Directory 帐户自动登录，请以 Azure AD 联接方式(请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) 以获取更多信息)或混合联接方式(请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) 以获取更多信息)联接环境。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5568">如果你的用户计算机加入了域并且你的环境未进行混合联接，则启用使用 Active Directory 帐户自动登录。如果希望用户使用其 Azure Active Directory 帐户自动登录，请以 Azure AD 联接方式(请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) 以获取更多信息)或混合联接方式(请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) 以获取更多信息)联接环境。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5569">如果已经将 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 策略配置为“已禁用”，则此策略将不会生效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5569">如果已经将 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 策略配置为“已禁用”，则此策略将不会生效。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5570">如果启用此策略并将其设置为“SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable”，则 Microsoft Edge 将使计算机加入到域中的用户使用其 Active Directory 帐户自动登录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5570">如果启用此策略并将其设置为“SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable”，则 Microsoft Edge 将使计算机加入到域中的用户使用其 Active Directory 帐户自动登录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5571">如果将此策略设置为“Disabled”或未设置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将不会使计算机加入到域中的用户使用其 Active Directory 帐户自动登录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5571">如果将此策略设置为“Disabled”或未设置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将不会使计算机加入到域中的用户使用其 Active Directory 帐户自动登录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5572">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5572">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5573">Disabled (0) = 已禁用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5573">Disabled (0) = 已禁用</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5574">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = 登录并将域帐户设为无法删除</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5574">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = 登录并将域帐户设为无法删除</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5575">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5575">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5576">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5576">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5577">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5577">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5578">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5578">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5579">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5579">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5580">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5580">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5581">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5581">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5582">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5582">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5583">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5583">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5584">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5584">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5585">GP 名称: 配置用 Active Directory 域帐户(如果没有 Azure AD 域帐户)进行的自动登录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5585">GP 名称: 配置用 Active Directory 域帐户(如果没有 Azure AD 域帐户)进行的自动登录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5586">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5586">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5587">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5587">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5588">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5588">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5589">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5589">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5590">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5590">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5591">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5591">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5592">值名称: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5592">值名称: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5593">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5593">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5594">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5594">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5595">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5595">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5596">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5596">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5597">配置在线文本到语音转换</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5597">配置在线文本到语音转换</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5598">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5598">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5599">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5599">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5600">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5600">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5601">设置浏览器是否可以利用在线文本到语音转换的语音字体，这是 Azure 认知服务的一部分。这些语音字体比预先安装的系统语音字体质量更高。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5601">设置浏览器是否可以利用在线文本到语音转换的语音字体，这是 Azure 认知服务的一部分。这些语音字体比预先安装的系统语音字体质量更高。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5602">如果启用或未配置此策略，则使用 SpeechSynthesis API 的基于 Web 的应用程序可以使用在线文本到语音转换的语音字体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5602">如果启用或未配置此策略，则使用 SpeechSynthesis API 的基于 Web 的应用程序可以使用在线文本到语音转换的语音字体。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5603">如果禁用此策略，则语音字体不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5603">如果禁用此策略，则语音字体不可用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5604">可在此处了解有关此功能的详细信息: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) 认知服务: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5604">可在此处了解有关此功能的详细信息: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) 认知服务: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5605">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5605">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5606">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5606">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5607">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5607">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5608">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5608">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5609">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5609">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5610">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5610">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5611">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5611">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5612">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5612">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5613">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5613">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5614">GP 名称: 配置在线文本到语音转换</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5614">GP 名称: 配置在线文本到语音转换</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5615">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5615">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5616">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5616">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5617">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5617">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5618">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5618">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5619">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5619">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5620">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5620">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5621">值名称: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5621">值名称: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5622">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5622">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5623">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5623">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5624">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5624">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5625">首选项密钥名称: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5625">首选项密钥名称: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5626">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5626">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5627">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5627">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5628">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5628">ConfigureShare</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5629">配置共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5629">配置共享体验</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5630">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5630">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5631">在 Windows 自 83 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5631">在 Windows 自 83 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5632">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5632">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5633">如果将此策略设置为“ShareAllowed”(默认值)，用户能够在 Microsoft Edge 中从“设置及更多”菜单访问 Windows 10“共享”体验，以便与系统上的其他应用共享。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5633">如果将此策略设置为“ShareAllowed”(默认值)，用户能够在 Microsoft Edge 中从“设置及更多”菜单访问 Windows 10“共享”体验，以便与系统上的其他应用共享。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5634">如果将此策略设置为“ShareDisallowed”，则用户无法访问 Windows 10“共享”体验。如果“共享”按钮位于工具栏上，则它也会隐藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5634">如果将此策略设置为“ShareDisallowed”，则用户无法访问 Windows 10“共享”体验。如果“共享”按钮位于工具栏上，则它也会隐藏。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5635">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5635">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5636">ShareAllowed (0) = 允许使用共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5636">ShareAllowed (0) = 允许使用共享体验</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5637">ShareDisallowed (1) = 不允许使用共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5637">ShareDisallowed (1) = 不允许使用共享体验</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5638">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5638">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5639">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5639">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5640">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5640">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5641">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5641">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5642">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5642">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5643">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5643">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5644">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5644">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5645">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5645">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5646">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5646">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5647">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5647">GP 唯一名称: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5648">GP 名称: 配置共享体验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5648">GP 名称: 配置共享体验</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5649">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5649">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5650">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5650">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5651">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5651">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5652">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5652">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5653">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5653">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5654">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5654">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5655">值名称: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5655">值名称: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5656">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5656">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5657">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5657">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5658">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5658">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5659">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5659">CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5660">指定自定义帮助链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5660">指定自定义帮助链接</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5661">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5661">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5662">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5662">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5663">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5663">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5664">指定 "帮助" 菜单或 F1 键的链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5664">指定 "帮助" 菜单或 F1 键的链接。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5665">如果启用此策略，则管理员可以指定 "帮助" 菜单或 F1 键的链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5665">如果启用此策略，则管理员可以指定 "帮助" 菜单或 F1 键的链接。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5666">如果禁用或不配置此策略，将使用 "帮助" 菜单或 F1 键的默认链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5666">如果禁用或不配置此策略，将使用 "帮助" 菜单或 F1 键的默认链接。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5667">此策略仅适用于已加入到 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者是通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入到域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5667">此策略仅适用于已加入到 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或者是通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入到域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5668">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5668">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5669">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5669">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5670">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5670">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5671">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5671">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5672">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5672">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5673">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5673">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5674">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5674">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5675">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5675">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5676">GP 唯一名称: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5676">GP 唯一名称: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5677">GP 名称: 指定自定义帮助链接</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5677">GP 名称: 指定自定义帮助链接</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5678">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5678">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5679">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5679">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5680">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5680">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
