  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5681">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5681">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5682">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5682">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5683">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5683">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5684">值名称: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5684">值名称: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5685">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5685">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5686">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5686">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5687">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5687">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5688">首选项密钥名称: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5688">首选项密钥名称: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5689">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5689">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5690">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5690">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5691">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5691">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5692">已启用 DNS 拦截检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5692">已启用 DNS 拦截检查</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5693">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5693">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5694">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5694">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5695">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5695">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5696">此策略配置可用于禁用 DNS 拦截检查的本地交换机。这些检查意图了解浏览器是否在重定向未知主机名的代理后面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5696">此策略配置可用于禁用 DNS 拦截检查的本地交换机。这些检查意图了解浏览器是否在重定向未知主机名的代理后面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5697">在已知网络配置的企业环境中，可能不需要此检测。可以禁用它，以避免在启动时以及在每次 DNS 配置更改时出现额外的 DNS 和 HTTP 流量。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5697">在已知网络配置的企业环境中，可能不需要此检测。可以禁用它，以避免在启动时以及在每次 DNS 配置更改时出现额外的 DNS 和 HTTP 流量。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5698">如果启用或未设置此策略，则会执行 DNS 拦截检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5698">如果启用或未设置此策略，则会执行 DNS 拦截检查。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5699">如果禁用此策略，则不会执行 DNS 拦截检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5699">如果禁用此策略，则不会执行 DNS 拦截检查。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5700">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5700">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5701">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5701">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5702">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5702">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5703">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5703">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5704">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5704">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5705">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5705">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5706">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5706">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5707">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5707">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5708">GP 唯一名称: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5708">GP 唯一名称: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5709">GP 名称: 已启用 DNS 拦截检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5709">GP 名称: 已启用 DNS 拦截检查</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5710">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5710">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5711">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5711">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5712">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5712">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5713">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5713">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5714">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5714">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5715">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5715">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5716">值名称: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5716">值名称: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5717">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5717">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5718">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5718">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5719">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5719">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5720">首选项密钥名称: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5720">首选项密钥名称: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5721">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5721">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5722">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5722">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5723">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5723">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5724">将 Microsoft Edge 设置为默认浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5724">将 Microsoft Edge 设置为默认浏览器</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5725">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5725">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5726">由于 Windows 7 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5726">由于 Windows 7 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5727">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5727">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5728">如果将此策略设置为 True，则 Microsoft Edge 在启动时会始终检查它是否是默认浏览器，并且如有可能，会自动进行注册。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5728">如果将此策略设置为 True，则 Microsoft Edge 在启动时会始终检查它是否是默认浏览器，并且如有可能，会自动进行注册。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5729">如果将此策略设置为 False，Microsoft Edge 将停止检查其是否为默认设置，并关闭用户对此选项的控制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5729">如果将此策略设置为 False，Microsoft Edge 将停止检查其是否为默认设置，并关闭用户对此选项的控制。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5730">如果未设置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 允许用户控制它是否为默认设置，如果不是，则控制是否应显示用户通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5730">如果未设置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 允许用户控制它是否为默认设置，如果不是，则控制是否应显示用户通知。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5731">Windows 管理员注意事项: 此策略仅适用于运行 Windows 7 的电脑。对于较高版本的 Windows，必须部署“默认应用程序关联”文件，使 Microsoft Edge 成为 https 和 http 协议(以及 FTP 协议和文件格式(可选)，如 .html、.htm、.pdf、.svg、.webp)的处理程序。有关详细信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5731">Windows 管理员注意事项: 此策略仅适用于运行 Windows 7 的电脑。对于较高版本的 Windows，必须部署“默认应用程序关联”文件，使 Microsoft Edge 成为 https 和 http 协议(以及 FTP 协议和文件格式(可选)，如 .html、.htm、.pdf、.svg、.webp)的处理程序。有关详细信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5732">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5732">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5733">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5733">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5734">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5734">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5735">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5735">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5736">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5736">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5737">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5737">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5738">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5738">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5739">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5739">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5740">GP 唯一名称: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5740">GP 唯一名称: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5741">GP 名称: 将 Microsoft Edge 设置为默认浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5741">GP 名称: 将 Microsoft Edge 设置为默认浏览器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5742">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5742">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5743">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5743">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5744">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5744">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5745">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5745">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5746">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5746">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5747">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5747">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5748">值名称: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5748">值名称: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5749">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5749">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5750">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5750">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5751">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5751">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5752">首选项密钥名称: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5752">首选项密钥名称: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5753">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5753">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5754">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5754">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5755">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5755">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5756">允许默认搜索提供程序上下文菜单搜索访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5756">允许默认搜索提供程序上下文菜单搜索访问</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5757">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5757">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5758">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5758">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5759">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5759">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5760">允许在上下文菜单上使用默认搜索提供程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5760">允许在上下文菜单上使用默认搜索提供程序。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5761">如果将此策略设置为已禁用，则依赖于默认搜索提供程序和边栏搜索的搜索上下文菜单项将不可用，</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5761">如果将此策略设置为已禁用，则依赖于默认搜索提供程序和边栏搜索的搜索上下文菜单项将不可用，</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5762">如果将此策略设置为已启用或未设置，则默认搜索提供程序和边栏搜索的上下文菜单项将可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5762">如果将此策略设置为已启用或未设置，则默认搜索提供程序和边栏搜索的上下文菜单项将可用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5763">仅当已启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 策略时才会应用该策略值，否则不适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5763">仅当已启用 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 策略时才会应用该策略值，否则不适用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5764">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5764">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5765">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5765">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5766">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5766">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5767">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5767">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5768">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5768">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5769">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5769">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5770">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5770">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5771">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5771">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5772">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5772">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5773">GP 名称: 允许默认搜索提供程序上下文菜单搜索访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5773">GP 名称: 允许默认搜索提供程序上下文菜单搜索访问</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5774">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5774">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5775">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5775">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5776">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5776">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5777">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5777">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5778">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5778">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5779">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5779">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5780">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5780">值名称: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5781">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5781">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5782">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5782">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5783">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5783">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5784">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5784">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5785">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5785">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5786">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5786">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5787">DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5787">DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5788">默认传感器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5788">默认传感器设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5789">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5789">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5790">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5790">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5791">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5791">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5792">设置网站是否可以访问和使用诸如运动和光线传感器之类的传感器。你可以完全阻止或允许网站访问传感器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5792">设置网站是否可以访问和使用诸如运动和光线传感器之类的传感器。你可以完全阻止或允许网站访问传感器。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5793">将策略设置为 1 可允许网站访问和使用传感器。将策略设置为 2 会拒绝访问传感器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5793">将策略设置为 1 可允许网站访问和使用传感器。将策略设置为 2 会拒绝访问传感器。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5794">可使用 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 策略覆盖特定 URL 模式的此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5794">可使用 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 策略覆盖特定 URL 模式的此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5795">如果未配置此策略，网站可以访问和使用传感器，用户可以更改此设置。这是 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 的全局默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5795">如果未配置此策略，网站可以访问和使用传感器，用户可以更改此设置。这是 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 和 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 的全局默认值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5796">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5796">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5797">AllowSensors (1) = 允许网站访问传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5797">AllowSensors (1) = 允许网站访问传感器</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5798">BlockSensors (2) = 不允许任何网站访问传感器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5798">BlockSensors (2) = 不允许任何网站访问传感器</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5799">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5799">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5800">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5800">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5801">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5801">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5802">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5802">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5803">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5803">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5804">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5804">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5805">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5805">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5806">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5806">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5807">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5807">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5808">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5808">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5809">GP 名称: 默认传感器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5809">GP 名称: 默认传感器设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5810">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5810">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5811">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5811">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5812">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5812">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5813">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5813">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5814">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5814">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5815">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5815">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5816">值名称: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5816">值名称: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5817">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5817">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5818">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5818">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5819">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5819">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5820">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5820">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5821">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5821">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5822">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5822">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5823">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5823">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5824">控制串行 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5824">控制串行 API 的使用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5825">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5825">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5826">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5826">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5827">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5827">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5828">设置网站是否可以访问串行端口。你可以完全阻止访问，也可以在每次网站想要访问串行端口时询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5828">设置网站是否可以访问串行端口。你可以完全阻止访问，也可以在每次网站想要访问串行端口时询问用户。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5829">将该策略设置为 3 将使网站请求访问串行端口。将该策略设置为 2 将拒绝访问串行端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5829">将该策略设置为 3 将使网站请求访问串行端口。将该策略设置为 2 将拒绝访问串行端口。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5830">可以使用 [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 和 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 策略针对特定 URL 模式覆盖此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5830">可以使用 [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 和 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 策略针对特定 URL 模式覆盖此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5831">如果未配置此策略，默认情况下，网站可以询问用户是否可以访问串行端口，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5831">如果未配置此策略，默认情况下，网站可以询问用户是否可以访问串行端口，并且用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5832">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5832">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5833">BlockSerial (2) = 不允许任何网站通过串行 API 请求对串行端口的访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5833">BlockSerial (2) = 不允许任何网站通过串行 API 请求对串行端口的访问</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5834">AskSerial (3) = 允许网站请求访问串行端口的用户权限</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5834">AskSerial (3) = 允许网站请求访问串行端口的用户权限</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5835">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5835">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5836">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5836">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5837">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5837">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5838">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5838">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5839">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5839">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5840">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5840">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5841">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5841">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5842">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5842">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5843">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5843">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5844">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5844">GP 唯一名称: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5845">GP 名称: 控制串行 API 的使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5845">GP 名称: 控制串行 API 的使用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5846">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5846">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5847">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5847">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5848">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5848">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5849">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5849">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5850">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5850">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5851">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5851">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5852">值名称: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5852">值名称: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5853">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5853">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5854">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5854">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5855">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5855">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5856">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5856">首选项密钥名称: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5857">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5857">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5858">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5858">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5859">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5859">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5860">要求在选项卡导航之前企业模式站点列表可用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5860">要求在选项卡导航之前企业模式站点列表可用</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5861">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5861">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5862">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5862">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5863">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5863">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5864">允许你指定 Microsoft Edge 选项卡是否等待浏览，直到浏览器下载了初始企业模式站点列表。此设置适用于浏览器主页应在 Internet Explorer 模式下加载的情形，在启用 IE 模式后首次运行浏览器时，执行此操作非常重要。如果不存在这种情况，建议不要启用此设置，因为它可能会对加载主页的性能产生负面影响。仅当 Microsoft Edge 没有缓存的企业模式站点列表时(例如，在启用 IE 模式后浏览器首次运行时)，此设置才适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5864">允许你指定 Microsoft Edge 选项卡是否等待浏览，直到浏览器下载了初始企业模式站点列表。此设置适用于浏览器主页应在 Internet Explorer 模式下加载的情形，在启用 IE 模式后首次运行浏览器时，执行此操作非常重要。如果不存在这种情况，建议不要启用此设置，因为它可能会对加载主页的性能产生负面影响。仅当 Microsoft Edge 没有缓存的企业模式站点列表时(例如，在启用 IE 模式后浏览器首次运行时)，此设置才适用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5865">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5865">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5866">可以使用 [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) 策略配置此策略的超时行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5866">可以使用 [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) 策略配置此策略的超时行为。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5867">如果将此策略设置为“All”，则当 Microsoft Edge 没有企业模式站点列表的缓存版本时，选项卡会延迟导航，直到浏览器下载了站点列表。配置为通过站点列表在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的站点将以 Internet Explorer 模式加载，即使在浏览器的初始导航期间也是如此。不能配置为在 Internet Explorer 中打开的站点(例如，使用 http:、https:、file: 或 ftp: 以外的其他方案的任何站点)不会延迟浏览，会立即在 Edge 模式下加载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5867">如果将此策略设置为“All”，则当 Microsoft Edge 没有企业模式站点列表的缓存版本时，选项卡会延迟导航，直到浏览器下载了站点列表。配置为通过站点列表在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的站点将以 Internet Explorer 模式加载，即使在浏览器的初始导航期间也是如此。不能配置为在 Internet Explorer 中打开的站点(例如，使用 http:、https:、file: 或 ftp: 以外的其他方案的任何站点)不会延迟浏览，会立即在 Edge 模式下加载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5868">如果将此策略设置为“None”或未配置，则当 Microsoft Edge 没有企业模式站点列表的缓存版本时，选项卡将立即导航，而不会等待浏览器下载企业模式站点列表。配置为通过站点列表在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的站点将在 Microsoft Edge 模式下打开，直到浏览器完成下载企业模式站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5868">如果将此策略设置为“None”或未配置，则当 Microsoft Edge 没有企业模式站点列表的缓存版本时，选项卡将立即导航，而不会等待浏览器下载企业模式站点列表。配置为通过站点列表在 Internet Explorer 模式下打开的站点将在 Microsoft Edge 模式下打开，直到浏览器完成下载企业模式站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5869">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5869">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5870">None (0) = 无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5870">None (0) = 无</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5871">All (1) = 所有符合条件的导航</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5871">All (1) = 所有符合条件的导航</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5872">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5872">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5873">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5873">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5874">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5874">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5875">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5875">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5876">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5876">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5877">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5877">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5878">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5878">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5879">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5879">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5880">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5880">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5881">GP 唯一名称: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5881">GP 唯一名称: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5882">GP 名称: 要求在选项卡导航之前企业模式站点列表可用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5882">GP 名称: 要求在选项卡导航之前企业模式站点列表可用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5883">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5883">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5884">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5884">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5885">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5885">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5886">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5886">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5887">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5887">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5888">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5888">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5889">值名称: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5889">值名称: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5890">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5890">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5891">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5891">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5892">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5892">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5893">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5893">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5894">迁移时删除旧浏览器数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5894">迁移时删除旧浏览器数据</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5895">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5895">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5896">在 Windows 自 83 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5896">在 Windows 自 83 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5897">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5897">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5898">此策略确定迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更高版本后，是否删除旧版 Microsoft Edge 中的用户浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5898">此策略确定迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更高版本后，是否删除旧版 Microsoft Edge 中的用户浏览数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5899">如果将此策略设置为“已启用”，则迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更高版本后，旧版 Microsoft Edge 中的所有浏览数据都将被删除。必须在迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更高版本之前设置此策略，这样才能对现有浏览数据产生影响。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5899">如果将此策略设置为“已启用”，则迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更高版本后，旧版 Microsoft Edge 中的所有浏览数据都将被删除。必须在迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 81 或更高版本之前设置此策略，这样才能对现有浏览数据产生影响。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5900">如果将此策略设置为“已禁用”，或者未配置此策略，则在迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 83 或更高版本后，不会删除用户浏览数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5900">如果将此策略设置为“已禁用”，或者未配置此策略，则在迁移到 Microsoft Edge 版本 83 或更高版本后，不会删除用户浏览数据。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5901">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5901">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5902">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5902">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5903">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5903">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5904">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5904">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5905">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5905">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5906">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5906">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5907">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5907">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5908">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5908">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5909">GP 唯一名称: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5909">GP 唯一名称: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5910">GP 名称: 迁移时删除旧浏览器数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5910">GP 名称: 迁移时删除旧浏览器数据</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5911">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5911">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5912">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5912">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5913">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5913">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5914">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5914">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5915">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5915">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5916">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5916">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5917">值名称: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5917">值名称: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5918">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5918">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5919">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5919">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5920">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5920">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5921">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5921">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5922">控制可以使用开发人员工具的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5922">控制可以使用开发人员工具的位置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5923">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5923">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5924">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5924">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5925">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5925">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5926">控制可以使用开发人员工具的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5926">控制可以使用开发人员工具的位置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5927">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions”(默认值)，则用户通常可以访问开发人员工具和 JavaScript 控制台，但不能在按企业策略安装的扩展环境中访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5927">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions”(默认值)，则用户通常可以访问开发人员工具和 JavaScript 控制台，但不能在按企业策略安装的扩展环境中访问。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5928">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsAllowed”，则用户可以在所有环境中访问开发人员工具和 JavaScript 控制台，还能在按企业策略安装的扩展中访问。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5928">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsAllowed”，则用户可以在所有环境中访问开发人员工具和 JavaScript 控制台，还能在按企业策略安装的扩展中访问。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5929">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsDisallowed”，则用户无法访问开发人员工具或检查网站元素。用于打开开发人员工具或 JavaScript 控制台的键盘快捷方式和菜单或上下文菜单条目处于禁用状态。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5929">如果将此策略设置为“DeveloperToolsDisallowed”，则用户无法访问开发人员工具或检查网站元素。用于打开开发人员工具或 JavaScript 控制台的键盘快捷方式和菜单或上下文菜单条目处于禁用状态。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5930">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5930">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5931">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = 在按企业策略安装的扩展上阻止开发人员工具，允许在其他上下文中使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5931">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = 在按企业策略安装的扩展上阻止开发人员工具，允许在其他上下文中使用</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5932">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = 允许使用开发人员工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5932">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = 允许使用开发人员工具</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5933">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = 不允许使用开发人员工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5933">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = 不允许使用开发人员工具</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5934">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5934">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5935">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5935">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5936">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5936">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5937">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5937">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5938">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5938">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5939">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5939">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5940">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5940">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5941">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5941">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5942">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5942">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5943">GP 唯一名称: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5943">GP 唯一名称: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5944">GP 名称: 控制可以使用开发人员工具的位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5944">GP 名称: 控制可以使用开发人员工具的位置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5945">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5945">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5946">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5946">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5947">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5947">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5948">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5948">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5949">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5949">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5950">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5950">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5951">值名称: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5951">值名称: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5952">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5952">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5953">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5953">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5954">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5954">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5955">首选项密钥名称: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5955">首选项密钥名称: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5956">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5956">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5957">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5957">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5958">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5958">DiagnosticData</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5959">发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5959">发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5960">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5960">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5961">由于 Windows 7 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5961">由于 Windows 7 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5962">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5962">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5963">此策略控制向 Microsoft 发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5963">此策略控制向 Microsoft 发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5964">收集必要的诊断数据以确保 Microsoft Edge 安全、最新并按预期运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5964">收集必要的诊断数据以确保 Microsoft Edge 安全、最新并按预期运行。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5965">可选诊断数据包括有关使用浏览器的方式、访问的网站以及为改进产品和服务而向 Microsoft 发送的崩溃报告的数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5965">可选诊断数据包括有关使用浏览器的方式、访问的网站以及为改进产品和服务而向 Microsoft 发送的崩溃报告的数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5966">此策略在 Windows 10 设备上不受支持。若要在 Windows 10 上控制此数据收集，IT 管理员必须使用 Windows 诊断数据组策略。此策略将为“允许遥测”或“允许诊断数据”，具体取决于 Windows 版本。详细了解 Windows 10 诊断数据收集: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5966">此策略在 Windows 10 设备上不受支持。若要在 Windows 10 上控制此数据收集，IT 管理员必须使用 Windows 诊断数据组策略。此策略将为“允许遥测”或“允许诊断数据”，具体取决于 Windows 版本。详细了解 Windows 10 诊断数据收集: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5967">使用以下设置之一来配置此策略:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5967">使用以下设置之一来配置此策略:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5968">“Off”会关闭必需和可选诊断数据收集。不建议使用此选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5968">“Off”会关闭必需和可选诊断数据收集。不建议使用此选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5969">必需数据(1)会发送必需的诊断数据，但会关闭可选诊断数据收集。Microsoft Edge 将发送必需的诊断数据以确保 Microsoft Edge 安全、最新并按预期运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5969">必需数据(1)会发送必需的诊断数据，但会关闭可选诊断数据收集。Microsoft Edge 将发送必需的诊断数据以确保 Microsoft Edge 安全、最新并按预期运行。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5970">“可选数据”将发送可选诊断数据，其中包括有关浏览器使用情况、访问的网站以及为改进产品和服务而向 Microsoft 发送的崩溃报告的数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5970">“可选数据”将发送可选诊断数据，其中包括有关浏览器使用情况、访问的网站以及为改进产品和服务而向 Microsoft 发送的崩溃报告的数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5971">在 Windows 7/macOS 上，此策略控制向 Microsoft 发送必需和可选数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5971">在 Windows 7/macOS 上，此策略控制向 Microsoft 发送必需和可选数据。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5972">如果你未配置此策略或禁用它，则 Microsoft Edge 将默认为用户的首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5972">如果你未配置此策略或禁用它，则 Microsoft Edge 将默认为用户的首选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5973">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5973">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5974">Off (0) = 关闭(不推荐)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5974">Off (0) = 关闭(不推荐)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5975">RequiredData (1) = 必需数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5975">RequiredData (1) = 必需数据</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5976">OptionalData (2) = 可选数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5976">OptionalData (2) = 可选数据</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-5977">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5977">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5978">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5978">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5979">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5979">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5980">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5980">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5981">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5981">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5982">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5982">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5983">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5983">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5984">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5984">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5985">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5985">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5986">GP 唯一名称: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5986">GP 唯一名称: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5987">GP 名称: 发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5987">GP 名称: 发送有关浏览器使用情况的必需和可选诊断数据</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5988">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5988">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5989">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5989">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5990">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5990">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5991">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5991">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5992">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5992">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5993">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5993">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5994">值名称: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5994">值名称: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5995">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5995">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5996">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5996">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5997">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5997">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5998">首选项密钥名称: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5998">首选项密钥名称: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-5999">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-5999">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6000">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6000">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6001">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6001">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6002">允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6002">允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6003">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6003">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6004">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6004">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6005">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6005">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6006">允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。DirectInvoke 协议允许网站使用用户的计算机或设备上的特定文件处理程序请求浏览器打开特定 URL 中的文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6006">允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。DirectInvoke 协议允许网站使用用户的计算机或设备上的特定文件处理程序请求浏览器打开特定 URL 中的文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6007">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6007">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6008">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。文件将被保存到文件系统中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6008">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件。文件将被保存到文件系统中。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6009">注意：禁用 DirectInvoke 可能会阻止某些 Microsoft Office SharePoint Online 功能按预期方式工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6009">注意：禁用 DirectInvoke 可能会阻止某些 Microsoft Office SharePoint Online 功能按预期方式工作。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6010">有关 DirectInvoke 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6010">有关 DirectInvoke 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 和 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6011">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6011">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6012">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6012">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6013">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6013">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6014">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6014">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6015">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6015">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6016">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6016">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6017">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6017">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6018">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6018">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6019">GP 唯一名称: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6019">GP 唯一名称: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6020">GP 名称: 允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6020">GP 名称: 允许用户使用 DirectInvoke 协议打开文件</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6021">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6021">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6022">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6022">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6023">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6023">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6024">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6024">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6025">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6025">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6026">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6026">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6027">值名称: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6027">值名称: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6028">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6028">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6029">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6029">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6030">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6030">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6031">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6031">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6032">禁用对 3D 图形 API 的支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6032">禁用对 3D 图形 API 的支持</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6033">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6033">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6034">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6034">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6035">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6035">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6036">防止网页访问图形处理单元(GPU)。具体而言，网页不能访问 WebGL API 并且插件不能使用 Pepper 3D API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6036">防止网页访问图形处理单元(GPU)。具体而言，网页不能访问 WebGL API 并且插件不能使用 Pepper 3D API。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6037">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则可能会允许网页使用 WebGL API 并允许插件使用 Pepper 3D API。默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 可能仍需要传递命令行参数才能使用这些 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6037">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则可能会允许网页使用 WebGL API 并允许插件使用 Pepper 3D API。默认情况下，Microsoft Edge 可能仍需要传递命令行参数才能使用这些 API。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6038">如果 [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) 策略设置为 false，则 [Disable3DAPIs](#disable3dapis) 策略的设置会被忽略 - 这等同于将 [Disable3DAPIs](#disable3dapis) 策略设置为 true。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6038">如果 [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) 策略设置为 false，则 [Disable3DAPIs](#disable3dapis) 策略的设置会被忽略 - 这等同于将 [Disable3DAPIs](#disable3dapis) 策略设置为 true。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6039">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6039">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6040">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6040">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6041">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6041">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6042">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6042">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6043">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6043">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6044">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6044">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6045">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6045">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6046">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6046">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6047">GP 唯一名称: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6047">GP 唯一名称: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6048">GP 名称: 禁用对 3D 图形 API 的支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6048">GP 名称: 禁用对 3D 图形 API 的支持</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6049">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6049">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6050">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6050">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6051">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6051">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6052">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6052">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6053">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6053">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6054">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6054">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6055">值名称: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6055">值名称: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6056">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6056">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6057">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6057">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6058">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6058">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6059">首选项密钥名称: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6059">首选项密钥名称: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6060">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6060">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6061">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6061">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6062">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6062">DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6063">禁用进行屏幕截图</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6063">禁用进行屏幕截图</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6064">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6064">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6065">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6065">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6066">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6066">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6067">控制用户是否可以截取浏览器页面的屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6067">控制用户是否可以截取浏览器页面的屏幕截图。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6068">如果启用，则用户无法使用键盘快捷方式或扩展 API 截取屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6068">如果启用，则用户无法使用键盘快捷方式或扩展 API 截取屏幕截图。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6069">如果禁用或不配置此策略，则用户可以截取屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6069">如果禁用或不配置此策略，则用户可以截取屏幕截图。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6070">请注意，此策略控制从浏览器本身内部截取的屏幕截图。即使启用此策略，用户或许仍可以在浏览器之外使用某些方法（例如使用操作系统功能或其他应用程序）截取屏幕截图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6070">请注意，此策略控制从浏览器本身内部截取的屏幕截图。即使启用此策略，用户或许仍可以在浏览器之外使用某些方法（例如使用操作系统功能或其他应用程序）截取屏幕截图。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6071">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6071">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6072">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6072">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6073">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6073">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6074">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6074">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6075">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6075">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6076">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6076">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6077">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6077">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6078">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6078">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6079">GP 唯一名称: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6079">GP 唯一名称: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6080">GP 名称: 禁用进行屏幕截图</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6080">GP 名称: 禁用进行屏幕截图</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6081">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6081">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6082">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6082">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6083">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6083">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6084">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6084">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6085">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6085">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6086">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6086">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6087">值名称: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6087">值名称: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6088">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6088">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6089">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6089">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6090">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6090">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6091">首选项密钥名称: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6091">首选项密钥名称: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6092">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6092">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6093">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6093">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6094">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6094">DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6095">设置磁盘缓存目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6095">设置磁盘缓存目录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6096">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6096">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6097">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6097">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6098">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6098">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6099">配置用于存储缓存文件的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6099">配置用于存储缓存文件的目录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6100">如果启用此策略，那么无论用户是否已指定 "--disk-cache-dir" 标志，Microsoft Edge 都将使用提供的目录。为避免数据丢失或其他意外错误，请不要将此策略配置为使用卷的根目录或用于其他用途的目录，因为 Microsoft Edge 会管理其内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6100">如果启用此策略，那么无论用户是否已指定 "--disk-cache-dir" 标志，Microsoft Edge 都将使用提供的目录。为避免数据丢失或其他意外错误，请不要将此策略配置为使用卷的根目录或用于其他用途的目录，因为 Microsoft Edge 会管理其内容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6101">有关在指定目录和路径时可以使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6101">有关在指定目录和路径时可以使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6102">如果你未配置此策略，则使用默认缓存目录，用户可以使用 "--disk-cache-dir" 命令行标志替代该默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6102">如果你未配置此策略，则使用默认缓存目录，用户可以使用 "--disk-cache-dir" 命令行标志替代该默认值。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6103">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6103">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6104">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6104">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6105">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6105">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6106">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6106">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6107">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6107">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6108">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6108">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6109">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6109">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6110">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6110">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6111">GP 唯一名称: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6111">GP 唯一名称: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6112">GP 名称: 设置磁盘缓存目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6112">GP 名称: 设置磁盘缓存目录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6113">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6113">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6114">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6114">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6115">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6115">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6116">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6116">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6117">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6117">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6118">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6118">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6119">值名称: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6119">值名称: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6120">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6120">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6121">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6121">示例值:</span></span>
```
"${user_home}/Edge_cache"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6122">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6122">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6123">首选项密钥名称: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6123">首选项密钥名称: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6124">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6124">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6125">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6125">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6126">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6126">DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6127">设置磁盘缓存大小(字节)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6127">设置磁盘缓存大小(字节)</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6128">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6128">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6129">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6129">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6130">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6130">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6131">配置用于在磁盘上存储文件的缓存的大小(以字节为单位)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6131">配置用于在磁盘上存储文件的缓存的大小(以字节为单位)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6132">如果启用此策略，那么无论用户是否指定了 "--disk-cache-size" 标志，Microsoft Edge 都会使用提供的缓存大小。此策略中指定的值不是严格界限，而是针对缓存系统的建议；低于几兆字节的任何值都太小，将被舍入为合理的最小值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6132">如果启用此策略，那么无论用户是否指定了 "--disk-cache-size" 标志，Microsoft Edge 都会使用提供的缓存大小。此策略中指定的值不是严格界限，而是针对缓存系统的建议；低于几兆字节的任何值都太小，将被舍入为合理的最小值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6133">如果将此策略的值设置为 0，则将使用默认缓存大小，而且用户无法更改它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6133">如果将此策略的值设置为 0，则将使用默认缓存大小，而且用户无法更改它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6134">如果未配置此策略，则将使用默认大小，但用户可以使用 "--disk-cache-size" 标志替代它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6134">如果未配置此策略，则将使用默认大小，但用户可以使用 "--disk-cache-size" 标志替代它。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6135">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6135">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6136">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6136">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6137">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6137">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6138">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6138">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6139">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6139">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6140">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6140">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6141">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6141">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6142">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6142">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6143">GP 唯一名称: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6143">GP 唯一名称: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6144">GP 名称: 设置磁盘缓存大小(字节)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6144">GP 名称: 设置磁盘缓存大小(字节)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6145">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6145">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6146">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6146">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6147">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6147">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6148">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6148">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6149">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6149">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6150">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6150">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6151">值名称: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6151">值名称: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6152">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6152">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6153">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6153">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x06400000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6154">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6154">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6155">首选项密钥名称: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6155">首选项密钥名称: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6156">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6156">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6157">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6157">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6158">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6158">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6159">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6159">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 的模式</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6160">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6160">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6161">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6161">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6162">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6162">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6163">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的模式。请注意，此策略将仅为每个查询设置默认模式。对于特殊类型的查询（例如，请求解析 DNS-over-HTTPS  服务器主机名的请求），可以覆盖此模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6163">控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的模式。请注意，此策略将仅为每个查询设置默认模式。对于特殊类型的查询（例如，请求解析 DNS-over-HTTPS  服务器主机名的请求），可以覆盖此模式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6164">"off" 模式将禁用 DNS-over-HTTPS。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6164">"off" 模式将禁用 DNS-over-HTTPS。</span></span>
