<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6165">如果 DNS-over-HTTPS 服务器可用，则 "automatic" 模式将首先发送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查询，并且可能会回退到因错误而发送不安全的查询。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6165">如果 DNS-over-HTTPS 服务器可用，则 "automatic" 模式将首先发送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查询，并且可能会回退到因错误而发送不安全的查询。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6166">"secure" 模式将仅发送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查询，将无法解决错误。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6166">"secure" 模式将仅发送 DNS-over-HTTPS 查询，将无法解决错误。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6167">如果您未配置此策略，则浏览器可能会将 DNS-over-HTTPS 请求发送到与用户配置的系统解析程序关联的解析程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6167">如果您未配置此策略，则浏览器可能会将 DNS-over-HTTPS 请求发送到与用户配置的系统解析程序关联的解析程序。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6168">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6168">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6169">off (off) = 禁用 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6169">off (off) = 禁用 DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6170">automatic (automatic) = 启用具有不安全回退功能的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6170">automatic (automatic) = 启用具有不安全回退功能的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6171">secure (secure) = 启用不带不安全回退功能的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6171">secure (secure) = 启用不带不安全回退功能的 DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6172">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6172">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6173">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6173">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6174">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6174">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6175">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6175">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6176">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6176">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6177">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6177">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6178">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6178">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6179">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6179">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6180">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6180">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6181">GP 唯一名称: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6181">GP 唯一名称: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6182">GP 名称: 控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6182">GP 名称: 控制 DNS-over-HTTPS 的模式</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6183">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6183">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6184">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6184">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6185">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6185">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6186">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6186">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6187">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6187">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6188">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6188">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6189">值名称: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6189">值名称: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6190">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6190">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6191">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6191">示例值:</span></span>
```
"off"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6192">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6192">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6193">首选项密钥名称: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6193">首选项密钥名称: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6194">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6194">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6195">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6195">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6196">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6196">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6197">指定所需的 IP-HTTPS DNS 解析程序的 URI 模板</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6197">指定所需的 IP-HTTPS DNS 解析程序的 URI 模板</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6198">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6198">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6199">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6199">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6200">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6200">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6201">所需的 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的 URI 模板。若要指定多个 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序，请用空格分隔相应的 URI 模板。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6201">所需的 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序的 URI 模板。若要指定多个 DNS-over-HTTPS 解析程序，请用空格分隔相应的 URI 模板。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6202">如果已将 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 设置为 "secure"，则必须设置此策略并且它不能为空。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6202">如果已将 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 设置为 "secure"，则必须设置此策略并且它不能为空。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6203">如果已将 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 设置为 "automatic" 并且已设置此策略，则将使用指定的 URI 模板。如果未设置此策略，则将使用硬编码映射来尝试将用户当前的 DNS 解析程序升级到由同一提供商运营的 DoH 解析程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6203">如果已将 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 设置为 "automatic" 并且已设置此策略，则将使用指定的 URI 模板。如果未设置此策略，则将使用硬编码映射来尝试将用户当前的 DNS 解析程序升级到由同一提供商运营的 DoH 解析程序。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6204">如果 URI 模板包含 dns 变量，则对解析程序的请求将使用 GET；否则，请求将使用 POST。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6204">如果 URI 模板包含 dns 变量，则对解析程序的请求将使用 GET；否则，请求将使用 POST。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6205">将忽略格式不正确的模板。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6205">将忽略格式不正确的模板。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6206">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6206">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6207">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6207">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6208">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6208">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6209">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6209">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6210">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6210">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6211">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6211">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6212">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6212">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6213">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6213">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6214">GP 唯一名称: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6214">GP 唯一名称: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6215">GP 名称: 指定所需的 IP-HTTPS DNS 解析程序的 URI 模板</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6215">GP 名称: 指定所需的 IP-HTTPS DNS 解析程序的 URI 模板</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6216">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6216">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6217">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6217">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6218">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6218">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6219">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6219">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6220">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6220">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6221">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6221">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6222">值名称: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6222">值名称: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6223">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6223">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6224">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6224">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6225">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6225">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6226">首选项密钥名称: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6226">首选项密钥名称: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6227">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6227">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6228">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6228">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6229">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6229">DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6230">设置下载目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6230">设置下载目录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6231">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6231">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6232">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6232">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6233">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6233">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6234">配置下载文件时要使用的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6234">配置下载文件时要使用的目录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6235">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用提供的目录，无论用户是已指定目录还是选择每次都提示提供下载位置。有关可以使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6235">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将使用提供的目录，无论用户是已指定目录还是选择每次都提示提供下载位置。有关可以使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6236">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则使用默认下载目录，但用户可以更改它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6236">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则使用默认下载目录，但用户可以更改它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6237">如果设置了无效路径，Microsoft Edge 将默认使用用户的默认下载目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6237">如果设置了无效路径，Microsoft Edge 将默认使用用户的默认下载目录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6238">如果路径指定的文件夹不存在，则下载将触发提示，询问用户他们想要保存下载的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6238">如果路径指定的文件夹不存在，则下载将触发提示，询问用户他们想要保存下载的位置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6239">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6239">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6240">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6240">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6241">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6241">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6242">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6242">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6243">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6243">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6244">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6244">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6245">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6245">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6246">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6246">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6247">GP 唯一名称: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6247">GP 唯一名称: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6248">GP 名称: 设置下载目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6248">GP 名称: 设置下载目录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6249">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6249">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6250">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6250">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6251">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6251">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6252">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6252">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6253">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6253">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6254">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6254">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6255">值名称: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6255">值名称: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6256">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6256">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6257">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6257">示例值:</span></span>
```
"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6258">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6258">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6259">首选项密钥名称: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6259">首选项密钥名称: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6260">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6260">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6261">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6261">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6262">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6262">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6263">允许使用下载限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6263">允许使用下载限制</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6264">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6264">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6265">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6265">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6266">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6266">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6267">配置 Microsoft Edge 完全阻止的下载类型，不让用户覆盖安全决策。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6267">配置 Microsoft Edge 完全阻止的下载类型，不让用户覆盖安全决策。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6268">设置“BlockDangerousDownloads”可以允许所有下载，但带有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告的下载除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6268">设置“BlockDangerousDownloads”可以允许所有下载，但带有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告的下载除外。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6269">设置“BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads”可以允许所有下载，但带有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 潜在危险或不需要的下载警告的下载除外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6269">设置“BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads”可以允许所有下载，但带有 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 潜在危险或不需要的下载警告的下载除外。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6270">设置“BlockAllDownloads”可以阻止所有下载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6270">设置“BlockAllDownloads”可以阻止所有下载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6271">如果未配置此策略或者设置“DefaultDownloadSecurity”选项，则下载将根据 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的分析结果受到普通安全限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6271">如果未配置此策略或者设置“DefaultDownloadSecurity”选项，则下载将根据 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的分析结果受到普通安全限制。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6272">请注意，这些限制适用于网页内容下载以及“下载链接...”上下文菜单选项。这些限制不适用于保存或下载当前显示的页面，也不适用于打印选项中的“另存为 PDF”选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6272">请注意，这些限制适用于网页内容下载以及“下载链接...”上下文菜单选项。这些限制不适用于保存或下载当前显示的页面，也不适用于打印选项中的“另存为 PDF”选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6273">有关 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6273">有关 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6274">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6274">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6275">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = 无特殊限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6275">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = 无特殊限制</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6276">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = 阻止危险的下载</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6276">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = 阻止危险的下载</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6277">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = 阻止可能导致危险或不需要的下载</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6277">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = 阻止可能导致危险或不需要的下载</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6278">BlockAllDownloads (3) = 阻止所有下载</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6278">BlockAllDownloads (3) = 阻止所有下载</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6279">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6279">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6280">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6280">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6281">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6281">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6282">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6282">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6283">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6283">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6284">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6284">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6285">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6285">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6286">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6286">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6287">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6287">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6288">GP 唯一名称: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6288">GP 唯一名称: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6289">GP 名称: 允许使用下载限制</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6289">GP 名称: 允许使用下载限制</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6290">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6290">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6291">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6291">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6292">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6292">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6293">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6293">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6294">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6294">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6295">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6295">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6296">值名称: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6296">值名称: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6297">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6297">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6298">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6298">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6299">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6299">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6300">首选项密钥名称: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6300">首选项密钥名称: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6301">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6301">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6302">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6302">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6303">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6303">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6304">启用集锦功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6304">启用集锦功能</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6305">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6305">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6306">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6306">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6307">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6307">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6308">使你能够支持用户访问集锦功能，利用此功能，他们可以通过 Office 集成更高效地收集、组织、共享和导出内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6308">使你能够支持用户访问集锦功能，利用此功能，他们可以通过 Office 集成更高效地收集、组织、共享和导出内容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6309">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中访问和使集锦功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6309">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中访问和使集锦功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6310">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法在 Microsoft Edge 中访问和使集锦。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6310">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法在 Microsoft Edge 中访问和使集锦。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6311">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6311">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6312">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6312">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6313">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6313">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6314">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6314">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6315">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6315">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6316">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6316">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6317">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6317">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6318">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6318">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6319">GP 唯一名称: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6319">GP 唯一名称: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6320">GP 名称: 启用集锦功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6320">GP 名称: 启用集锦功能</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6321">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6321">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6322">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6322">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6323">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6323">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6324">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6324">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6325">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6325">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6326">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6326">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6327">值名称: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6327">值名称: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6328">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6328">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6329">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6329">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6330">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6330">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6331">首选项密钥名称: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6331">首选项密钥名称: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6332">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6332">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6333">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6333">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6334">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6334">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6335">允许用户编辑收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6335">允许用户编辑收藏夹</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6336">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6336">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6337">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6337">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6338">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6338">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6339">启用此策略可让用户添加、删除和修改收藏夹。如果未配置此策略，则这是默认行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6339">启用此策略可让用户添加、删除和修改收藏夹。如果未配置此策略，则这是默认行为。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6340">禁用此策略可阻止用户添加、删除或修改收藏夹。他们仍可使用现有收藏夹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6340">禁用此策略可阻止用户添加、删除或修改收藏夹。他们仍可使用现有收藏夹。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6341">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6341">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6342">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6342">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6343">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6343">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6344">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6344">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6345">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6345">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6346">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6346">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6347">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6347">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6348">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6348">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6349">GP 唯一名称: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6349">GP 唯一名称: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6350">GP 名称: 允许用户编辑收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6350">GP 名称: 允许用户编辑收藏夹</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6351">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6351">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6352">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6352">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6353">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6353">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6354">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6354">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6355">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6355">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6356">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6356">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6357">值名称: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6357">值名称: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6358">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6358">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6359">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6359">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6360">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6360">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6361">首选项密钥名称: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6361">首选项密钥名称: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6362">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6362">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6363">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6363">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6364">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6364">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6365">在有限的时间内重新启用弃用的 Web 平台功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6365">在有限的时间内重新启用弃用的 Web 平台功能</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6366">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6366">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6367">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6367">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6368">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6368">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6369">指定要暂时重新启用的弃用 Web 平台功能列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6369">指定要暂时重新启用的弃用 Web 平台功能列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6370">此策略允许你在有限的时间内重新启用弃用的 Web 平台功能。这些功能由字符串标签标识。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6370">此策略允许你在有限的时间内重新启用弃用的 Web 平台功能。这些功能由字符串标签标识。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6371">如果不配置此策略，或者列表为空，或者某个功能不能与某一受支持的字符串标签匹配，则所有弃用的 Web 平台功能将仍是禁用的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6371">如果不配置此策略，或者列表为空，或者某个功能不能与某一受支持的字符串标签匹配，则所有弃用的 Web 平台功能将仍是禁用的。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6372">虽然上述平台支持此策略，但它启用的功能可能并不在所有这些平台上都可用。并非所有弃用的 Web 平台功能都可以重新启用。只有下面明确列出的功能才能重新启用，并且只能在有限的时间内重新启用，具体取决于每项功能。你可以查看 https://bit.ly/blinkintents 了解网站平台功能变化背后的意图。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6372">虽然上述平台支持此策略，但它启用的功能可能并不在所有这些平台上都可用。并非所有弃用的 Web 平台功能都可以重新启用。只有下面明确列出的功能才能重新启用，并且只能在有限的时间内重新启用，具体取决于每项功能。你可以查看 https://bit.ly/blinkintents 了解网站平台功能变化背后的意图。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6373">字符串标记的常规格式为 [DeprecatedFeatureName] _EffectiveUntil [yyyymmdd]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6373">字符串标记的常规格式为 [DeprecatedFeatureName] _EffectiveUntil [yyyymmdd]。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6374">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6374">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6375">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = 启用 ExampleDeprecatedFeature API 直至 2008 年 9 月 2 日</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6375">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = 启用 ExampleDeprecatedFeature API 直至 2008 年 9 月 2 日</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6376">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6376">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6377">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6377">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6378">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6378">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6379">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6379">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6380">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6380">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6381">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6381">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6382">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6382">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6383">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6383">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6384">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6384">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6385">GP 唯一名称: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6385">GP 唯一名称: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6386">GP 名称: 在有限的时间内重新启用弃用的 Web 平台功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6386">GP 名称: 在有限的时间内重新启用弃用的 Web 平台功能</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6387">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6387">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6388">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6388">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6389">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6389">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6390">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6390">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6391">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6391">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6392">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6392">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6393">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6393">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6394">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6394">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6395">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6395">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = "ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6396">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6396">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6397">首选项密钥名称: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6397">首选项密钥名称: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6398">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6398">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6399">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6399">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6400">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6400">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6401">启用从 Microsoft 进行域操作下载 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6401">启用从 Microsoft 进行域操作下载 (过时)</span></span>
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-6402">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 84 之后无法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6402">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 84 之后无法使用。</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6403">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6403">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6404">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 77 上 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6404">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 77 上 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6405">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6405">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6406">该政策无效，因为应避免发生冲突的状态。此策略用于启用/禁用域操作列表的下载，不过它并不会始终实现所需状态。处理下载的试验和配置服务使用自己的策略配置从服务下载的内容。请改用 [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6406">该政策无效，因为应避免发生冲突的状态。此策略用于启用/禁用域操作列表的下载，不过它并不会始终实现所需状态。处理下载的试验和配置服务使用自己的策略配置从服务下载的内容。请改用 [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6407">在 Microsoft Edge 中，域操作表示一系列兼容性功能，这些功能可帮助浏览器在 Web 上正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6407">在 Microsoft Edge 中，域操作表示一系列兼容性功能，这些功能可帮助浏览器在 Web 上正常工作。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6408">出于兼容性原因，Microsoft 会保留针对某些域采取的操作的列表。例如，如果某个网站由于 Microsoft Edge 上的新用户代理字符串而中断，则浏览器可能会覆盖该网站上的用户代理字符串。在 Microsoft 尝试与站点所有者一起解决问题时，所有这些操作都是临时性操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6408">出于兼容性原因，Microsoft 会保留针对某些域采取的操作的列表。例如，如果某个网站由于 Microsoft Edge 上的新用户代理字符串而中断，则浏览器可能会覆盖该网站上的用户代理字符串。在 Microsoft 尝试与站点所有者一起解决问题时，所有这些操作都是临时性操作。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6409">当浏览器启动后，浏览器会定期与包含最新待执行兼容性操作列表的试验和配置服务联系。此列表在第一次被检索后保存在本地，以便后续请求仅在服务器的副本发生更改时才会更新列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6409">当浏览器启动后，浏览器会定期与包含最新待执行兼容性操作列表的试验和配置服务联系。此列表在第一次被检索后保存在本地，以便后续请求仅在服务器的副本发生更改时才会更新列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6410">如果启用此策略，将继续通过试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6410">如果启用此策略，将继续通过试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6411">如果禁用此策略，则不再通过试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6411">如果禁用此策略，则不再通过试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6412">如果未配置此策略，则将继续通过试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6412">如果未配置此策略，则将继续通过试验和配置服务下载域操作列表。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6413">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6413">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6414">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6414">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6415">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6415">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6416">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6416">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6417">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6417">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6418">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6418">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6419">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6419">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6420">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6420">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6421">GP 唯一名称: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6421">GP 唯一名称: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6422">GP 名称: 启用从 Microsoft 进行域操作下载 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6422">GP 名称: 启用从 Microsoft 进行域操作下载 (过时)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6423">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6423">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6424">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6424">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6425">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6425">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6426">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6426">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6427">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6427">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6428">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6428">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6429">值名称: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6429">值名称: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6430">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6430">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6431">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6431">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6432">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6432">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6433">首选项密钥名称: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6433">首选项密钥名称: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6434">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6434">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6435">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6435">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6436">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6436">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6437">启用联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6437">启用联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6438">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6438">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6439">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6439">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6440">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6440">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6441">联机吊销检查并不具备显著的安全优势，并且默认情况下将其禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6441">联机吊销检查并不具备显著的安全优势，并且默认情况下将其禁用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6442">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将执行软失败的联机 OCSP/CRL 检查。“软失败”是指如果无法访问吊销服务器，则该证书将被视为有效。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6442">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将执行软失败的联机 OCSP/CRL 检查。“软失败”是指如果无法访问吊销服务器，则该证书将被视为有效。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6443">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 不会执行联机吊销检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6443">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 不会执行联机吊销检查。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6444">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6444">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6445">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6445">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6446">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6446">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6447">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6447">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6452">GP 唯一名称: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6452">GP 唯一名称: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6453">GP 名称: 启用联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6453">GP 名称: 启用联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6454">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6454">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6455">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6455">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6456">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6456">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6458">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6458">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6459">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6459">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6460">值名称: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6460">值名称: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6461">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6461">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6462">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6462">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6464">首选项密钥名称: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6464">首选项密钥名称: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6466">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6466">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6467">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6467">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6468">由本地信任锚颁发时，允许使用 SHA-1 签名的证书 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6468">由本地信任锚颁发时，允许使用 SHA-1 签名的证书 (已弃用)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-6469">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6469">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6470">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6470">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6471">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6471">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6472">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6472">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6473">启用此设置后，只要证书链接到本地安装的根证书且有效，则 Microsoft Edge 允许受 SHA-1 签名证书保护的连接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6473">启用此设置后，只要证书链接到本地安装的根证书且有效，则 Microsoft Edge 允许受 SHA-1 签名证书保护的连接。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6474">请注意，此策略取决于允许 SHA-1 签名的操作系统(OS)证书验证堆栈。如果操作系统更新更改了处理 SHA-1 证书的操作系统，则此策略可能不再有效。此外，此策略旨在用作临时解决方法，让企业有更多时间迁离 SHA-1。我们将在 2021 年年中发布的 Microsoft Edge 92 中删除此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6474">请注意，此策略取决于允许 SHA-1 签名的操作系统(OS)证书验证堆栈。如果操作系统更新更改了处理 SHA-1 证书的操作系统，则此策略可能不再有效。此外，此策略旨在用作临时解决方法，让企业有更多时间迁离 SHA-1。我们将在 2021 年年中发布的 Microsoft Edge 92 中删除此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6475">如果你未设置此策略或将其设置为 false，或者将 SHA-1 证书链接到了公开信任的根证书，则 Microsoft Edge 将不允许使用 SHA-1 签名的证书。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6475">如果你未设置此策略或将其设置为 false，或者将 SHA-1 证书链接到了公开信任的根证书，则 Microsoft Edge 将不允许使用 SHA-1 签名的证书。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6476">此策略仅在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6476">此策略仅在已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例上可用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6477">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6477">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6478">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6478">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6479">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6479">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6480">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6480">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6481">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6481">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6482">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6482">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6483">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6483">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6484">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6484">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6485">GP 唯一名称: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6485">GP 唯一名称: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6486">GP 名称: 由本地信任锚颁发时，允许使用 SHA-1 签名的证书 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6486">GP 名称: 由本地信任锚颁发时，允许使用 SHA-1 签名的证书 (已弃用)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6487">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6487">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6488">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6488">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6489">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6489">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6490">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6490">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6491">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6491">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6492">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6492">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6493">值名称: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6493">值名称: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6494">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6494">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6495">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6495">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6496">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6496">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6497">首选项密钥名称: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6497">首选项密钥名称: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6498">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6498">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6499">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6499">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6500">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6500">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6501">允许托管扩展使用企业硬件平台 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6501">允许托管扩展使用企业硬件平台 API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6502">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6502">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6503">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6503">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6504">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6504">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6505">如果将此策略设置为“已启用”，则允许通过企业策略安装的扩展使用企业硬件平台 API。 如果此策略设置为“已禁用”，或者未设置此策略，则不允许扩展使用企业硬件平台 API。 此策略也适用于组件扩展。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6505">如果将此策略设置为“已启用”，则允许通过企业策略安装的扩展使用企业硬件平台 API。 如果此策略设置为“已禁用”，或者未设置此策略，则不允许扩展使用企业硬件平台 API。 此策略也适用于组件扩展。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6506">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6506">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6507">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6507">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6508">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6508">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6509">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6509">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6510">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6510">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6511">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6511">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6512">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6512">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6513">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6513">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6514">GP 唯一名称: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6514">GP 唯一名称: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6515">GP 名称: 允许托管扩展使用企业硬件平台 API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6515">GP 名称: 允许托管扩展使用企业硬件平台 API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6516">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6516">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6517">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6517">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6518">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6518">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6519">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6519">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6520">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6520">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6521">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6521">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6522">值名称: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6522">值名称: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6523">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6523">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6524">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6524">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6525">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6525">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6526">首选项密钥名称: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6526">首选项密钥名称: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6527">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6527">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6528">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6528">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6529">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6529">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6530">允许访问 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6530">允许访问 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6531">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6531">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6532">在 Windows 自 86 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6532">在 Windows 自 86 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6533">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6533">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6534">允许你设置用户是否可以使用 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6534">允许你设置用户是否可以使用 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6535">如果启用此策略，则用户可以在 edge://compat 页面上看到 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 导航按钮，导航至该工具并使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6535">如果启用此策略，则用户可以在 edge://compat 页面上看到 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 导航按钮，导航至该工具并使用它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6536">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户将看不到 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 导航按钮，也将无法使用它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6536">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户将看不到 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 导航按钮，也将无法使用它。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6537">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6537">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6538">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6538">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6539">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6539">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6540">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6540">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6541">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6541">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6542">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6542">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6543">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6543">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6544">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6544">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6545">GP 唯一名称: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6545">GP 唯一名称: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6546">GP 名称: 允许访问 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6546">GP 名称: 允许访问 Enterprise Mode Site List Manager 工具</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6547">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6547">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6548">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6548">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6549">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6549">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6550">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6550">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6551">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6551">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6552">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6552">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6556">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6556">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6557">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6557">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6558">对域上的指定文件类型禁用基于下载文件类型扩展名的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6558">对域上的指定文件类型禁用基于下载文件类型扩展名的警告</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6559">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6559">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6560">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6560">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6561">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6561">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6562">你可以启用此策略来创建文件类型扩展名的字典，其相应的域列表将免于基于文件类型扩展名的下载警告。这使企业管理员可以阻止与列出的域关联的文件的基于文件扩展名的下载警告。例如，如果“jnlp”扩展名与“website1.com”关联，则用户从“website1.com”下载“jnlp”文件时不会看到警告，但从“website2.com”下载“jnlp”文件时会看到下载警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6562">你可以启用此策略来创建文件类型扩展名的字典，其相应的域列表将免于基于文件类型扩展名的下载警告。这使企业管理员可以阻止与列出的域关联的文件的基于文件扩展名的下载警告。例如，如果“jnlp”扩展名与“website1.com”关联，则用户从“website1.com”下载“jnlp”文件时不会看到警告，但从“website2.com”下载“jnlp”文件时会看到下载警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6563">具有为此策略标识的域指定的文件类型扩展名的文件仍将受到基于非文件类型扩展名的安全警告，例如混合内容下载警告和 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6563">具有为此策略标识的域指定的文件类型扩展名的文件仍将受到基于非文件类型扩展名的安全警告，例如混合内容下载警告和 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6564">如果你禁用或未配置此策略，则触发基于扩展名的下载警告的文件类型将向用户显示警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6564">如果你禁用或未配置此策略，则触发基于扩展名的下载警告的文件类型将向用户显示警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6565">如果启用此策略：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6565">如果启用此策略：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6566">URL 模式应根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6566">URL 模式应根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置格式。</span></span>
* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6567">输入的文件扩展名必须使用小写 ASCII。 列出文件类型扩展名时，不应包括前导分隔符，因此应使用列表“jnlp”代替“.jnlp”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6567">输入的文件扩展名必须使用小写 ASCII。 列出文件类型扩展名时，不应包括前导分隔符，因此应使用列表“jnlp”代替“.jnlp”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6568">示例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6568">示例：</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6569">以下示例值将防止 \*.contoso.com 域在 swf、exe 和 jnlp扩展名上出现基于文件类型扩展名的下载警告。 它将在其他任何域上为用户显示 exe 和 jnlp 文件基于文件扩展名的下载警告，而不显示 swf 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6569">以下示例值将防止 \*.contoso.com 域在 swf、exe 和 jnlp扩展名上出现基于文件类型扩展名的下载警告。 它将在其他任何域上为用户显示 exe 和 jnlp 文件基于文件扩展名的下载警告，而不显示 swf 文件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6570">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6570">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6571">请注意，尽管前面的示例显示了针对所有域的“swf”文件的基于文件类型扩展名的下载警告的抑制，但是出于安全考虑，建议不要针对所有危险文件类型扩展名对所有域应用此类警告的抑制。 在示例中仅显示了这样做的能力。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6571">请注意，尽管前面的示例显示了针对所有域的“swf”文件的基于文件类型扩展名的下载警告的抑制，但是出于安全考虑，建议不要针对所有危险文件类型扩展名对所有域应用此类警告的抑制。 在示例中仅显示了这样做的能力。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6572">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6572">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6573">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6573">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6574">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6574">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6575">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6575">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6576">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6576">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6577">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6577">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6578">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6578">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6579">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6579">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6580">GP 唯一名称: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6580">GP 唯一名称: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6581">GP 名称: 对域上的指定文件类型禁用基于下载文件类型扩展名的警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6581">GP 名称: 对域上的指定文件类型禁用基于下载文件类型扩展名的警告</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6582">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6582">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6583">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6583">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6584">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6584">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6585">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6585">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6586">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6586">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6587">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6587">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6588">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6588">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6589">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6589">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6590">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6590">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\1 = {"domains": ["https://contoso.com", "contoso2.com"], "file_extension": "jnlp"}
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\2 = {"domains": ["*"], "file_extension": "swf"}

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6591">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6591">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6592">首选项密钥名称: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6592">首选项密钥名称: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6593">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6593">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com'], 'file_extension': 'jnlp'}</string>
  <string>{'domains': ['*'], 'file_extension': 'swf'}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6594">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6594">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6595">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6595">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6596">控制与实验和配置服务的通信</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6596">控制与实验和配置服务的通信</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6597">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6597">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6598">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6598">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6599">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6599">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6600">Microsoft Edge 使用试验和配置服务来部署试验和配置有效负载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6600">Microsoft Edge 使用试验和配置服务来部署试验和配置有效负载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6601">试验有效负载由一系列 Microsoft 为测试和反馈而启用的处于早期开发阶段的功能组成。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6601">试验有效负载由一系列 Microsoft 为测试和反馈而启用的处于早期开发阶段的功能组成。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6602">配置有效负载由一系列 Microsoft 希望部署到 Microsoft Edge 以优化用户体验的设置组成。例如，配置有效负载可以指定 Microsoft Edge 将请求发送到试验和配置服务以检索最新有效负载的频率。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6602">配置有效负载由一系列 Microsoft 希望部署到 Microsoft Edge 以优化用户体验的设置组成。例如，配置有效负载可以指定 Microsoft Edge 将请求发送到试验和配置服务以检索最新有效负载的频率。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6603">此外，配置有效负载还可以包含由于兼容性原因而要对特定域执行的操作的列表。例如，如果某个网站由于 Microsoft Edge 上的新用户代理字符串而中断，则浏览器可能会覆盖该网站上的用户代理字符串。在 Microsoft 尝试与站点所有者一起解决问题时，所有这些操作都是临时性操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6603">此外，配置有效负载还可以包含由于兼容性原因而要对特定域执行的操作的列表。例如，如果某个网站由于 Microsoft Edge 上的新用户代理字符串而中断，则浏览器可能会覆盖该网站上的用户代理字符串。在 Microsoft 尝试与站点所有者一起解决问题时，所有这些操作都是临时性操作。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6604">如果将此策略设置为“FullMode”，则将从试验和配置服务下载完整有效负载，包括试验有效负载和配置有效负载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6604">如果将此策略设置为“FullMode”，则将从试验和配置服务下载完整有效负载，包括试验有效负载和配置有效负载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6605">如果将此策略设置为“ConfigurationsOnlyMode”，则仅提供配置有效负载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6605">如果将此策略设置为“ConfigurationsOnlyMode”，则仅提供配置有效负载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6606">如果将此策略设置为“RestrictedMode”，则与试验和配置服务的通信将完全停止。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6606">如果将此策略设置为“RestrictedMode”，则与试验和配置服务的通信将完全停止。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6607">如果未配置此策略，则位于稳定通道和测试通道的托管设备上的行为与“ConfigurationsOnlyMode”相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6607">如果未配置此策略，则位于稳定通道和测试通道的托管设备上的行为与“ConfigurationsOnlyMode”相同。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6608">如果未配置此策略，则非托管设备上的行为与“FullMode”相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6608">如果未配置此策略，则非托管设备上的行为与“FullMode”相同。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6609">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6609">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6610">FullMode (2) = 检索配置和试验</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6610">FullMode (2) = 检索配置和试验</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6611">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = 仅检索配置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6611">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = 仅检索配置</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6612">RestrictedMode (0) = 禁止与实验和配置服务通信</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6612">RestrictedMode (0) = 禁止与实验和配置服务通信</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-6613">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6613">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6614">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6614">支持的功能:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6622">GP 唯一名称: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6622">GP 唯一名称: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6626">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6626">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6627">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6627">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6628">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6628">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6629">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6629">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-6630">值名称: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-6630">值名称: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
