  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7125">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7125">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7126">使用硬件加速(如可用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7126">使用硬件加速(如可用)</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7127">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7127">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7128">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7128">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7129">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7129">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7130">指定要使用硬件加速(如果可用)。如果启用或未配置此策略，将启用硬件加速，除非已显式阻止 GPU 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7130">指定要使用硬件加速(如果可用)。如果启用或未配置此策略，将启用硬件加速，除非已显式阻止 GPU 功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7131">如果禁用此策略，将禁用硬件加速。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7131">如果禁用此策略，将禁用硬件加速。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7132">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7132">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7133">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7133">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7134">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7134">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7135">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7135">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7136">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7136">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7137">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7137">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7138">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7138">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7139">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7139">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7140">GP 唯一名称: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7140">GP 唯一名称: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7141">GP 名称: 使用硬件加速(如可用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7141">GP 名称: 使用硬件加速(如可用)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7142">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7142">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7143">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7143">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7144">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7144">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7145">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7145">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7146">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7146">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7147">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7147">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7148">值名称: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7148">值名称: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7149">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7149">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7151">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7151">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7152">首选项密钥名称: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7152">首选项密钥名称: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7155">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7155">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7156">隐藏首次运行体验和初始屏幕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7156">隐藏首次运行体验和初始屏幕</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7157">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7157">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7158">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7158">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7159">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7159">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7160">如果启用此策略，则当用户第一次运行 Microsoft Edge 时，不会向用户显示首次运行体验和初始屏幕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7160">如果启用此策略，则当用户第一次运行 Microsoft Edge 时，不会向用户显示首次运行体验和初始屏幕。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7161">对于首次运行体验中显示的配置选项，浏览器将默认使用以下设置:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7161">对于首次运行体验中显示的配置选项，浏览器将默认使用以下设置:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7162">在新标签页上，源类型将设置为“MSN 资讯”，布局将设置为“灵感”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7162">在新标签页上，源类型将设置为“MSN 资讯”，布局将设置为“灵感”。</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7163">如果 Windows 帐户是 Azure AD 或 MSA 类型，则用户仍将自动登录到 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7163">如果 Windows 帐户是 Azure AD 或 MSA 类型，则用户仍将自动登录到 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7164">默认情况下，不会启用同步，并且会提示用户选择是否要在浏览器启动时进行同步。可以使用 [ForceSync](#forcesync) 或 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略来配置同步和同步同意提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7164">默认情况下，不会启用同步，并且会提示用户选择是否要在浏览器启动时进行同步。可以使用 [ForceSync](#forcesync) 或 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略来配置同步和同步同意提示。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7165">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则会显示首次运行体验和初始屏幕。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7165">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则会显示首次运行体验和初始屏幕。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7166">注意: 也可以使用其他特定策略管理首次运行体验中向用户显示的特定配置选项。可以将 HideFirstRunExperience 策略与这些策略结合使用，以在托管设备上配置特定的浏览器体验。其中一些其他策略包括：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7166">注意: 也可以使用其他特定策略管理首次运行体验中向用户显示的特定配置选项。可以将 HideFirstRunExperience 策略与这些策略结合使用，以在托管设备上配置特定的浏览器体验。其中一些其他策略包括：</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7167">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7167">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7168">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7168">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7169">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7169">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7170">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7170">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7171">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7171">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7172">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7172">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7173">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7173">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7174">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7174">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7175">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7175">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7176">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7176">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7177">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7177">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7178">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7178">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7179">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7179">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7180">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7180">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7181">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7181">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7182">GP 唯一名称: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7182">GP 唯一名称: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7183">GP 名称: 隐藏首次运行体验和初始屏幕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7183">GP 名称: 隐藏首次运行体验和初始屏幕</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7184">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7184">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7185">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7185">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7186">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7186">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7187">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7187">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7188">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7188">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7189">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7189">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7190">值名称: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7190">值名称: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7191">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7191">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7192">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7192">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7193">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7193">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7194">首选项密钥名称: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7194">首选项密钥名称: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7195">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7195">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7196">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7196">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7197">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7197">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7198">允许导入自动填充表单数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7198">允许导入自动填充表单数据</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7199">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7199">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7200">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7200">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7201">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7201">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7202">允许用户将其他浏览器中的自动填充表单数据导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7202">允许用户将其他浏览器中的自动填充表单数据导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7203">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于手动导入自动填充数据的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7203">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于手动导入自动填充数据的选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7204">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入自动填充表单数据，并且用户无法手动导入它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7204">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入自动填充表单数据，并且用户无法手动导入它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7205">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入自动填充数据，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7205">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入自动填充数据，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7206">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入自动填充数据，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**自动填充数据**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7206">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入自动填充数据，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**自动填充数据**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7207">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)浏览器中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7207">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)浏览器中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7208">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7208">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7209">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7209">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7210">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7210">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7211">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7211">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7212">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7212">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7213">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7213">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7214">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7214">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7215">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7215">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7216">GP 唯一名称: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7216">GP 唯一名称: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7217">GP 名称: 允许导入自动填充表单数据</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7217">GP 名称: 允许导入自动填充表单数据</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7218">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7218">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7219">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7219">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7220">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7220">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7221">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7221">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7222">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7222">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7223">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7223">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7224">值名称: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7224">值名称: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7225">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7225">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7226">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7226">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7227">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7227">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7228">首选项密钥名称: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7228">首选项密钥名称: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7229">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7229">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7230">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7230">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7231">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7231">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7232">允许导入浏览器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7232">允许导入浏览器设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7233">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7233">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7234">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7234">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7235">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7235">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7236">允许用户将其他浏览器中的浏览器设置导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7236">允许用户将其他浏览器中的浏览器设置导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7237">如果启用此策略，则**导入浏览器数据**中的**浏览器设置**复选框会自动选中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7237">如果启用此策略，则**导入浏览器数据**中的**浏览器设置**复选框会自动选中。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7238">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入浏览器设置，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7238">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入浏览器设置，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7239">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入浏览器设置，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7239">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入浏览器设置，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7240">你也可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**浏览器设置**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7240">你也可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**浏览器设置**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7241">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7241">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7242">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7242">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7243">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7243">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7244">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7244">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7245">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7245">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7246">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7246">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7247">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7247">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7248">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7248">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7249">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7249">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7250">GP 唯一名称: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7250">GP 唯一名称: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7251">GP 名称: 允许导入浏览器设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7251">GP 名称: 允许导入浏览器设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7252">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7252">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7253">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7253">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7254">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7254">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7255">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7255">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7256">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7256">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7257">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7257">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7258">值名称: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7258">值名称: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7259">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7259">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7260">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7260">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7261">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7261">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7262">首选项密钥名称: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7262">首选项密钥名称: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7263">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7263">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7264">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7264">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7265">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7265">ImportCookies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7266">允许导入 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7266">允许导入 Cookie</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7267">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7267">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7268">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7268">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7269">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7269">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7270">允许用户将其他浏览器中的 Cookie 导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7270">允许用户将其他浏览器中的 Cookie 导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7271">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7271">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7272">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7272">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7273">你也可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7273">你也可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7274">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome 进行的导入(在 Windows 7、8、10 和 macOS 上)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7274">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome 进行的导入(在 Windows 7、8、10 和 macOS 上)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7275">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7275">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7276">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7276">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7277">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7277">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7278">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7278">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7279">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7279">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7280">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7280">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7281">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7281">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7282">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7282">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7283">GP 唯一名称: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7283">GP 唯一名称: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7284">GP 名称: 允许导入 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7284">GP 名称: 允许导入 Cookie</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7285">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7285">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7286">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7286">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7287">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7287">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7288">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7288">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7289">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7289">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7290">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7290">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7291">值名称: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7291">值名称: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7292">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7292">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7293">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7293">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7294">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7294">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7295">首选项密钥名称: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7295">首选项密钥名称: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7296">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7296">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7297">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7297">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7298">ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7298">ImportExtensions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7299">允许导入扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7299">允许导入扩展</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7300">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7300">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7301">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7301">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7302">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7302">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7303">允许用户将其他浏览器中的扩展导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7303">允许用户将其他浏览器中的扩展导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7304">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**扩展**复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7304">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**扩展**复选框。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7305">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入扩展，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7305">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入扩展，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7306">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入扩展，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7306">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入扩展，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7307">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入扩展，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**收藏夹**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7307">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入扩展，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**收藏夹**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7308">**注意**: 此策略目前仅支持从 Google Chrome 进行导入(在 Windows 7、8、10 和 macOS 上)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7308">**注意**: 此策略目前仅支持从 Google Chrome 进行导入(在 Windows 7、8、10 和 macOS 上)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7309">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7309">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7310">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7310">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7311">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7311">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7312">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7312">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7313">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7313">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7314">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7314">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7315">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7315">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7316">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7316">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7317">GP 唯一名称: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7317">GP 唯一名称: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7318">GP 名称: 允许导入扩展</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7318">GP 名称: 允许导入扩展</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7319">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7319">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7320">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7320">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7321">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7321">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7322">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7322">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7323">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7323">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7324">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7324">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7325">值名称: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7325">值名称: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7326">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7326">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7327">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7327">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7328">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7328">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7329">首选项密钥名称: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7329">首选项密钥名称: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7330">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7330">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7331">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7331">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7332">ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7332">ImportFavorites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7333">允许导入收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7333">允许导入收藏夹</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7334">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7334">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7335">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7335">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7336">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7336">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7337">允许用户将其他浏览器中的收藏夹导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7337">允许用户将其他浏览器中的收藏夹导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7338">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**收藏夹**复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7338">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**收藏夹**复选框。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7339">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入收藏夹，并且用户无法手动导入收藏夹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7339">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入收藏夹，并且用户无法手动导入收藏夹。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7340">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入收藏夹，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7340">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入收藏夹，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7341">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入收藏夹，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**收藏夹**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7341">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入收藏夹，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**收藏夹**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7342">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)、Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Apple Safari (macOS) 浏览器中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7342">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)、Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Apple Safari (macOS) 浏览器中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7343">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7343">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7344">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7344">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7345">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7345">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7346">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7346">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7347">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7347">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7348">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7348">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7349">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7349">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7350">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7350">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7351">GP 唯一名称: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7351">GP 唯一名称: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7352">GP 名称: 允许导入收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7352">GP 名称: 允许导入收藏夹</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7353">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7353">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7354">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7354">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7355">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7355">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7356">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7356">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7357">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7357">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7358">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7358">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7359">值名称: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7359">值名称: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7360">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7360">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7361">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7361">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7362">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7362">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7363">首选项密钥名称: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7363">首选项密钥名称: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7364">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7364">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7365">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7365">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7366">ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7366">ImportHistory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7367">允许导入浏览历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7367">允许导入浏览历史记录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7368">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7368">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7369">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7369">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7370">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7370">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7371">允许用户将其他浏览器中的浏览历史记录导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7371">允许用户将其他浏览器中的浏览历史记录导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7372">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**浏览历史记录**复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7372">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**浏览历史记录**复选框。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7373">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入浏览历史记录数据，并且用户无法手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7373">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入浏览历史记录数据，并且用户无法手动导入此数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7374">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入浏览历史记录数据，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7374">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入浏览历史记录数据，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7375">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入浏览历史记录，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**历史记录**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7375">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入浏览历史记录，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**历史记录**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7376">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)、Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Apple Safari (macOS) 浏览器中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7376">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)、Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Apple Safari (macOS) 浏览器中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7377">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7377">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7378">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7378">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7379">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7379">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7380">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7380">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7381">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7381">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7382">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7382">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7383">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7383">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7384">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7384">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7385">GP 唯一名称: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7385">GP 唯一名称: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7386">GP 名称: 允许导入浏览历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7386">GP 名称: 允许导入浏览历史记录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7387">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7387">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7388">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7388">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7389">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7389">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7390">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7390">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7391">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7391">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7392">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7392">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7393">值名称: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7393">值名称: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7394">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7394">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7395">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7395">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7396">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7396">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7397">首选项密钥名称: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7397">首选项密钥名称: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7398">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7398">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7399">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7399">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7400">ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7400">ImportHomepage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7401">允许导入主页设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7401">允许导入主页设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7402">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7402">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7403">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7403">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7404">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7404">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7405">允许用户将其他浏览器中的主页设置导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7405">允许用户将其他浏览器中的主页设置导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7406">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于手动导入主页设置的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7406">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于手动导入主页设置的选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7407">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入主页设置，并且用户无法手动导入它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7407">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入主页设置，并且用户无法手动导入它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7408">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入主页设置，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7408">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入主页设置，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7409">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入主页设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**主页**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7409">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入主页设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**主页**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7410">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从(Windows 7、8 和 10 上) Internet Explorer 中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7410">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从(Windows 7、8 和 10 上) Internet Explorer 中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7411">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7411">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7412">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7412">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7413">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7413">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7414">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7414">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7415">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7415">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7416">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7416">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7417">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7417">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7418">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7418">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7419">GP 唯一名称: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7419">GP 唯一名称: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7420">GP 名称: 允许导入主页设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7420">GP 名称: 允许导入主页设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7421">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7421">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7422">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7422">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7423">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7423">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7424">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7424">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7425">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7425">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7426">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7426">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7427">值名称: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7427">值名称: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7428">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7428">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7429">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7429">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7430">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7430">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7431">首选项密钥名称: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7431">首选项密钥名称: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7432">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7432">示例值:</span></span>

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7433">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7433">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7434">ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7434">ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7435">允许导入打开的标签页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7435">允许导入打开的标签页</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7436">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7436">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7437">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7437">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7438">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7438">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7439">允许用户将其他浏览器中打开和固定的标签页导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7439">允许用户将其他浏览器中打开和固定的标签页导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7440">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**打开的标签页**复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7440">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**打开的标签页**复选框。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7441">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入打开的标签页，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7441">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入打开的标签页，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7442">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入打开的标签页，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7442">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入打开的标签页，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7443">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入打开的标签页，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**打开的标签页**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7443">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入打开的标签页，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**打开的标签页**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7444">**注意**: 此策略目前仅支持从(Windows 7、8、10 和 macOS 上) Google Chrome 中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7444">**注意**: 此策略目前仅支持从(Windows 7、8、10 和 macOS 上) Google Chrome 中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7445">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7445">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7446">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7446">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7447">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7447">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7448">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7448">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7449">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7449">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7450">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7450">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7451">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7451">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7452">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7452">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7453">GP 唯一名称: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7453">GP 唯一名称: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7454">GP 名称: 允许导入打开的标签页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7454">GP 名称: 允许导入打开的标签页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7455">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7455">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7456">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7456">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7457">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7457">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7458">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7458">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7459">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7459">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7460">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7460">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7461">值名称: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7461">值名称: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7462">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7462">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7463">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7463">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7464">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7464">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7465">首选项密钥名称: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7465">首选项密钥名称: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7466">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7466">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7468">ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7468">ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7469">允许导入付款信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7469">允许导入付款信息</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7470">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7470">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7471">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7471">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7472">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7472">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7473">允许用户将其他浏览器中的付款信息导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7473">允许用户将其他浏览器中的付款信息导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7474">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**付款信息**复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7474">如果启用此策略，则会在**导入浏览器数据**对话框中自动选中**付款信息**复选框。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7475">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入付款信息，并且用户无法手动导入它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7475">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入付款信息，并且用户无法手动导入它。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7476">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入付款信息，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7476">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入付款信息，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此信息。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7477">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入付款信息，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**付款信息**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7477">你还可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入付款信息，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**付款信息**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7478">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 、10 和 macOS 上)中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7478">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 、10 和 macOS 上)中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7479">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7479">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7480">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7480">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7481">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7481">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7482">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7482">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7483">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7483">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7484">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7484">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7485">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7485">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7486">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7486">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7487">GP 唯一名称: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7487">GP 唯一名称: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7488">GP 名称: 允许导入付款信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7488">GP 名称: 允许导入付款信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7489">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7489">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7490">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7490">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7491">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7491">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7492">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7492">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7493">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7493">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7494">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7494">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7495">值名称: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7495">值名称: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7496">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7496">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7498">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7498">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7499">首选项密钥名称: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7499">首选项密钥名称: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7500">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7500">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7501">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7501">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7502">ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7502">ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7503">允许导入保存的密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7503">允许导入保存的密码</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7504">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7504">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7505">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7505">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7506">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7506">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7507">允许用户将其他浏览器中保存的密码导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7507">允许用户将其他浏览器中保存的密码导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7508">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于手动导入已保存密码的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7508">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于手动导入已保存密码的选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7509">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入保存的密码，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7509">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入保存的密码，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7510">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入密码，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7510">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入密码，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7511">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入密码，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**密码**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7511">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入密码，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**密码**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7512">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)浏览器中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7512">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)、Google Chrome (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)和 Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)浏览器中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7513">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7513">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7514">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7514">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7515">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7515">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7516">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7516">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7517">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7517">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7518">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7518">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7519">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7519">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7520">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7520">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7521">GP 唯一名称: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7521">GP 唯一名称: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7522">GP 名称: 允许导入保存的密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7522">GP 名称: 允许导入保存的密码</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7523">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7523">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7524">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7524">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7525">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7525">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7526">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7526">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7527">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7527">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7528">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7528">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7529">值名称: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7529">值名称: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7530">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7530">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7531">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7531">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7532">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7532">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7533">首选项密钥名称: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7533">首选项密钥名称: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7534">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7534">示例值:</span></span>

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7535">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7535">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7536">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7536">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7537">允许导入搜索引擎设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7537">允许导入搜索引擎设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7538">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7538">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7539">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7539">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7540">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7540">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7541">允许用户将其他浏览器中的搜索引擎设置导入 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7541">允许用户将其他浏览器中的搜索引擎设置导入 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7542">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于导入搜索引擎设置的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7542">如果启用此策略，则会自动选择用于导入搜索引擎设置的选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7543">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入搜索引擎设置，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7543">如果禁用此策略，则首次运行时不会导入搜索引擎设置，并且用户无法手动导入它们。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7544">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入搜索引擎设置，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7544">如果未配置此策略，则会在首次运行时导入搜索引擎设置，并且用户可以选择是否在以后的浏览会话期间手动导入此数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7545">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入搜索引擎设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**搜索引擎**选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7545">你可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 会在首次运行时导入搜索引擎设置，但用户可以在手动导入期间选择或清除**搜索引擎**选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7546">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)中的导入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7546">**注意**: 此策略目前管理从 Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8 和 10 上)中的导入。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7547">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7547">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7548">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7548">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7549">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7549">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7550">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7550">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7551">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7551">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7552">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7552">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7553">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7553">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7554">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7554">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7555">GP 唯一名称: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7555">GP 唯一名称: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7556">GP 名称: 允许导入搜索引擎设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7556">GP 名称: 允许导入搜索引擎设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7557">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7557">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7558">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7558">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7559">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7559">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7560">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7560">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7561">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7561">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7562">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7562">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7563">值名称: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7563">值名称: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7564">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7564">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7565">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7565">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7566">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7566">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7567">首选项密钥名称: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7567">首选项密钥名称: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7568">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7568">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7569">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7569">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7570">ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7570">ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7571">允许导入快捷方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7571">允许导入快捷方式</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7572">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7572">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7573">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7573">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7574">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7574">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7575">允许用户从另一个浏览器将快捷方式导入到Microsoft Edge 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7575">允许用户从另一个浏览器将快捷方式导入到Microsoft Edge 中。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7576">如果禁用此策略，则不会在首次运行时导入快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7576">如果禁用此策略，则不会在首次运行时导入快捷方式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7577">如果未配置此策略，则在首次运行时会导入快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7577">如果未配置此策略，则在首次运行时会导入快捷方式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7578">也可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时会导入快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7578">也可以将此策略设置为建议。这意味着 Microsoft Edge 在首次运行时会导入快捷方式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7579">**注意**: 此策略当前管理从 Google Chrome 进行的导入(在 Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7579">**注意**: 此策略当前管理从 Google Chrome 进行的导入(在 Windows 7、8 和 10 以及 macOS 上)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7580">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7580">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7581">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7581">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7582">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7582">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7583">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7583">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7584">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7584">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7585">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7585">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7586">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7586">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7587">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7587">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7588">GP 唯一名称: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7588">GP 唯一名称: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7589">GP 名称: 允许导入快捷方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7589">GP 名称: 允许导入快捷方式</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7590">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7590">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7591">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7591">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7592">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7592">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7593">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7593">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7594">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7594">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7595">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7595">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7596">值名称: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7596">值名称: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7597">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7597">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7598">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7598">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7599">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7599">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7600">首选项密钥名称: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7600">首选项密钥名称: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7601">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7601">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7602">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7602">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7603">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7603">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7604">配置 InPrivate 模式可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7604">配置 InPrivate 模式可用性</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7605">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7605">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7606">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7606">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7607">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7607">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7608">指定用户是否可以在 Microsoft Edge 中以 InPrivate 模式打开页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7608">指定用户是否可以在 Microsoft Edge 中以 InPrivate 模式打开页面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7609">如果未配置此策略或将其设置为“Enabled”，则用户可以在 InPrivate 模式下打开页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7609">如果未配置此策略或将其设置为“Enabled”，则用户可以在 InPrivate 模式下打开页面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7610">将此策略设置为“Disabled”可以阻止用户使用 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7610">将此策略设置为“Disabled”可以阻止用户使用 InPrivate 模式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7611">将此策略设置为“Forced”可以始终使用 InPrivate 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7611">将此策略设置为“Forced”可以始终使用 InPrivate 模式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7612">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7612">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7613">Enabled (0) = InPrivate 模式可用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7613">Enabled (0) = InPrivate 模式可用</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7614">Disabled (1) = InPrivate 模式已禁用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7614">Disabled (1) = InPrivate 模式已禁用</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7615">Forced (2) = 强制的 InPrivate 模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7615">Forced (2) = 强制的 InPrivate 模式</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7616">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7616">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7619">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7619">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7620">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7620">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7622">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7622">整数</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7625">GP 唯一名称: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7625">GP 唯一名称: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7626">GP 名称: 配置 InPrivate 模式可用性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7626">GP 名称: 配置 InPrivate 模式可用性</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7627">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7627">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7628">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7628">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7629">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7629">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7630">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7630">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7631">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7631">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
