  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7633">值名称: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7633">值名称: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7637">首选项密钥名称: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7637">首选项密钥名称: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7639">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7639">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7640">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7640">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7641">为不安全的表单启用警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7641">为不安全的表单启用警告</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7642">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7642">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7643">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7643">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7644">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7644">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7645">此策略控制对浏览器中安全(HTTPS)网站内嵌入的不安全表单(通过 HTTP 提交的表单)的处理。 如果启用或未设置此策略，则在提交不安全的表单时将显示完整页面警告。此外，当表单字段处于焦点时，它们旁边将显示一个警告气泡，并且将对这些表单禁用自动填充。 如果禁用此策略，则不会对不安全的表单显示警告，并且自动填充将正常工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7645">此策略控制对浏览器中安全(HTTPS)网站内嵌入的不安全表单(通过 HTTP 提交的表单)的处理。 如果启用或未设置此策略，则在提交不安全的表单时将显示完整页面警告。此外，当表单字段处于焦点时，它们旁边将显示一个警告气泡，并且将对这些表单禁用自动填充。 如果禁用此策略，则不会对不安全的表单显示警告，并且自动填充将正常工作。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7646">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7646">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7647">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7647">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7648">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7648">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7649">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7649">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7650">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7650">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7651">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7651">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7652">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7652">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7653">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7653">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7654">GP 唯一名称: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7654">GP 唯一名称: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7655">GP 名称: 为不安全的表单启用警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7655">GP 名称: 为不安全的表单启用警告</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7656">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7656">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7657">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7657">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7658">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7658">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7659">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7659">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7660">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7660">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7661">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7661">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7662">值名称: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7662">值名称: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7663">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7663">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7664">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7664">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7665">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7665">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7666">首选项密钥名称: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7666">首选项密钥名称: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7667">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7667">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7668">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7668">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7669">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7669">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7670">控制 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7670">控制 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7671">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7671">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7672">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7672">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7673">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7673">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7674">启用后，IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能会导致后台选项卡中的 Javascript 计时器受到严重限制和合并，当页面在后台 5 分钟或更长时间后，计时器每分钟运行不超过一次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7674">启用后，IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能会导致后台选项卡中的 Javascript 计时器受到严重限制和合并，当页面在后台 5 分钟或更长时间后，计时器每分钟运行不超过一次。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7675">这是一个符合 Web 标准的功能，但可能会导致某些网站上的功能中断，最长可延迟一分钟。但是，启用后可显著节省 CPU 和电池开销。有关更多详细信息，请参阅 https://bit.ly/30b1XR4。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7675">这是一个符合 Web 标准的功能，但可能会导致某些网站上的功能中断，最长可延迟一分钟。但是，启用后可显著节省 CPU 和电池开销。有关更多详细信息，请参阅 https://bit.ly/30b1XR4。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7676">如果启用此策略，则将强制启用该功能，用户将无法覆盖此设置。 如果禁用此策略，则将强制禁用该功能。用户将无法覆盖此设置。 如果未配置此策略，则该功能将由其自身的内部逻辑控制。用户可以手动配置此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7676">如果启用此策略，则将强制启用该功能，用户将无法覆盖此设置。 如果禁用此策略，则将强制禁用该功能。用户将无法覆盖此设置。 如果未配置此策略，则该功能将由其自身的内部逻辑控制。用户可以手动配置此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7677">请注意，策略是按呈现器进程应用的，策略设置的最新值将在呈现器进程启动时有效。需要完全重新启动，以确保所有加载的选项卡都收到一致的策略设置。使用此策略的不同值运行进程没有什么害处。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7677">请注意，策略是按呈现器进程应用的，策略设置的最新值将在呈现器进程启动时有效。需要完全重新启动，以确保所有加载的选项卡都收到一致的策略设置。使用此策略的不同值运行进程没有什么害处。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7678">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7678">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7679">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7679">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7680">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7680">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7681">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7681">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7682">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7682">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7683">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7683">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7684">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7684">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7685">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7685">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7686">GP 唯一名称: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7686">GP 唯一名称: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7687">GP 名称: 控制 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7687">GP 名称: 控制 IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 功能</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7688">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7688">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7689">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7689">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7690">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7690">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7691">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7691">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7692">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7692">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7693">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7693">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7694">值名称: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7694">值名称: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7695">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7695">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7696">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7696">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7697">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7697">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7698">首选项密钥名称: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7698">首选项密钥名称: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7699">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7699">示例值:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7700">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7700">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7701">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7701">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7702">为 Internet Explorer 模式配置增强型挂起检测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7702">为 Internet Explorer 模式配置增强型挂起检测</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7703">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7703">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7704">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7704">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7705">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7705">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7706">增强型挂起检测可在 Internet Explorer 模式下检测挂起的网页，这种检测方法比独立 Internet Explorer 使用的方法更精细。检测到挂起的网页时，浏览器将应用缓解措施，防止浏览器的其余部分挂起。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7706">增强型挂起检测可在 Internet Explorer 模式下检测挂起的网页，这种检测方法比独立 Internet Explorer 使用的方法更精细。检测到挂起的网页时，浏览器将应用缓解措施，防止浏览器的其余部分挂起。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7707">通过此设置，可以配置使用增强型挂起检测，以防遇到任何网站的不兼容问题。建议仅在 Internet Explorer 模式下看到“(网站)未响应”之类的通知时，才禁用此策略，而不要在独立 Internet Explorer 中禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7707">通过此设置，可以配置使用增强型挂起检测，以防遇到任何网站的不兼容问题。建议仅在 Internet Explorer 模式下看到“(网站)未响应”之类的通知时，才禁用此策略，而不要在独立 Internet Explorer 中禁用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7708">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7708">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7709">如果将此策略设置为“Enabled”或不对其进行配置，则在 Internet Explorer 模式下运行的网站将使用增强型挂起检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7709">如果将此策略设置为“Enabled”或不对其进行配置，则在 Internet Explorer 模式下运行的网站将使用增强型挂起检测。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7710">如果将此策略设置为“Disabled”，则将禁用增强型挂起检测，因此用户将获得基本 Internet Explorer 挂起检测行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7710">如果将此策略设置为“Disabled”，则将禁用增强型挂起检测，因此用户将获得基本 Internet Explorer 挂起检测行为。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7711">若要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7711">若要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7712">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7712">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7713">Disabled (0) = 已禁用增强型挂起检测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7713">Disabled (0) = 已禁用增强型挂起检测</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7714">Enabled (1) = 已启用增强型挂起检测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7714">Enabled (1) = 已启用增强型挂起检测</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7715">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7715">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7716">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7716">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7717">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7717">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7718">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7718">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7719">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7719">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7720">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7720">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7721">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7721">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7722">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7722">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7723">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7723">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7724">GP 唯一名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7724">GP 唯一名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7725">GP 名称: 为 Internet Explorer 模式配置增强型挂起检测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7725">GP 名称: 为 Internet Explorer 模式配置增强型挂起检测</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7726">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7726">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7727">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7727">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7728">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7728">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7729">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7729">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7730">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7730">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7731">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7731">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7732">值名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7732">值名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7733">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7733">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7734">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7734">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7796">在 Windows 自 81 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7796">在 Windows 自 81 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7797">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7797">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7798">从当前页面上的链接、脚本或表单中启动“页面内”导航。它也可以是上次“页面内”导航尝试的服务器端重定向。反过来，用户可以使用多种浏览器控件来启动独立于当前页面的非“页面内”导航，例如地址栏、“后退”按钮或收藏夹链接。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7798">从当前页面上的链接、脚本或表单中启动“页面内”导航。它也可以是上次“页面内”导航尝试的服务器端重定向。反过来，用户可以使用多种浏览器控件来启动独立于当前页面的非“页面内”导航，例如地址栏、“后退”按钮或收藏夹链接。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7799">通过此设置，你可以指定从以 Internet Explorer 模式加载的页面导航到未配置站点(即未在企业模式站点列表中配置的站点)时是切换回 Microsoft Edge 还是保持 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7799">通过此设置，你可以指定从以 Internet Explorer 模式加载的页面导航到未配置站点(即未在企业模式站点列表中配置的站点)时是切换回 Microsoft Edge 还是保持 Internet Explorer 模式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7800">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7800">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7801">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则只有配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点才会在该模式下打开。任何未配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点都将重定向回 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7801">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则只有配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点才会在该模式下打开。任何未配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点都将重定向回 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7802">如果将此策略设置为“Default”，则只有配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点才会在该模式下打开。任何未配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点都将重定向回 Microsoft Edge。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7802">如果将此策略设置为“Default”，则只有配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点才会在该模式下打开。任何未配置为以 Internet Explorer 模式打开的站点都将重定向回 Microsoft Edge。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7803">如果将此策略设置为“AutomaticNavigationsOnly”，则会获得默认体验，只不过所有到未配置站点的自动导航(如 302 重定向)都将保持 Internet Explorer 模式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7803">如果将此策略设置为“AutomaticNavigationsOnly”，则会获得默认体验，只不过所有到未配置站点的自动导航(如 302 重定向)都将保持 Internet Explorer 模式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7804">如果将此策略设置为“AllInPageNavigations”，则所有从以 IE 模式加载的页面到未配置站点的导航都将保持 Internet Explorer 模式(最不推荐)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7804">如果将此策略设置为“AllInPageNavigations”，则所有从以 IE 模式加载的页面到未配置站点的导航都将保持 Internet Explorer 模式(最不推荐)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7805">要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7805">要了解有关 Internet Explorer 模式的详细信息，请访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7806">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7806">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7807">Default (0) = 默认值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7807">Default (0) = 默认值</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7808">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = 仅在 Internet Explorer 模式下保留自动导航</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7808">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = 仅在 Internet Explorer 模式下保留自动导航</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7809">AllInPageNavigations (2) = 在 Internet Explorer 模式下保留所有“页面内”导航</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7809">AllInPageNavigations (2) = 在 Internet Explorer 模式下保留所有“页面内”导航</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7810">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7810">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7811">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7811">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7812">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7812">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7813">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7813">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7814">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7814">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7815">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7815">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7816">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7816">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7817">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7817">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7818">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7818">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7819">GP 唯一名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7819">GP 唯一名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7820">GP 名称: 指定从 Internet Explorer 模式页面启动时，到未配置站点的“页面内”导航的行为方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7820">GP 名称: 指定从 Internet Explorer 模式页面启动时，到未配置站点的“页面内”导航的行为方式</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7821">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7821">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7822">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7822">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7823">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7823">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7824">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7824">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7825">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7825">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7826">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7826">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7827">值名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7827">值名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7828">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7828">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7829">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7829">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7830">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7830">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7831">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7831">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7832">允许 Internet Explorer 模式测试</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7832">允许 Internet Explorer 模式测试</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7833">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7833">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7834">在 Windows 自 86 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7834">在 Windows 自 86 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7835">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7835">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7836">此策略取代了 ie-mode-test 标志策略。它使用户可以从 UI 菜单选项中打开 IE 模式选项卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7836">此策略取代了 ie-mode-test 标志策略。它使用户可以从 UI 菜单选项中打开 IE 模式选项卡。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7837">此设置与以下各项结合使用 [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 和 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略，其中列表至少包含一个条目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7837">此设置与以下各项结合使用 [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 和 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略，其中列表至少包含一个条目。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7838">如果启用此策略，则用户可以从 UI 选项打开 IE 模式选项卡，然后将当前网站导航到 IE 模式网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7838">如果启用此策略，则用户可以从 UI 选项打开 IE 模式选项卡，然后将当前网站导航到 IE 模式网站。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7839">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法直接在菜单中看到 UI 选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7839">如果禁用此策略，用户将无法直接在菜单中看到 UI 选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7840">如果未配置此策略，则可以手动设置 ie-mode-test 标志。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7840">如果未配置此策略，则可以手动设置 ie-mode-test 标志。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7841">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7841">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7842">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7842">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7843">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7843">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7844">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7844">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7845">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7845">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7846">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7846">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7847">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7847">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7848">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7848">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7849">GP 唯一名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7849">GP 唯一名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7850">GP 名称: 允许 Internet Explorer 模式测试</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7850">GP 名称: 允许 Internet Explorer 模式测试</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7851">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7851">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7852">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7852">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7853">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7853">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7854">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7854">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7855">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7855">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7856">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7856">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7857">值名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7857">值名称: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7858">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7858">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7859">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7859">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7860">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7860">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7861">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7861">IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7862">对特定来源启用站点隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7862">对特定来源启用站点隔离</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7863">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7863">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7864">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7864">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7865">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7865">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7866">指定要在自身进程中隔离运行的来源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7866">指定要在自身进程中隔离运行的来源。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7867">该策略还隔离由子域命名的来源 - 例如，指定 https://contoso.com/ 将导致 https://foo.contoso.com/ 作为 https://contoso.com/ 站点的一部分被隔离。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7867">该策略还隔离由子域命名的来源 - 例如，指定 https://contoso.com/ 将导致 https://foo.contoso.com/ 作为 https://contoso.com/ 站点的一部分被隔离。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7868">如果启用此策略，每个以逗号分隔的列表中指定的来源将在其自身进程中运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7868">如果启用此策略，每个以逗号分隔的列表中指定的来源将在其自身进程中运行。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7869">如果禁用此策略，将同时禁用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 和 [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 功能。用户仍然可以通过命令行标志手动启用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7869">如果禁用此策略，将同时禁用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 和 [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 功能。用户仍然可以通过命令行标志手动启用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7870">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7870">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以更改此设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7871">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7871">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7872">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7872">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7873">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7873">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7874">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7874">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7875">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7875">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7876">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7876">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7877">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7877">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7878">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7878">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7879">GP 唯一名称: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7879">GP 唯一名称: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7880">GP 名称: 对特定来源启用站点隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7880">GP 名称: 对特定来源启用站点隔离</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7881">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7881">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7882">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7882">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7883">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7883">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7884">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7884">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7885">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7885">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7886">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7886">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7887">值名称: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7887">值名称: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7888">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7888">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7889">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7889">示例值:</span></span>
```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7890">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7890">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7891">首选项密钥名称: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7891">首选项密钥名称: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7892">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7892">示例值:</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7893">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7893">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7894">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7894">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7895">允许来自本地提供商的建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7895">允许来自本地提供商的建议</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7896">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7896">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7897">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7897">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7898">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7898">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7899">允许在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏和自动建议列表中的设备上提供建议，如收藏夹和浏览历史记录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7899">允许在 Microsoft Edge 地址栏和自动建议列表中的设备上提供建议，如收藏夹和浏览历史记录。</span></span>

     <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7900">如果启用此策略，将使用来自本地提供商的建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7900">如果启用此策略，将使用来自本地提供商的建议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7901">如果禁用此策略，则从不使用来自本地提供商的建议。本地历史记录和本地收藏夹建议将不会显示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7901">如果禁用此策略，则从不使用来自本地提供商的建议。本地历史记录和本地收藏夹建议将不会显示。</span></span>

     如果未配置此策略，则允许本地提供商提出建议，用户可以使用“设置”切换进行更改。

     请注意，如果已应用禁用此功能的策略，则某些功能可能不可用。例如，如果启用 [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) 策略，浏览历史记录建议将不可用。

     此策略需要浏览器重新启动才能完成应用。

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7902">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7902">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7903">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7903">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7904">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7904">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7905">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7905">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7906">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7906">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7907">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7907">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7908">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7908">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7909">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7909">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7910">GP 唯一名称: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7910">GP 唯一名称: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7911">GP 名称: 允许来自本地提供商的建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7911">GP 名称: 允许来自本地提供商的建议</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7912">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7912">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7913">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7913">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7914">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7914">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7915">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7915">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7916">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7916">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7917">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7917">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7918">值名称: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7918">值名称: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7919">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7919">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7920">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7920">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7921">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7921">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7922">首选项密钥名称: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7922">首选项密钥名称: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7923">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7923">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7924">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7924">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7925">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7925">ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7926">配置收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7926">配置收藏夹</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7927">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7927">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7928">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7928">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7929">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7929">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7930">配置托管收藏夹列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7930">配置托管收藏夹列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7931">此策略会创建收藏夹列表。每个收藏夹都包含 "name"和 "url" 关键值，这些关键值表示收藏夹的名称和目标地址。你可以通过定义不带 "url" 关键值但带有附加 "children" 关键值的收藏夹来配置子文件夹，此 "children" 关键值包含上面定义的收藏夹列表(其中一些可能还是文件夹)。Microsoft Edge 会修改不完整的 URL，就好像它们是通过地址栏提交的一样，例如 "microsoft.com" 会变为 "https://microsoft.com/"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7931">此策略会创建收藏夹列表。每个收藏夹都包含 "name"和 "url" 关键值，这些关键值表示收藏夹的名称和目标地址。你可以通过定义不带 "url" 关键值但带有附加 "children" 关键值的收藏夹来配置子文件夹，此 "children" 关键值包含上面定义的收藏夹列表(其中一些可能还是文件夹)。Microsoft Edge 会修改不完整的 URL，就好像它们是通过地址栏提交的一样，例如 "microsoft.com" 会变为 "https://microsoft.com/"。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7932">这些收藏夹放在用户无法修改的文件夹中(但用户可以选择在收藏夹栏中将其隐藏)。默认情况下，文件夹名称为“托管收藏夹”，但是，通过向收藏夹列表添加一个包含 "toplevel_name" 关键值并且以所需文件夹名称为值的词典，你可以更改此名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7932">这些收藏夹放在用户无法修改的文件夹中(但用户可以选择在收藏夹栏中将其隐藏)。默认情况下，文件夹名称为“托管收藏夹”，但是，通过向收藏夹列表添加一个包含 "toplevel_name" 关键值并且以所需文件夹名称为值的词典，你可以更改此名称。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7933">托管收藏夹未同步到用户帐户，无法通过扩展进行修改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7933">托管收藏夹未同步到用户帐户，无法通过扩展进行修改。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7934">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7934">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7935">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7935">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7936">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7936">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7937">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7937">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7938">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7938">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7939">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7939">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7940">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7940">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7941">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7941">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7942">GP 唯一名称: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7942">GP 唯一名称: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7943">GP 名称: 配置收藏夹</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7943">GP 名称: 配置收藏夹</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7944">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7944">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7945">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7945">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7946">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7946">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7947">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7947">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7948">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7948">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7949">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7949">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7950">值名称: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7950">值名称: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7951">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7951">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7952">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7952">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7953">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7953">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7954">首选项密钥名称: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7954">首选项密钥名称: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7955">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7955">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7956">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7956">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7957">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7957">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7958">管理搜索引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7958">管理搜索引擎</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7959">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7959">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7960">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7960">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7961">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7961">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7962">允许你配置一个可列出最多 10 个搜索引擎的列表，其中一个搜索引擎必须标记为默认搜索引擎。 不需要指定编码。从 Microsoft Edge 80 开始，suggest_url 和 image_search_url 参数是可选参数。从 Microsoft Edge 80 开始，可以使用可选参数 image_search_post_params (包含以逗号分隔的名称/值对)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7962">允许你配置一个可列出最多 10 个搜索引擎的列表，其中一个搜索引擎必须标记为默认搜索引擎。 不需要指定编码。从 Microsoft Edge 80 开始，suggest_url 和 image_search_url 参数是可选参数。从 Microsoft Edge 80 开始，可以使用可选参数 image_search_post_params (包含以逗号分隔的名称/值对)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7963">从 Microsoft Edge 83 开始，你可以使用 allow_search_engine_discovery 可选参数启用搜索引擎发现。此参数必须是列表中的第一项。如果未指定 allow_search_engine_discovery，则默认情况下禁用搜索引擎发现。从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置为推荐策略，以允许搜索提供程序发现。无需添加 allow_search_engine_discovery 可选参数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7963">从 Microsoft Edge 83 开始，你可以使用 allow_search_engine_discovery 可选参数启用搜索引擎发现。此参数必须是列表中的第一项。如果未指定 allow_search_engine_discovery，则默认情况下禁用搜索引擎发现。从 Microsoft Edge 84 开始，你可以将此策略设置为推荐策略，以允许搜索提供程序发现。无需添加 allow_search_engine_discovery 可选参数。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7964">如果启用此策略，用户将无法在列表中添加、删除或更改任何搜索引擎。用户可以将其默认搜索引擎设置为列表中的任何搜索引擎。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7964">如果启用此策略，用户将无法在列表中添加、删除或更改任何搜索引擎。用户可以将其默认搜索引擎设置为列表中的任何搜索引擎。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7965">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以根据需要修改搜索引擎列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7965">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以根据需要修改搜索引擎列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7966">如果设置了 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略，则将忽略此策略 (ManagedSearchEngines)。用户必须重启浏览器才能完成应用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7966">如果设置了 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 策略，则将忽略此策略 (ManagedSearchEngines)。用户必须重启浏览器才能完成应用此策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7967">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7967">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7968">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7968">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7969">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7969">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7970">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7970">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7971">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7971">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7972">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7972">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7973">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7973">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7974">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7974">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7975">GP 唯一名称: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7975">GP 唯一名称: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7976">GP 名称: 管理搜索引擎</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7976">GP 名称: 管理搜索引擎</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7977">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7977">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7978">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7978">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7979">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7979">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7980">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7980">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7981">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7981">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7982">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7982">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7983">值名称: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7983">值名称: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7984">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7984">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7985">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7985">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example2.com", 
    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example3.com", 
    "name": "Example3", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7989">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7989">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7990">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7990">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7991">到代理服务器的最大并发连接数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7991">到代理服务器的最大并发连接数</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7992">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7992">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7993">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7993">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7994">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7994">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-7995">指定与代理服务器的最大同时连接数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7995">指定与代理服务器的最大同时连接数。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7996">有些代理服务器不能处理每个客户端的大量并发连接，你可以通过将此策略设置为较低的值来解决这个问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7996">有些代理服务器不能处理每个客户端的大量并发连接，你可以通过将此策略设置为较低的值来解决这个问题。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7997">此策略的值应小于 100 并大于 6。默认值为 32。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7997">此策略的值应小于 100 并大于 6。默认值为 32。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7998">已知一些网络应用程序会消耗很多挂起的 GET 的连接，如果这类 Web 应用打开太多，将最大连接降低到 32 以下可能会导致浏览器网络挂起。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7998">已知一些网络应用程序会消耗很多挂起的 GET 的连接，如果这类 Web 应用打开太多，将最大连接降低到 32 以下可能会导致浏览器网络挂起。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-7999">如果未配置此策略，将使用默认值(32)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-7999">如果未配置此策略，将使用默认值(32)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8000">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8000">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8001">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8001">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8002">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8002">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8003">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8003">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8004">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8004">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8005">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8005">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8006">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8006">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8007">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8007">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8008">GP 唯一名称: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8008">GP 唯一名称: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8009">GP 名称: 到代理服务器的最大并发连接数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8009">GP 名称: 到代理服务器的最大并发连接数</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8010">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8010">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8011">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8011">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8012">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8012">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8013">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8013">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8014">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8014">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8015">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8015">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8016">值名称: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8016">值名称: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8017">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8017">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8018">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8018">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000020
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8019">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8019">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8020">首选项密钥名称: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8020">首选项密钥名称: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8021">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8021">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8022">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8022">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8023">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8023">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8024">允许 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的强制转换设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8024">允许 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的强制转换设备</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8025">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8025">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8026">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8026">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8027">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8027">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8028">启用此策略可让 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的强制转换设备，而不仅仅是 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8028">启用此策略可让 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的强制转换设备，而不仅仅是 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8029">禁用此策略以限制 Google Cast 连接到 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址上的强制转换设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8029">禁用此策略以限制 Google Cast 连接到 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址上的强制转换设备。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8030">如果未配置此策略，则 Google Cast 仅会连接到 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址上的强制转换设备，除非你启用 CastAllowAllIPs 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8030">如果未配置此策略，则 Google Cast 仅会连接到 RFC1918/RFC4193 专用地址上的强制转换设备，除非你启用 CastAllowAllIPs 功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8031">如果禁用了 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 策略，则此策略不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8031">如果禁用了 [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 策略，则此策略不起作用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8032">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8032">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8033">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8033">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8034">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8034">可以推荐: 否</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8041">GP 名称: 允许 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的强制转换设备</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8041">GP 名称: 允许 Google Cast 连接到所有 IP 地址上的强制转换设备</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8042">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8042">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8051">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8051">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
