  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8054">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8054">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8055">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8055">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8056">启用使用情况和崩溃相关的数据报告 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8056">启用使用情况和崩溃相关的数据报告 (已弃用)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-8057">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8057">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8058">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8058">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8059">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8059">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8060">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8060">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8061">此策略已被弃用。它目前受支持，但在 Microsoft Edge 89 中将不再使用。对于 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS，此策略将替换为新策略: [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)。在 Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569))上，此策略将替换为“允许遥测”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8061">此策略已被弃用。它目前受支持，但在 Microsoft Edge 89 中将不再使用。对于 Windows 7、Windows 8 和 macOS，此策略将替换为新策略: [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)。在 Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569))上，此策略将替换为“允许遥测”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8062">通过此策略，可向 Microsoft 报告与 Microsoft Edge 的使用情况和故障相关的数据。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8062">通过此策略，可向 Microsoft 报告与 Microsoft Edge 的使用情况和故障相关的数据。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8063">启用此策略可将与使用情况和故障相关的数据发送给 Microsoft。禁用此策略则不会将数据发送给 Microsoft。在这两种情况下，用户都不能更改或替代设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8063">启用此策略可将与使用情况和故障相关的数据发送给 Microsoft。禁用此策略则不会将数据发送给 Microsoft。在这两种情况下，用户都不能更改或替代设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8064">对于 Windows 10，如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认为 Windows 诊断数据设置。如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将仅在“Windows 诊断数据设置”设置为“增强”或“全部”时发送使用情况数据。如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将不会发送使用情况数据，而是根据 Windows 诊断数据设置发送故障相关数据。访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)，了解有关 Windows 诊断数据设置的详细信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8064">对于 Windows 10，如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认为 Windows 诊断数据设置。如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将仅在“Windows 诊断数据设置”设置为“增强”或“全部”时发送使用情况数据。如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 将不会发送使用情况数据，而是根据 Windows 诊断数据设置发送故障相关数据。访问 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)，了解有关 Windows 诊断数据设置的详细信息</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8065">对于 Windows 7、8 和 macOS，此策略控制使用情况和故障相关数据的发送。如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认为用户的首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8065">对于 Windows 7、8 和 macOS，此策略控制使用情况和故障相关数据的发送。如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 将默认为用户的首选项。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8066">若要启用此策略，必须将 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 设置为“已启用”，如果未配置或已禁用 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 或 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices)，则系统不会将此数据发送给 Microsoft。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8066">若要启用此策略，必须将 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 设置为“已启用”，如果未配置或已禁用 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 或 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices)，则系统不会将此数据发送给 Microsoft。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8067">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8067">此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版或企业版实例，或通过 MDM 管理或通过 MCX 加入域的 macOS 实例。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8068">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8068">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8069">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8069">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8070">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8070">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8071">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8071">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8072">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8072">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8073">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8073">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8074">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8074">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8075">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8075">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8076">GP 唯一名称: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8076">GP 唯一名称: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8077">GP 名称: 启用使用情况和崩溃相关的数据报告 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8077">GP 名称: 启用使用情况和崩溃相关的数据报告 (已弃用)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8078">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8078">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8079">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8079">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8080">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8080">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8081">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8081">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8082">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8082">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8083">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8083">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8084">值名称: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8084">值名称: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8085">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8085">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8086">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8086">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8087">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8087">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8088">首选项密钥名称: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8088">首选项密钥名称: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8089">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8089">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8090">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8090">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8091">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8091">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8092">启用本机窗口封闭</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8092">启用本机窗口封闭</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8093">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8093">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8094">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8094">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8095">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8095">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8096">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用本机窗口封闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8096">在 Microsoft Edge 中启用本机窗口封闭。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8097">如果启用此设置，为减少 CPU 和功耗，Microsoft Edge 将检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖，并且将暂停工作绘制像素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8097">如果启用此设置，为减少 CPU 和功耗，Microsoft Edge 将检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖，并且将暂停工作绘制像素。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8098">如果禁用此设置，Microsoft Edge 将不会检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8098">如果禁用此设置，Microsoft Edge 将不会检测窗口何时被其他窗口覆盖。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8099">如果未设置此策略，则将启用窗口隐藏检测。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8099">如果未设置此策略，则将启用窗口隐藏检测。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8100">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8100">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8101">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8101">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8102">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8102">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8103">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8103">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8104">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8104">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8105">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8105">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8106">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8106">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8107">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8107">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8108">GP 唯一名称: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8108">GP 唯一名称: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8109">GP 名称: 启用本机窗口封闭</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8109">GP 名称: 启用本机窗口封闭</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8110">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8110">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8111">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8111">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8112">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8112">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8113">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8113">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8114">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8114">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8115">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8115">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8116">值名称: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8116">值名称: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8117">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8117">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8118">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8118">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8119">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8119">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8120">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8120">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8121">为企业模式站点列表的选项卡导航设置延迟超时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8121">为企业模式站点列表的选项卡导航设置延迟超时</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8122">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8122">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8123">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8123">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8124">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8124">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8125">允许你以秒为单位设置一个超时值，以便 Microsoft Edge 选项卡等待导航，直到浏览器下载了初始企业模式站点列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8125">允许你以秒为单位设置一个超时值，以便 Microsoft Edge 选项卡等待导航，直到浏览器下载了初始企业模式站点列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8126">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略 以及 [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) 设置为“所有符合条件的导航”(1)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8126">此设置可与以下各项结合使用: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 设置为“IEMode” 以及 列表中至少有一个条目的 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 策略 以及 [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) 设置为“所有符合条件的导航”(1)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8127">选项卡等待企业模式站点列表下载的时间不会超过此超时值。如果超时过期后浏览器尚未完成下载企业模式站点列表，则 Microsoft Edge 选项卡仍将继续导航。超时值不应大于 20 秒且不应少于 1 秒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8127">选项卡等待企业模式站点列表下载的时间不会超过此超时值。如果超时过期后浏览器尚未完成下载企业模式站点列表，则 Microsoft Edge 选项卡仍将继续导航。超时值不应大于 20 秒且不应少于 1 秒。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8128">如果将此策略中的超时设置为大于默认值 2 秒的值，则 2 秒后将向用户显示一个信息栏。该信息栏包含一个按钮，允许用户退出等待企业模式站点列表下载完成。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8128">如果将此策略中的超时设置为大于默认值 2 秒的值，则 2 秒后将向用户显示一个信息栏。该信息栏包含一个按钮，允许用户退出等待企业模式站点列表下载完成。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8129">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认超时 2 秒。此默认值将来可能会更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8129">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认超时 2 秒。此默认值将来可能会更改。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8130">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8130">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8131">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8131">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8132">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8132">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8133">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8133">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8134">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8134">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8135">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8135">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8136">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8136">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8137">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8137">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8138">GP 唯一名称: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8138">GP 唯一名称: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8139">GP 名称: 为企业模式站点列表的选项卡导航设置延迟超时</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8139">GP 名称: 为企业模式站点列表的选项卡导航设置延迟超时</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8140">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8140">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8141">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8141">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8142">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8142">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8143">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8143">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8144">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8144">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8145">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8145">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8146">值名称: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8146">值名称: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8147">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8147">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8148">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8148">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x0000000a
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8149">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8149">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8150">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8150">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8151">启用网络预测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8151">启用网络预测</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8152">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8152">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8153">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8153">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8154">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8154">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8155">启用网络预测，并阻止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8155">启用网络预测，并阻止用户更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8156">此策略控制 DNS 预取、TCP 和 SSL 预连接及网页的预呈现。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8156">此策略控制 DNS 预取、TCP 和 SSL 预连接及网页的预呈现。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8157">如果未配置此策略，则启用网络预测，但用户可以更改此项设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8157">如果未配置此策略，则启用网络预测，但用户可以更改此项设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8158">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8158">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8159">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = 预测任何网络连接上的网络操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8159">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = 预测任何网络连接上的网络操作</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8160">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = 不支持，如果使用此值，它将被视为已设置“预测任何网络连接上的网络操作”(0)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8160">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = 不支持，如果使用此值，它将被视为已设置“预测任何网络连接上的网络操作”(0)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8161">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = 不要对任何网络连接预测网络操作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8161">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = 不要对任何网络连接预测网络操作</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8162">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8162">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8163">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8163">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8164">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8164">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8165">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8165">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8166">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8166">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8167">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8167">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8168">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8168">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8169">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8169">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8170">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8170">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8171">GP 唯一名称: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8171">GP 唯一名称: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8172">GP 名称: 启用网络预测</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8172">GP 名称: 启用网络预测</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8173">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8173">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8174">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8174">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8175">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8175">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8176">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8176">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8177">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8177">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8178">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8178">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8179">值名称: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8179">值名称: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8180">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8180">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8181">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8181">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8182">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8182">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8183">首选项密钥名称: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8183">首选项密钥名称: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8184">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8184">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8185">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8185">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8186">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8186">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8187">配置用户是否始终具有使用其工作或学校帐户自动登录的默认用户配置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8187">配置用户是否始终具有使用其工作或学校帐户自动登录的默认用户配置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8188">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8188">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8189">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8189">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8190">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8190">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8191">此策略确定用户是否可以删除通过用户工作或学校帐户自动登录的 Microsoft Edge 用户配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8191">此策略确定用户是否可以删除通过用户工作或学校帐户自动登录的 Microsoft Edge 用户配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8192">如果启用此策略，则将使用用户的工作或学校帐户在 Windows 上创建不可删除的用户配置。此用户配置无法注销或删除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8192">如果启用此策略，则将使用用户的工作或学校帐户在 Windows 上创建不可删除的用户配置。此用户配置无法注销或删除。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8193">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以注销或删除 Windows 中通过用户的工作或学校帐户自动登录的用户配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8193">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以注销或删除 Windows 中通过用户的工作或学校帐户自动登录的用户配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8194">如果要配置浏览器登录，请使用 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8194">如果要配置浏览器登录，请使用 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 策略。</span></span>

     此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft Active Directory 域的 Windows 实例、为设备管理注册的 Windows 10 专业版(或企业版)实例，

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8195">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8195">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8196">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8196">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8197">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8197">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8198">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8198">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8199">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8199">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8200">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8200">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8201">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8201">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8202">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8202">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8203">GP 唯一名称: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8203">GP 唯一名称: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8204">GP 名称: 配置用户是否始终具有使用其工作或学校帐户自动登录的默认用户配置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8204">GP 名称: 配置用户是否始终具有使用其工作或学校帐户自动登录的默认用户配置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8205">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8205">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8206">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8206">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8207">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8207">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8208">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8208">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8209">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8209">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8210">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8210">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8211">值名称: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8211">值名称: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8212">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8212">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8213">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8213">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8214">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8214">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8215">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8215">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8216">控制针对不安全源的安全限制的适用范围</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8216">控制针对不安全源的安全限制的适用范围</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8217">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8217">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8218">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8218">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8219">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8219">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8220">指定来源(URL)或主机名模式(如 "\*.contoso.com")的列表，对于这些模式，针对不安全来源的安全限制不适用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8220">指定来源(URL)或主机名模式(如 "\*.contoso.com")的列表，对于这些模式，针对不安全来源的安全限制不适用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8221">此策略让你可以针对无法部署 TLS 或为内部 Web 开发设置暂存服务器的旧版应用程序指定允许的来源，以便开发人员可以测试需要安全上下文的功能，而不必在暂存服务器上部署 TLS。此策略还可防止来源在多功能地址栏中被标记为“不安全”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8221">此策略让你可以针对无法部署 TLS 或为内部 Web 开发设置暂存服务器的旧版应用程序指定允许的来源，以便开发人员可以测试需要安全上下文的功能，而不必在暂存服务器上部署 TLS。此策略还可防止来源在多功能地址栏中被标记为“不安全”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8222">在此策略中设置 URL 列表的效果与将命令行标志 "--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure" 设置为相同 URL 的逗号分隔列表的效果相同。如果启用此策略，它将覆盖命令行标志。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8222">在此策略中设置 URL 列表的效果与将命令行标志 "--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure" 设置为相同 URL 的逗号分隔列表的效果相同。如果启用此策略，它将覆盖命令行标志。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8223">有关安全上下文的详细信息，请参阅 https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8223">有关安全上下文的详细信息，请参阅 https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8224">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8224">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8225">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8225">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8226">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8226">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8227">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8227">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8228">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8228">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8229">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8229">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8230">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8230">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8231">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8231">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8232">GP 唯一名称: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8232">GP 唯一名称: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8233">GP 名称: 控制针对不安全源的安全限制的适用范围</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8233">GP 名称: 控制针对不安全源的安全限制的适用范围</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8234">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8234">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8235">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8235">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8236">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8236">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8237">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8237">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8238">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8238">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8239">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8239">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8240">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8240">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8241">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8241">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8242">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8242">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = "http://testserver.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = "*.contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8243">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8243">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8244">首选项密钥名称: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8244">首选项密钥名称: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8245">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8245">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8246">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8246">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8247">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8247">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8248">允许网站查询可用的付款方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8248">允许网站查询可用的付款方式</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8249">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8249">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8250">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8250">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8251">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8251">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8252">允许你设置网站能否检查用户是否已保存付款方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8252">允许你设置网站能否检查用户是否已保存付款方式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8253">如果禁用此策略，则使用 PaymentRequest.canMakePayment 或 PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API 的网站将收到没有可用支付方式的通知。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8253">如果禁用此策略，则使用 PaymentRequest.canMakePayment 或 PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API 的网站将收到没有可用支付方式的通知。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8254">如果启用此策略或未设置此策略，则网站可以检查用户是否保存了付款方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8254">如果启用此策略或未设置此策略，则网站可以检查用户是否保存了付款方式。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8255">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8255">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8256">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8256">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8257">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8257">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8258">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8258">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8259">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8259">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8260">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8260">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8261">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8261">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8262">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8262">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8263">GP 唯一名称: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8263">GP 唯一名称: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8264">GP 名称: 允许网站查询可用的付款方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8264">GP 名称: 允许网站查询可用的付款方式</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8265">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8265">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8266">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8266">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8267">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8267">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8268">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8268">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8269">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8269">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8270">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8270">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8271">值名称: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8271">值名称: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8272">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8272">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8273">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8273">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8274">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8274">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8275">首选项密钥名称: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8275">首选项密钥名称: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8276">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8276">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8277">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8277">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8278">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8278">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8279">允许向 Microsoft 发送浏览历史记录以对广告、搜索和新闻进行个性化设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8279">允许向 Microsoft 发送浏览历史记录以对广告、搜索和新闻进行个性化设置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8280">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8280">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8281">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8281">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8282">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8282">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8283">此策略阻止 Microsoft 收集用户的 Microsoft Edge 浏览历史记录以用于提供个性化广告、搜索、新闻和其他 Microsoft 服务。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8283">此策略阻止 Microsoft 收集用户的 Microsoft Edge 浏览历史记录以用于提供个性化广告、搜索、新闻和其他 Microsoft 服务。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8284">此设置仅适用于具有 Microsoft 帐户的用户。此设置不适用于子帐户或企业帐户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8284">此设置仅适用于具有 Microsoft 帐户的用户。此设置不适用于子帐户或企业帐户。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8285">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法更改或替代此设置。如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将默认使用用户的首选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8285">如果禁用此策略，则用户无法更改或替代此设置。如果启用或未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将默认使用用户的首选项。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8286">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8286">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8287">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8287">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8288">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8288">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8289">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8289">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8290">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8290">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8291">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8291">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8292">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8292">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8293">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8293">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8294">GP 唯一名称: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8294">GP 唯一名称: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8295">GP 名称: 允许向 Microsoft 发送浏览历史记录以对广告、搜索和新闻进行个性化设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8295">GP 名称: 允许向 Microsoft 发送浏览历史记录以对广告、搜索和新闻进行个性化设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8296">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8296">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8297">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8297">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8298">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8298">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8299">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8299">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8300">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8300">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8301">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8301">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8302">值名称: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8302">值名称: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8303">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8303">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8304">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8304">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8305">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8305">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8306">首选项密钥名称: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8306">首选项密钥名称: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8307">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8307">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8308">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8308">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8309">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8309">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8310">允许使用“固定到任务栏”向导</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8310">允许使用“固定到任务栏”向导</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8311">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8311">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8312">在 Windows 自 80 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8312">在 Windows 自 80 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8313">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8313">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8314">Microsoft Edge 使用“固定到任务栏”向导来帮助用户将建议的站点固定到任务栏。默认情况下，“固定到任务栏”向导功能处于启用状态，用户可以通过“设置及更多”菜单使用此功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8314">Microsoft Edge 使用“固定到任务栏”向导来帮助用户将建议的站点固定到任务栏。默认情况下，“固定到任务栏”向导功能处于启用状态，用户可以通过“设置及更多”菜单使用此功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8315">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以从“设置及更多”菜单中调用“固定到任务栏”向导。也可以通过协议启动来调用该向导。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8315">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以从“设置及更多”菜单中调用“固定到任务栏”向导。也可以通过协议启动来调用该向导。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8316">如果禁用此策略，则“固定到任务栏”向导在菜单中被禁用，并且无法通过协议启动来调用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8316">如果禁用此策略，则“固定到任务栏”向导在菜单中被禁用，并且无法通过协议启动来调用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8317">用于启用或禁用“固定到任务栏”向导的用户设置不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8317">用于启用或禁用“固定到任务栏”向导的用户设置不可用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8318">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8318">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8319">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8319">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8320">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8320">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8321">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8321">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8322">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8322">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8323">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8323">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8324">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8324">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8325">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8325">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8326">GP 唯一名称: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8326">GP 唯一名称: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8327">GP 名称: 允许使用“固定到任务栏”向导</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8327">GP 名称: 允许使用“固定到任务栏”向导</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8328">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8328">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8329">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8329">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8330">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8330">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8331">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8331">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8332">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8332">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8333">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8333">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8334">值名称: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8334">值名称: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8335">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8335">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8336">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8336">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8337">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8337">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8338">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8338">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8339">启用主动身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8339">启用主动身份验证</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8340">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8340">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8341">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8341">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8342">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8342">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8343">允许你配置是否开启主动身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8343">允许你配置是否开启主动身份验证。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8344">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会尝试使用 Microsoft 服务主动验证登录用户的身份。Microsoft Edge 将定期通过联机服务检查更新的清单，该清单包含管理如何执行此操作的配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8344">如果启用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会尝试使用 Microsoft 服务主动验证登录用户的身份。Microsoft Edge 将定期通过联机服务检查更新的清单，该清单包含管理如何执行此操作的配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8345">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 不会尝试使用 Microsoft 服务对已登录用户进行主动身份验证。Microsoft Edge 不再通过联机服务检查更新的清单，该清单包含用于执行此操作的配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8345">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 不会尝试使用 Microsoft 服务对已登录用户进行主动身份验证。Microsoft Edge 不再通过联机服务检查更新的清单，该清单包含用于执行此操作的配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8346">如果未配置此策略，则会开启主动身份验证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8346">如果未配置此策略，则会开启主动身份验证。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8347">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8347">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8348">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8348">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8349">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8349">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8350">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8350">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8351">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8351">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8352">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8352">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8353">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8353">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8354">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8354">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8355">GP 唯一名称: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8355">GP 唯一名称: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8356">GP 名称: 启用主动身份验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8356">GP 名称: 启用主动身份验证</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8357">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8357">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8358">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8358">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8359">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8359">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8360">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8360">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8361">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8361">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8362">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8362">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8363">值名称: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8363">值名称: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8364">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8364">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8365">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8365">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8366">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8366">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8367">首选项密钥名称: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8367">首选项密钥名称: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8368">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8368">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8369">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8369">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8370">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8370">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8371">启用完整标签页促销内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8371">启用完整标签页促销内容</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8372">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8372">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8373">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8373">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8374">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8374">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8375">控制完整标签页的宣传内容或教育内容的呈现。此设置控制欢迎页面的呈现，以帮助用户登录 Microsoft Edge、选择其默认浏览器或了解产品功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8375">控制完整标签页的宣传内容或教育内容的呈现。此设置控制欢迎页面的呈现，以帮助用户登录 Microsoft Edge、选择其默认浏览器或了解产品功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8376">如果启用此策略(将其设置为 true)或未对其进行配置，则 Microsoft Edge 可能会向用户显示完整标签页内容以提供产品信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8376">如果启用此策略(将其设置为 true)或未对其进行配置，则 Microsoft Edge 可能会向用户显示完整标签页内容以提供产品信息。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8377">如果禁用(设置为 false)此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 无法向用户显示完整标签页内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8377">如果禁用(设置为 false)此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 无法向用户显示完整标签页内容。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8378">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8378">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8379">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8379">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8380">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8380">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8381">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8381">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8382">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8382">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8383">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8383">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8384">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8384">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8385">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8385">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8386">GP 唯一名称: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8386">GP 唯一名称: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8387">GP 名称: 启用完整标签页促销内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8387">GP 名称: 启用完整标签页促销内容</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8388">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8388">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8389">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8389">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8390">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8390">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8391">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8391">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8392">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8392">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8393">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8393">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8394">值名称: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8394">值名称: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8395">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8395">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8397">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8397">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8398">首选项密钥名称: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8398">首选项密钥名称: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>

<false/>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8400">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8400">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8401">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8401">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8402">询问所下载文件的保存位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8402">询问所下载文件的保存位置</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8403">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8403">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8404">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8404">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8405">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8405">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8406">设置下载文件前是否询问文件保存位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8406">设置下载文件前是否询问文件保存位置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8407">如果启用此策略，系统将在下载前询问用户每个文件的保存位置；如果不进行配置，文件会自动保存到默认位置，而不会询问用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8407">如果启用此策略，系统将在下载前询问用户每个文件的保存位置；如果不进行配置，文件会自动保存到默认位置，而不会询问用户。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8408">如果未配置此策略，用户将能够更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8408">如果未配置此策略，用户将能够更改此设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8409">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8409">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8410">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8410">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8411">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8411">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8412">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8412">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8413">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8413">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8414">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8414">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8415">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8415">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8416">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8416">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8417">GP 唯一名称: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8417">GP 唯一名称: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8418">GP 名称: 询问所下载文件的保存位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8418">GP 名称: 询问所下载文件的保存位置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8419">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8419">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8420">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8420">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8421">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8421">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8422">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8422">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8423">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8423">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8424">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8424">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8425">值名称: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8425">值名称: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8426">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8426">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8427">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8427">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8428">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8428">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8429">首选项密钥名称: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8429">首选项密钥名称: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8430">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8430">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8431">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8431">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8432">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8432">QuicAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8433">允许 QUIC 协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8433">允许 QUIC 协议</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8434">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8434">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8435">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8435">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8436">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8436">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8437">允许在 Microsoft Edge 中使用 QUIC 协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8437">允许在 Microsoft Edge 中使用 QUIC 协议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8438">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则允许使用 QUIC 协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8438">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则允许使用 QUIC 协议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8439">如果禁用此策略，则会阻止 QUIC 协议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8439">如果禁用此策略，则会阻止 QUIC 协议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8440">QUIC 是一种传输层网络协议，可以提高当前使用 TCP 的 Web 应用程序的性能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8440">QUIC 是一种传输层网络协议，可以提高当前使用 TCP 的 Web 应用程序的性能。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8441">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8441">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8442">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8442">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8443">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8443">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8444">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8444">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8445">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8445">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8446">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8446">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8447">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8447">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8448">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8448">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8449">GP 唯一名称: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8449">GP 唯一名称: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8450">GP 名称: 允许 QUIC 协议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8450">GP 名称: 允许 QUIC 协议</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8451">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8451">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8452">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8452">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8453">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8453">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8454">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8454">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8455">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8455">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8456">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8456">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8457">值名称: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8457">值名称: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8458">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8458">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8459">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8459">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8460">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8460">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8461">首选项密钥名称: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8461">首选项密钥名称: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8462">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8462">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8463">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8463">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8464">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8464">RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8465">通知用户推荐或需要对挂起的更新重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8465">通知用户推荐或需要对挂起的更新重启浏览器</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8466">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8466">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8467">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8467">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8468">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8468">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8469">通知用户需要重启 Microsoft Edge 以应用待处理的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8469">通知用户需要重启 Microsoft Edge 以应用待处理的更新。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8470">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 会在顶部菜单栏的最右侧添加一个回收站图标，提示用户重启浏览器以应用更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8470">如果未配置此策略，Microsoft Edge 会在顶部菜单栏的最右侧添加一个回收站图标，提示用户重启浏览器以应用更新。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8471">如果启用此策略并将其设置为“Recommended”，则定期警告会提示用户系统建议重启。用户可以消除此警告并推迟重启。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8471">如果启用此策略并将其设置为“Recommended”，则定期警告会提示用户系统建议重启。用户可以消除此警告并推迟重启。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8472">如果将该策略设置为“Required”，则定期警告会提示用户: 当通知期过后，浏览器将立即自动重启。默认期限为七天。你可以使用 [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) 策略配置此期限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8472">如果将该策略设置为“Required”，则定期警告会提示用户: 当通知期过后，浏览器将立即自动重启。默认期限为七天。你可以使用 [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) 策略配置此期限。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8473">当浏览器重启时，将还原用户的会话。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8473">当浏览器重启时，将还原用户的会话。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8474">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8474">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8475">Recommended (1) = 推荐 - 向用户显示重复提示，指示建议重启</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8475">Recommended (1) = 推荐 - 向用户显示重复提示，指示建议重启</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8476">Required (2) = 需要 - 向用户显示重复提示，指示需要重启</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8476">Required (2) = 需要 - 向用户显示重复提示，指示需要重启</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8477">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8477">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8478">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8478">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8479">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8479">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8480">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8480">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8481">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8481">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8482">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8482">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8483">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8483">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8484">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8484">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8485">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8485">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8486">GP 唯一名称: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8486">GP 唯一名称: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8487">GP 名称: 通知用户推荐或需要对挂起的更新重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8487">GP 名称: 通知用户推荐或需要对挂起的更新重启浏览器</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8488">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8488">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8489">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8489">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8490">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8490">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8491">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8491">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8492">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8492">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8493">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8493">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8494">值名称: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8494">值名称: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8495">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8495">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8496">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8496">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8497">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8497">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8498">首选项密钥名称: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8498">首选项密钥名称: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
