``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8500">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8500">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8501">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8501">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8502">设置更新通知的时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8502">设置更新通知的时间段</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8503">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8503">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8504">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8504">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8505">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8505">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8506">允许设置时间段（以毫秒为单位），在该时间段内，将通知用户必须重新启动Microsoft Edge才能应用挂起的更新。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8506">允许设置时间段（以毫秒为单位），在该时间段内，将通知用户必须重新启动Microsoft Edge才能应用挂起的更新。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8507">在此时间段内，将反复通知用户需要更新。在 Microsoft Edge 中，应用程序菜单更改，以指示通知时间过去三分之一后，需要重新启动。通知时间过去三分之二后，此通知将更改颜色，而整个通知时间结束后再次更改。[RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) 策略所启用的附加通知采用此相同的计划。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8507">在此时间段内，将反复通知用户需要更新。在 Microsoft Edge 中，应用程序菜单更改，以指示通知时间过去三分之一后，需要重新启动。通知时间过去三分之二后，此通知将更改颜色，而整个通知时间结束后再次更改。[RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) 策略所启用的附加通知采用此相同的计划。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8508">如果未设置，则使用默认时间段 604800000 毫秒（一周）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8508">如果未设置，则使用默认时间段 604800000 毫秒（一周）。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8509">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8509">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8510">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8510">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8511">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8511">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8512">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8512">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8513">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8513">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8514">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8514">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8515">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8515">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8516">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8516">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8517">GP 唯一名称: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8517">GP 唯一名称: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8518">GP 名称: 设置更新通知的时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8518">GP 名称: 设置更新通知的时间段</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8519">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8519">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8520">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8520">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8521">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8521">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8522">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8522">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8523">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8523">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8524">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8524">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8525">值名称: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8525">值名称: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8526">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8526">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8527">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8527">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x240c8400
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8528">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8528">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8529">首选项密钥名称: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8529">首选项密钥名称: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8530">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8530">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8531">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8531">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8532">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8532">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8533">启用呈现器代码完整性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8533">启用呈现器代码完整性</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8534">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8534">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8535">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8535">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8536">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8536">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8537">如果启用或未设置此策略，则会启用呈现器代码完整性。仅当必须在 Microsoft Edge 的呈现器进程中运行的第三方软件存在兼容性问题时，才应禁用此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8537">如果启用或未设置此策略，则会启用呈现器代码完整性。仅当必须在 Microsoft Edge 的呈现器进程中运行的第三方软件存在兼容性问题时，才应禁用此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8538">禁用此策略对 Microsoft Edge 的安全和稳定性有不利影响，因为 Microsoft Edge 的呈现器进程内部可能因此允许加载未知和可能有害的代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8538">禁用此策略对 Microsoft Edge 的安全和稳定性有不利影响，因为 Microsoft Edge 的呈现器进程内部可能因此允许加载未知和可能有害的代码。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8539">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8539">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8540">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8540">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8541">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8541">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8542">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8542">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8543">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8543">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8544">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8544">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8545">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8545">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8546">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8546">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8547">GP 唯一名称: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8547">GP 唯一名称: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8548">GP 名称: 启用呈现器代码完整性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8548">GP 名称: 启用呈现器代码完整性</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8549">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8549">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8550">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8550">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8551">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8551">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8552">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8552">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8553">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8553">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8554">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8554">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8555">值名称: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8555">值名称: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8556">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8556">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8557">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8557">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8558">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8558">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8559">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8559">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8560">指定本地信任密钥是否需要联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8560">指定本地信任密钥是否需要联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8561">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8561">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8562">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8562">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8563">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8563">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8564">控制是否需要进行在线吊销检查(OCSP/CRL 检查)。如果 Microsoft Edge 无法获取吊销状态信息，则会将这些证书视为已吊销(“硬故障”)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8564">控制是否需要进行在线吊销检查(OCSP/CRL 检查)。如果 Microsoft Edge 无法获取吊销状态信息，则会将这些证书视为已吊销(“硬故障”)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8565">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 始终对成功验证并由本地安装的 CA 证书签名的服务器证书执行吊销检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8565">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 始终对成功验证并由本地安装的 CA 证书签名的服务器证书执行吊销检查。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8566">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将使用现有的在线吊销检查设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8566">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将使用现有的在线吊销检查设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8567">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8567">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8568">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8568">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8569">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8569">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8570">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8570">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8571">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8571">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8572">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8572">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8573">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8573">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8574">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8574">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8575">GP 唯一名称: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8575">GP 唯一名称: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8576">GP 名称: 指定本地信任密钥是否需要联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8576">GP 名称: 指定本地信任密钥是否需要联机 OCSP/CRL 检查</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8577">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8577">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8578">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8578">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8579">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8579">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8580">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8580">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8581">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8581">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8582">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8582">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8583">值名称: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8583">值名称: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8584">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8584">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8585">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8585">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8586">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8586">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8587">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8587">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8588">启用使用 Web 服务解决导航错误</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8588">启用使用 Web 服务解决导航错误</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8589">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8589">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8590">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8590">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8591">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8591">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8592">允许 Microsoft Edge 发布到 Web 服务的无数据连接，以便在旅馆和机场 WLAN 等情况下探测网络的连接性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8592">允许 Microsoft Edge 发布到 Web 服务的无数据连接，以便在旅馆和机场 WLAN 等情况下探测网络的连接性。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8593">如果启用此策略，则使用 Web 服务进行网络连接测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8593">如果启用此策略，则使用 Web 服务进行网络连接测试。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8594">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 使用本机 API 尝试解决网络连接和导航问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8594">如果禁用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 使用本机 API 尝试解决网络连接和导航问题。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8595">**注意**: 除在 Windows 8 和更高版本的 Windows 上外，Microsoft Edge *始终*使用本机 API 解决连接问题。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8595">**注意**: 除在 Windows 8 和更高版本的 Windows 上外，Microsoft Edge *始终*使用本机 API 解决连接问题。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8596">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会采用位于 edge://settings/privacy 的“服务”下设置的用户首选项。 具体来说，用户可以打开或关闭名为**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**的切换开关。请注意，如果已启用此策略(ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService)，则**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**设置处于开启状态，但用户无法使用该切换开关来更改此设置。如果已禁用此策略，则**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**设置处于关闭状态，用户无法使用该切换开关更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8596">如果未配置此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会采用位于 edge://settings/privacy 的“服务”下设置的用户首选项。 具体来说，用户可以打开或关闭名为**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**的切换开关。请注意，如果已启用此策略(ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService)，则**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**设置处于开启状态，但用户无法使用该切换开关来更改此设置。如果已禁用此策略，则**使用 Web 服务帮助解决导航错误**设置处于关闭状态，用户无法使用该切换开关更改此设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8597">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8597">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8598">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8598">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8599">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8599">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8600">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8600">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8601">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8601">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8602">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8602">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8603">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8603">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8604">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8604">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8605">GP 唯一名称: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8605">GP 唯一名称: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8606">GP 名称: 启用使用 Web 服务解决导航错误</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8606">GP 名称: 启用使用 Web 服务解决导航错误</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8607">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8607">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8608">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8608">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8609">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8609">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8610">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8610">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8611">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8611">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8612">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8612">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8613">值名称: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8613">值名称: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8614">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8614">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8615">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8615">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8616">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8616">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8617">首选项密钥名称: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8617">首选项密钥名称: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8618">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8618">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8619">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8619">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8620">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8620">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8621">限制哪些帐户可用作 Microsoft Edge 主帐户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8621">限制哪些帐户可用作 Microsoft Edge 主帐户</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8622">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8622">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8623">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8623">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8624">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8624">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8625">确定可以在 Microsoft Edge 中将哪些帐户设置为浏览器主帐户(在同步选择加入流程中选择的帐户)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8625">确定可以在 Microsoft Edge 中将哪些帐户设置为浏览器主帐户(在同步选择加入流程中选择的帐户)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8626">如果用户尝试使用与此模式不匹配的用户名配置浏览器主帐户，则他们将被阻止，并会收到相应的错误消息。你可以使用该模式的 Perl 样式正则表达式将此策略配置为匹配多个帐户。请注意，模式匹配区分大小写。有关所使用的正则表达式规则的详细信息，请参阅 https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8626">如果用户尝试使用与此模式不匹配的用户名配置浏览器主帐户，则他们将被阻止，并会收到相应的错误消息。你可以使用该模式的 Perl 样式正则表达式将此策略配置为匹配多个帐户。请注意，模式匹配区分大小写。有关所使用的正则表达式规则的详细信息，请参阅 https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8627">如果未配置此策略或将其留空，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中将任何帐户设置为浏览器主帐户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8627">如果未配置此策略或将其留空，则用户可以在 Microsoft Edge 中将任何帐户设置为浏览器主帐户。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8628">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8628">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8629">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8629">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8630">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8630">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8631">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8631">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8632">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8632">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8633">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8633">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8634">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8634">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8635">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8635">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8636">GP 唯一名称: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8636">GP 唯一名称: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8637">GP 名称: 限制哪些帐户可用作 Microsoft Edge 主帐户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8637">GP 名称: 限制哪些帐户可用作 Microsoft Edge 主帐户</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8638">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8638">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8639">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8639">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8640">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8640">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8641">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8641">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8642">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8642">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8643">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8643">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8644">值名称: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8644">值名称: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8645">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8645">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8646">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8646">示例值:</span></span>
```
".*@contoso.com"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8647">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8647">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8648">首选项密钥名称: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8648">首选项密钥名称: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8649">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8649">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8650">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8650">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8651">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8651">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8652">设置漫游用户配置目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8652">设置漫游用户配置目录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8653">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8653">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8654">在 Windows 自 85 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8654">在 Windows 自 85 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8655">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8655">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8656">配置用于存储用户配置漫游副本的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8656">配置用于存储用户配置漫游副本的目录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8657">如果启用此策略，那么只要你还启用了 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 策略，Microsoft Edge 就会使用提供的目录存储用户配置的漫游副本。如果禁用 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 策略或未对其进行配置，则不会使用此策略中存储的值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8657">如果启用此策略，那么只要你还启用了 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 策略，Microsoft Edge 就会使用提供的目录存储用户配置的漫游副本。如果禁用 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 策略或未对其进行配置，则不会使用此策略中存储的值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8658">请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) 以获取可以使用的变量列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8658">请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) 以获取可以使用的变量列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8659">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认漫游用户配置路径。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8659">如果未配置此策略，则使用默认漫游用户配置路径。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8660">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8660">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8661">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8661">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8662">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8662">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8663">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8663">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8664">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8664">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8665">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8665">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8666">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8666">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8667">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8667">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8668">GP 唯一名称: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8668">GP 唯一名称: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8669">GP 名称: 设置漫游用户配置目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8669">GP 名称: 设置漫游用户配置目录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8670">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8670">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8671">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8671">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8672">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8672">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8673">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8673">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8674">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8674">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8675">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8675">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8676">值名称: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8676">值名称: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8677">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8677">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8678">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8678">示例值:</span></span>
```
"${roaming_app_data}\\edge-profile"
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8679">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8679">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8680">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8680">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8681">启用对 Microsoft Edge 用户配置数据使用漫游副本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8681">启用对 Microsoft Edge 用户配置数据使用漫游副本</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8682">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8682">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8683">在 Windows 自 85 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8683">在 Windows 自 85 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8684">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8684">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8685">启用此策略可在 Windows 上使用漫游用户配置。存储在 Microsoft Edge 用户配置中的设置(收藏夹和首选项)也将保存到一个文件中，该文件存储在漫游用户的用户配置文件夹中(或管理员通过 [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) 策略指定的位置)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8685">启用此策略可在 Windows 上使用漫游用户配置。存储在 Microsoft Edge 用户配置中的设置(收藏夹和首选项)也将保存到一个文件中，该文件存储在漫游用户的用户配置文件夹中(或管理员通过 [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) 策略指定的位置)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8686">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则仅使用常规的本地用户配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8686">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则仅使用常规的本地用户配置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8687">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略将禁用所有数据同步，覆盖该策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8687">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 策略将禁用所有数据同步，覆盖该策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8688">有关使用漫游用户用户配置的详细信息，请参阅 https://docs.microsoft.com/windows-server/storage/folder-redirection/deploy-roaming-user-profiles。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8688">有关使用漫游用户用户配置的详细信息，请参阅 https://docs.microsoft.com/windows-server/storage/folder-redirection/deploy-roaming-user-profiles。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8689">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8689">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8690">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8690">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8691">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8691">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8692">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8692">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8693">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8693">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8694">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8694">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8695">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8695">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8696">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8696">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8697">GP 唯一名称: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8697">GP 唯一名称: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8698">GP 名称: 启用对 Microsoft Edge 用户配置数据使用漫游副本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8698">GP 名称: 启用对 Microsoft Edge 用户配置数据使用漫游副本</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8699">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8699">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8700">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8700">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8701">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8701">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8702">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8702">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8703">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8703">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8704">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8704">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8705">值名称: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8705">值名称: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8706">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8706">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8707">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8707">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8708">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8708">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8709">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8709">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8710">将 Adobe Flash 内容设置扩展到所有内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8710">将 Adobe Flash 内容设置扩展到所有内容</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8711">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8711">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8712">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8712">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8713">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8713">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8714">如果启用此策略，则将运行嵌入在网站中的所有 Adobe Flash 内容，前提是此类网站已由用户或通过企业策略在内容设置中设置为允许运行 Adobe Flash。内容包括其他来源中的内容和/或较小内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8714">如果启用此策略，则将运行嵌入在网站中的所有 Adobe Flash 内容，前提是此类网站已由用户或通过企业策略在内容设置中设置为允许运行 Adobe Flash。内容包括其他来源中的内容和/或较小内容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8715">若要控制允许哪些网站运行 Adobe Flash，请参阅 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting)、[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) 策略中的规范。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8715">若要控制允许哪些网站运行 Adobe Flash，请参阅 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting)、[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 和 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) 策略中的规范。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8716">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则可能会阻止其他来源(来自未在上述三个策略中指定的站点)的 Adobe Flash 内容或较小内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8716">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则可能会阻止其他来源(来自未在上述三个策略中指定的站点)的 Adobe Flash 内容或较小内容。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8717">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8717">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8718">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8718">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8719">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8719">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8720">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8720">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8721">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8721">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8722">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8722">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8723">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8723">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8724">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8724">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8725">GP 唯一名称: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8725">GP 唯一名称: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8726">GP 名称: 将 Adobe Flash 内容设置扩展到所有内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8726">GP 名称: 将 Adobe Flash 内容设置扩展到所有内容</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8727">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8727">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8728">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8728">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8729">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8729">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8730">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8730">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8731">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8731">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8732">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8732">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8733">值名称: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8733">值名称: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8734">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8734">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8735">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8735">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8736">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8736">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8737">首选项密钥名称: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8737">首选项密钥名称: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8738">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8738">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8739">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8739">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8740">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8740">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8741">允许用户从 HTTPS 警告页继续</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8741">允许用户从 HTTPS 警告页继续</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8742">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8742">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8743">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8743">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8744">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8744">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8745">当用户访问具有 SSL 错误的站点时，Microsoft Edge 会显示警告页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8745">当用户访问具有 SSL 错误的站点时，Microsoft Edge 会显示警告页面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8746">如果启用或未配置(默认)此策略，则用户能够以单击方式浏览这些警告页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8746">如果启用或未配置(默认)此策略，则用户能够以单击方式浏览这些警告页面。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8747">如果禁用此策略，则会阻止用户以单击方式浏览任何警告页面。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8747">如果禁用此策略，则会阻止用户以单击方式浏览任何警告页面。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8748">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8748">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8749">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8749">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8750">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8750">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8751">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8751">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8752">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8752">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8753">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8753">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8754">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8754">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8755">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8755">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8756">GP 唯一名称: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8756">GP 唯一名称: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8757">GP 名称: 允许用户从 HTTPS 警告页继续</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8757">GP 名称: 允许用户从 HTTPS 警告页继续</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8758">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8758">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8759">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8759">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8760">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8760">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8761">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8761">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8762">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8762">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8763">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8763">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8764">值名称: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8764">值名称: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8765">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8765">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8766">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8766">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8767">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8767">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8768">首选项密钥名称: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8768">首选项密钥名称: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8769">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8769">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8770">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8770">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8771">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8771">SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8772">已启用的最低 TLS 版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8772">已启用的最低 TLS 版本</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8773">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8773">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8774">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8774">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8775">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8775">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8776">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8776">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8777">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 기본 최소 버전인 TLS 1.0을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8777">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge uses a default minimum version, TLS 1.0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8778">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8778">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8779">인식할 수 없는 모든 값은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8779">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8780">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8780">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8781">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8781">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8782">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8782">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8783">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8783">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8784">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8784">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8785">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8785">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8786">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8786">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8787">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8787">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8788">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8788">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8789">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8789">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8790">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8790">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8791">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8791">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8792">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8792">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8793">GP 唯一名称: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8793">GP 唯一名称: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8794">GP 名称: 已启用的最低 TLS 版本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8794">GP 名称: 已启用的最低 TLS 版本</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8795">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8795">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8796">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8796">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8797">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8797">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8798">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8798">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8799">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8799">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8800">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8800">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8801">值名称: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8801">值名称: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8802">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8802">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8803">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8803">示例值:</span></span>
```
"tls1"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8804">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8804">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8805">首选项密钥名称: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8805">首选项密钥名称: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8806">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8806">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8807">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8807">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8808">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8808">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8809">当 Microsoft Edge 关闭时保存 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8809">当 Microsoft Edge 关闭时保存 Cookie</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8810">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8810">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8811">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8811">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8812">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8812">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8813">如果启用此策略，则当浏览器关闭时，指定的 Cookie 集将免于删除。此策略仅在以下情况下有效:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8813">如果启用此策略，则当浏览器关闭时，指定的 Cookie 集将免于删除。此策略仅在以下情况下有效:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8814">已在“设置”/“隐私和服务”/“关闭时清除浏览数据”中配置“Cookie 和其他网站数据”切换，或者</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8814">已在“设置”/“隐私和服务”/“关闭时清除浏览数据”中配置“Cookie 和其他网站数据”切换，或者</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8815">已启用策略 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8815">已启用策略 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 或</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8816">已将策略 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 设置为“在会话期间保留 Cookie”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8816">已将策略 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 设置为“在会话期间保留 Cookie”。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8817">你可以根据 URL 模式定义网站列表，它将在各个会话之间保留 Cookie。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8817">你可以根据 URL 模式定义网站列表，它将在各个会话之间保留 Cookie。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8818">注意：用户仍可以编辑 Cookie 网站列表以添加或删除 URL。但是，他们不能删除已由管理员添加的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8818">注意：用户仍可以编辑 Cookie 网站列表以添加或删除 URL。但是，他们不能删除已由管理员添加的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8819">如果你启用此策略，则关闭浏览器时不会清除 Cookie 列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8819">如果你启用此策略，则关闭浏览器时不会清除 Cookie 列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8820">如果你禁用或未配置此策略，则将使用用户的个人配置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8820">如果你禁用或未配置此策略，则将使用用户的个人配置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8821">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8821">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8822">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8822">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8823">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8823">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8824">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8824">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8825">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8825">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8826">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8826">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8827">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8827">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8828">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8828">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8829">GP 唯一名称: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8829">GP 唯一名称: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8830">GP 名称: 当 Microsoft Edge 关闭时保存 Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8830">GP 名称: 当 Microsoft Edge 关闭时保存 Cookie</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8831">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8831">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8832">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8832">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8833">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8833">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8834">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8834">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8835">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8835">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8836">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8836">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8837">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8837">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8838">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8838">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8839">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8839">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8840">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8840">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8841">首选项密钥名称: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8841">首选项密钥名称: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8842">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8842">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8843">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8843">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8844">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8844">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8845">禁用保存浏览器历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8845">禁用保存浏览器历史记录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8846">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8846">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8847">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8847">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8848">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8848">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8849">禁用保存浏览器历史记录，并阻止用户更改此设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8849">禁用保存浏览器历史记录，并阻止用户更改此设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8850">如果启用此策略，浏览历史记录将不会保存。这还将禁用标签页同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8850">如果启用此策略，浏览历史记录将不会保存。这还将禁用标签页同步。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8851">如果禁用或未配置此策略，浏览历史记录将被保存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8851">如果禁用或未配置此策略，浏览历史记录将被保存。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8852">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8852">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8853">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8853">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8854">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8854">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8855">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8855">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8856">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8856">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8857">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8857">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8858">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8858">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8859">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8859">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8860">GP 唯一名称: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8860">GP 唯一名称: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8861">GP 名称: 禁用保存浏览器历史记录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8861">GP 名称: 禁用保存浏览器历史记录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8862">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8862">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8863">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8863">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8864">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8864">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8865">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8865">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8866">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8866">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8867">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8867">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8868">值名称: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8868">值名称: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8869">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8869">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8870">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8870">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8871">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8871">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8872">首选项密钥名称: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8872">首选项密钥名称: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8873">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8873">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8874">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8874">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8875">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8875">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8876">允许或拒绝屏幕捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8876">允许或拒绝屏幕捕获</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8877">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8877">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8878">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8878">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8879">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8879">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8880">如果启用此策略，或者未配置此策略，则网页可以使用屏幕共享 API（如 getDisplayMedia() 或桌面捕获扩展 API）进行屏幕捕获。 如果禁用此策略，则对屏幕共享 API 的调用将失败。例如，如果你使用的是基于 Web 的联机会议，则视频或屏幕共享将无法工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8880">如果启用此策略，或者未配置此策略，则网页可以使用屏幕共享 API（如 getDisplayMedia() 或桌面捕获扩展 API）进行屏幕捕获。 如果禁用此策略，则对屏幕共享 API 的调用将失败。例如，如果你使用的是基于 Web 的联机会议，则视频或屏幕共享将无法工作。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8881">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8881">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8882">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8882">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8883">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8883">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8884">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8884">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8885">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8885">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8886">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8886">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8887">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8887">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8888">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8888">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8889">GP 唯一名称: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8889">GP 唯一名称: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8890">GP 名称: 允许或拒绝屏幕捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8890">GP 名称: 允许或拒绝屏幕捕获</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8891">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8891">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8892">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8892">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8893">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8893">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8894">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8894">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8895">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8895">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8896">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8896">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8897">值名称: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8897">值名称: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8898">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8898">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8899">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8899">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8900">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8900">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8901">首选项密钥名称: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8901">首选项密钥名称: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8902">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8902">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8903">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8903">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8904">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8904">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8905">启用滚动到 URL 片段中的指定文本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8905">启用滚动到 URL 片段中的指定文本</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8906">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8906">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8907">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8907">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8908">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8908">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8909">此功能允许超链接和地址栏 URL 导航以网页上的特定文本为目标，网页完成加载后将滚动到该文本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8909">此功能允许超链接和地址栏 URL 导航以网页上的特定文本为目标，网页完成加载后将滚动到该文本。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8910">如果启用或未配置此策略，则将允许网页通过 URL 滚动至特定文本片段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8910">如果启用或未配置此策略，则将允许网页通过 URL 滚动至特定文本片段。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8911">如果禁用此策略，则不允许网页通过 URL 滚动到特定文本片段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8911">如果禁用此策略，则不允许网页通过 URL 滚动到特定文本片段。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8912">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8912">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8913">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8913">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8914">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8914">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8915">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8915">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8916">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8916">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8917">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8917">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8918">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8918">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8919">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8919">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8920">GP 唯一名称: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8920">GP 唯一名称: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8921">GP 名称: 启用滚动到 URL 片段中的指定文本</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8921">GP 名称: 启用滚动到 URL 片段中的指定文本</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8922">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8922">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8923">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8923">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8924">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8924">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8925">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8925">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8926">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8926">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8927">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8927">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8928">值名称: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8928">值名称: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8929">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8929">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8930">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8930">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8931">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8931">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8932">首选项密钥名称: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8932">首选项密钥名称: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8933">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8933">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8934">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8934">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8935">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8935">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8936">启用搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8936">启用搜索建议</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8937">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8937">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8938">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8938">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8939">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8939">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8940">在 Microsoft Edge 的地址栏和自动建议列表中启用 Web 搜索建议，并阻止用户更改此策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8940">在 Microsoft Edge 的地址栏和自动建议列表中启用 Web 搜索建议，并阻止用户更改此策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8941">如果启用此策略，将使用 Web 搜索建议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8941">如果启用此策略，将使用 Web 搜索建议。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8942">如果禁用此策略，则永远不会使用 Web 搜索建议，但仍会显示本地历史记录和本地收藏夹建议。如果禁用此策略，则键入的字符和访问的 URL 不会包含在发送给 Microsoft 的遥测信息中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8942">如果禁用此策略，则永远不会使用 Web 搜索建议，但仍会显示本地历史记录和本地收藏夹建议。如果禁用此策略，则键入的字符和访问的 URL 不会包含在发送给 Microsoft 的遥测信息中。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8943">如果未设置此策略，则会启用搜索建议，但用户可以对其进行更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8943">如果未设置此策略，则会启用搜索建议，但用户可以对其进行更改。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8944">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8944">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8945">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8945">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8946">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8946">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8947">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8947">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8948">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8948">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8949">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8949">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8950">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8950">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8951">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8951">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8952">GP 唯一名称: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8952">GP 唯一名称: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8953">GP 名称: 启用搜索建议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8953">GP 名称: 启用搜索建议</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8954">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8954">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8955">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8955">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8956">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8956">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8957">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8957">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8958">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8958">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8959">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8959">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8960">值名称: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8960">值名称: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8961">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8961">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8962">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8962">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8963">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8963">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8964">首选项密钥名称: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8964">首选项密钥名称: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8966">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8966">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8967">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8967">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8968">无需许可即可使用直接安全密钥证明的网站或域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8968">无需许可即可使用直接安全密钥证明的网站或域</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8969">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8969">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8970">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8970">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8971">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8971">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8972">指定当请求来自安全密钥的证明证书时不需要显式用户许可的网站和域。此外，向安全密钥发送一个信号，指示它可以使用单独的证明。如果不这样做，每次站点请求安全密钥证明时都会提示用户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8972">指定当请求来自安全密钥的证明证书时不需要显式用户许可的网站和域。此外，向安全密钥发送一个信号，指示它可以使用单独的证明。如果不这样做，每次站点请求安全密钥证明时都会提示用户。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-8973">网站(如 https://contoso.com/some/path)仅作为 U2F appID 匹配。域(如 contoso.com)仅作为 webauthn RP ID 匹配。对于指定站点，要涵盖 U2F 和 webauthn API，需要列出 appID URL 和域。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8973">网站(如 https://contoso.com/some/path)仅作为 U2F appID 匹配。域(如 contoso.com)仅作为 webauthn RP ID 匹配。对于指定站点，要涵盖 U2F 和 webauthn API，需要列出 appID URL 和域。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8974">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8974">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8975">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8975">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8976">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8976">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8977">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8977">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8978">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8978">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8979">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8979">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8980">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8980">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8981">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8981">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8982">GP 唯一名称: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8982">GP 唯一名称: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8983">GP 名称: 无需许可即可使用直接安全密钥证明的网站或域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8983">GP 名称: 无需许可即可使用直接安全密钥证明的网站或域</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8984">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8984">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8985">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8985">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8986">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8986">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8987">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8987">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8988">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8988">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8989">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8989">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8990">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8990">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8991">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8991">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8992">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8992">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8993">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8993">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8994">首选项密钥名称: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8994">首选项密钥名称: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-8995">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-8995">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
