  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9214">值名称: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9214">值名称: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9215">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9215">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9216">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9216">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9217">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9217">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9218">首选项密钥名称: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9218">首选项密钥名称: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9219">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9219">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9220">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9220">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9221">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9221">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9222">启用签名 HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9222">启用签名 HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支持</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9223">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9223">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9224">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9224">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9225">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9225">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9226">启用对已签名 HTTP Exchange (SXG)的支持。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9226">启用对已签名 HTTP Exchange (SXG)的支持。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9227">如果未设置或未启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将接受作为已签名 HTTP Exchange 提供的 Web 内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9227">如果未设置或未启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 将接受作为已签名 HTTP Exchange 提供的 Web 内容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9228">如果将此策略设置为“已禁用”，则无法加载已签名 HTTP Exchange。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9228">如果将此策略设置为“已禁用”，则无法加载已签名 HTTP Exchange。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9229">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9229">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9230">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9230">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9231">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9231">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9232">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9232">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9233">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9233">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9234">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9234">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9235">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9235">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9236">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9236">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9237">GP 唯一名称: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9237">GP 唯一名称: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9238">GP 名称: 启用签名 HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9238">GP 名称: 启用签名 HTTP Exchange (SXG) 支持</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9239">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9239">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9240">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9240">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9241">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9241">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9242">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9242">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9243">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9243">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9244">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9244">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9245">值名称: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9245">值名称: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9246">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9246">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9247">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9247">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9248">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9248">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9249">首选项密钥名称: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9249">首选项密钥名称: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9250">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9250">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9251">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9251">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9252">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9252">SitePerProcess</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9253">为每个站点启用站点隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9253">为每个站点启用站点隔离</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9254">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9254">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9255">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9255">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9256">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9256">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9257">[SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 策略可用于阻止用户选择不采取隔离所有站点这一默认行为。请注意，你还可以使用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 策略隔离其他更细粒度的来源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9257">[SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 策略可用于阻止用户选择不采取隔离所有站点这一默认行为。请注意，你还可以使用 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 策略隔离其他更细粒度的来源。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9258">如果启用此策略，则用户只能选择采取默认行为，即每个站点在自身进程中运行。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9258">如果启用此策略，则用户只能选择采取默认行为，即每个站点在自身进程中运行。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9259">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以选择不采取站点隔离。（例如，通过在 edge://flags 中使用“禁用站点隔离”项来实现）。禁用或未配置此策略不会导致站点隔离关闭。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9259">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则用户可以选择不采取站点隔离。（例如，通过在 edge://flags 中使用“禁用站点隔离”项来实现）。禁用或未配置此策略不会导致站点隔离关闭。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9260">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9260">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9261">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9261">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9262">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9262">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9263">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9263">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9264">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9264">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9265">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9265">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9266">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9266">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9267">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9267">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9268">GP 唯一名称: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9268">GP 唯一名称: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9269">GP 名称: 为每个站点启用站点隔离</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9269">GP 名称: 为每个站点启用站点隔离</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9270">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9270">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9271">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9271">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9272">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9272">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9273">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9273">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9274">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9274">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9275">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9275">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9276">值名称: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9276">值名称: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9277">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9277">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9278">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9278">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9279">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9279">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9280">首选项密钥名称: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9280">首选项密钥名称: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9281">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9281">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9282">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9282">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9283">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9283">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9284">启用拼写检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9284">启用拼写检查</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9285">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9285">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9286">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9286">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9287">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9287">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9288">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以使用拼写检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9288">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以使用拼写检查。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9289">如果禁用此策略，则用户不能使用拼写检查，并且 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略也将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9289">如果禁用此策略，则用户不能使用拼写检查，并且 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略也将被禁用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9290">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9290">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9291">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9291">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9292">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9292">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9293">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9293">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9294">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9294">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9295">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9295">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9296">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9296">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9297">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9297">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9298">GP 唯一名称: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9298">GP 唯一名称: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9299">GP 名称: 启用拼写检查</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9299">GP 名称: 启用拼写检查</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9300">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9300">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9301">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9301">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9302">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9302">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9303">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9303">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9304">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9304">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9305">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9305">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9306">值名称: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9306">值名称: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9307">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9307">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9308">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9308">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9309">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9309">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9310">首选项密钥名称: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9310">首选项密钥名称: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9311">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9311">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9312">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9312">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9313">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9313">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9314">启用特定拼写检查语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9314">启用特定拼写检查语言</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9315">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9315">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9316">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9316">在 Windows 自 77 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9317">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9317">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9318">启用不同的语言以进行拼写检查。任何所指定的无法识别的语言都将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9318">启用不同的语言以进行拼写检查。任何所指定的无法识别的语言都将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9319">如果启用此策略，则会对指定的语言以及用户启用的任何语言启用拼写检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9319">如果启用此策略，则会对指定的语言以及用户启用的任何语言启用拼写检查。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9320">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则用户的拼写检查首选项没有变化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9320">如果未配置或禁用此策略，则用户的拼写检查首选项没有变化。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9321">如果禁用 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 策略，则此策略将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9321">如果禁用 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 策略，则此策略将不起作用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9322">如果 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略中都包含某种语言，则将启用该拼写检查语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9322">如果 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略中都包含某种语言，则将启用该拼写检查语言。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9323">支持的语言包括: af、bg、ca、cs、cy、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9323">支持的语言包括: af、bg、ca、cs、cy、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9324">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9324">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9325">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9325">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9326">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9326">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9327">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9327">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9328">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9328">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9329">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9329">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9330">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9330">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9331">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9331">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9332">GP 唯一名称: SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9332">GP 唯一名称: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9333">GP 名称: 启用特定拼写检查语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9333">GP 名称: 启用特定拼写检查语言</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9334">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9334">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9335">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9335">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9336">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9336">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9337">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9337">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9338">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9338">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9339">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9339">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9340">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9340">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9341">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9341">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9342">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9342">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9343">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9343">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9344">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9344">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9345">强制禁用拼写检查功能的语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9345">强制禁用拼写检查功能的语言</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9346">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9346">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9347">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9347">在 Windows 自 78 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9348">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9348">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9349">强制禁用拼写检查语言。该列表中无法识别的语言将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9349">强制禁用拼写检查语言。该列表中无法识别的语言将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9350">如果启用此策略，将对指定语言禁用拼写检查。用户仍然可以对不在列表中的语言启用或禁用拼写检查。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9350">如果启用此策略，将对指定语言禁用拼写检查。用户仍然可以对不在列表中的语言启用或禁用拼写检查。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9351">如果未设置或禁用此策略，则用户的拼写检查首选项将不会更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9351">如果未设置或禁用此策略，则用户的拼写检查首选项将不会更改。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9352">如果 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 策略设置为“已禁用”，则此策略将不起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9352">如果 [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 策略设置为“已禁用”，则此策略将不起作用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9353">如果在 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略中都包含某种语言，则将启用该拼写检查语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9353">如果在 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 和 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 策略中都包含某种语言，则将启用该拼写检查语言。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9354">当前支持的语言包括: af、bg、ca、cs、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9354">当前支持的语言包括: af、bg、ca、cs、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9355">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9355">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9356">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9356">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9357">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9357">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9358">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9358">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9359">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9359">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9360">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9360">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9361">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9361">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9362">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9362">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9363">GP 唯一名称: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9363">GP 唯一名称: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9364">GP 名称: 强制禁用拼写检查功能的语言</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9364">GP 名称: 强制禁用拼写检查功能的语言</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9365">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9365">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9366">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9366">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9367">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9367">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9368">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9368">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9369">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9369">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9370">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9370">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9371">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9371">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9372">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9372">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9373">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9373">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9374">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9374">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9375">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9375">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9376">针对混合内容启用更严格的处理 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9376">针对混合内容启用更严格的处理 (已弃用)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-9377">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9377">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9378">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9378">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9379">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9379">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 81</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9380">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9380">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9381">此策略已弃用，因为它旨在仅作为一种短期机制，让企业在发现它与更严格的混合内容处理不兼容时，有更多时间更新其 Web 内容。它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 中正常使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9381">此策略已弃用，因为它旨在仅作为一种短期机制，让企业在发现它与更严格的混合内容处理不兼容时，有更多时间更新其 Web 内容。它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 中正常使用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9382">此策略控制浏览器中的混合内容 (HTTPS 站点中的 HTTP 内容) 的处理。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9382">此策略控制浏览器中的混合内容 (HTTPS 站点中的 HTTP 内容) 的处理。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9383">如果将此策略设置为“true”或未设置，则音频和视频混合内容将自动升级到 HTTPS (即，URL 将被重写为 HTTPS; 如果资源在 HTTPS 上不可用，则无回退)，并且图像混合内容的 URL 栏中将显示“不安全”警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9383">如果将此策略设置为“true”或未设置，则音频和视频混合内容将自动升级到 HTTPS (即，URL 将被重写为 HTTPS; 如果资源在 HTTPS 上不可用，则无回退)，并且图像混合内容的 URL 栏中将显示“不安全”警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9384">如果将策略设置为“false”，将禁用音频和视频的自动升级，并且不会针对图像显示警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9384">如果将策略设置为“false”，将禁用音频和视频的自动升级，并且不会针对图像显示警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9385">此策略不会影响音频、视频和图像以外的其他混合内容类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9385">此策略不会影响音频、视频和图像以外的其他混合内容类型。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9386">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9386">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9387">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9387">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9388">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9388">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9389">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9389">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9390">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9390">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9391">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9391">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9392">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9392">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9393">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9393">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9394">GP 唯一名称: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9394">GP 唯一名称: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9395">GP 名称: 针对混合内容启用更严格的处理 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9395">GP 名称: 针对混合内容启用更严格的处理 (已弃用)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9396">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9396">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9397">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9397">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9398">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9398">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9399">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9399">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9400">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9400">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9401">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9401">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9402">值名称: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9402">值名称: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9403">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9403">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9404">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9404">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9405">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9405">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9406">首选项密钥名称: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9406">首选项密钥名称: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9407">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9407">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9408">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9408">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9409">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9409">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9410">禁止不支持的操作系统警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9410">禁止不支持的操作系统警告</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9411">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9411">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9412">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9412">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9413">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9413">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9414">取消当 Microsoft Edge 运行于不再受支持的计算机或操作系统上时显示的警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9414">取消当 Microsoft Edge 运行于不再受支持的计算机或操作系统上时显示的警告。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9415">如果此策略为 False 或未设置，则将在此类不受支持的计算机或操作系统上显示警告。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9415">如果此策略为 False 或未设置，则将在此类不受支持的计算机或操作系统上显示警告。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9416">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9416">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9417">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9417">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9418">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9418">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9419">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9419">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9420">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9420">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9421">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9421">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9422">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9422">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9423">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9423">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9424">GP 唯一名称: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9424">GP 唯一名称: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9425">GP 名称: 禁止不支持的操作系统警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9425">GP 名称: 禁止不支持的操作系统警告</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9426">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9426">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9427">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9427">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9428">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9428">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9429">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9429">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9430">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9430">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9431">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9431">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9432">值名称: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9432">值名称: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9433">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9433">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9434">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9434">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9435">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9435">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9436">首选项密钥名称: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9436">首选项密钥名称: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9437">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9437">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9438">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9438">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9439">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9439">SyncDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9440">使用 Microsoft 同步服务禁用数据同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9440">使用 Microsoft 同步服务禁用数据同步</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9441">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9441">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9442">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9442">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9443">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9443">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9444">在 Microsoft Edge 中禁用数据同步。此策略还会阻止弹出关于同意进行同步的提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9444">在 Microsoft Edge 中禁用数据同步。此策略还会阻止弹出关于同意进行同步的提示。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9445">如果未设置此策略或未按照建议应用此策略，则用户将可以打开或关闭同步。如果作为强制性策略应用此策略，则用户将无法打开同步。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9445">如果未设置此策略或未按照建议应用此策略，则用户将可以打开或关闭同步。如果作为强制性策略应用此策略，则用户将无法打开同步。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9446">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9446">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9447">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9447">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9448">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9448">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9449">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9449">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9450">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9450">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9451">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9451">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9452">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9452">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9453">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9453">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9454">GP 唯一名称: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9454">GP 唯一名称: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9455">GP 名称: 使用 Microsoft 同步服务禁用数据同步</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9455">GP 名称: 使用 Microsoft 同步服务禁用数据同步</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9456">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9456">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9457">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9457">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9458">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9458">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9459">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9459">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9460">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9460">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9461">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9461">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9462">值名称: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9462">值名称: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9463">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9463">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9464">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9464">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9465">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9465">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9466">首选项密钥名称: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9466">首选项密钥名称: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9467">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9467">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9468">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9468">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9469">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9469">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9470">配置从同步中排除的类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9470">配置从同步中排除的类型列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9471">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9471">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9472">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9472">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9473">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9473">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9474">如果启用此策略，则所有指定的数据类型都将从同步中排除。此策略可用于限制上传到 Microsoft Edge 同步服务的数据类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9474">如果启用此策略，则所有指定的数据类型都将从同步中排除。此策略可用于限制上传到 Microsoft Edge 同步服务的数据类型。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9475">你可以为此策略提供以下数据类型之一：“收藏夹”、“设置”、“密码”、“addressesAndMore”、“扩展”、“历史记录”、“openTabs”和“集锦”。请注意，这些数据类型名称区分大小写。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9475">你可以为此策略提供以下数据类型之一：“收藏夹”、“设置”、“密码”、“addressesAndMore”、“扩展”、“历史记录”、“openTabs”和“集锦”。请注意，这些数据类型名称区分大小写。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9476">用户将无法覆盖禁用的数据类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9476">用户将无法覆盖禁用的数据类型。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9477">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9477">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9478">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9478">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9479">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9479">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9480">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9480">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9481">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9481">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9482">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9482">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9483">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9483">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9484">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9484">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9485">GP 唯一名称: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9485">GP 唯一名称: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9486">GP 名称: 配置从同步中排除的类型列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9486">GP 名称: 配置从同步中排除的类型列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9487">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9487">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9488">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9488">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9489">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9489">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9490">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9490">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9491">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9491">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9492">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9492">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9493">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9493">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9494">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9494">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9495">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9495">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9496">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9496">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9497">首选项密钥名称: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9497">首选项密钥名称: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9498">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9498">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9499">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9499">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9500">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9500">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9501">对本地信任密钥启用 TLS 1.3 安全功能。 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9501">对本地信任密钥启用 TLS 1.3 安全功能。 (过时)</span></span>
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-9502">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 85 之后无法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9502">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 85 之后无法使用。</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9503">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9503">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9504">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 81 上 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9504">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 81 上 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9505">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9505">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9506">此策略仅为短期机制，旨在为企业提供更多时间升级受影响的代理。因此，目前已不再工作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9506">此策略仅为短期机制，旨在为企业提供更多时间升级受影响的代理。因此，目前已不再工作。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9507">此策略控制 TLS 1.3 中的安全功能，该功能可保护连接免遭降级攻击。它向后兼容，不会影响与兼容的 TLS 1.2 服务器或代理的连接。但是，某些较旧版本的拦截 TLS 代理有实现缺陷，导致它们不兼容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9507">此策略控制 TLS 1.3 中的安全功能，该功能可保护连接免遭降级攻击。它向后兼容，不会影响与兼容的 TLS 1.2 服务器或代理的连接。但是，某些较旧版本的拦截 TLS 代理有实现缺陷，导致它们不兼容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9508">如果启用此策略或不对其进行设置，Microsoft Edge 将为所有连接启用这些安全保护。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9508">如果启用此策略或不对其进行设置，Microsoft Edge 将为所有连接启用这些安全保护。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9509">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会针对通过本地安装的 CA 证书进行身份验证的连接禁用这些安全保护。对于通过公共信任的 CA 证书进行身份验证的连接，将始终启用这些保护。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9509">如果禁用此策略，Microsoft Edge 会针对通过本地安装的 CA 证书进行身份验证的连接禁用这些安全保护。对于通过公共信任的 CA 证书进行身份验证的连接，将始终启用这些保护。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9510">此策略可用于测试任何受影响的代理并对其进行升级。受影响的代理预期会导致连接失败，错误代码为“ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9510">此策略可用于测试任何受影响的代理并对其进行升级。受影响的代理预期会导致连接失败，错误代码为“ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED”。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9511">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9511">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9512">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9512">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9513">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9513">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9514">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9514">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9515">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9515">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9516">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9516">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9517">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9517">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9518">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9518">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9519">GP 唯一名称: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9519">GP 唯一名称: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9520">GP 名称: 对本地信任密钥启用 TLS 1.3 安全功能。 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9520">GP 名称: 对本地信任密钥启用 TLS 1.3 安全功能。 (过时)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9521">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9521">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9522">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9522">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9523">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9523">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9524">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9524">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9525">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9525">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9526">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9526">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9527">值名称: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9527">值名称: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9528">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9528">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9529">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9529">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9530">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9530">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9531">首选项密钥名称: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9531">首选项密钥名称: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9532">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9532">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9533">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9533">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9534">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9534">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9535">指定要禁用的 TLS 密码套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9535">指定要禁用的 TLS 密码套件</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9536">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9536">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9537">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9537">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9538">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9538">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9539">配置为 TLS 连接禁用的密码套件的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9539">配置为 TLS 连接禁用的密码套件的列表。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9540">如果配置此策略，则不会在建立 TLS 连接时使用配置的密码套件列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9540">如果配置此策略，则不会在建立 TLS 连接时使用配置的密码套件列表。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9541">如果未配置此策略，则浏览器将选择要使用的 TLS 密码套件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9541">如果未配置此策略，则浏览器将选择要使用的 TLS 密码套件。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9542">要禁用的密码套件值被指定为 16 位十六进制值。这些值由 Internet 分配的号码颁发机构（IANA）注册表指定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9542">要禁用的密码套件值被指定为 16 位十六进制值。这些值由 Internet 分配的号码颁发机构（IANA）注册表指定。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9543">TLS 1.3 需要 TLS 1.3 密码套件 TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256（0x1301），并且无法通过此策略禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9543">TLS 1.3 需要 TLS 1.3 密码套件 TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256（0x1301），并且无法通过此策略禁用。</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9544">此策略不会影响基于QUIC的连接。可以通过 [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) 策略关闭 QUIC。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9544">此策略不会影响基于QUIC的连接。可以通过 [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) 策略关闭 QUIC。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9545">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9545">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9546">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9546">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9547">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9547">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9548">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9548">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9549">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9549">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9550">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9550">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9551">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9551">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9552">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9552">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9553">GP 唯一名称: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9553">GP 唯一名称: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9554">GP 名称: 指定要禁用的 TLS 密码套件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9554">GP 名称: 指定要禁用的 TLS 密码套件</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9555">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9555">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9556">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9556">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9557">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9557">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9558">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9558">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9559">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9559">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9560">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9560">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9561">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9561">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9562">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9562">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9563">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9563">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9564">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9564">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9565">首选项密钥名称: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9565">首选项密钥名称: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9566">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9566">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9567">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9567">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9568">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9568">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9569">允许冻结后台标签页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9569">允许冻结后台标签页</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9570">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9570">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9571">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9571">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 79</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9572">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9572">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9573">控制 Microsoft Edge 是否可以将后台中的标签页至少冻结 5 分钟。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9573">控制 Microsoft Edge 是否可以将后台中的标签页至少冻结 5 分钟。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9574">标签页冻结可减少 CPU、电池和内存的使用量。Microsoft Edge 使用试探法来避免冻结在后台执行有用工作(例如显示通知、播放声音和流式传输视频)的标签页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9574">标签页冻结可减少 CPU、电池和内存的使用量。Microsoft Edge 使用试探法来避免冻结在后台执行有用工作(例如显示通知、播放声音和流式传输视频)的标签页。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9575">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则后台中已至少存在 5 分钟的标签页可能会被冻结。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9575">如果启用此策略或未配置此策略，则后台中已至少存在 5 分钟的标签页可能会被冻结。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9576">如果禁用此策略，则不会冻结任何标签页。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9576">如果禁用此策略，则不会冻结任何标签页。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9577">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9577">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9578">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9578">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9579">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9579">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9580">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9580">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9581">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9581">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9582">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9582">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9583">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9583">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9584">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9584">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9585">GP 唯一名称: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9585">GP 唯一名称: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9586">GP 名称: 允许冻结后台标签页</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9586">GP 名称: 允许冻结后台标签页</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9587">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9587">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9590">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9590">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9591">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9591">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9592">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9592">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9593">值名称: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9593">值名称: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9594">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9594">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9596">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9596">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>

<false/>

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9599">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9599">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9600">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9600">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9601">启用在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9601">启用在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9602">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9602">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9603">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9603">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9604">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9604">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9605">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程。如果禁用此策略，用户将无法结束进程，并且浏览器任务管理器中的“结束进程”按钮将被禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9605">如果启用或未配置此策略，用户可以在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程。如果禁用此策略，用户将无法结束进程，并且浏览器任务管理器中的“结束进程”按钮将被禁用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9606">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9606">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9607">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9607">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9608">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9608">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9609">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9609">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9610">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9610">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9611">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9611">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9612">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9612">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9613">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9613">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9614">GP 唯一名称: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9614">GP 唯一名称: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9615">GP 名称: 启用在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9615">GP 名称: 启用在浏览器任务管理器中结束进程</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9616">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9616">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9617">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9617">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9618">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9618">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9619">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9619">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9620">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9620">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9621">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9621">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9622">值名称: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9622">值名称: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9623">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9623">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9624">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9624">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9625">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9625">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9626">首选项密钥名称: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9626">首选项密钥名称: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9627">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9627">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9628">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9628">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9629">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9629">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9630">设置单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存限制(MB)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9630">设置单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存限制(MB)。</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9631">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9631">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9632">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9632">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9633">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9633">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9634">配置在标签页开始被放弃以节省内存之前，单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存量。将释放该标签页所使用的内存，并且当切换到该标签页时，必须对其重新加载。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9634">配置在标签页开始被放弃以节省内存之前，单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存量。将释放该标签页所使用的内存，并且当切换到该标签页时，必须对其重新加载。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9635">如果启用此策略，则当超出限制时，浏览器将开始放弃标签页以节省内存。但不能保证浏览器始终在限制下运行。低于 1024 的任何值都将舍入为 1024。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9635">如果启用此策略，则当超出限制时，浏览器将开始放弃标签页以节省内存。但不能保证浏览器始终在限制下运行。低于 1024 的任何值都将舍入为 1024。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9636">如果未设置此策略，则在检测到计算机上的物理内存较少时，浏览器将仅尝试节省内存。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9636">如果未设置此策略，则在检测到计算机上的物理内存较少时，浏览器将仅尝试节省内存。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9637">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9637">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9638">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9638">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9639">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9639">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9640">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9640">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9641">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9641">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9642">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9642">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9643">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9643">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9644">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9644">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9645">GP 唯一名称: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9645">GP 唯一名称: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9646">GP 名称: 设置单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存限制(MB)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9646">GP 名称: 设置单个 Microsoft Edge 实例可以使用的内存限制(MB)。</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9647">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9647">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9648">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9648">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9649">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9649">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9650">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9650">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9651">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9651">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9652">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9652">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9653">值名称: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9653">值名称: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9654">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9654">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9655">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9655">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000800
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9656">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9656">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9657">首选项密钥名称: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9657">首选项密钥名称: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9658">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9658">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9659">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9659">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9660">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9660">TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9661">阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9661">阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9662">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9662">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9663">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9663">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 78</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9664">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9664">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9665">允许决定是否阻止网站跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9665">允许决定是否阻止网站跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9666">如果禁用或不配置此策略，则用户可以设置自己的跟踪保护的级别。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9666">如果禁用或不配置此策略，则用户可以设置自己的跟踪保护的级别。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9667">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9667">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9668">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = 关(无跟踪保护)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9668">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = 关(无跟踪保护)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9669">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = 基本（阻止有害的跟踪器，内容和广告将被个性化）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9669">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = 基本（阻止有害的跟踪器，内容和广告将被个性化）</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9670">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = 平衡(阻止有害跟踪器以及来自用户尚未访问的站点的跟踪器；内容和广告的个性化程度将较低)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9670">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = 平衡(阻止有害跟踪器以及来自用户尚未访问的站点的跟踪器；内容和广告的个性化程度将较低)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9671">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = 严格(阻止有害的跟踪器以及来自所有站点的大多数跟踪器；内容和广告将具有最低的个性化程度。站点的某些部分可能不起作用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9671">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = 严格(阻止有害的跟踪器以及来自所有站点的大多数跟踪器；内容和广告将具有最低的个性化程度。站点的某些部分可能不起作用)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9672">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9672">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9673">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9673">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9674">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9674">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9675">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9675">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9676">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9676">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9677">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9677">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9678">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9678">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9679">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9679">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9680">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9680">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9681">GP 唯一名称: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9681">GP 唯一名称: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9682">GP 名称: 阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9682">GP 名称: 阻止跟踪用户的 Web 浏览活动</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9683">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9683">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9684">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9684">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9685">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9685">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9686">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9686">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9687">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9687">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9688">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9688">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9689">值名称: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9689">值名称: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9690">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9690">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9691">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9691">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9692">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9692">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9693">首选项密钥名称: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9693">首选项密钥名称: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9694">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9694">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9695">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9695">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9696">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9696">TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9697">启用翻译</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9697">启用翻译</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9698">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9698">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9699">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9699">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9700">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9700">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9701">在 Microsoft Edge 上启用集成式 Microsoft 翻译服务。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9701">在 Microsoft Edge 上启用集成式 Microsoft 翻译服务。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9702">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会在适当的情况下显示集成式翻译浮出控件，以及右键单击上下文菜单中的翻译选项，来为用户提供翻译功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9702">如果启用此策略，则 Microsoft Edge 会在适当的情况下显示集成式翻译浮出控件，以及右键单击上下文菜单中的翻译选项，来为用户提供翻译功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9703">禁用此策略可以禁用所有内置翻译功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9703">禁用此策略可以禁用所有内置翻译功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9704">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否使用翻译功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9704">如果未配置此策略，则用户可以选择是否使用翻译功能。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9705">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9705">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9706">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9706">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9707">可以推荐: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9707">可以推荐: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9708">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9708">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9709">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9709">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9710">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9710">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9711">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9711">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9712">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9712">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9713">GP 唯一名称: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9713">GP 唯一名称: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9714">GP 名称: 启用翻译</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9714">GP 名称: 启用翻译</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9715">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9715">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9716">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9716">GP 路径 (推荐): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge - 默认设置（用户可以覆盖）/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9717">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9717">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9718">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9718">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9719">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9719">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
