  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9720">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9720">路径 (推荐): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\推荐</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9721">值名称: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9721">值名称: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9722">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9722">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9723">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9723">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9724">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9724">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9725">首选项密钥名称: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9725">首选项密钥名称: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9726">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9726">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9727">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9727">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9728">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9728">URLAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9729">定义允许的 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9729">定义允许的 URL 列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9730">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9730">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9731">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9731">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9732">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9732">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9733">允许访问列出的 URL，作为 URL 阻止名单的例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9733">允许访问列出的 URL，作为 URL 阻止名单的例外。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9734">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式的格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9734">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式的格式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9735">可以使用此策略对限制性阻止名单设置例外。例如，可以在阻止名单中包含 "\*" 以阻止所有请求，然后使用此策略允许访问受限制的 URL 列表。可以使用此策略对某些方案、其他域的子域、端口或特定路径设置例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9735">可以使用此策略对限制性阻止名单设置例外。例如，可以在阻止名单中包含 "\*" 以阻止所有请求，然后使用此策略允许访问受限制的 URL 列表。可以使用此策略对某些方案、其他域的子域、端口或特定路径设置例外。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9736">最具体的筛选器会确定是阻止还是允许 URL。允许列表优先于阻止名单。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9736">最具体的筛选器会确定是阻止还是允许 URL。允许列表优先于阻止名单。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9737">此策略不得超过 1000 个条目；后续条目将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9737">此策略不得超过 1000 个条目；后续条目将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9738">此策略还允许浏览器自动调用注册为“tel:”或“ssh:”等协议的协议处理程序的外部应用程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9738">此策略还允许浏览器自动调用注册为“tel:”或“ssh:”等协议的协议处理程序的外部应用程序。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9739">如果未配置此策略，则 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 策略中的阻止名单没有例外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9739">如果未配置此策略，则 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 策略中的阻止名单没有例外。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9740">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9740">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9741">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9741">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9742">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9742">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9743">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9743">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9744">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9744">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9745">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9745">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9746">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9746">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9747">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9747">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9748">GP 唯一名称: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9748">GP 唯一名称: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9749">GP 名称: 定义允许的 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9749">GP 名称: 定义允许的 URL 列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9750">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9750">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9751">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9751">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9752">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9752">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9753">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9753">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9754">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9754">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9755">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9755">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9756">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9756">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9757">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9757">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9758">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9758">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9759">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9759">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9760">首选项密钥名称: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9760">首选项密钥名称: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9761">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9761">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9762">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9762">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9763">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9763">URLBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9764">阻止访问 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9764">阻止访问 URL 列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9765">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9765">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9766">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9766">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9767">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9767">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9768">根据 URL 模式定义被阻止的站点列表(你的用户无法加载它们)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9768">根据 URL 模式定义被阻止的站点列表(你的用户无法加载它们)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9769">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9769">根据 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) 设置 URL 模式格式。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9770">你可以在 [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) 策略中定义例外。这些策略不得超过 1000 个条目；后续条目将被忽略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9770">你可以在 [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) 策略中定义例外。这些策略不得超过 1000 个条目；后续条目将被忽略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9771">请注意，不建议阻止内部 "edge://\*" URL - 这可能会导致意外错误。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9771">请注意，不建议阻止内部 "edge://\*" URL - 这可能会导致意外错误。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9772">此策略不会阻止页面通过 JavaScript 动态更新。例如，如果你阻止 "contoso.com/abc"，那么只要页面不刷新，用户或许仍然可以访问 "contoso.com" 并单击链接来访问 "contoso.com/abc"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9772">此策略不会阻止页面通过 JavaScript 动态更新。例如，如果你阻止 "contoso.com/abc"，那么只要页面不刷新，用户或许仍然可以访问 "contoso.com" 并单击链接来访问 "contoso.com/abc"。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9773">如果你未配置此策略，则不会阻止任何 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9773">如果你未配置此策略，则不会阻止任何 URL。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9774">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9774">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9775">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9775">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9776">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9776">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9777">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9777">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9778">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9778">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9779">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9779">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9780">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9780">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9781">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9781">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9782">GP 唯一名称: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9782">GP 唯一名称: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9783">GP 名称: 阻止访问 URL 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9783">GP 名称: 阻止访问 URL 列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9784">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9784">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9785">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9785">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9786">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9786">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9787">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9787">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9788">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9788">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9789">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9789">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9790">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9790">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9791">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9791">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9792">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9792">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9793">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9793">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9794">首选项密钥名称: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9794">首选项密钥名称: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9795">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9795">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9796">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9796">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9797">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9797">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9798">启用用户代理客户端提示功能 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9798">启用用户代理客户端提示功能 (已弃用)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-9799">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9799">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9800">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9800">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9801">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9801">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9802">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9802">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9803">已弃用此策略，因为它仅为短期机制，旨在为企业提供更多时间升级其 Web 内容(如果发现与“用户代理客户端提示”功能不兼容的话)。它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 89 中起作用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9803">已弃用此策略，因为它仅为短期机制，旨在为企业提供更多时间升级其 Web 内容(如果发现与“用户代理客户端提示”功能不兼容的话)。它将无法在 Microsoft Edge 版本 89 中起作用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9804">启用此策略时，“用户代理客户端提示”功能会发送粒度请求标题，提供与用户浏览器相关的信息(例如，浏览器版本)和环境(例如，系统体系结构)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9804">启用此策略时，“用户代理客户端提示”功能会发送粒度请求标题，提供与用户浏览器相关的信息(例如，浏览器版本)和环境(例如，系统体系结构)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9805">此策略虽然是累加功能，但新标题可能破坏某些限制请求可能包含的字符的网站。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9805">此策略虽然是累加功能，但新标题可能破坏某些限制请求可能包含的字符的网站。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9806">如果启用或未配置此策略，将启用“用户代理客户端提示”功能。如果禁用此策略，则此功能不可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9806">如果启用或未配置此策略，将启用“用户代理客户端提示”功能。如果禁用此策略，则此功能不可用。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9807">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9807">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9808">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9808">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9809">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9809">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9810">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9810">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9811">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9811">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9812">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9812">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9813">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9813">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9814">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9814">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9815">GP 唯一名称: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9815">GP 唯一名称: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9816">GP 名称: 启用用户代理客户端提示功能 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9816">GP 名称: 启用用户代理客户端提示功能 (已弃用)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9817">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9817">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9818">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9818">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9819">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9819">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9820">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9820">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9821">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9821">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9822">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9822">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9823">值名称: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9823">值名称: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9824">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9824">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9825">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9825">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9826">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9826">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9827">首选项密钥名称: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9827">首选项密钥名称: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9828">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9828">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9829">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9829">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9830">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9830">UserDataDir</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9831">设置用户数据目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9831">设置用户数据目录</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9832">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9832">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9833">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9833">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9834">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9834">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9835">设置用于存储用户数据的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9835">设置用于存储用户数据的目录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9836">如果启用此策略，那么无论用户是否已设置了 "--user-data-dir" 命令行标志，Microsoft Edge 都会使用指定的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9836">如果启用此策略，那么无论用户是否已设置了 "--user-data-dir" 命令行标志，Microsoft Edge 都会使用指定的目录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9837">如果未启用此策略，则使用默认用户配置路径，但用户可以使用 "--user-data-dir" 标志覆盖它。用户可以在用户配置路径下的 edge://version/ 中找到该用户配置的目录。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9837">如果未启用此策略，则使用默认用户配置路径，但用户可以使用 "--user-data-dir" 标志覆盖它。用户可以在用户配置路径下的 edge://version/ 中找到该用户配置的目录。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9838">为避免数据丢失或其他错误，请不要将此策略配置为卷的根目录或用于其他用途的目录，因为 Microsoft Edge 会管理其内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9838">为避免数据丢失或其他错误，请不要将此策略配置为卷的根目录或用于其他用途的目录，因为 Microsoft Edge 会管理其内容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9839">有关可以使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9839">有关可以使用的变量列表，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9840">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9840">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9841">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9841">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9842">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9842">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9843">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9843">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9844">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9844">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9845">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9845">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9846">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9846">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9847">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9847">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9848">GP 唯一名称: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9848">GP 唯一名称: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9849">GP 名称: 设置用户数据目录</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9849">GP 名称: 设置用户数据目录</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9850">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9850">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9851">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9851">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9852">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9852">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9853">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9853">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9854">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9854">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9855">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9855">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9856">值名称: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9856">值名称: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9857">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9857">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9858">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9858">示例值:</span></span>
```
"${users}/${user_name}/Edge"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9859">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9859">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9860">首选项密钥名称: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9860">首选项密钥名称: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9861">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9861">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${users}/${user_name}/Edge</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9862">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9862">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9863">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9863">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9864">限制保留的用于紧急回退的用户数据快照的数量</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9864">限制保留的用于紧急回退的用户数据快照的数量</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9865">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9865">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9866">在 Windows 自 86 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9866">在 Windows 自 86 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9867">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9867">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9868">在每个主要版本更新之后，Microsoft Edge 将创建用户部分浏览数据的快照，以便在以后遇到需要临时回退版本的紧急情况时使用。如果对用户具有相应快照的版本执行临时回退，则会还原快照中的数据。这可让用户保留书签和自动填充数据等设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9868">在每个主要版本更新之后，Microsoft Edge 将创建用户部分浏览数据的快照，以便在以后遇到需要临时回退版本的紧急情况时使用。如果对用户具有相应快照的版本执行临时回退，则会还原快照中的数据。这可让用户保留书签和自动填充数据等设置。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9869">如果不设置此策略，则会使用 3 个快照的默认值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9869">如果不设置此策略，则会使用 3 个快照的默认值。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9870">如果你设置了此策略，则会根据需要删除旧快照以遵守你设置的限制。如果将此策略设置为 0，则不会使用任何快照。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9870">如果你设置了此策略，则会根据需要删除旧快照以遵守你设置的限制。如果将此策略设置为 0，则不会使用任何快照。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9871">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9871">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9872">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9872">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9873">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9873">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9874">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9874">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9875">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9875">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9876">整数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9876">整数</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9877">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9877">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9878">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9878">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9879">GP 唯一名称: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9879">GP 唯一名称: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9880">GP 名称: 限制保留的用于紧急回退的用户数据快照的数量</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9880">GP 名称: 限制保留的用于紧急回退的用户数据快照的数量</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9881">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9881">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9882">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9882">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9883">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9883">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9884">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9884">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9885">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9885">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9886">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9886">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9887">值名称: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9887">值名称: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9888">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9888">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9889">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9889">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000003
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9890">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9890">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9891">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9891">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9892">允许用户反馈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9892">允许用户反馈</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9893">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9893">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9894">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9894">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9895">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9895">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9896">Microsoft Edge 使用 Microsoft Edge 反馈功能(默认情况下已启用)来允许用户发送反馈、建议或客户调查，以及报告任何浏览器问题。另外，默认情况下，用户不能禁用(关闭) Microsoft Edge 反馈功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9896">Microsoft Edge 使用 Microsoft Edge 反馈功能(默认情况下已启用)来允许用户发送反馈、建议或客户调查，以及报告任何浏览器问题。另外，默认情况下，用户不能禁用(关闭) Microsoft Edge 反馈功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9897">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以调用 Microsoft Edge 反馈。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9897">如果启用或未配置此策略，则用户可以调用 Microsoft Edge 反馈。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9898">如果禁用此策略，则用户不能调用 Microsoft Edge 反馈。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9898">如果禁用此策略，则用户不能调用 Microsoft Edge 反馈。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9899">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9899">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9900">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9900">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9901">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9901">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9902">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9902">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9903">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9903">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9904">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9904">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9905">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9905">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9906">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9906">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9907">GP 唯一名称: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9907">GP 唯一名称: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9908">GP 名称: 允许用户反馈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9908">GP 名称: 允许用户反馈</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9909">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9909">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9910">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9910">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9911">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9911">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9912">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9912">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9913">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9913">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9914">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9914">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9915">值名称: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9915">值名称: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9916">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9916">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9917">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9917">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9918">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9918">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9919">首选项密钥名称: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9919">首选项密钥名称: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9920">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9920">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9921">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9921">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9922">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9922">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9923">允许或阻止视频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9923">允许或阻止视频捕获</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9924">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9924">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9925">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9925">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9926">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9926">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9927">控制站点是否可以捕获视频。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9927">控制站点是否可以捕获视频。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9928">如果已启用或未配置(默认)，则将询问用户有关所有站点的视频捕获访问权限的信息，但在 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 策略列表中配置了 URL 的站点除外，这些站点将被授予访问权限而不进行提示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9928">如果已启用或未配置(默认)，则将询问用户有关所有站点的视频捕获访问权限的信息，但在 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 策略列表中配置了 URL 的站点除外，这些站点将被授予访问权限而不进行提示。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9929">如果禁用此策略，则不会提示用户，且视频捕获仅适用于 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 策略中配置的 URL。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9929">如果禁用此策略，则不会提示用户，且视频捕获仅适用于 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 策略中配置的 URL。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9930">此策略影响所有类型的视频输入，而不只是内置摄像头。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9930">此策略影响所有类型的视频输入，而不只是内置摄像头。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9931">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9931">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9932">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9932">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9933">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9933">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9934">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9934">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9935">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9935">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9936">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9936">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9937">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9937">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9938">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9938">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9939">GP 唯一名称: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9939">GP 唯一名称: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9940">GP 名称: 允许或阻止视频捕获</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9940">GP 名称: 允许或阻止视频捕获</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9941">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9941">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9942">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9942">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9943">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9943">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9944">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9944">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9945">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9945">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9946">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9946">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9947">值名称: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9947">值名称: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9948">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9948">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9949">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9949">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9950">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9950">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9951">首选项密钥名称: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9951">首选项密钥名称: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9952">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9952">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9953">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9953">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9954">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9954">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9955">无需请求许可即可访问视频捕获设备的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9955">无需请求许可即可访问视频捕获设备的站点</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9956">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9956">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9957">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9957">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9958">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9958">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9959">根据 URL 模式指定无需用户许可即可使用视频捕获设备的网站。该列表中的模式将与请求 URL 的安全来源进行匹配。如果匹配，站点将自动获得视频捕获设备的访问权限。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9959">根据 URL 模式指定无需用户许可即可使用视频捕获设备的网站。该列表中的模式将与请求 URL 的安全来源进行匹配。如果匹配，站点将自动获得视频捕获设备的访问权限。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9960">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9960">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9961">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9961">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9962">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9962">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9963">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9963">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9964">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9964">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9965">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9965">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9966">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9966">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9967">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9967">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9968">GP 唯一名称: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9968">GP 唯一名称: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9969">GP 名称: 无需请求许可即可访问视频捕获设备的站点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9969">GP 名称: 无需请求许可即可访问视频捕获设备的站点</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9970">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9970">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9971">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9971">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9972">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9972">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9973">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9973">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9974">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9974">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9975">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9975">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9976">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9976">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9977">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9977">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9978">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9978">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9979">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9979">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9980">首选项密钥名称: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9980">首选项密钥名称: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9981">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9981">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9982">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9982">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9983">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9983">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9984">设置 WPAD 优化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9984">设置 WPAD 优化</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9985">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9985">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9986">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9986">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9987">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9987">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9988">允许你在 Microsoft Edge 中关闭 WPAD (Web 代理自动发现)优化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9988">允许你在 Microsoft Edge 中关闭 WPAD (Web 代理自动发现)优化。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9989">如果禁用此策略，则会禁用 WPAD 优化，这会使浏览器等待基于 DNS 的 WPAD 服务器更长时间。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9989">如果禁用此策略，则会禁用 WPAD 优化，这会使浏览器等待基于 DNS 的 WPAD 服务器更长时间。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9990">如果启用或未配置此策略，则会启用 WPAD 优化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9990">如果启用或未配置此策略，则会启用 WPAD 优化。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-9991">无论是否或如何启用此策略，用户都无法更改 WPAD 优化设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9991">无论是否或如何启用此策略，用户都无法更改 WPAD 优化设置。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9992">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9992">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9993">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9993">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9994">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9994">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9995">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9995">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9996">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9996">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9997">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9997">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9998">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9998">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-9999">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-9999">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10000">GP 唯一名称: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10000">GP 唯一名称: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10001">GP 名称: 设置 WPAD 优化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10001">GP 名称: 设置 WPAD 优化</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10002">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10002">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10003">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10003">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10004">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10004">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10005">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10005">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10006">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10006">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10007">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10007">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10008">值名称: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10008">值名称: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10009">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10009">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10010">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10010">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10011">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10011">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10012">首选项密钥名称: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10012">首选项密钥名称: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10013">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10013">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10014">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10014">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10015">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10015">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10016">配置强制安装的 Web 应用列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10016">配置强制安装的 Web 应用列表</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10017">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10017">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10018">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10018">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10019">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10019">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10020">配置此策略可指定无需用户交互即可自行安装，且用户无法卸载或关闭的 web 应用列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10020">配置此策略可指定无需用户交互即可自行安装，且用户无法卸载或关闭的 web 应用列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10021">该策略的每个列表项都是必需包含成员的对象：url（要安装的 web 应用的网址）和 2 个可选成员： default_launch_container（指定 web 应用打开时所使用的窗口模式 - 默认打开新的标签页），以及 create_desktop_shortcut（如果你要创建 Linux 和 Windows 桌面快捷方式，则为 TRUE）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10021">该策略的每个列表项都是必需包含成员的对象：url（要安装的 web 应用的网址）和 2 个可选成员： default_launch_container（指定 web 应用打开时所使用的窗口模式 - 默认打开新的标签页），以及 create_desktop_shortcut（如果你要创建 Linux 和 Windows 桌面快捷方式，则为 TRUE）。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10022">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10022">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10023">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10023">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10024">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10024">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10025">动态策略刷新: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10025">动态策略刷新: 是</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10026">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10026">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10027">字典</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10027">字典</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10028">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10028">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10029">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10029">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10030">GP 唯一名称: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10030">GP 唯一名称: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10031">GP 名称: 配置强制安装的 Web 应用列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10031">GP 名称: 配置强制安装的 Web 应用列表</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10032">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10032">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10033">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10033">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10034">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10034">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10035">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10035">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10036">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10036">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10037">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10037">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10038">值名称: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10038">值名称: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10039">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10039">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10040">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10040">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10041">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10041">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10042">首选项密钥名称: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10042">首选项密钥名称: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10043">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10043">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10044">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10044">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10045">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10045">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10046">在 M84 之前重新启用 Web 组件 v0 API (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10046">在 M84 之前重新启用 Web 组件 v0 API (过时)</span></span>
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-10047">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 84 之后无法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10047">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 84 之后无法使用。</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10048">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10048">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10049">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 80 上 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10049">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 80 上 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10050">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10050">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10051">此策略不起作用，因为此策略允许在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 之前选择性地重新启用这些功能。Web 组件 v0 API (影子 DOM v0、自定义元素 v0 和 HTML 导入)已于 2018 年弃用，默认情况下，自 Microsoft Edge 版本 80 开始禁用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10051">此策略不起作用，因为此策略允许在 Microsoft Edge 版本 85 之前选择性地重新启用这些功能。Web 组件 v0 API (影子 DOM v0、自定义元素 v0 和 HTML 导入)已于 2018 年弃用，默认情况下，自 Microsoft Edge 版本 80 开始禁用。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10052">如果将此策略设置为“True”，则将对所有站点启用 Web 组件 v0 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10052">如果将此策略设置为“True”，则将对所有站点启用 Web 组件 v0 功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10053">如果将此策略设置为“False”或未设置此策略，自 Microsoft Edge 版本 80 开始，默认将禁用 Web 组件 v0 功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10053">如果将此策略设置为“False”或未设置此策略，自 Microsoft Edge 版本 80 开始，默认将禁用 Web 组件 v0 功能。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10054">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10054">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10055">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10055">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10056">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10056">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10057">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10057">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10058">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10058">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10059">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10059">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10060">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10060">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10061">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10061">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10062">GP 唯一名称: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10062">GP 唯一名称: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10063">GP 名称: 在 M84 之前重新启用 Web 组件 v0 API (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10063">GP 名称: 在 M84 之前重新启用 Web 组件 v0 API (过时)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10064">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10064">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10065">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10065">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10066">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10066">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10067">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10067">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10068">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10068">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10069">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10069">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10070">值名称: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10070">值名称: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10071">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10071">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10072">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10072">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10073">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10073">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10074">首选项密钥名称: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10074">首选项密钥名称: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10075">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10075">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10076">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10076">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10077">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10077">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10078">允许 WebDriver 覆盖不兼容的策略 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10078">允许 WebDriver 覆盖不兼容的策略 (过时)</span></span>
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-10079">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 84 之后无法使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10079">过时: 此策略已过时，在 Microsoft Edge 84 之后无法使用。</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10080">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10080">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10081">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 77 上 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10081">在 Windows 后，在 macOS 和 77 上 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10082">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10082">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10083">此策略不起作用，因为 WebDriver 现在与所有现有策略兼容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10083">此策略不起作用，因为 WebDriver 现在与所有现有策略兼容。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10084">此策略允许使用 WebDriver 功能的用户覆盖 可能干扰该其运行的策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10084">此策略允许使用 WebDriver 功能的用户覆盖 可能干扰该其运行的策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10085">目前此策略禁用 [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 和 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10085">目前此策略禁用 [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 和 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 策略。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10086">如果启用该策略，WebDriver 将能够覆盖不兼容的 策略。 如果禁用或未配置此策略，则 WebDriver 将无法 覆盖不兼容的策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10086">如果启用该策略，WebDriver 将能够覆盖不兼容的 策略。 如果禁用或未配置此策略，则 WebDriver 将无法 覆盖不兼容的策略。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10087">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10087">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10088">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10088">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10089">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10089">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10090">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10090">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10091">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10091">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10092">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10092">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10093">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10093">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10094">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10094">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10095">GP 唯一名称: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10095">GP 唯一名称: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10096">GP 名称: 允许 WebDriver 覆盖不兼容的策略 (过时)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10096">GP 名称: 允许 WebDriver 覆盖不兼容的策略 (过时)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10097">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10097">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10098">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10098">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10099">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10099">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10100">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10100">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10101">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10101">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10102">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10102">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10103">值名称: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10103">值名称: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10104">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10104">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10105">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10105">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10106">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10106">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10107">首选项密钥名称: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10107">首选项密钥名称: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10108">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10108">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10109">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10109">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10110">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10110">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10111">管理 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10111">管理 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10112">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10112">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10113">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10113">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 80</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10114">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10114">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10115">指定本地 IP 地址应由 WebRTC 公开的源(URL)或主机名模式(如 "*contoso.com*")的列表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10115">指定本地 IP 地址应由 WebRTC 公开的源(URL)或主机名模式(如 "*contoso.com*")的列表。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10116">如果启用此策略并设置源(URL)或主机名模式列表，那么当启用 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns 时，对于与列表中的模式匹配的情况，WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10116">如果启用此策略并设置源(URL)或主机名模式列表，那么当启用 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns 时，对于与列表中的模式匹配的情况，WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10117">如果禁用或未配置此策略，并且启用了 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns，则 WebRTC 将不会公开本地 IP 地址。本地 IP 地址用 mDNS 主机名隐藏。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10117">如果禁用或未配置此策略，并且启用了 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns，则 WebRTC 将不会公开本地 IP 地址。本地 IP 地址用 mDNS 主机名隐藏。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10118">如果启用、禁用或未配置此策略，并且禁用了 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns，则 WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10118">如果启用、禁用或未配置此策略，并且禁用了 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns，则 WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10119">请注意，此策略会削弱管理员可能需要的本地 IP 地址保护。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10119">请注意，此策略会削弱管理员可能需要的本地 IP 地址保护。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10120">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10120">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10121">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10121">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10122">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10122">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10123">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10123">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10124">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10124">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10125">字符串列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10125">字符串列表</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10126">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10126">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10127">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10127">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10128">GP 唯一名称: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10128">GP 唯一名称: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10129">GP 名称: 管理 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10129">GP 名称: 管理 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10130">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10130">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10131">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10131">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10132">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10132">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10133">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10133">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10134">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10134">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10135">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10135">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10136">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10136">值名称: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10137">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10137">值类型: REG_SZ 列表</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10138">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10138">示例值:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10139">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10139">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10140">首选项密钥名称: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10140">首选项密钥名称: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10141">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10141">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10142">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10142">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10143">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10143">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10144">限制 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10144">限制 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10145">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10145">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10146">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10146">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10147">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10147">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10148">允许你设置 WebRTC 是否公开用户的本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10148">允许你设置 WebRTC 是否公开用户的本地 IP 地址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10149">如果将此策略设置为“AllowAllInterfaces”或“AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces”，则 WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10149">如果将此策略设置为“AllowAllInterfaces”或“AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces”，则 WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10150">如果将此策略设置为“AllowPublicInterfaceOnly”或“DisableNonProxiedUdp”，则 WebRTC 不会公开本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10150">如果将此策略设置为“AllowPublicInterfaceOnly”或“DisableNonProxiedUdp”，则 WebRTC 不会公开本地 IP 地址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10151">如果未设置此策略，或者如果禁用它，则 WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10151">如果未设置此策略，或者如果禁用它，则 WebRTC 将公开本地 IP 地址。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10152">策略选项映射：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10152">策略选项映射：</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10153">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = 允许使用所有接口。这会公开本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10153">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = 允许使用所有接口。这会公开本地 IP 地址</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10154">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = 允许通过 http 默认路由使用公共和专用接口。这会公开本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10154">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = 允许通过 http 默认路由使用公共和专用接口。这会公开本地 IP 地址</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10155">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = 允许通过 http 默认路由使用公共接口。这不会公开本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10155">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = 允许通过 http 默认路由使用公共接口。这不会公开本地 IP 地址</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10156">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = 除非代理服务器支持 UDP，否则，请使用 TCP。这不会公开本地 IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10156">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = 除非代理服务器支持 UDP，否则，请使用 TCP。这不会公开本地 IP 地址</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10157">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10157">配置此策略时，请使用上述信息。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10158">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10158">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10159">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10159">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10160">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10160">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10161">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10161">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10162">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10162">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10163">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10163">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10164">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10164">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10165">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10165">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10166">GP 唯一名称: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10166">GP 唯一名称: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10167">GP 名称: 限制 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10167">GP 名称: 限制 WebRTC 的本地 IP 地址公开</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10168">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10168">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10169">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10169">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10170">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10170">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10171">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10171">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10172">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10172">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10173">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10173">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10174">值名称: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10174">值名称: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10175">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10175">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10176">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10176">示例值:</span></span>
```
"default"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10177">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10177">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10178">首选项密钥名称: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10178">首选项密钥名称: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10179">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10179">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10180">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10180">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10181">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10181">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10182">限制 WebRTC 使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10182">限制 WebRTC 使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10183">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10183">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10184">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10184">由于 Windows 或更高版本，macOS 和 77</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10185">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10185">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10186">将 WebRTC 使用的 UDP 端口范围限制在指定的端口间隔(包括终结点)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10186">将 WebRTC 使用的 UDP 端口范围限制在指定的端口间隔(包括终结点)。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10187">通过配置此策略，可以指定 Webrtc 可以使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10187">通过配置此策略，可以指定 Webrtc 可以使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10188">如果不配置此策略或将其设置为空字符串或无效端口范围，WebRTC 可以使用任何可用的本地 UDP 端口。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10188">如果不配置此策略或将其设置为空字符串或无效端口范围，WebRTC 可以使用任何可用的本地 UDP 端口。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10189">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10189">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10190">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10190">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10191">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10191">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10192">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10192">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10193">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10193">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10194">字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10194">字符串</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10195">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10195">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10196">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10196">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10197">GP 唯一名称: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10197">GP 唯一名称: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10198">GP 名称: 限制 WebRTC 使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10198">GP 名称: 限制 WebRTC 使用的本地 UDP 端口的范围</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10199">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10199">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10200">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10200">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
