  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10201">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10201">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10202">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10202">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10203">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10203">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10204">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10204">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10205">值名称: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10205">值名称: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10206">值类型: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10206">值类型: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10207">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10207">示例值:</span></span>
```
"10000-11999"
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10208">Mac 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10208">Mac 信息和设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10209">首选项密钥名称: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10209">首选项密钥名称: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10210">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10210">示例值:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10211">返回顶部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10211">返回顶部</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---策略)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10212">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10212">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10213">使用 Windows 代理解析程序 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10213">使用 Windows 代理解析程序 (已弃用)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="27a59-10214">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10214">已弃用: 此策略已弃用。目前仍受支持，但将在未来版本中弃用。</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10215">支持的版本:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10215">支持的版本:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10216">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10216">在 Windows 自 84 或之后</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10217">描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10217">描述</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10218">此策略已弃用。在将来的版本中，它将被类似功能取代，请参阅 https://crbug.com/1032820。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10218">此策略已弃用。在将来的版本中，它将被类似功能取代，请参阅 https://crbug.com/1032820。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10219">使用 Windows 解析所有浏览器网络的代理，而不是 Microsoft Edge 中内置的代理解析程序。Windows 代理解析程序可启用诸如 DirectAccess/NRPT 之类的 Windows 代理功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10219">使用 Windows 解析所有浏览器网络的代理，而不是 Microsoft Edge 中内置的代理解析程序。Windows 代理解析程序可启用诸如 DirectAccess/NRPT 之类的 Windows 代理功能。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10220">此策略附带了 https://crbug.com/644030 描述的问题，它会导致 Windows 代码提取和执行 PAC 文件，包括通过 [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) 策略设置的 PAC 文件。由于 PAC 文件的网络提取是通过 Windows 而不是 Microsoft Edge 代码执行的，因此诸如 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 之类的网络策略不适用于 PAC 文件的网络提取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10220">此策略附带了 https://crbug.com/644030 描述的问题，它会导致 Windows 代码提取和执行 PAC 文件，包括通过 [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) 策略设置的 PAC 文件。由于 PAC 文件的网络提取是通过 Windows 而不是 Microsoft Edge 代码执行的，因此诸如 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 之类的网络策略不适用于 PAC 文件的网络提取。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10221">如果启用此策略，则将使用 Windows 代理解析程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10221">如果启用此策略，则将使用 Windows 代理解析程序。</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27a59-10222">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则将使用 Microsoft Edge 代理解析程序。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10222">如果禁用或未配置此策略，则将使用 Microsoft Edge 代理解析程序。</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10223">支持的功能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10223">支持的功能:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10224">可以为必填字段: 是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10224">可以为必填字段: 是</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10225">可以推荐: 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10225">可以推荐: 否</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10226">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10226">动态策略刷新: 否 - 需要重启浏览器</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10227">数据类型:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10227">数据类型:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10228">布尔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10228">布尔</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10229">Windows 信息和设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10229">Windows 信息和设置</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10230">组策略(ADMX)信息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10230">组策略(ADMX)信息</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10231">GP 唯一名称: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10231">GP 唯一名称: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10232">GP 名称: 使用 Windows 代理解析程序 (已弃用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10232">GP 名称: 使用 Windows 代理解析程序 (已弃用)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10233">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10233">GP 路径 (强制): 管理模板/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10234">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10234">GP 路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10235">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10235">GP ADMX 文件名: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10236">Windows 注册表设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10236">Windows 注册表设置</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10237">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10237">路径 (强制): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10238">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10238">路径 (推荐): 不适用</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10239">值名称: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10239">值名称: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10240">值类型: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10240">值类型: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="27a59-10241">示例值:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27a59-10241">示例值:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```
